description-en_US-mobile: Copy, Fax, Scan, Color, 40 ppm, 6.5 seconds, 1200 x 1200 dpi, Monochrome Laser, 80000 pages per month, 500 MHz, USB 2.0, Ethernet, 25.9 kg
description-en_US-print: Streamlined Reliability A smart, reliable option for bringing duplex printing, copying, scanning and high-speed faxing into one machine, with up to 40 ppm and the ability to scan documents straight to e-mail or a flash drive. As Easy as It Gets Right out of the box, youll power through tasks at exceptionally fast speedsup to 40 ppm. Its a breeze to set up, install, and start enjoying the benefit of doing all those multiple tasks on one user-friendly machine. Smarter Printer, Smarter Business The large LCD color touch screen offers amazingly simple access to a rich range of features, including duplex scanning, advanced copying and easy user authorization for enhanced security. You can even customize the touch screen to meet your workgroups specific needs. Small in Size, Huge on Features Enjoy an intelligent, efficient combination of built-in features like duplex printing, copying and scanning plus a front Direct USB port. Gives you the ability to scan to multiple destinations, letting your workgroup breeze through intense workloads. Save the Earth and Money Lower your cost per page while helping conserve resources with up to 9,000*-page or 15,000*-page replacement cartridges. Add that to the automatic duplex printing and the energy savings of consolidating to one smart device, and youre taking big steps toward an eco-conscious workplace. (*Declared yield in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752.)
name: Lexmark X464de

description-en_US-mobile: fi-5530C2 Sheet-Fed Scanner - 600 dpi; 50ppm; 100 ipm
description-en_US-print: Attractive price, outstanding performance and exceptional scanning reliability. -Affordable departmental scanner with a compact footprint (16" wide by 11.5" high) and true, 600-dpi resolution. -Captures up to 50 pages per minute / 100 images per minute (landscape, 200dpi) in color, monochrome, and grayscale. -Versatile A3 paper path handles documents as large as 11" x 17" and as small as 2.1" x 2.9". -Ultrasonic double-feed detection ensures reliable scanning. Even with mixed batches of documents. -Includes Adobe Acrobat Standard, ScandAll Pro and Kofax VRS Professional scanning software. -Enhance productivity with Fujitsu service and support.
name: Fujitsu fi-5530C2

description-de_DE-print: Der neue spritzwassergeschtzte CAMILEO CLIP Full HD Minicamcorder ist der perfekte Outdoor-Begleiter: Klipsen Sie ihn einfach an Ihre Jacke und nehmen Sie die Action auf, wenn Sie mittendrin sind. Mit nur 85 g Gewicht und kaum grer als eine Scheckkarte ist der CAMILEO CLIP nicht nur beraus handlich, sondern auch schnell und einfach zu bedienen. Ein 5MP-CMOS-Sensor mit BSI-Technologie fngt Ihre aufregendsten Abenteuer in Full HD und brillanten Farben ein - auch wenn die Lichtbedingungen nicht optimal sind. Hauptfunktionen - 1080p Full-HD-Grafikauflsung - Digitaler H.264 HD-Camcorder - Anklipsfunktion - 5MP CMOS-Sensor (bis zu 16MP-Fotos) - BSI-Sensortechnologie - 1,5" (3,8 cm) LCD - 10-facher digitaler Zoom - Electronic Image Stabiliser (EIS) - HDMI- und USB-Anschluss - Untersttzt Micro-SD / SDHC / SDXC - Webcam und Sprachaufnahme - Robustes Design - Spritzwassergeschtzt (IPX-2) - Videobearbeitungsfunktion - CAMILEO Uploader

description-en_US-print: 20" Widescreen Ultra-Slim Desktop Monitor MODEL: EX201W-BK The NEC MultiSync EX201W is a 20 widescreen, lightweight LED-backlit LCD monitor with an ultra-slim bezel depth. It stands out with its stylish minimalist design, rich features and ergonomic adjustability. Rated EPEAT Gold, this display is packed with green features. Its smart sensing technology, such as human sensor and ambient light sensor, make it one of the most power-efficient monitors (.37W in power saving mode and 62% less power consumption). The EX201W is an ideal solution for business users on-the-go and small-sized client meetings in that its portable, flexible and adaptable. - LED backlight technology provides for industry-leading low power consumption and less hazardous materials - Minimalist design, featuring an ultra-thin bezel width and depth and lightweight design, puts the focus on the screen vs. the cabinet - ECO Mode allows you to manually adjust the displays brightness to your liking, saving power and reducing your energy costs - Human and ambient light sensors automatically detect your work conditions to determine the proper display brightness, thereby conserving power - Fully adjustable quick-release stand, including height-adjust (110mm), pivot, tilt and swivel capabilities, adds flexibility and comfort to your viewing preferences - Full connectivity, including DisplayPort and DVI-I inputs and USB pass-through - Touch-sensitive OSD controls are integrated into the bezel, making display adjustments easier than ever
name: NEC EX201W-BK

description-en_US-print: HD 720p video calling thats simpleon most major IMs, including Logitech Vid HD. HD video calls Youll get HD 720p video calling on most major instant messaging applications and Logitech Vid HD. 3-megapixel snapshots Its easy to take snapshots when you dont have time for a video call (software enhanced). Includes Logitech Vid HD Now HD video calling is free, fast and easy for you and anyone you want to talk to. Its built into your webcam setup, so you can call right away. Built-in mic with RightSound It gives you clear conversations without annoying background noise. RightLight technology It automatically adjusts the image during your call, so you look your best even in dim light. IM compatibility Works with Skype, Windows Live Messenger, Yahoo! Messenger, AOL Instant Messenger (AIM) and other popular instant messaging applications. Free video editing software Logitech has teamed up with MAGIX to offer MAGIX Photo Manager 9 and MAGIX Video Easy with your new Logitech webcam. And theyre free.

description-en_US-print: For enterprises that need a green, fully functional display screen, with unparalleled visual quality, the ThinkVision LT1952p is the best choice. Compatible with virtually any hardware platform, the LT1952p offers VGA, DVI-D, and DisplayPort connections. The LT1952p is a breeze to use with exceptional LED performance, swivel, tilt, and lift options, 5 milliseconds response time, and a 1000:1 contrast ratio. The LT1952p delivers high energy cost savings, through compliance with go green certifications. The monitors are mercury-free, contain reduced toxic chemicals. The LT1952p delivers the best value on investment for large enterprises.
name: Lenovo ThinkVision LT1952p

description-en_US-mobile: MicroTouch ChassisTouch 17" LCD Enclosure Monitor
description-en_US-print:
The 3M MicroTouch ChassisTouch 17" LCD monitor combines a thin profile with multiple mounting options supporting space constrained enclosures designs. Back-mounted display controls are accessible even with the monitor sitting flush with the face of the enclosure, improving the aesthetics of your integration. The optional user installable bezel is available for applications requiring a more finished appearance.

The ChassisTouch 17" LCDs rugged metal enclosure provides mounting stability and protects the LCD from damage. Combined with 3Ms MicroTouch ClearTek II technology the ChassisTouch 17" LCD is a winning combination for all public access environments concerned with durability.

- Slim design is conducive to sleek kiosk design trends.
- Robust metal enclosure provides mounting stability and protection for the LCD display.
- VESA-mounting hole pattern on the back allows for arm mount capability or bracket-mounting within the enclosure.
- Optional bezel available.
- Bright 300 nit chassis solution.
- High-contrast 17" TFT LCD panel delivers crisp, vibrant images.
name: 3M MicroTouch Chassis

description-en_US-mobile: PowerShot ELPH 520 HS - 1/3" CMOS, 10.1MP, 4 - 48mm, f/3.4 - f/5.6, TTL, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT, 3648 x 2736, USB 2.0, Mini-HDMI, Red
description-en_US-print: An Ultra-Slim High Performer. In the twelve years since the original ELPH was instantly and universally proclaimed an icon of style, successive ELPH cameras have remained at the forefront of design even while boasting the very latest in digital technology. Now, opening a new era of ELPH design, the PowerShot ELPH 520 HS digital camera is both homage to the original ELPH and astonishing synthesis of Canon's leadership in technical advancements. A mere 0.76 inches thick, it is the world's thinnest 12x zoom camera*. Canon's pursuit of perfection has driven the development of new miniaturization including a new lens and new 10.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor that, powered by Canon's DIGIC 5 Image Processor, create images as breathtakingly beautiful as the camera itself. It's also packed with the latest Canon technologies including Smart AUTO with new Face ID and Full HD Video. Brimming with a full range of advanced technologies that automatically optimize the image quality of every shot, the PowerShot ELPH 520 HS digital camera makes the ultimate style icon incredibly effortless. Incredibly Thin Design Canon's unwavering commitment to equipping an ultra-thin, clean-profiled ELPH with 12x zooming power required a redesign of the lens, sensor and other technologies. This pursuit of perfection paid off, creating the world's thinnest camera with a 12x zoom. At an astonishingly thin 0.76 inches, it is significantly slimmer than competitors' 12x zoom models. 12x Optical Zoom and 28mm Wide-Angle Lens Newly designed to custom-fit the PowerShot ELPH 520 HS digital camera's incredibly thin profile, the camera's 12x Optical Zoom and 28mm Wide-Angle Lens is a marvel of optical technology. The Wide-Angle lens gives you more to work with in every shot, adding depth, perspective and grandeur as called for. Landscapes, city scenes, family shots and more all benefit from the extra width. With a 12x Optical Zoom, no shot is beyond your reach. You'll love the flexibility it gives you when shooting: from a single vantage point you can capture an unlimited number of different images simply by zooming in and out. It also incorporates the latest in Canon UA lens technology, suppressing lens aberration for outstanding image quality throughout the entire zoom range. The camera's sensor was specifically designed for this lens, so even at the long end of the zoom images are bright and clear. UA Lens Technology Pioneered by Canon, UA Lens technology makes possible compact lenses with remarkable optical performance. By using molded glass with an ultra-high refractive index in aspherical lens elements, Canon has succeeded in reducing lens size while significantly reducing image aberrations. Another stellar example of cutting-edge Canon optics, UA Lens technology helps make PowerShot digital cameras pocket-friendly and capable of astounding image quality.
name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 520 HS

description-en_US-print: Designed for 24/7 continuous operation, the 47WS10 displays advertisements, information and broadcast video with Full HD brilliance. With landscape, portrait and 5x5 tile mode capabilities, the 47WS10 adapts to your signage needs
name: LG 47WS10

description-en_US-mobile: Xorb Wireless - 30W, 2.1 Stereo, Bluetooth, Black
description-en_US-print: 2.1 stereo speaker for any Bluetooth-enabled device Xorb Wireless is GEAR4s latest 2.1 stereo speaker packed with 30-watts of power and the latest in Bluetooth wireless technology. With two neodymium drivers and one sub-woofer, the Xorb Wireless delivers stunning stereo audio to fill the biggest sized rooms from the device in your hand. You can stream audio from any Smartphone or Tablet with Bluetooth, with simple connectivity, and continue surfing the web or posting on Facebook. The Xorb Wireless looks fitting in any modern home with its beautiful hemispherical design, stylish finish and elegant rounded grill. Its compact design also makes it suitable for any bookshelf, coffee table or entertainment stand. With 2.1A USB charging for any Smartphone or Tablet, bass control and a line-in port for any music player, playing music from a Xorb Wireless provides a high quality music experience, wirelessly and with style. The Xorb Wireless is covered by GEAR4's no-quibble, 2 year extended warranty exclusively when purchased on gear4.com. Please retain your purchase confirmation email in the event you need to make a warranty claim in future. 2.1 stereo speaker for any Bluetooth-enabled device Wireless Bluetooth Streaming The Xorb Wireless comes complete with the leading industry standard for high quality, efficient Bluetooth audio delivery. This means streaming music over Bluetooth is indistinguishable from CD quality audio. The advance audio coding provides instant delivery and lower power operation from your device with optimal performance. 2.1 Stereo With two neodymium drivers and one sub-woofer, the Xorb Wireless delivers 30-watts of power to deliver stunning audio and to fill the biggest sized rooms from the device in your hand. The bass control function allows you to really crank-up those lower bass frequencies and thump out those big bass tunes. Bass Control The bass control dial helps you achieve a balanced tonal response across your entire music collection. Crank up the bass for lower bass frequencies and pack your music with a punch at high volume levels. Medium bass levels provide even treble and bass frequencies for the all-round music listener. If you prefer hearing the detailed layer of instruments, reduce the bass settings to provide a clear tonal pitch. USB Charging You can use the Xorb Wireless to charge any Smartphone or Tablet from the rear 2.1A USB charging port. This provides quick charging for Tablets and lets the music continue whilst your device charges. Line-in Port for Use with Other Music Players Use the Xorb Wireless with any music player with a 3.5mm jack. Enjoy your favourite music, movies or games from a MP3 player, TV or Laptop by connecting a 3.5mm audio cable into the line-in port.
name: GEAR4 Xorb Wireless

description-en_US-print:
Simple, affordable, fun. Widely-available DV tape makes a great choice if you're into editing your own shots. Handycam quality video with super power 40x Carl Zeiss lens. Easy to use touchscreen LCD and long 14 hour battery life for extended shooting.

- Standard Definition video recording on affordable DV tape 
800k pixel CCD sensor 
- Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens with 40x optical zoom / 2000x digital zoom 
- Super SteadyShot for improved still image and video stability, especially in low light 
- 2.5 LCD touchscreen 
- Colour viewfinder 
- Start / Stop and Zoom buttons on LCD screen frame 
- Up to 14 hours STAMINA continuous shooting time (with optional battery) 
- DV (i.LINK) connection for video editing with connected PC (output only) 
- USB streaming for webcam use 
- Fun, easy to use Picture Motion Browser software with web upload assist function

description-en_US-mobile: i2800 Scanner, 70 ppm/140 ipm, Dual CCD, 600 dpi, USB 2.0, 5.5 kg, black
description-en_US-print: Energize your information for a competitive edge. Todays business runs on information. But when that information is on paper, it can slow you down. Get things flowing faster with the KODAK i2800 Scanner. It lets you extract critical information from documents at the point of entry, for quick distribution to decision-makers who need it. So money to be gained isnt left waiting for choices to be made. No matter what size your business or department is, the reliable performance of the KODAK i2800 Scanner can enable collaboration right from your desktop. It decreases processing time for information that needs to be shared for review, reference, approval, and legal and compliance reasons. This helps increase both internal and external customer satisfaction, and saves your company time and money. Plus, if your business has branch offices or field agents, distributed capture allows document images to be immediately sent to a central location for easy access. Help your company get ahead with a scanning solution that can bring you increased security, faster internal processes, better teamwork, and a host of other business benefits. The KODAK i2800 Scanner. More imaging power - Dual LED illumination means faster first scans, plus great image clarity, consistency, and color stability. More perfomance - With speeds up to 70 pages per minute, you get plenty of production in a small package. More flexibility - No matter what document youre scanning, paper handling from Kodak gets the job done. Small or large, thick or thin, ID cards, even embossed hard cards the versatile, self-storing output tray easily adjusts. More options - The KODAK A4 Flatbed Accessory, with USB connectivity, makes it simple to scan oversized, bound, or fragile materials. More automation - Kodaks Smart Touch functionality performs multiple-step scanning operations at the press of a button.

description-fr_FR-print: Dynamisez vos informations pour gagner un avantage concurrentiel. De nos jours, les tches professionnelles sexcutent partir des informations. Mais lorsque linformation requise se trouve sur papier, il est possible que cela vous ralentisse. Acclrez le flux avec le scanner KODAK i2800. Il vous permet dextraire au point dentre les informations importantes contenues dans les documents pour les transmettre rapidement aux dcisionnaires qui en ont besoin. Largent gagner nest donc pas laiss pour compte, au dpens des choix effectuer. Quelle que soit la taille de votre entreprise ou de votre service, la fiabilit des performances offertes par le scanner Kodak i2800 vous permet de collaborer partir de votre bureau. Il rduit le temps de traitement des informations qui doivent tre partages pour une rvision, une rfrence, une approbation ou encore pour des raisons lgales ou de conformit. Cela permet votre entreprise de mieux satisfaire les attentes des clients en interne et en externe et dconomiser du temps et de largent. En outre, si votre entreprise dispose de succursales ou dagents rgionaux, la capture distribue permet denvoyer immdiatement les images de documents vers un emplacement central pour une facilit daccs. Aidez votre entreprise aller de lavant avec une solution de numrisation offrant une scurit accrue, des procdures internes plus rapides, un meilleur travail dquipe et une foule dautres avantages pour lentreprise. Le scanner KODAK i2800. Une numrisation plus puissante : un clairage double voyant suppose la rapidit des premires numrisations, une superbe nettet dimage, une cohrence et une stabilit des couleurs. Performances accrues : avec des vitesses pouvant aller jusqu 70 pages par minute, vous profitez dune production abondante, dans un format compact. Flexibilit amliore : quel que soit le document numriser, la fonctionnalit de gestion du papier Kodak sen charge. Documents de petite ou de grande taille, pais ou fins, cartes didentit et mme cartes papier en relief, le plateau de sortie polyvalent stockage indpendant procde lajustement en toute simplicit. Davantage doptions : le module de numrisation plat A4 KODAK dot dune connectivit USB simplifie la numrisation de documents surdimensionns, relis ou fragiles. Automatisation renforce : la fonctionnalit Smart Touch de Kodak effectue des numrisations en plusieurs tapes, en appuyant tout simplement sur un bouton.

Intelligent IS Der Intelligent IS kompensiert Kamerawackler, so dass die Aufnahmen auch dann noch scharf und deutlich sind, wenn mit hohem Zoomwert oder bei wenig Licht fotografiert wird. Er passt den optischen Bildstabilisator je nach Szene auf einen von fnf verschiedene Modi an und minimiert Verwacklungsunschrfen. Groes 7,5 cm (3,0 Zoll) LCD Das helle und gut lesbare Display (230.000 Bildpunkte) bietet ideale Voraussetzungen zur Motivsuche aber auch um Aufnahmen direkt anzusehen und anderen zu zeigen. Kompaktes Metallgehuse Das schlanke und kompakte Metallgehuse in attraktiven Farbausfhrungen ist so klein und edel, dass es ist berall hin passt. Smart Auto (intelligenter AUTO-Modus fr 32 Aufnahmesituationen) Im intelligenten Automatik-Modus (Smart Auto) entstehen ganz einfach hochwertige Fotos oder Movies. 32 Aufnahmesituationen werden unterschieden und automatisch die richtigen Einstellungen ausgewhlt. Einfach die AUTO-Taste drcken und Sie gelangen von jedem zuvor eingestellten Modus zu Smart Auto. HD-Movies (720p) mit Movie-Aufnahmetaste Mit einem Druck auf die Movie-Taste nehmen Sie sofort Hochwertige HD-Movies (720p) auf. Der Intelligent IS sorgt fr Movie-Aufnahmen ohne Verwacklungsunschrfen. Hilfe-Taste Ein Druck auf die Hilfe-Taste fhrt zu einer leicht verstndlichen Erklrung der Kamerafunktionen das ist ideal fr Anfnger. Kreativ-Modi Zahlreiche Kreativfilter laden zum Experimentieren ein und bieten echten Fotospa. Mit dem Fischaugen-Effekt erscheinen die Aufnahmen, als wren sie durch ein Fischaugen-Objektiv verzerrt und Super Vivid verstrkt die Farbsttigung. Poster-Effekt, Spielzeugkamera-Effekt und Monochrome sind weitere kreative Modi, die echten Fotospa bieten. Der Miniatur-Effekt gibt Fotos und Movies das Aussehen einer Miniatur-Spielzeugwelt. Livebildkontrolle, Face Detection Per Livebildkontrolle wird das Experimentieren mit Einstellungen wie Helligkeit oder Farbintensitt noch einfacher, weil das Ergebnis sofort auf dem Display zu sehen ist. So werden nur die besten Aufnahmen gespeichert. Face Detection ist eine Technologie zur Gesichtserkennung und sorgt fr tolle Personenaufnahmen. Sie erkennt bis zu 35 Gesichter in einem Motiv und optimiert automatisch Scharfstellung und Helligkeit. Der Face Detection Weiabgleich lsst Hauttne selbst bei ungewhnlichen Lichtbedingungen ganz natrlich erscheinen. Automatische Rote-Augen-Korrekturgegen rot Augen
description-en_US-mobile: 16.0 MP, 1/2.3" CCD, 4608 x 3456, TTL Autofocus, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT, 15 - 1/2000 sec, SD/SDHC/SDXC, USB, NTSC/PAL, 145 g
description-en_US-print: Go wide or get 8x closer with a Canon quality 8x optical zoom lens, Intelligent IS and Smart Auto for great photos and HD movies. The compact PowerShot A4000 IS captures every moment with ease. - 28mm wide, 8x optical zoom - 16.0 Megapixels - Intelligent IS - Large 7.5 cm (3.0) LCD - Compact metal body - Smart Auto (32 scenes) - HD movies (720p) with movie button - Help button - Fun and creative modes - Live View Control, Face Detection Intelligent and easy 8x zoom 28mm wide, 8x optical zoom A versatile, Canon 8x optical zoom lens lets you get closer to distant subjects and focus on the detail while the 28mm wide-angle fits more in the frame for sweeping landscapes and great group shots. 16.0 Megapixels Capturing all the detail from the genuine Canon lens the 16MP sensor delivers superb quality images that are perfect for large-scale prints (A3+) or creative cropping. Intelligent IS Intelligent IS combats camera shake to ensure all your photos and videos are sharp and detailed even at full zoom or in low light. It automatically adjusts the optical Image Stabilizer to the scene from 6 modes to prevent blur. Large 7.5 cm (3.0) LCD A large, high quality LCD screen (230k dots) allows effortless menu navigation, lets you frame and view your shots with ease and makes sharing them with friends a pleasure. Compact metal body The slim, compact metal body in attractive colours is small and stylish enough to take anywhere. Smart Auto (32 scenes) Even complete beginners can effortlessly shoot high quality photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and automatically selects the optimal settings from 32 variables. Press the Auto button to return instantly to Smart Auto from any other mode. HD movies (720p) with movie button Instantly record high quality HD movies (720p) using one touch of the dedicated movie button. Intelligent IS keeps movies steady. Help button Simply press the Help button for quick, easy-to-follow guidance on using your camera and its different functions the ideal introduction for beginners. Fun and creative modes Have fun with a range of creative filters. Use Fish-eye Effect to re-create fish-eye lens distortion, Super Vivid to boost colour saturation, retro Poster and Toy Camera Effects or Monochrome. Miniature Effect makes scenes in stills or movies look like miniature scale models. Live View Control, Face Detection Live View Control allows you to easily experiment with picture settings like brightness and colour intensity and preview the results while framing, so you can capture the best shot. Face Detection Technology ensures great people shots. It detects up to 35 faces in a single frame making sure they remain in focus and with optimum brightness. Face Detection White Balance ensures natural skin tones even in unusual lighting conditions. Auto Red-Eye Correction eliminates red-eye.

description-fr_FR-print: Objectif grand-angle de 28 mm avec zoom optique 8x Grce au zoom optique 8x polyvalent de Canon, vous pouvez vous rapprocher des sujets distants et effectuer la mise au point sur des dtails prcis. L'objectif grand-angle de 28 mm vous permet quant lui de photographier des paysages tendus ou de prendre de superbes photos de groupe. 16 millions de pixels Enregistrant tous les dtails transmis par l'objectif Canon, le capteur de 16 millions de pixels fournit des images d'une qualit exceptionnelle, parfaites pour des tirages en grand format (A3 ou plus) ou pour des recadrages cratifs. Stabilisateur d'image intelligent Le stabilisateur d'image intelligent minimise les flous de boug afin de garantir des photos et des vidos nettes et dtailles, mme au niveau de zoom maximal ou en basse lumire. Il adapte automatiquement le stabilisateur d'image optique la scne en choisissant l'un des 6 modes disponibles afin d'viter tout effet de flou. Grand cran LCD de 7,5 cm (3 pouces) Le grand cran LCD de haute qualit (230.000 points) assure une navigation aise dans les menus et vous permet de cadrer et de visionner vos prises de vue en toute simplicit partager les photos est un vrai plaisir. Botier en mtal compact Le botier en mtal plat et lgant, disponible dans diffrentes couleurs attrayantes, est suffisamment compact pour vous permettre d'emporter l'appareil photo o que vous alliez, et ce, avec style. Mode Smart Auto (32 scnes) Le mode Smart Auto dtecte le type de scne et slectionne automatiquement les paramtres les mieux adapts parmi 32 variables. Ainsi, mme les utilisateurs les moins expriments peuvent prendre des photos de haute qualit en toute simplicit. Et grce la touche Auto, une simple pression suffit revenir au mode Smart Auto depuis n'importe quel autre mode. Vidos HD (720p) avec touche vido Enregistrez instantanment des vidos HD (720p) de haute qualit en appuyant simplement sur la touche vido ddie. Et grce au stabilisateur d'image intelligent, vous pouvez dire adieu aux vidos tremblantes. Touche Aide La touche Aide permet d'obtenir d'une simple pression des instructions claires et rapides sur l'utilisation de l'appareil photo et ses diffrentes fonctions une faon extrmement pratique pour les dbutants de se familiariser avec l'appareil. Modes amusants et cratifs Amusez-vous avec un large ventail de filtres cratifs. Utilisez le filtre Effet trs grand angle pour recrer la distorsion d'un objectif fish-eye , le filtre Super clatant pour augmenter la saturation des couleurs, le filtre Effet poster rtro, ou encore les filtres Toy Camera ou Monochrome. Avec le filtre Effet miniature, vos photos et vos vidos prennent l'aspect de modles rduits. Contrle de vise directe et dtection des visages Le contrle de vise directe vous permet d'exprimenter diffrents paramtres photo tels que la luminosit ou l'intensit des couleurs et de prvisualiser le rsultat pendant le cadrage afin d'obtenir la prise de vue souhaite. La technologie de dtection de visages permet de raliser de magnifiques portraits. L'appareil photo dtecte jusqu' 35 visages dans un mme cadre et optimise la mise au point et la luminosit pour chacun d'entre eux. La dtection de visages avec balance des blancs garantit des tons chair naturels, mme dans des conditions d'clairage inhabituelles. La correction automatique des yeux rouges liminecet effet inesthtique des prises de vue.

description-de_DE-print: Vielseitige Kamera fr gestochen scharfe Aufnahmen Dank 28-mm-Weitwinkelobjektiv mit 12fach optischem Zoom ist die Kamera hervorragend fr weit entfernte Motive, Gruppenfotos und Panorama-Landschaften geeignet. Mit 7 Modi passt Intelligent IS den Bildstabilisator automatisch an das Motiv an; das Resultat: minimierte Verwacklungsunschrfe und gestochen scharfe, detailreiche Fotos und Movieclips. HS-System (12,1 Megapixel) Das innovative HS-System, die Kombination aus leistungsstarkem DIGIC-4-Bildprozessor und hoch empfindlichem Sensor, sorgt fr exzellente Bildqualitt in nahezu allen Aufnahmesituationen. Es brilliert besonders bei schwachen Lichtverhltnissen ideal, um den Zauber einer Stimmung auch ohne Blitz und Stativ festzuhalten. Die Kombination aus hoch empfindlichem Bildsensor und leistungsstarkem DIGIC-4-Bildprozessor sorgt fr exzellente Bildqualitt in nahezu allen Situationen. Schlank und elegant Die ultrakompakte IXUS 1100 HS ist eine erstklassige Kombination aus schickem Design und innovativerTechnologie, ein attraktiver Begleiter fr unterwegs. Bedienung per Fingertipp Das groe, hochauflsende 8,0 cm (3,2 Zoll) PureColor II Touch-LCD ermglicht per intuitiver Touch-Steuerung die schnelle, einfache Bedienung und komfortable Wiedergabe. Die innovative Steuerung bietet das Fokussieren per Touch AF, Fokussieren und Auslsen per Touch-Auslser und das individuelle Anlegen der Funktionen. Full-HD-Movies Im Moviemodus entstehen 1080p-Full-HD-Movies mit Stereoton; die teilt man gern mit Freunden. Mit dem optischen Zoom kommen Sie ganz nah an das Geschehen heran; dank des optischen Dynamik-Bildstabilisators werden die Movieclips auch dann gestochen scharf, wenn Sie sich whrend des Filmens bewegen oder im Telebereich filmen. ber eine spezielle Taste wechseln Sie sofort vom Foto- in den Moviemodus; die Kamera ist mit einem HDMI-CEC-Anschluss fr die bequeme Wiedergabe auf einem HD-Fernseher ausgestattet. Intelligenter AUTO-Modus (Smart Auto) Im intelligenten AUTO-Modus (Smart Auto) entstehen ganz komfortabel hochwertige Fotos oder Movies. 32 Aufnahmesituationen (21 bei Movies) werden unterschieden und automatisch die richtigen Einstellungen ausgewhlt. Sie mssen nur noch das Motiv anvisieren und auslsen. Highspeed-Serienbilder. Superzeitlupe-Movie Die Funktion Highspeed-Serienbilder ermglicht die ununterbrochene Aufnahme mit 7,8 Bildern pro Sekunde (bei 3,0 MP), Sie verpassen nichts mehr. Im Super Slow Motion Movie Modus werden Szenen mit schneller Action bei der Wiedergabe auf 1/8 ihrer eigentlichen Geschwindigkeit reduziert. 720p-iFrame-Movie Filmtagebuch PC- und Mac-kompatible 720p-HD-Movies filmen Sie im optimierten Apple iFrame-Format ideal fr den schnellen Import, die mhelose Bearbeitung und bequeme Weitergabe. Im Modus Filmtagebuch wird vor jedem Foto eine 4 Sekunden lange Moviesequenz in VGA-Qualitt aufgenommen; die Movieclips eines Tages knnen zu einem interessanten Bonus-Video zusammengefgt werden. Kreativmodi Entdecken Sie mit interessanten Aufnahmemodi Ihre kreative Ader. Beispielsweise mit dem Spielzeugkamera-Effekt fr einen altmodischen Look, dem Miniatureffekt, der ein Foto oder eine Filmszene wie in einer Miniaturwelt darstellt oder dem Monochrom-Effekt. Hinweise und Tipps Mit einfachen und auf dem Display einblendbaren Hinweisen und Tipps lernen Sie die Funktionsweise Ihrer Kamera besser verstehen und optimieren Ihre Ergebnisse.

description-fr_FR-print: Versatile, sharp shooting A Canon lens that lets you get close with 12x optical zoom, while 28mm wide-angle fits more in the frame for great group shots and sweeping landscapes. Intelligent IS automatically adjusts the optical Image Stabilizer to the scene from 7 modes to prevent blur and deliver sharp, detailed photos and videos. HS System (12.1 MP) HS System excels in low light allowing you to capture the real atmosphere of the moment without flash or tripod. A high performance DIGIC 4 processor and high sensitivity sensor combine to give superior image quality in all situations. Slim and stylish An ultra-compact fusion of high-class styling and superb technology you can easily keep in your pocket. Fingertip control A large, high-resolution 8.0 cm (3.2") PureColor II Touch LCD provides intuitive touch control for fast, easy operation and pleasurable playback. Advanced controls include Touch AF to focus the shot, Touch Shutter to focus and trigger the shot and customisable layout of functions. Full HD movies Create Full HD (1080p) movies with stereo sound you'll be proud to share. Use the optical zoom to get close to the action while Powered and Dynamic image stabilisation keep movies steady. A dedicated movie button instantly switches from stills to movie mode; an HDMI-CEC connector allows easy playback on an HDTV. Smart Auto Effortlessly shoot high quality photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and selects the perfect settings from 32 variables (21 in movie). All you have to do is point and shoot. High-speed Burst. Super Slow Motion Movie High-speed Burst delivers non-stop photo shooting, capturing 7.8 shots per second (3.0 MP), so you never miss a thing. Super Slow Motion Movie slows fast-paced action to 1/8th of the real speed. iFrame movie (720p). Movie Digest Shoot PC and Mac friendly HD video (720p) in the optimised Apple iFrame format for fast importing, easy editing and simple sharing. Movie Digest records up to 4-seconds of action before each still shot, joining the days clips into a bonus VGA movie. Creative modes Explore your creativity with fun shooting modes. Effects include Toy Camera for an older style camera look, Miniature to transform a photo or movie scene into a scale model and Monochrome. Hints & Tips Simple Hints & Tips interface messages offer step-by-step menu guidance making it easy to understand camera features and settings.
name: Canon Digital IXUS 1100 HS

description-de_DE-mobile: WorkCentre 5645 Offset Catch Tray
description-de_DE-print:
- Leichtere und schnellere Entwicklung angepasster Benutzeroberflchen als bei den meisten Wettbewerberprodukten dank der auf Webstandards basierenden Xerox Extensible Interface Platform (EIP).
- Umfassende Scan-Lsungen verfgbar, die allen Bedrfnissen im Bro gerecht werden. Die Scan-Angebote der Mitbewerber sind weitaus begrenzter.
- Schnellere CPU als mit dem WorkCentre 5645/5655 vergleichbare Produkte (1,4 GHz).
- Grerer Standard-Duplexvorlageneinzug als vergleichbare Produkte fr umfangreiche Druckauftrge (100 Blatt).
- Hhere Scangeschwindigkeit als vergleichbare Produkte (bis zu 60 ipm).
- Xerox SMARTsend-Software zum Erfassen und Verteilen von Scans (optional)  mit wertvollen Merkmalen, die sich bei Wettbewerberprodukten nicht finden.
- Ergiebigeres Verbrauchsmaterial als vergleichbare Produkte  weniger Unterbrechungen und weniger Aufwand.
- Weniger Ausfallzeiten durch SMart Kit-Komponenten, die der Nutzer bequem selbst austauschen kann. Bei Wettbewerberprodukten muss der Austausch von einem Servicetechniker durchgefhrt werden.
- Netzwerkserverfax und Internet-Fax sind bei den Kopierer/Drucker/Scanner-Modellen WorkCentre 5645/5655 im Lieferumfang enthalten  bei Wettbewerberprodukten werden diese Merkmale als Zusatzoption angeboten.
- Schnellere Scanbertragung und geringere Netzwerkbelastung als bei vergleichbaren Produkten durch JBIG 2, MRC und optimierte, auf den Scaninhalt abgestimmte Komprimierung.
description-en_US-mobile: WorkCentre 5645 Offset Catch Tray
description-en_US-print:
- Easier and faster development of custom user interface software than most competitors because the Xerox Extensible Interface Platform (EIP) is based on web standards
- Comprehensive scanning solutions are available to meet any office need. Competitive scan offerings are more limited
- Faster processor (1.4 GHz) on the WorkCentre 5645/5655 than competitive products
- Larger-capacity standard DADF (100 sheets) than competitive products to handle larger print jobs
- Faster scanning speed (up to 60 ipm) than competitive products
- Xerox SMARTsend scan capture and distribution software (optional) has valuable features that competitive products don't have
- Higher-yield consumables for fewer interruptions and less hassle than competitive products
- Less downtime with SMart Kit components that users can easily replace themselves. Competitive products require calls for service to do this
- Network Server Fax and Internet Fax are standard on the WorkCentre 5645/5655 Copier/Printer/Scanner models versus optional on competitive products
- Faster scan transmissions and reduced network load than competitive products with JBIG 2, MRC, and optimized scan compression to match the scanned input
name: Xerox WorkCentre 5645 Offset Catch Tray

description-en_US-mobile: X560n- Color laser multifunction, 31 ppm black, 20 ppm color
description-en_US-print: Designed especially for medium-sized workgroups that want quality color and increased productivity, Lexmarks network-ready X560n MFP delivers high-performance printing, copying, scanning and faxing. This is the perfect solution for your everyday color needs! Options include duplex printing and additional input capacity. - Color laser multifunction device. - Print up to 31 ppm black, 20 ppm color. - Newly enhanced toner. - Easy to share; easy to use. Great value for your everyday color needs Printing should be as attractive on your budget as it is on your documents. Built for demanding medium-sized workgroups, the Lexmark X560n MFP brings you a world of cost-saving benefits. By merging print, copy, fax and scan into one high-performance network device, you save considerably on office space, hardware costs, consumables, service contracts and energy. But why stop there? Opt for the high-yield cartridges to drive down your cost per page. Add the optional duplex unit to save paper, money and the environment all at the same time! Elevate office productivity! The Lexmark X560n is robust, reliable and ready to go to work with PostScript 3 and PCL 6 compatibility. It is perfect for integration into any IT environment. Need to copy a large presentation before lunch? No problem. Just load the 50-page Automatic Document Feeder and zip through your document. More than just fast, the X560n gives you a range of efficiency-boosting features too, like a multipurpose feeder, fax speed dials and intuitive workflow software to digitize, manage, search and edit documents with ease. An effortless way of working A plug-and-print solution, everything about the Lexmark X560n is straightforward and simple. The consumables are 100% front-loading, so they take just seconds to replace. The operator panel offers a variety of intuitive features to simplify everyday workflow tasks. For instance, it includes a handy job-cancel button to put the brakes on print runs quickly, so you dont waste paper. The 4-line graphical display guides you through printing and maintenance tasks with ease. You get the tools you need to help maximize uptime and boost productivity! Color you can be proud of Studies show that color can increase brand recognition and reader retention by up to 80%, and that more than 60% of buying decisions are based on color! * Even a little bit of color can make a big difference in your business. So when you can acquire color thats fast and affordable as well as eye-catching, why settle for anything less? Combining newly enhanced toner, Pantone calibration and crisp 2400 Image Quality, the Lexmark X560n is perfect for all your important document needs from presentations and office memos to spreadsheets and newsletters. Lexmarks guarantee to you At Lexmark, were always working hard to ensure you achieve maximum productivity and minimum downtime. Our X560n MFP includes our solid service warranty of One-year Onsite Repair, with a response time of next business day *. For an even greater level of peace of mind, you can opt for one of our extended-warranty service offerings. For more information on any of these offerings, contact your local dealer or visit us today at www.lexmark.com. Duplex print unit What better way to reduce costs while promoting earth-friendly practices in your business? With two-sided printing, everyone wins. Save paper, money and the environment! Extra drawer with floor stand To load a second paper type or increase your input capacity, add the extra 550-sheet drawer. It comes with a flexible floor stand that gives you extra storage space.
name: Lexmark X560n

description-de_DE-mobile: SCX-3405W - 3-in-1, Laser, 20ppm, 8.5s, 1200 x 1200dpi, SPL, 433MHz Processor, 64MB, USB 2.0, 802.11b/g/n, 6.7kg
description-de_DE-print: Der Samsung SCX-3405W kombiniert Kosteneffizienz und Leistung. Das Multifunktionsgert untersttzt eine einfache Kostenverwaltung, damit Sie Ihr Budget halten knnen. Der Drucker ist sehr einfach in der Handhabung, macht Schnelldrucke mglich und bietet weitere ntzliche Funktionen wie die One-Touch-Eco-Taste, eine einfache Druckerverwaltung und kabelloses Drucken von mobilen Gerten. Sparen Sie Platz und Geld mit dem Multifunktionsgert SCX-3405W. Umweltfreundlich mit One Touch Mit einem einfachen Knopfdruck aktivieren Sie die umweltfreundliche One-Touch-Eco-Funktion und der Drucker stellt smtliche Funktionen automatisch auf die umweltfreundlichste Variante ein. Von der Tonersparfunktion bis hin zum Duplexdruck der Drucker stellt auf Energiesparen und liefert weiterhin professionelle Ausdrucke. Die Ergebnisse knnen sich sehen lassen und das mit nur einem Knopfdruck. Verbessern Sie Ihre Ausdrucke mit dem Easy Eco Driver Durch die Anzeige des CO2-Ausstoes, der verbrauchten Energie und des Papierbedarfs knnen Sie Ihre Druckereinstellungen ganz auf Ihre Arbeitsziele zuschneiden. Der Easy Eco Driver optimiert Ihre Druckvorgnge, ganz gleich ob es Ihnen um Kostenreduzierung oder Energieersparnis geht. Einfache Druckerverwaltung Druckvorgnge gelingen leicht mit Samsungs Easy Print Manager. Jedes Detail, von Tonerstand und Arbeitsnachweis bis Gerteeinstellungen und Onlinebestellungen, wird in einem leicht zu bedienenden Programm gespeichert. Samsung MobilePrint Machen Sie mehr aus Ihren mobilen Gerten: Mit der Samsung MobilePrint-Funktion wird das Drucken von Fotos, Webseiten, PDF-Dateien usw., die sich auf Ihrem mobilen Gert befinden, zu einer ganz einfachen Angelegenheit. Verbessern Sie Produktivitt und Workflow in Ihrem Bro und drucken Sie wichtige Dokumente in hoher Qualitt und vllig stressfrei. 3-in-1-Funktion fr besseres Arbeiten Die 3-in-1-Funktion des SCX-3405W rationalisiert Ihre Arbeitsablufe und sorgt dafr, dass Ihre Druckvorgnge so effizient wie mglich ablaufen. Drucken, Kopieren und Scannen der SCX-3405W ist unglaublich flexibel und optimal fr den modernen Arbeitsalltag ausgerstet. description-en_US-mobile: SCX-3405W - 3-in-1, Laser, 20ppm, 8.5s, 1200 x 1200dpi, SPL, 433MHz Processor, 64MB, USB 2.0, 802.11b/g/n, 6.7kg
description-en_US-print: Discover economical printing that can easily be tailored to meet your budget and needs. One touch of the Samsung SCX-3405W multifunction printers Eco Button takes you to Eco Mode, conserving paper, toner and power usage. With Easy Eco Driver, you can preview your print, and adjust and monitor toner use, print quality and more, as well as removing unnecessary page elements. Administration is easy, too, with integrated Easy Printer Manager software to streamline tasks like application linking and device discovery. You can even print directly from wireless devices from PCs to smartphones and tablets - with a printer thats as feature-filled as it is economically-efficient. Push the button. Save on print costs. Optimise your printing in one simple step with Samsungs One touch Eco Button. You can save on printing expenses when you quickly switch to Eco Mode and conserve toner, paper and energy. Theres no need to waste time changing settings or altering your documents with this useful feature, as one touch is all you need to configure your printer to deliver the most economical results. Optimise your printing with Easy Eco Driver Enjoy cost-optimised results every time you print thanks to Samsungs Easy-Eco Driver. With this useful software, youll be able to accurately preview your document before printing and adjust quality, colour and other settings to meet your precise requirements and budget, as well as removing unnecessary text, images and other elements. You can even monitor savings, including paper, toner, energy and overall cost. Say goodbye to wasted printouts and discover more economically-efficient printing. Simple and efficient printer management made easy Discover simplified print management with Easy Printer Manager. This integrated EPM software allows you to quickly set up your device and monitor status using only simple-to-use software. Never worry about unexpectedly running out of toner again, as toner ordering, device discovery, application linking and other functions are all easily accessible with our Easy Printer Manager. Setup is a cinch with our secure, one-touch wireless connection. The SCX-3405Ws One Touch Wi-Fi Setting lets you connect quickly and easily. Simply select the WPS (WiFi Protected Set-up) button on the access point (router), press the WPS button on the printer and youre done. Normally, you would have to spend time creating a wireless network name and manually entering a security key or password on all the wireless devices. But the ultra-convenient One Touch Wi-Fi Setting automatically configures and protects your wireless network for you. Unleash your workforce with 3-in-1 functionality With 3-in-1 versatility, the Samsung SCX-3405W printer streamlines workflow and ensures that the office print operation is working as efficient as possible. With print, copy and scan functionality, the SCX-3405W offers flexibility and lets you work with less barriers. A host of innovative features like ID Copy, N-up copy, Scan-to-email and the convenient PC fax functionality ensure that your workforce has the necessary functionality needed to thrive in the modern world of business. Improve efficiency with compact design With the growing demand for more space efficient office equipment, the Samsung SCX-3405W Laser Printer is a perfect choice. This compact multifunction printer delivers the standard in premium printing service without the excess of unwanted size. Small to medium businesses and home offices will find this printer ideal. And because it is so compact in design, it adds to its portability. So, save space and hassle with the Samsung SCX-3405W Laser Printer and its contemporary compact design. Discover the power of easy mobile printing Enhance the productivity of your mobile devices with Samsung MobilePrint, available for both Android and iOS users. With this application, you can print directly from a wide range of smartphones, mobile tablets and more. You can also scan images to your device using the multifunction printers scanner. MobilePrint makes wireless connections quickly and easily without setting up new network configurations or installing new drivers , so you can enjoy smart connectivity for a smarter workplace. Achieve more with Samsungs Fast Print Dont settle for slow printing. With Samsungs faster printing speed of 20 pages per minute, you can minimise time wasted hanging around the printer. The enhanced printer performance will streamline workflows and let employees, and businesses, reach their full potential. Give your print-outs standout detail If you need to make an impression, nothing shows professionalism like the stunning 1200 x 1200dpi clarity produced by the Samsung SCX-3405W Laser Printer. High resolution printing of this caliber ensures that important print-outs, like work presentations and reports, are sharp and impressive. So, give your operation every chance of making a good impression with high resolution printing.

description-en_US-mobile: C9500 hdn V2 1200x1200 dpi, 320MB PCL5c PS3 Duplex parallel USB 10/100-TX, 30ppm color, 37ppm mono, with HDD
description-en_US-print:
High-quality, tabloid-plus (12" x 18") color and monochrome outputright in your workspace.
Until now, color added high cost as well as impact to your documents. OKI C9500 Digital Color printers can lower your expenses and increase your productivity.
These wide-format color printers are the efficient and affordable answer, especially if presentations, ad layouts, spreadsheets, large photos and illustrations, signs, posters or banners are part of your business.
Commercial printshop performance at desktop printer prices.
No more running down to the corporate or neighborhood copy center every time you need ledger-size color documentsor postcard-size or any size up to 12.9" by 47.24" banners! You can simply print them in-house. OKI C9500 printers are available with MonacoEZmatch color matching software1 to ensure accurate and consistent color whenever its required.
OKI Single Pass Color Digital technology and long-lasting, individually replaceable OKI toner cartridges and image drums mean fewer interventionsi.e. more productivityand a lower cost per printed page than color laser printers, solid ink or inkjet printers and, especially, outside copy services.
Further, the cost of a black-and-white page is comparable to that of most mono laser printersso you can use OKI C9500 color printers for all your business printing.
Connectivity and more.
OKI C9500 printers come with both bi-directional parallel and USB interfaces, and can be connected to the networkPC- or Mac -basedvia an OkiLAN 6200e+ 10/100 Base-T internal print server card.2
When it comes to handling huge graphic files, all models come with generous standard RAM and are upgradable to a whopping 1 GB.
All C9500 models are equipped with job accounting software that provides a precise count of color and mono pages, the types and quantities of paper used, and a record of printing activity by department.
So go on, get as creative as you likeand expect the superlative capabilities of OKI C9500 Series Digital Color printers to make you look great on paper.
name: OKI C9500 hdn

description-en_US-print:
Touch control comes to the A-Series! You'll love the ease and familiarity of controlling PowerShot A3400 IS digital camera with its big 3.0-inch Touch Panel LCD. Touch to shoot, choose shooting modes and select settings - it's easy and intuitive. The camera makes it easy to get the best possible quality from every shot, too, with Smart AUTO that selects proper camera settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations. Beautiful image quality with today's touch-panel interface makes PowerShot A3400 IS digital camera an easy choice.

- Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations for capturing spectacular images with ease.
- Shoot brilliant 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button.

- Available in black, silver, red, and gold.

description-en_US-print: Stylish, space-saving design The compact design of the i-SENSYS LBP7018C and its quiet operation make it the ideal desktop printer for small or home office use. Small in size and responsive, this affordable laser printer offers exceptional quality colour printing. Quick to print Theres no waiting around when you want to print, with Canons Quick First-Print technologies. Printing at up to 16 ppm in mono and 4 ppm in colour, it has a mono First Print Out Time of just 13.6 seconds so theres minimal delay in initial output. Brilliant output in colour and black-and-white Make your mark with great quality prints. With up to 2400 x 600 dpi print resolution youll notice the improved detail, sharp, crisp text and smooth grey scales. Canons superior image processing and innovative S-Toner ensure the finest quality colour output. Reduce costs with low energy consumption The superior energy efficiency of the i-SENSYS LBP7018C will help save you money and lower the cost of ownership, as well as reduce your carbon footprint. As part of Canons commitment to providing the most eco-friendly products possible, this colour laser printer is Energy Star certified. It has a Typical Electricity Consumption (TEC) rating of just 0.5 kWh and in sleep mode it consumes as little as 1.1 watts, making it one of the most efficient printers in its class. Easy to use and run This printer is exceptionally simple to set up and operate. The toner cartridges are easy to replace and special noise reduction features make for a quieter, more pleasant working environment, so you are free to concentrate on your business. You have the peace of mind that the user-friendly Canon CAPT printer driver will save you time and deliver outstanding colour output.
description-fr_FR-print: Design lgant et peu encombrant Grce son design compact et son fonctionnement silencieux, l'imprimante de bureau i-SENSYS LBP7018C est idale pour les travailleurs indpendants et les petites entreprises. De petite taille et ractive, cette imprimante laser au prix abordable offre une qualit d'impression couleur exceptionnelle. Impression rapide Avec la technologie Canon Quick First Print (premire impression rapide), fini le temps d'attente avant impression. Imprimant jusqu' 16 ppm en noir et 4 ppm en couleur, elle a un temps de sortie de la premire impression en noir de seulement 13,6 secondes ; l'attente avant la premire impression est ainsi minimale. Excellent rsultat en couleur et en noir et blanc Obtenez des tirages de qualit exceptionnelle. Avec une rsolution d'impression allant jusqu' 2 400 x 600 dpi, vous remarquerez l'amlioration au niveau des dtails, la nettet du texte et la fluidit des niveaux de gris. Le traitement suprieur de l'image de Canon et son toner de type S garantissent des impressions couleur d'une qualit suprieure. Rduction des cots grce la faible consommation d'nergie L'efficacit nergtique suprieure de l'imprimante i-SENSYS LBP7018C vous permet d'conomiser de l'argent et de diminuer le cot global. Elle vous permet en outre de diminuer vos missions de dioxyde de carbone. Dans le cadre de l'engagement de Canon proposer les produits les plus cologiques possible, cette imprimante laser couleur est homologue Energy Star. Sa consommation lectrique typique (TEC) est de seulement 0,5 kWh ; en mode veille, elle ne consomme que 1,1 watt, ce qui en fait l'une des imprimantes les plus conomes de sa catgorie. Facile utiliser Cette imprimante est extraordinairement facile configurer et utiliser. Les cartouches de toner sont faciles remplacer et des fonctions avances de rduction du bruit rendent le lieu de travail plus silencieux et plus agrable. Vous pouvez ainsi vous concentrer pleinement sur votre travail. Vous avez l'assurance que le trs convivial pilote d'imprimante Canon CAPT vous fera gagner du temps et vous permettra d'obtenir des impressions couleur exceptionnelles.
name: Canon i-SENSYS LBP7018C

description-en_US-print: Simple to Shoot in HD - Shoot up to 2 hours of stunning HD video on the easy-to-use MinoHD - Carry it anywhere with its sleek and slim design that fits in any pocket or purse - Comes with 8 GB of built-in memory; no additional memory needed - Keep your video steady on the go with MinoHDs newest feature, image stabilization - Power on, press record and start filming it's that simple - Charge the internal Lithium-ion battery through the built-in USB arm; also recharges quickly when connected to Flip Video Power Adapter sold separately - Watch your videos on the large, 2" anti-glare color display - Connect the flip-out USB arm directly into your PC or Mac to launch pre-loaded FlipShare software - Use FlipShare software to organize and edit your videos, capture photos, send video greeting cards and create custom movies - Watch your videos on your HDTV by connecting your MinoHD to your HDTV with the Flip Video Cables HDMI sold separately - Features a flat-back panel with touch-sensitive, backlit buttons - Records high-quality H.264 videos that are compatible with most video-playing applications, including Windows Media Player, QuickTime Player and iTunes - Video: 16:9 widescreen, HD 720p (1280 x 720) at 60 frames per seconds (fps) progressive scan; recorded as MP4 files Simple to Share - Organize your videos by dragging and dropping into folders you've created, or use the automatic date-stamped folders - Edit and trim your favorite videos clips or even add your own music, all using FlipShare's easy editing tools - Create video greeting cards or use the Magic Movie feature to make movies with the click of a button - Capture photos using the easy Snapshot feature. You can grab a still-image photo from any of the 60 frames that comprise each second of your video - Share videos privately using FlipShare's attachment-free email or by creating Flip Channels; post publicly with direct video shares to Facebook, Twitter and YouTube

ViewSonics new CDP6530 full HD commercial display with 1920x1080p, 500 nits panel with 20,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio. Additional features include versatile inputs  HDMI, DVI, VGA, S-video and composite, YPbPr (BNC) with built-in 12Wx2 speakers and 12Wx2 speaker output connections. The CDP6530 can be used to make up to a 5x5 display video wall applications and automatic scheduler. RS232 daisy chain and DDC/CI is also provided for remote control. VGA and composite video output is also provided for video loop through applications.

Features

- Installation options include stand or VESA wall mount

description-en_US-print:
- Full HD camcorder with very high image quality and versatile functions
- Full HD 1920x1080 50p recording - Full HD recording at very high bit rate with 50p progressive shooting mode for highest image quality and smoothness
- 25p progressive recording mode - Shoots Full HD images at 25 frames per second to achieve cinematic feel with your video footage
- Recording on optional memory card - Records on choice of removable Memory Stick' or SD cards (Memory Stick Pro Duo' or SD/SDHC)
- G Lens with 12x optical zoom/20x extended zoom - Excellent optical performance: 26.8mm (video and photo) wide angle ideal for group shots, landscapes and more
- Optical SteadyShot with enhanced Active Mode - With 3-Way Shake-Cancelling for stable images, even while walking. Now offers enhanced stabilisation at all zoom settings
- Super sensitive 1/3.91 type Exmor R' CMOS Sensor - Highly efficient, large sensor captures detail-packed video and still images with reduced image noise, especially in low light
- BIONZ processor - High-speed image processor for enhanced image quality and responsive performance
- Up to 20.4 Megapixel still photo - By Pixel Super Resolution Technology ensures extremely detailed, high quality still images
- 7.5cm/3" Xtra Fine LCD - 921k dot wide touchscreen with TruBlack technology for high-contrast images
- Connect and quick charge with built-in USB cable - USB cable stows neatly in camcorder's hand strap. Connect Handycam to your computer and transfer videos or recharge battery
- Easy interface with Event Browse - Intuitive playback solution groups your camcorder footage and still photos by events: allows easy searching to favourites
- Highlight Playback - Automatically edits together movie highlights and still photos with music and transitions: burn the results to DVD or share online
- Intelligent AUTO (iAUTO) mode - Recognizes up to 180 combinations of Face Detection, scene settings and handheld/tripod shooting: adjusts for best results
- Tracking focus - Select an object on the touchscreen and keep autofocus locked on moving subjects, even if they're not people: ideal for pets
- Quick AF - Autofocus locks onto subject at high speed for clear, sharply-focused images, even in low-light conditions
- High Quality 5.1ch surround sound - Sensitive new microphone design captures dialogue and surround sound with superb clarity
- Auto Wind Noise Reduction - Advanced processing reduces wind noise for clearer outdoor sountracks; automatically adjusts processing to match wind strength
- Closer Voice for clearer dialogue and speech - Boosts microphone directionality and optimises processing to reduce noise and background sounds when faces are detected
- Stereo speaker with S-Master amplifer technology - High quality linear phase speaker system delivers clear, natural stereo sound when playing back your clips
- Face Detection and Smile Shutter - Capture clear, natural portraits: automatically shoot still photos of smiling faces during video recording
- Direct Copy - Transfer video footage direct to an external hard disk drive without PC: playback with fun camcorder features
- DVDirect Express compatibility - PC-free burning to AVCHD or Standard Definition DVD discs with compatible Sony DVDirect Express writer
- HDMI output - Connect camcorder for viewing any HD Ready TV
- BRAVIA Sync - Directly control camcorder playback functions via remote of connected BRAVIA television
- Golf Shot - Automatically captures a high-speed burst of images to freeze fast-moving action at exactly the right moment
- PlayMemories Home - Built-in software allows easy transfers to PC for editing, printing, disc burning, emailing and web uploads

description-de_DE-mobile: ScanSnap S1500, CCD, 600 DPI, 52 - 127 g/m, USB 1.1/2.0, 35 W, 3 kg, Schwarz
description-de_DE-print: Scangeschwindigkeit und -auflsung Einfach Papier in den 50-Blatt-ADF (automatischer Dokumenteneinzug) einlegen, ein Knopfdruck und schon scannt ScanSnap S1500 Dokumente mit einer Geschwindigkeit von bis zu 20 Seiten pro Minute bei 150 dpi oder, bis zu 40 Bildern pro Minute beim Duplexscannen. Hhere Auflsungen von bis zu 600 dpi sind in Farbe und schwarzwei mglich. Zudem hat der Anwender die Mglichkeit, Papierdokumente entweder direkt in Adobe PDF-, Word-, Excel-, PowerPoint 2003-Dateien umzuwandeln oder Standardbildbetrachter zu nutzen. Scannen von gemischtem Beleggut ScanSnap S1500 erfasst problemlos Dokumentenvorlagen vom Visitenkarten- bis zumA3-Format. Selbst Vorlagen bis zu A3 knnen gefaltet in einer Dokumententasche eingelegt und gescannt werden. Mithilfe seiner Software kann der Scanner automatisch das Format gescannter Dokumente erkennen und sie entsprechend zuschneiden und so den Speicherbedarf reduzieren. Zustzliche Funktionen ScanSnap S1500 verfgt ber eine Vielfalt integrierter Funktionen zur Verbesserung der Qualitt der gescannten Bilder und Minimierung der Bedienereingriffe. Die automatische Farberkennung sorgt dafr, dass mehrfarbige oder schwarzweie Dokumente stets korrekt gescannt und entsprechend gespeichert werden. Leere Seiten innerhalb eines Papierstapels werden automatisch gelscht. Kopfber eingelegte Seiten werden beim Scanvorgang automatisch seitenrichtig gedreht. Auerdem werden schrg eingezogene oder schief dargestellte Vorlagen mittels der Deskew-Funktion automatisch geradegerckt. Einfaches und intuitives Scannen Der ScanSnap S1500 wurde mit einer neuen Funktion zum zeitsparenden Scannen ausgestattet: 'Quick Menu'. Mithilfe dieser Funktion kann der Anwender whrend des Scanvorgangs die weitere Bearbeitung des gescannten Dokuments bestimmen. Quick Menu wird automatisch bei Drcken der Scantaste aufgerufen und ermglicht die intuitive Auswahl weiterer Bearbeitungsschritte, wie Versendung als E-Mail, Druck, Ablage in einem gewnschten Verzeichnis oder Konvertierung zur Ansicht in Word, Excel oder PowerPoint. ScanSnap S1500 ist auch in einer Deluxe-Version mit dem Rack2-Filer v5.0 erhltlich, einem einfach zu handhabenden, persnlichen Content Management Companion, mittels welchem sich alle gescannten und digital erzeugten Dokumente im Nu in virtuelle Aktenordner und Dateien einordnen und kategorisieren lassen.
description-en_US-mobile: ScanSnap S1500, CCD, 600 DPI, 52 - 127 g/m, USB 1.1/2.0, 35 W, 3 kg, Black
description-en_US-print: The ScanSnap S1500 provides Windows users an effective way to greatly reduce paper clutter, storage space, and security risk associated with unmanaged paperwork at home or office. Even better, documents scanned by ScanSnap take on a higher level of accessibility and usefulness once liberated into the digital realm. Compact Color Duplex Scanner for Microsoft Windows - One button searchable PDF creation - Intelligent paper feed detection - Blazing 20ppm color scanning - 50-page Automatic Document Feeder (ADF) - Comes with Adobe Acrobat 9 Standard - The S1500 replaces the fi-4110EOX, fi-5110EOX, fi-5110EOX2, S500 and S510
description-fr_FR-mobile: ScanSnap S1500, CCD, 600 DPI, 52 - 127 g/m, USB 1.1/2.0, 35 W, 3 kg, Noir
description-fr_FR-print: Vitesse de numrisation et rsolution Il suffit de placer une pile de documents dans le chargeur automatique de documents de 50 pages et d'appuyer sur la touche, le ScanSnap S1500 numrisera les documents des vitesses allant jusqu' 18 pages par minute 150 dpi, ou en recto-verso jusqu' 36 images par minute. Des rsolutions allant jusqu' 600 dpi sont possibles en couleur ou en noir et blanc et l'utilisateur a le choix de numriser directement en PDF Adobe, Word, Excel, PowerPoint 2003 ou en logiciels d'affichage d'images standard. Numrisation de lots mixtes de documents Le ScanSnap S1500 numrisera facilement aussi bien les petits documents tels que les cartes de visite que les documents de taille A3, grce l'utilisation du transparent fourni. Le logiciel permet au scanner de reconnatre automatiquement la taille des documents numriss et de les rduire en consquence, ce qui permet d'optimiser l'espace de stockage. Fonctionnalit supplmentaire Le ScanSnap S1500 est offert avec un ventail de fonctionnalits intgres, ceci afin d'amliorer la qualit de l'image numrise et pour rduire au minimum le travail de l'oprateur. La dtection automatique de la couleur permet d'assurer que quel que soit le format couleur ou monochrome d'un document, il est numris et stock en consquence. Les documents mixtes recto et recto-verso ne reprsentent pas un problme, toute page blanche tant automatiquement retire et de mme les pages numrises dans le mauvais sens avec des lments de texte tant automatiquement tournes dans le bon sens. L'image amliore le sera plus encore avec la correction de dsalignement automatique, qui permet d'assurer que les documents introduits de travers sont automatiquement raligns.geradegerckt. Numrisation intuitive et simple La fonction 'Quick Menu' est une nouvelle caractristique de ScanSnap S1500. Elle permet l'utilisateur de dterminer la destination du document numris au cours de la numrisation. Le Quick Menu est lanc aprs avoir appuy sur la touche numrisation, qui permet l'utilisateur de choisir immdiatement d'envoyer le document par e-mail, de l'imprimer, de l'enregistrer dans un dossier particulier ou de le convertir et de l'ouvrir sous Word, Excel ou PowerPoint. ScanSnap S1500 est disponible dans une version deluxe, compris d'un logiciel de numrisation et de gestion de dossiers ultra intuitif. Appel Rack2-Filer, ce logiciel est extrmement convivial et facile appliquer, permettant la classification des donnes numrises et fichiers lectroniques en classeurs anneaux virtuels.

description-de_DE-print:

Mit seiner berzeugenden Kombination aus hervorragender Bildqualitt und der beeindruckend schnellen Druckgeschwindigkeit verhilft der Xerox Phaser 6700 Ihrem Unternehmen oderIhrer groen Arbeitsgruppe beim Drucken hoher Auflagen zu einer neuen Stufe der Produktivitt. Bei jedem Ausdruck wichtiger Unternehmensdokumente knnen Sie sich auf unschlagbare Farbgenauigkeit verlassen. Weitere Pluspunkte: die enorme Benutzerfreundlichkeit und die bekannte Zuverlssigkeit, die nur Xerox bietet. Die Fakten auf einen Blick
  • Farbe: bis zu 45 Seiten/Min. in DIN A4 Schwarzwei: bis zu 45 Seiten/Min. in DIN A4
  • Maximales Papierformat: 216 x 356 mm

  • Optionales Produktivitts-Kit mit 160 GB-Festplattenlaufwerk (Standard auf dem Modell DX)

  • Maximales technisches Druckvolumen von bis zu 120.000 Seiten pro Monat

    • Farbe Tonerkartuschen (Kapazitt: Je 5.000 Seiten1) Schwarze Tonerkartusche (Kapazitt: 7.100 Seiten1) Trommeleinheiten2 (Kapazitt: 50.000 Seiten je Farbe, 50.000 Schwarzweiseiten) Netzkabel Software und Dokumentation

Merkmale zur Schonung von Ressourcen

description-en_US-mobile: Phaser 6700DT with PagePack/EClick: A4 Size Colour Printer, 220V, up to 45PPM Colour/B&W, 2400 DPI, 1.25GHZ Processor, USB and Ethernet I/F, 1GB Memory, 2 Sided Printing, Additional 1 x 550 sheet feeder
description-en_US-print:
Xerox Phaser 6700 Colour Laser Printer The Phaser 6700 colour laser printer accelerates work group productivity, giving you more time to focus on what matters most: the success of your business. With the winning combination of exceptional image quality and impressive fast print speed, the Xerox Phaser 6700 takes your business or large work group to a new level of high-volume productivity. You get unbeatable colour accuracy on every business-critical document you print, with the added benefits of superior ease-of-use and renowned reliability that only come from Xerox. Quick Facts
  • Colour: up to 45 ppm Black: up to 45 ppm
  • Maximum paper size: 216 x 356 mm
  • Two-sided output standard on 6700/DN, DT and DX configurations
  • Finishing option adds 1000-sheet stacking and 50-sheet stapling
  • True 2400 x 1200 dpi print resolution
  • Advanced ease-of-use and security features
  • Optional Productivity Kit with 160 GB hard drive (standard on DX model)
  • Mac, Windows (including Vista), Unix, Linux, and Citrix compatible
  • Maximum duty cycle of up to 120,000 pages per month
  • Minimum dimensions (w x d x h): 560 x 516 x 429 mm
  • Power requirements: 240 V, 50/60 Hz
  • What comes in the box
    • Colour toner cartridges (capacity: 5,000 pages each1) Black toner cartridge (capacity: 7,100 pages1) Drum cartridges2 (capacity: 50,000 pages per colour, 50,000 pages black) Power cord Software and documentation
Productivity Features
  • Superior print quality thanks to true 2400 x 1200 dpi print resolution and true Adobe PostScript 3
  • Incredible performance, with a colour and black-and-white print speed of up to 45 ppm
  • The 120,000-page monthly duty cycle supports the heaviest office print volumes
  • 1.25 GHz processor and standard 1 GB system memory handle a steady stream of complex jobs with ease
  • The Print Around feature eliminates extended printing delays by holding a job in need of resources (such as a different paper size) and printing the next job in the queue
  • Finisher option allows you to add 1000-sheet stacking and 50-sheet stapling
Ease-of-use Features
  • The large, 109 mm colour touch screen interface makes it ultra easy to find the functions you need
  • Embedded help videos provide quick troubleshooting assistance right on the front panel
  • Color By Words lets you select desired colour modifications from a simple drop-down list
  • Smart Trays alleviate guesswork by showing all available media types and sizes at print time
Resource-conserving Features
  • Standard duplexing on Phaser 6700/DN, DT and DX configurations help you reduce paper consumption
  • Innovative EA Toner requires a lower fusing temperature than traditional toner while offering glossy, beautiful office graphics
  • The Phaser 6700/DN, DT and DX configurations support the highest ENERGY STAR standards for power-saving.
Security Features
  • State-of-the-art security includes free 256-bit encryption using the FIPS 140-2 standard, plus built-in support for IPv6, IPsec, secure HTTPS, and other industry-standard network security features
  • Optional Productivity Kit with Hard Drive includes the Secure Print feature which holds private print jobs in the queue until theyre released at the device by the job owner (standard on DX model)
  • Available Image Overwrite feature completely removes unneeded data from the Phaser 6700 colour printers internal storage
1 Average standard pages. Declared Yield in accordance with ISO/IEC 19798. Yield will vary based on image, area coverage and print mode. 2 Approximate pages. Declared Yield on Drums based on an average job size of 4 pages A4/letter size. Declared Yield on Fusers based on A4/letter size 20 lb (75 gsm) pages. Drum and Fuser Yields will vary based on job run length, media type, size, weight, orientation, and usage patterns.

description-fr_FR-print:
Imprimante laser couleur Xerox Phaser 6700 Limprimante laser couleur Phaser 6700 amliore la productivit du groupe de travail en vous librant du temps que vous pouvez ainsi consacrer ce qui revt le plus dimportance : la russite de votre activit. Avec une combinaison gagnante de qualit dimage exceptionnelle et de rapidit dimpression tonnante, lappareil Xerox Phaser 6700 offre votre entreprise ou votre grand groupe de travail un niveau suprieur de productivit en gros volumes. Vous bnficiez dune prcision des couleurs sans pareil pour chaque document stratgique imprim, avec lavantage supplmentaire dune facilit dutilisation suprieure et dune fiabilit de renom que seule Xerox peut vous offrir. Prsentation gnrale
  • Couleur: jusqu' 45 ppm Noir et Blanc : jusqu' 45 ppm
  • Format de papier maximal : 216 x 356 mm
  • Impression recto-verso standard sur les configurations 6700/DN, DT et DX
  • L'option de finition ajoute une rception de 1.000 feuilles et l'agrafage de 50 feuilles
  • Vritable rsolution 2400 x 1200 dpi
  • Fonctions d'utilisation aise et de scurit avances

  • Cycle de service maximum de 120.000 pages par mois

  • Contenu de l'emballage
    • Cartouches de toner de couleur (capacit : 5 000 pages (de chaque)1) Cartouche de toner noire (capacit : 7 100 pages1) Cartouches de tambour2 (capacit : 50 000 pages par couleur, 50 000 pages (noir)) Cordon d'alimentation Logiciel et documentation
Fonctions de productivit
  • Qualit d'impression suprieure grce la vritable rsolution 2400 x 1200 et la compatibilit totale avec Adobe PostScript 3
  • Extraordinaire performance, avec une vitesse d'impression couleur et noir et blanc pouvant atteindre jusqu' 45 ppm
  • Le cycle de service mensuel de 120.000 pages supporte les volumes d'impression bureautique les plus levs
  • Le processeur 1,25 GHz et la mmoire systme de 1 Go standard grent aisment un flux complexe de tches
  • La fonction Print Around limine les retards d'impression prolongs en suspendant toute tche exigeant des ressources diffrentes (format de papier diffrent, par exemple) afin de traiter la tche suivante de la file d'attente.
  • L'option de finition permet d'ajouter une rception de 1.000 feuilles et l'agrafage de 50 feuilles
Fonctions simples
  • Le grand cran tactile couleur de 4,3 de l'interface permet de trouver aisment les fonctions ncessaires.
  • Les fichiers d'aide vido intgrs offrent une assistance de dpannage rapide, directement en faade
  • Le systme Color By Words permet de slectionner les modifications chromatiques voulues dans une simple liste contextuelle.
  • La fonction de slection intelligente de magasin supprime la conjecture en affichant tous les types et les formats de support au moment de l'impression
Des fonctions qui prservent les ressources
  • Le mode duplex standard sur les configurations Phaser 6700/DN, DT et DX contribue diminuer la consommation de papier
  • Le toner innovant EA requiert une temprature de fixation plus basse que le toner conventionnel mais permet l'impression de superbes graphiques brillants.
  • Les configurations Phaser 6700/DN, DT et DX sont conformes aux plus hautes normes ENERGY STAR d'conomie d'nergie.
Fonctions de scurit
  • Scurit de premier ordre qui comprend un cryptage libre 256 bits utilisant la norme FIPS 140-2, plus la prise en charge intgre des normes IPv6, IPsec, HTTPS scuris, entre autres fonctions de scurit rseau standard dans l'industrie
  • Le kit de productivit optionnel avec disque dur inclut la fonction d'impression protge, qui conserve les tches d'impression prives dans la file d'attente jusqu' ce que leur propritaire les dclenche au niveau du systme (en standard sur Phaser 6700/DX)
  • La fonction de nettoyage des images supprime totalement les donnes inutiles du stockage interne de l'imprimante couleur Phaser 6700
1 Pages standard moyennes. Rendement dclar conformment la norme ISO/IEC 19798. Le rendement varie en fonction de l'image, de la couverture et du mode d'impression. 2 Pages approximatives. Rendement dclar des tambours bas sur un travail moyen de 4 pages au format A4. Rendement dclar des units de fusion bas sur des pages au format A4 et de grammage de 75 gm. Les rendements des modules photorcepteur et four dpendent dela longueur des tirages, des supports utiliss - type, format, grammage, orientation - et des modes d'utilisation du systme.

description-en_US-mobile: SMARTBASE MP360 A4 18PPM 4800X1200DPI USB 2.0 IN (NMS)
description-en_US-print:
Delivering exceptional photo quality designed with elegance Get photo quality colour printing, scanning and copying in one single, stylish unit. The SmartBase MP360 combines elegance, ease and efficiency with practical features such as borderless printing. Benefit from true-to-life colours, detailed images and crisp, clear text on both plain and photo paper. The SmartBase MP360 uses a print head containing micro-nozzles that eject tiny 2 picolitre ink droplets with extraordinary precision. This advanced MicroFine Droplet Technology means that you get the highest print quality - right up to a 4800 x 1200 dots per inch resolution. Printing or copying photos usually results in a white frame around the edge of the paper. With the SmartBase MP360 you can print right up to the paper's edge, without any border. And by using special photo or glossy paper, you can produce ready-to-frame photographs or other material on A4, 4" x 6" and 5" x 7" sizes. Plus printing is fast, without compromising colour quality.
    * High image quality All-in-One
    * Professional photo quality
    * Advanced Microfine Droplet Technology
    * 2 pl ink droplets
    * Fast print/copy speed
    * CCD scanner, 1200 x 2400 dpi
    * Borderless print/copy
    * Hi-Speed USB 2.0 interface
    * Compact design
name: Canon SMARTBASE MP360 A4 18PPM
