description-de_DE-mobile: Galaxy Tab 10.1, EDGE/GPRS/HSPA+21, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 3.0, 1GHz dual - core NVIDIA Tegra 2, 1 GB RAM, 25.654 cm (10.1 ") , 3Mp Camera, 2Mp Camera, Android Browser
description-de_DE-print: Besseres Design Das Galaxy Tab 10.1 kombiniert eine riesige Funktionalitt mit ebenso groer Mobilitt: Seine Abmessungen sind geringer als die eines DINA4-Schreibblocks und es ist mit 565 Gramm und 8,6 mm eines der leichtesten und schlankesten Tablets der Welt perfekt zum immer dabei haben. Besseres Display Visuelles Vergngen ist keine Frage der Gre: Das Galaxy Tab 10.1 begeistert die Augen mit einem brillanten Bild, hoher Auflsung und beeindruckender Schrfe. Das Display stellt Inhalte im 16:10 Breitbildformat dar ein hervorragendes Seitenverhltnis fr Filme und viel Raum fr Internetseiten, Fotos und Spiele. Besserer Startbildschirm Mit dem so genannten Live Panel bleiben Sie stets im Bilde: Aktuelles wie Nachrichten, Neuigkeiten aus den sozialen Netzwerken oder E-Mails stehen Ihnen zentral ber die Startseite zur Verfgung. Hufig genutzte Anwendungen und Einstellungen erreichen Sie mit einem Fingertipp. Besseres Multitasking Praktische Mini Apps wie Weltzeituhr, Terminkalender, Taschenrechner, Notizblock oder MP3-Player ffnen sich im Vordergrund und lassen sich so schnell whrend der Nutzung anderer Apps ansteuern. Besser Surfen mit Flash BInternet, so wie es sein soll: Schnell und ohne Einschrnkungen. Mit dem Galaxy Tab 10.1 stehen Ihnen auch tausende Webangebote zur Vefgung, die Flash voraussetzen wie z.B. Videoportale oder Internetseiten mit interaktiven Brsenkursen. Bessere Geschwindigkeit Mit HSPA+ und WLAN-n nutzen Sie ortsunabhngig die derzeit schnellsten, kabellosen Zugangswege ins Netz. ber das Mobilfunknetz sind z.B. bis zu 21 MBit/s mglich, so dass Inhalte und Downloads wie Bilder und Musik unglaublich schnell auf dem Galaxy Tab verfgbar sind. Besser Lesen ber den Readers Hub haben Sie Zugriff auf Millionen Bcher sowie Tausende Zeitungen und Zeitschriften in vielen Sprachen. Komfortfunktionen wie Seitenzoom, Lesezeichen und Textvergrerung sorgen fr eine angenehme Leseerfahrung. Hierzu trgt auch die scharfe Darstellung auf dem leuchtstarken Display bei. Bessere Musik Der Musik Hub ist ein MP3-Player mit integriertem Musik-Shop, in dem Millionen von Titeln zum Download bereitstehen. Der bersichtlich strukturierte Musikkatalog hilft bei der Download;entscheidung mit Knstlerinformationen, Album-Cover, Musikkritiken und mehr. Bessere Kommunikation Der Social Hub organisiert zentral Ihre Nachrichten und Kontakte aus verschiedenen E-Mail-Konten, Instant Messengern und sozialen Netzwerken wie Facebook und Twitter. Durch den wahlweisen Einstieg ber den Nachrichten- oder Feeds-Tab bleibt auch bei einem sehr kommunikationsfreudigen Freundeskreis der berblick stets gewahrt. Besser Arbeiten Arbeit erledigen, egal wo Sie sind. Mit dem vorinstallierten Polaris Office betrachten, erstellen und bearbeiten Sie verschiedene, weit verbreitete Dateiarten darunter auch PowerPoint-, Word- und Excel-Dokumente. Die Zwischenablage erlaubt einen hnlichen Umgang mit der Ausschneiden- und Einfgen-Funktion wie am PC: Bis zu 20 Texte oder Bilder lassen sich im Zwischenspeicher ablegen. Besseres Multimedia Egal welches Genre: Auf dem 25,65 cm in der Diagonale messenden Display kommt jeder Film dank Full HD-Untersttzung bestens zur Geltung. Und auch der Ton untersttzt das Kinofeeling: Die Stereolautsprecher erzeugen einen Surround-Sound-Effekt, der Sie tiefer in das Filmgeschehen eintauchen lsst. Bessere Kameras Genieen Sie die Vorzge von zwei Kameras in Ihrem Galaxy Tab. Whrend Sie die vordere Kamera zum Beispiel fr Videochats mit Freunden oder Kollegen nutzen, lichten Sie Ihre Umgebung mit der hinteren Kamera auf Fotos oder in HD-Videos ab. Besseres Zubehr Samsung bietet optisch und funktional auf das Galaxy Tab 10.1 zugeschnittenes Original-Zubehr, das den Einsatzbereich stark erweitert und den Umgang mit dem schlanken Tablet noch komfortabler macht. Hierzu gehren z.B. Schutz-Taschen, Docking Stations und ideal fr Vielschreiber Keyboard Docks. Aktuelle Android-Plattform Das Software-Herzstck des Galaxy Tab 10.1 ist die eigens fr Tablet-Computer entwickelte Plattform Android 3.1. Sie stellt von Hause aus Anwendungen fr den Alltag wie Browser, E-Mailanwendung und Multimedia-Player bereit. Das umfangreiche Downloadangebot des Android Market bietet unzhlige Spiele und Anwendungen fr nahezu jeden Bedarf. Das ganze Paket der Google-Dienste Nutzen Sie die bekannten und beliebten Google-Dienste direkt auf Ihrem Galaxy Tab 10.1. Zu den Anwendungen gehren z.B. Google Talk (Text-, Audio- und Videochats), Google Mail, Google Kalender, YouTube, Google Maps, Google Latitude, Google Places und Google Maps Navigation (beta).
description-en_US-mobile: Galaxy Tab 10.1, EDGE/GPRS/HSPA+21, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 3.0, 1GHz dual - core NVIDIA Tegra 2, 1 GB RAM, 25.654 cm (10.1 ") , 3Mp Camera, 2Mp Camera, Android Browser
description-en_US-print: Better Design The new GALAXY Tab 10.1 offers a superlative experience with the thinnest and lightest large screen tablet available! Enjoy unmatched mobility thanks to the amazingly thin and light body. At just 565 grams and 8.6mm slim, this tablet is a breeze to handle. Better Screen High definition 10.1 display delivers excellent screen sharpness. With 1280 x 800 WXGA display boasting a pixel density of 149ppi (pixel per inch), you can enjoy better details. Movies, photos and programs with rich graphics will pop to life on the tablets screen. Better Home screen Live panel : Live Panel is a customizable home screen experience, so content can be instantly accessed from the home screen including e-mail, image galleries, favorite Web sites and social network feeds. The beauty of Live Panel is that real-time data updates, arranged as you like, are constantly refreshed to be accessed by you at any time. Better Multi-tasking Mini Apps : You can be more efficient and productive by utilizing the Mini Apps, which is true multitasking feature. Mini Apps allows you to easily access commonly-used features such as calendar, PenMemo, World Clock, Calculator or Task Manager close at hand - to be launched as a pop up over full screen applications. Better Web browsing Browse without limitations! Thousands of top websites use rich Flash applications, so whether you're browsing the web or viewing online multimedia content, you'll be able to see it all with your GALAXY Tab 10.1 and Adobe Flash player support. Better Speed With both HSPA+ and WiFi access, you can be connected 24/7 wherever you are. Enjoy fast and stable connections to the internet for speedy browsing, downloads and more! Enjoy the best of the web from your table. Better Reading Readers Hub : Readers Hub gives you access to millions of book titles, thousands of newspapers and magazines in multiple languages. Digital reading functions such as zoom in/out, font enlargement and virtual bookmarks improve the e-reading experience. Enjoy text and images in sharp detail with large bright screen. Better Music Music Hub : Rock out, get groovy or relax to some easy listening. With the Music Hub, you'll be able to access an extensive catalog of popular and classic songs along with artist information, album art, critics' music reviews and more. Better Communication Social Hub : Social Hub is a powerful tool that allows you to easily manage and have real-time access to multiple email, instant messaging, and social networking accounts through one portal. You have two access points for simplified viewing through Message tab and Feeds tab, integrating message and web feeds into one easy-to-read flow. Better Office Polaris Office : Get your work done from anywhere. With preloaded Polaris Office, you can view, edit, and create various documents including PowerPoint, Word, and Excel. Clipboard allows you to store up to 20 text & images, so you can experience advanced cut and paste function like you do with PC. Better Multimedia Experience cinema magic with Full HD Playback on the glorious 10.1 tablet screen. The dual speakers surrounding the screen create a surround sound effect that makes movie watching even more realistic. Better Imaging Enjoy having both front and rear-facing cameras built in on the tablet. Whether you need to video chat with a friend or a client, front camera offers great clarity. The rear camera allows you to capture the greatest photos and HD video right from your tablet. Better Accessories The right add-ons, such as Keyboard case or desktop dock, can help you get more out of the tablet experience. Whether it's using the tablet in more convenient ways or connecting to devices that expand the way the tablet can be used, these accessories will enhance the way you interact with your tablet. The Latest Android Technology Made for the tablet, AndroidTM 3.1 (Honeycomb) platform increases productivity by allowing you to perform different functions at the same time. View multiple panes in the same application, and browse the web just as you would on the PC. Also, the Android MarketTM offers a wide variety of apps for downloading. An Entire Suite of Google Services Do more with Google! Familiar applications including Google Talk video chat, Gmail, Google Calendar, Youtube, Google Maps, Google Latitude, Google Places, and Google Maps Navigation(Beta) work seamlessly on the Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1.
name: Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1

description-en_US-print: Robust Color Output Designed for busy color environments, the Lexmark XS796 Family delivers vibrant, professional quality output that is consistent from the first page to the last. - Lexmark Extra High Yield Print Cartridge available, offering yields of up to 20000 pages - Print and copy at speeds as fast as 50 ppm in both black and color - PANTONE calibration for consistent color tones - Named Color Replacement for easy color matching - Instant warm-up fuser to help reduce energy consumption and improve time to first page Business Productivity The Lexmark XS796 Family combines exceptional multifunction performance with time-saving applications designed to make you more productive. These MFPs can deliver the performance of much larger copiers, but with a smaller footprint and a more affordable price. - Duplex scanning to scan both sides of your documents in one pass - Advanced copy functions let you interrupt long print runs to make a quick copy, and proof the first copy set before completing your copy job - Scan to multiple destinations, including scan to email, scan to FTP, scan to fax, scan to network, and more - Preloaded applications to drive greater efficiency, and Lexmark Embedded Solutions - Framework to further extend the capabilities of the device Easy and Intuitive The Lexmark XS796 Family is designed for easy operation and maintenance. - Extra large, easy to navigate 10.2-inch color touch screen provides audible and tactile feedback to make completing tasks intuitive - Print and scan preview features help you select documents or specific pages within a document - Directional lights on the device provide visual cues to guide you through tasks - Eco-friendly settings such as the Sleep Button and Hibernate Mode - Available device fleet management software

description-en_US-print: PREPARE TO BE DAZZLED. Want deeper blacks and richer colors? LG's LED technology provides even greater control of brightness and delivers better contrast, amazing clarity and color detail, as well as greater energy efficiency compared to conventional LCD monitors. ULTRA SLIM DESIGN You'll love the stunning picture while it's on and marvel at its appearance when it's off. Its a sleek, elegant design that will appeal to even the most refined sense of style. DOUBLE THE DETAIL. This stunning picture is the reason you wanted HD in the first place. With almost double the pixel resolution, Full HD 1080p gives it superior picture quality over standard resolution. Youll see details and colors like never before. SAVE MORE THAN ENERGY. Earning the ENERGY STAR means a product meets strict energy efficiency guidelines set by the US Environmental Protection Agency and the Department of Energy. For Monitors, it means they save energy both in standby and active (when they're on) modes. ENERGY STAR qualified Monitors use about 25% less energy than standard units.

description-en_US-print: imageFORMULA DR-6010C Production Scanner The imageFORMULA DR-6010C departmental scanner delivers high speed, reliable document handling, and high quality images, in a small package. Flexibility, rich features, and ease-of-use, help maximize return on investment at all levels of the business system. The DR-6010C was developed to offer another option for decentralized capture scanning needs. In combination with its sister product, the imageFORMULA DR-4010C, these scanners offer competitive document imaging platforms designed to increase efficiencies and workflows in decentralized scanning environments. Features: High Speed: Capable of maintaining the same high scanning speeds in color, grayscale and black and white up to 200 dpi up to 60 ppm and 120 ipm. Suggested Daily Volume: Built to match the volume requirements of decentralized departmental scanning. Advanced Sensor: Employ advanced three line CIS sensors enable prompt transition of hardcopy documents into electronic files. High Flexibility: Capable of reliably handling a wide variety of document sizes, from 2.1 by 2.8 inches up to 8.6 by 14 inches. A Long Document Mode enables scanning of documents up to 118 inches in length. Flexible paper feed and output trays enhance reliable scanning of batches of mixed document sizes. Reliable Feeding: Employ Canon's advanced and unique feeding mechanism as well as such features as Ultrasonic Double Feed Detection and Rapid Recovery to ensure smooth and reliable document feeding. Combined with solid body design and heavy-duty feed and eject trays to help minimize downtime and help maintain business continuity. High Image Quality: Employ advanced three line CIS sensors with an automatic dust-free shading calibration mechanism to capture intricate details with up to 600 dpi resolution. Image quality can be further enhanced using such features as Advanced Text Enhancement, Moire Reduction, and Remove Bleed Through. Small size: Easily fits on a desktop. Ease-of-use: User friendly operation through programmable pre-registered Scan-To-Job buttons. Front Side Operation: Ergonomic design with a U-Turn paper path, that allows a user to conveniently feed and retrieve documents from the front side, and an advanced document feed tray space saving design, that employs the front cover as document feed tray when open.

description-de_DE-mobile: PIXMA MX715, 12.5/9.5 ipm, 9600 x 2400, Print, Scan, Copy, Fax, ADF, Ethernet, USB 2.0, Wireless LAN, 11.7kg
description-de_DE-print: - 4-in-1 Multifunktionssystem mit Single Ink, LAN + WLAN: Drucken, Kopieren, Scannen und Faxen - Bis 9.600 dpi, bis zu 1Pikoliter feine Tintentrpfchen - Ca. 12,5 / 9,3 ISO-Seiten/Min. (SW/Farbe) - Untersttzt Apple AirPrint und das Drucken von passenden Smartphones - 6,2 cm TFT-Display und bifunktionales Bedienfeld - Dokumenteneinzug fr bis zu 35 Blatt auch beidseitig - Automatischer beidseitiger Druck und 2 Papierzufhrungen - 5 separate Tintentanks inkl. Textschwarz - Scan-to-USB-Stick, Faxempfang auf USB-Stick oder Speicherkarte - Umfangreiches Softwarepaket mit Full HD Movie Print - Das Single-Ink Multifunktionssystem mit Duplex-Funktionalitt Ideal fr zu Hause und das Bro LAN- und WLAN-Schnittstelle prdestinierten dieses elegante, schwarze Multifunktionssystem zur gemeinsamen Nutzung beim Drucken, Scannen, Kopieren und Faxen und das von praktisch berall im Haus oder im Bro. Durch die Untersttzung von Apple AirPrint knnen Sie ganz einfach (ohne Treiberinstallation) von Ihrem iPad und iPhone drucken. Canon iEPP als kostenlose App im Apple App-Store erhltlich erweitert die Mglichkeiten ber WLAN zu drucken und neuerdings sogar zum iPhone, iPad und iPod touch zu scannen. Auch fr Android Mobilsysteme stellt Canon im Android Market ein kostenloses App zur Verfgung. Schnelles Handling Ihrer Dokumente Der Automatische Dokumenteneinzug mit Duplexfunktion (DADF) fr bis zu 35 Blatt erleichtert das Verarbeiten umfangreicher, auch beidseitig bedruckter Vorlagen. Die Mglichkeit Scans direkt als Kompakt-PDF zu speichern ist u. a. ideal zum Archivieren oder fr E-Mail-Anhnge. Eindrucksvolle Geschwindigkeit Die Druckgeschwindigkeit von Dokumenten betrgt ca. 12,5 ISO-Seiten pro Minute in Schwarzwei bzw. ca. 9,3 ISO-Seiten pro Minute in Farbe. Ein randloses Foto im Format 10 x 15 cm ist in ca. 20 Sekunden gedruckt; eine DIN A4 Seite in nur 14 Sekunden kopiert. Dank der Quick Start-Technologie ist dieses Multifunktionssystem nur wenige Sekunden nach dem Einschalten einsatzbereit. Bedienerfreundlich Ein 6,2 Zoll groes TFT-Farbdisplay erleichtert den Zugriff auf ausgewhlte Funktionen und die Vorschau von Bildern. Das bifunktionale Bedienfeld hat zweifach belegte LED-Tasten. Je nach gewhltem Betriebsmodus ndert sich die Tastenanzeige; die Tastenanzahl konnte so deutlich reduziert werden. Singe Ink Technologie Der PIXMA MX715 verfgt ber 5 separate Tintentanks. Wenn eine Farbe ausgeht, muss nur der entsprechende Tank ausgewechselt werden. Das ist effizient und wirtschaftlich. Umweltfreundlich und sparsam Mit dem automatischen Duplexdruck sparen Sie nicht nur Papier, weil dieses beidseitig bedruckt werden kann, sondern reduzieren damit auch den CO2 Aussto. Exzellente Laborqualitt Der FINE-Druckkopf von Canon sorgt mit Mikrodsen fr bis zu 1 Pikoliter feine Tintentrpfchen fr eine Druckauflsung von bis zu 9.600 dpi Farbdrucke sind beeindruckend detailreich. Direktscan auf USB-Stick oder Speicherkarte Vorn am Multifunktionssystem befinden sich eine USB-Schnittstelle und Speicherkartensteckplatz. Dokumente knnen direkt ohne den Umweg ber den PC auf einen hier angebrachten USB-Stick oder eine kompatible Karte gespeichert werden
description-en_US-mobile: PIXMA MX715, 12.5/9.5 ipm, 9600 x 2400, Print, Scan, Copy, Fax, ADF, Ethernet, USB 2.0, Wireless LAN, 11.7kg
description-en_US-print: - All-In-One with fax, Wi-Fi & Ethernet - Stylish black design - Dual Function panel - 35-sheet Duplex ADF - 5 Single Ink Tanks - ISO ESAT 12.5 ipm mono/9.3 ipm colour - Up to 9600 dpi - ISO A4 Copy: 14 seconds - Auto Duplex Print - Scan to USB memory without a PC - Quality, speed and functionality in one powerful All-In-One Ideal for home and office Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity make this stylish black All-In-One easy for everyone to share and print, scan, copy and fax from virtually anywhere in the home or office. Apple AirPrint support allows you to print directly from iPad and iPhone. High-speed document handling Large double-sided documents can be automatically scanned, copied or faxed with the fully integrated, 35-sheet Duplex Automatic Document Feeder (DADF). Scan and save to a compact PDF' is ideal for archiving or emailing. Impressive speeds Enjoy print speeds of 12.5 ipm mono or 9.3 ipm colour. A photolab-quality 10x15 cm borderless photo is printed in approximately 20 seconds, while an A4 page copies in just 14 seconds. Quick Start means this All-In-One is ready to go seconds after switching on. Easy to work with A 6.2cm colour TFT display makes it easy to view selected functions and preview images. The Dual Function Panel features LED-lit dual purpose keys. These keys change appearance according to the mode selected, reducing the number of physical keys on the product. Economical, single Ink tanks For greater economy, the PIXMA MX715 has 5 single ink tanks. When a colour runs out, only this single tank needs replacing. Go green and save See how much paper and CO2 you save using the Auto Duplex Print feature that automatically prints both sides of the paper. Superb photolab-quality Canon's FINE technology, with minimum 1pl ink droplets, delivers up to 9600dpi print resolution for amazingly detailed colour photos and images. Scan to USB or memory card Using the USB and memory card port on the front, documents can be saved directly without the need to connect to a PC.
description-fr_FR-mobile: PIXMA MX715, 12.5/9.5 ipm, 9600 x 2400, Print, Scan, Copy, Fax, ADF, Ethernet, USB 2.0, Wireless LAN, 11.7kg
description-fr_FR-print: - Multifonction avec tlcopieur et connexions Wi-Fi et Ethernet - Design noir lgant - Panneau de commande double fonction - Chargeur automatique de documents recto verso 35 feuilles - 5 rservoirs d'encre individuels - ESAT ISO 12,5 ipm en noir et blanc / 9,3 ipm en couleur - Rsolution maximale de 9600 dpi - Copie A4 ISO : 14 secondes - Impression recto verso automatique - Numrisez vos documents vers une cl USB, sans ordinateur - Qualit, rapidit et fonctionnalits runies dans un multifonction aux performances exceptionnelles La solution idale pour la maison et le bureau Grce la connectivit Wi-Fi et Ethernet de cet lgant multifonction noir, tout le monde peut se le partager et imprimer, numriser, copier et tlcopier des documents depuis quasiment n'importe quel endroit de la maison ou du bureau, en toute simplicit. La prise en charge d'Apple AirPrint vous permet d'imprimer directement depuis votre iPad ou votre iPhone. Gestion rapide des documents Le chargeur automatique recto verso de 35 feuilles intgr permet de numriser, copier et tlcopier automatiquement des documents recto verso volumineux. La fonction de numrisation et d'enregistrement au format Compact PDF est idale pour l'archivage ou l'envoi par voie lectronique de documents. Une vitesse impressionnante Bnficiez d'une vitesse d'impression de 12,5 ipm en noir et blanc et de 9,3 ipm en couleur. L'impression d'une photo sans marge de 10 15 cm de qualit professionnelle prend environ 20 secondes, tandis qu'une copie au format A4 ncessite seulement 14 secondes. Grce la technologie Quick Start, le multifonction est prt fonctionner quelques secondes aprs sa mise sous tension. Simplicit d'utilisation Un grand cran TFT couleur de 6,2 cm amliore la visibilit des fonctions slectionnes et facilite la visualisation des images. Le panneau de commande double fonction intgre des touches LED deux fonctions. Ces touches changent d'apparence en fonction du mode slectionn, ce qui rduit le nombre de touches physiques sur le produit. Rservoirs d'encre spars conomiques Le PIXMA MX715 est dot de 5 rservoirs d'encre individuels, pour encore plus d'conomies. Lorsqu'une couleur est puise, il suffit de remplacer le rservoir correspondant. Agissez pour la plante et ralisez des conomies Dcouvrez combien de papier et de CO2 vous conomisez grce la fonction d'impression recto verso automatique qui imprime automatiquement sur les deux faces d'une feuille de papier. Une qualit professionnelle d'exception La technologie FINE de Canon utilise des gouttelettes d'encre de 1 pl minimum et une rsolution d'impression pouvant atteindre 9600 dpi, pour des photos et des images couleur aux dtails stupfiants. Numrisation vers une carte mmoire ou une cl USB Les ports USB et carte mmoire situs l'avant de l'appareil permettent d'enregistrer les documents directement, sans avoir se connecter un ordinateur.
name: Canon PIXMA MX715

description-en_US-mobile: HandyCam, 1/8 CCD, 60x opt. zoom, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") LCD, USB 2.0, 195g, black
description-en_US-print: See the bigger picture Get even closer with the new 70x extended zoom feature. Advanced image processing technology ensures almost no visible image degradation, letting you enjoy a greater shooting range, from wide to telephoto. Smooth and steady videos, every time Whether you're standing still or on the move, SteadyShot drastically reduces camera shake for smooth, blur-free recordings even when you're zooming in and out. Wider, clearer, better The 2.7" Wide Clear Photo LCD screen delivers better visibility, higher screen resolution, sharper contrast and more accurate colour reproduction than ever before. Auto-correct settings for every shot With Intelligent Auto, it's easy to capture your moments in the best light. Just point your Handycam at your subject, and the correct camera settings will be adjusted automatically from 18 different scene combinations. It's hassle-free even for first-time users, so you can concentrate on getting your perfect shot and leave the details to us. Detects faces automatically The Face Detection feature automatically detects up to eight faces in a scene, optimising the exposure for the best results. It's handy for quick and easy shooting of scenes with people, guaranteeing correct exposures and bright faces every time. Capture great videos, even in the dark Shoot clear, vivid videos in low light conditions with the built-in LED video light. Bright and energy-efficient, it can illuminate any subject up to 1.5 metres. Picture Motion Browser (PMB) Share your videos easily with PMB Portable, already embedded in your Handycam. PMB Portable lets you upload videos to Facebook and YouTube easily when you connect your Handycam to a computer via a USB cable no installation required. For advanced importing options, check out the full version of PMB in the CD-ROM provided with every Handycam. Direct Copy With Direct Copy, you can also back up videos directly onto your external hard drive, via a USB adapter. Dual-Compatibility Memory Card Slot Shoot and store more on your Handycam with a memory card slot that's compatible with both MS and SD cards.
name: Sony DCR-SX22 hand-held camcorder

description-de_DE-print: Der 3D-Monitor e2352Phz holt die Action ganz dicht heran. Dank der realistischen 3D-Darstellung des 58,5 cm/23-Modells mit modernster LED-Backlight-Technologie fhlt der Nutzer sich direkt in das Geschehen hineinversetzt. Aufgrund der schnellen Reaktionszeit von nur 5 Millisekunden und einer Auflsung von 1920 x 1080 Bildpunkten (Full HD) ist er zudem perfekt fr Movies und Gaming ausgestattet. Sehr gute Kontrast- (20.000.000:1) und Helligkeitswerte (250 cd/m) sorgen fr eine ausgezeichnete Bildqualitt. Hochauflsende Inhalte empfngt der Monitor ber einen HDCP-kompatiblen HDMI-Eingang.
description-en_US-print: The 3D monitor e2352Phz brings action up close and personal. Thanks to its lifelike 3D rendering, the 58.5 cm/23 model with the latest LED backlight technology makes users feel like they are right in the middle of the experience. Due to its fast response time of five milliseconds and resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels (Full HD) it is also ideally suited for movies and gaming. Very good contrast (20,000,000:1) and brightness values (250 cd/m) provide an excellent image quality. High resolution content is received by the monitor via an HDCP compatible HDMI input.
description-fr_FR-print: Grce  un rendu 3D trs raliste, le2352Vz - modle de 58,5 cm/23  rtro-clairage par LED* - plonge lutilisateur au cur de laction ! Son temps de rponse de cinq millisecondes et sa rsolution Full HD de 1920 x 1080 pixels en font galement lalli idal des films et des jeux. Ses excellentes valeurs de contraste et de luminosit (250 cd/m) lui confrent une qualit dimage exceptionnelle, en 3D comme en 2D. Le contenu haute rsolution est transmis au moniteur par le biais dune entre HDMI compatible HDCP. *LED : diodes lectroluminescentes
name: AOC e2352Phz

Transform your PC into a high-end stereo system with the Dell AX210CR USB Stereo Speakers. With these speakers Dell offers a true upgrade in audio quality, speaker aesthetics and functionality. Whether you're enjoying the latest DVD movie, playing an action-packed game, or participating in a video-conference, you will be at the center of excellent sound. description-en_US-print: High on Options, Low on Costs The best in black and white: paper-saving duplex standard, a rich selection of paper handling accessories, and economical extra-high-yield 36,000*-page replacement cartridges. Turns work into workflow with 55 ppm speed, rapid time-to-first-page, and a built-in framework for supporting solution applications. (*Declared yield in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752.) Let It Decide the Best Speed Identifies the size and complexity of your job and automatically calculates the optimal speedquicker time-to-first-page for short jobs and more pages per minute for longer jobs. Intelligent Job Waiting No more letting missing media derail hours of print time. The innovative Job Waiting feature will simply hold that job aside, letting others go on working without interruption (requires the hard disk option). Outstanding Print Quality Combines true 1200 x 1200 dpi with automatic darkness adjustment and pixel-boosting technology to ensure high-quality, professional documents every time. Cutting-Edge Security From network security to user-access restrictions, youll be fully equipped to keep valuable data safe and sound. In addition to IPSec, SNMPv3 and 802.1x network security, the Lexmark T654dn offers an alphanumeric pad for easy PIN authentication, plus encryption and disk wiping to secure the optional hard disk. Get Efficient with Lexmark Solutions Nowadays there are apps for just about everything, from tracking your diet to balancing your checkbook. But what about managing your documents? The Lexmark T654 family is the ideal platform for tapping into serious business apps that can help you save paper, cut waste, lower costs and enhance document security. See Related Links to learn more.
name: Lexmark T654dn

description-de_DE-print: Mit Funktionen wie SmartImage, SmartContrast, SmartControl und TrueVision trgt der energiesparende Monitor 17S1 zur Steigerung Ihrer Produktivitt bei.
description-en_US-print: Feature packed display for increased productivity With features like SmartImage, SmartContrast, SmartControl and TrueVision, the energy efficient 17S1 business display increases your productivity. Sustainable Eco-friendly solution - Energy Star for energy efficiency and low power consumption; - Eco-friendly materials that meets international standards; - EPEAT Silver ensures lower impact on environment. Outstanding display performance - SmartImage: Optimized user friendly display experience; - SmartContrast: For incredible rich black details; - TrueVision: Laboratory quality display performance. Great convenience - Built-in stereo speakers for multimedia; - Dual input accepts both analog VGA and digital DVI signals; - Screen tilts to your ideal, individualized viewing angle; - Hassle-free display performance tuning with SmartControl II; - Cable management for a tidy work space. Dual input Dual input provides connectors to accommodate input of both analog VGA and digital DVI signals. SmartImage SmartImage is an exclusive leading edge Philips technology that analyzes the content displayed on your screen and gives you optimized display performance. This user friendly interface allows you to select various modes like Office, Image, Entertainment, Economy etc., to fit the application in use. Based on the selection, SmartImage dynamically optimizes the contrast, color saturation and sharpness of images and videos for ultimate display performance. The Economy mode option offers you major power savings. All in real time with the press of a single button! SmartControl II SmartControl II is monitor-based software with an easy-to-use on-screen graphic interface that guides you through fine-tuning resolution, color calibration and other display settings including brightness, contrast, clock & phase, position, RGB, white point and - on models with onboard speakers - volume adjustments. Built-in stereo speakers A pair of high quality stereo speakers built into a display device. It can be visible front firing, or invisible down firing, top firing, rear firing, etc depending on model and design. TrueVision TrueVision is industry-leading, proprietary Philips testing and algorithm technology for monitor adjustment and fine tuning, an extensive process that ensures ultimate display performance in compliance with a standard four-times more stringent than Microsoft's Vista requirements from each and every monitor that leaves the factory - not just a few review samples. Only Philips goes to these lengths to deliver this exacting level of color accuracy and display quality in every new monitor. Adjustable tilt Adjustable tilt is backward and forward movement of a screen on its base to achieve custom positioning for an ideal viewing angle and more comfort for people who spend long hours working on the computer. Cable management Cable management is a system that maintains tidy workspace by organizing cables and wires required for the operation of a display device. EPEAT Silver Philips EPEAT Silver certified monitors ensure protection for human health and environment, and are highly energy efficient ensuring low emissions of climate changing green house gases. EPEAT program helps purchasers evaluate, compare and select Monitors based on 51 environmental criteria supported by US EPA. EPEAT Silver is valid only where Philips registers the product. Eco-friendly materials Philips is committed to use sustainable, ecofriendly materials across its monitor range. All body plastic parts, metal chassis parts and packing materials use 100% recyclable materials. In some selected models we utilize upto 65% post consumer recycled plastics. Strict adherence to RoHS standards ensure substantial reduction or elimination of toxic substances like Lead, for example. Mercury content in monitors with CCFL backlight has been reduced significantly, while eliminated in monitors with LED backlight completely. Energy Star 5.0 Energy Star is a US EPA sponsored energy efficiency program also adopted by many other countries. Energy Star certification ensures that you are buying a product which meets the latest power efficiency standards which operates with maximum power efficiency at all operational levels. New Philips monitors are certified for Energy Star 5.0 specifications and meet or exceed the standard. For example, in sleep mode Energy Star 5.0 requires less than 1watt power consumption, whereas Philips monitors consume less than 0.5watts.
description-fr_FR-print: Dot des fonctions SmartImage, SmartContrast, SmartControl et TrueVision, l'cran professionnel 17S1  faible consommation d'nergie amliore votre productivit.
name: Philips 17S1AB

description-de_DE-mobile: AV36 - 600 dpi, CIS (LED), 600dpi, 32MB SDRAM, USB, 2.5 W, 0.7 kg, incl. UHG
description-de_DE-print: Sammeln sich unterwegs zu viele Dokumente an? Entscheiden sie sich fr den Avision AV36 Scanner. Dieser vollstndig portable Scanner erlaubt ihnen das Einscannen von allen ihren Dokumenten, Fotos, Visitenkarten, Ausweisen, Kreditkarten und Blttern bis zu einer Gre von 216 x 356mm. Dieser handliche und vielseitige Scanner kommt mit der Stromversorgung eines USB 2.0 Anschlusses aus. Der Avision AV36 Scanner lt sich bequem transportieren und bentigt nur ein Minimum an Platz auf dem Schreibtisch. Durch die Verwendung der CIS Technik (Contact Image Sensor) entgegen der CCD Technik, kann der Scanner kleiner und portabler sowie stromsparender gebaut werden. Somit ist der Avision AV36 Scanner die perfekte Lsung fr alle, die fr unterwegs eine effiziente und leicht verstndliche Scannlsung bentigen. Ein einfacher Druck auf die Scanntaste und das Dokument wird mit bis zu 24bit Farbtiefe und 600dpi optischer Auflsung gescannt. Die gerade Papierfhrung erlaubt es dem AV36 Ausweise und sogar Kreditkarten problemlos zu scannen, ohne diese zu beschdigen. Der brandneue AV36 ist nicht nur fr den portablen Einsatz entwickelt worden sondern auch mit der Absicht das Gert frei von einer externen Stromquelle nutzen zu knnen.Es reicht ein USB Anschlu aus um das Gert mit Strom zu versorgen und das Bild zu bertragen. Mobile Stromversorgung via USB Tragen sie das Gert nicht von einem Standort zum nchsten sondern nutzen sie es unterwegs! Diese Vision wurde mit dem AV36 Scanner realisiert, der unabhngig vom Stromnetz, nur ber den USB-Anschluss mit Strom versorgt wird. Somit scannen sie ihre Dokumente berall wo ein Notebook genutzt werden kann, praktisch berall. Portabel Der AV36 ist sehr leicht (nur 0.7kg) und sehr klein mit 290mm x 77mm x 52mm. Die geringe Gre erlaubt es dem Nutzer das Gert problemlos mitzufhren ohne zustzllichen Ballast zu tragen. Aufgrund der Tatsache das kein Netzteil bentigt wird ist der Avision AV36 der ideale Begleiter fr unterwegs und setzt einen neuen Standard in der Welt der portablen Scanner ohne auf Qualitt verzichten zu mssen. Duplex Scanner Der AV36 ist ein Duplex Scannermit einer optischen Auflsung von 600dpi. Sparen sie Zeit und Mhe indem sie ihre doppelseitigen Dokumente oder ID-Karten in einem Scannvorgang einlesen. Das Scannen eines Dokuments dauert in Farbe bei 300 dpi Auflsung nur 12 Sekunden im Simplex Modus, sowie 15 Sekunden im Duplex Modus. Kompatibel mit Plastik Karten(EC) Untersttzt Dokumente von A8 bis A4, und kann dabei Plastik Karten(z.B EC Karten/Psse) bis zu einer Hhe von 1.25mm einscannen. Software Umfang Der Avision AV36 Scanner wird mit Twain und ISIS Treibern ausgeliefert, der Vollversion des exklusiven Avision Button Manager, AVScan, ScanSoft PaperPort 11SE , NewSoft Presto! BizCard NewSoft Presto! BizCard Presto! Presto! BizCard ist eine umfassende Kontaktverwaltungs Software mit der Sie ihre Visitenkarten scannen , bearbeiten und mit einer Vielzahl an Anwendungen synchronisieren knnen.Das ideale Werkzeug um ihre Kontakte zu pflegen und sprachbergreifend zu organisieren. Presto! BizCard erfasst und konvertiert ihre Visitenkarten in eine durchsuchbare und editierbare Datenbank. Diese Informationen lassen sich somit einfach und mhelos mit dem AV36 zu ihrem Computer/Laptop bertragen.
description-en_US-mobile: AV36 - 600 dpi, CIS (LED), 600dpi, 32MB SDRAM, USB, 2.5 W, 0.7 kg, incl. UHG
description-en_US-print: Mobile power by USB Dont just haul the scanner from one destination to another, use it on the go! This is the vision fully realized with the AV36, which is powered by a USB port instead of a wall socket. So now, documents can be scanned whenever a laptop is present, which can be anywhere. Portable The AV36 is light (only 0.7kg) and small in size at 290mm x 77mm x 52mm. The small form factor enables users to pack along easily without sacrificing too much luggage space or become a burden to carry. Coupled with the benefits of being USB powered, the AV36 sets a new standard for scanner portability. Duplex scanning The AV36 is a duplex scanner with an optical resolution of 600dpi. Save the time and effort of manually scanning a double-sided document or a plastic ID card. A complete color scan of A4 document at 300dpi in simplex mode takes 12 seconds, and 7.5 seconds per image in duplex mode. Compatible with plastic cards Supported document size ranges from A8 to A4, and it can scan embossed plastic cards up to 1.25mm thick, such as credit cards and ID cards. Bundled software The newest version of TWAIN (v5.60) and extensive software applications Avision Button Manager, AVScan 5, NewSoft Presto! BizCard and ScanSoft PaperPort 11SE are included with every shipped unit to bring the most out of the AV36. NewSoft Presto! BizCard Presto! BizCard is a complete contact management solution that lets you scan, edit and synchronize business card contacts to various contact management software applications. It captures and converts business cards into a searchable and editable database, with support for 12 different languages including English, most European languages, Simplified/Traditional Chinese and Japanese. BizCard is the ideal tool for helping you stay in touch and organized.
name: Avision AV36

description-de_DE-mobile: i-SENSYS MF4410 - 23 ppm (A4), 600 x 600 dpi, USB 2.0, 64 MB, LCD, 10.3 Kg
description-de_DE-print: Dieses kompakt-elegante SW-Laser-Multifunktionssystem mit Drucker, Kopierer und Scanner ist ideal fr zu Hause, in kleinen Bros und punktet mit Produktivitt, Komfort und hoher Energieeffizienz. Features - SW-Laser-Multifunktionssystem: Drucker, Kopierer und Scanner. - Elegantes, Platz sparendes Design. - Anwenderfreundliches, intuitiv zu bedienendes LCD. - Bis zu 23 SW-Drucke/Min.; Druck der ersten Seite nach nur ca. 9 Sekunden. - Druckauflsung von bis zu 1.200 x 600 dpi fr qualitativ hochwertige Ausdrucke und Kopien. - Energieeffizient. Das kompakte, elegante 3-in-1 Multifunktionssystem fr zu Hause Elegant und kompakt Dieses kompakte Multifunktionssystem berzeugt mit einem attraktiven Preis-Leistungs-Verhltnis: Neben Kopieren und Scannen ist es ideal fr das Drucken von Dokumenten in ausgezeichneter Druckqualitt. Mit seinem eleganten, vollstndig in schwarz gehaltenem Design und der kleinen Stellflche ist das System ein Blickfang auf jedem Schreibtisch und ideal fr den Einsatz im Bro oder zu Hause. Exzellente Bildqualitt Die interpolierte Druckauflsung von 1.200 x 600 dpi liefert professionell aussehende Laserdrucke mit gestochen scharfem Text und detailgetreuen Grafiken. Komfortable Bedienung Das LC-Display des i-SENSYS MF4410 ist klar, intuitiv verstndlich und optimiert fr maximalen Bedienkomfort. Ein 5-zeiliges LC-Display und die animierte Benutzerfhrung erhhen den Bedienkomfort; Sie knnen schnell und einfach auf die Funktionen zugreifen, alle erforderlichen Informationen werden verstndlich angezeigt. Das spart Zeit und Mhe! Zeitsparend und effizient Bei einer Druckgeschwindigkeit von ca. 23 Seiten pro Minute und der Ausgabe der ersten Seite nach nur ca. 9 Sekunden knnen Sie sicher sein, Ihre Ausdrucke und Kopien immer sofort zur Hand haben, wenn Sie sie bentigen. Dank der Quick First-Print-Technologien gehren lange Wartezeiten vor dem Drucker der Vergangenheit an. Dieses umweltfreundliche System bentigt gerade einmal ca. 3 Watt im Sleep-Modus das spart Energie. Vielseitiges Scannen von Farbdokumenten Das Scannen von farbigen Dokumenten und Fotos wird mit einer Auflsung von bis zu 600 dpi zum Kinderspiel. Mithilfe der MF Toolbox lassen sich Daten direkt als E-Mail-Anhang oder durchsuchbare PDF-Dateien scannen so finden sich Informationen spter leichter wieder. description-en_US-print: This stylish mono laser 3-in-1 offers print, copy and scan functions in one compact device. Ideal for homes and small offices its productive, easy-to-use and energy efficient. Features - Mono laser 3-in-1: print, copy & scan. - Stylish, space-saving design. - Easy to use intuitive LCD display. - 23 ppm, 9 seconds First Copy Out Time. - Up to 1200 x 600 dpi resolution for prints and copies. - Energy efficient. The compact, stylish 3-in-1 multifunctional for personal use Stylish and compact Offering excellent value for money, this sleek multifunctional provides high quality print, copy and scan functionality in one space saving unit. With its stylish all black design and small footprint, it looks great on any desk and is perfect for both home and small office use. Superior image quality An enhanced print resolution of up to 1200 x 600 dpi delivers professional laser output for all your work, with sharp text and fine graphics. Easy to use The i-SENSYS MF4410 features a simple and intuitive LCD interface designed for easy operation. With 5 lines of text plus animations, features can be quickly and easily accessed and more information can be communicated saving time and effort. Time saving and efficient With an output speed of 23 ppm and a Fast First Copy Out Time of less than 9 seconds, prints and copies are delivered the moment you need them. With quick recovery from sleep mode, thanks to Quick First-Print technologies, long waits for your documents are a thing of the past. Additionally, this economical device uses only 3 watts in sleep mode, ensuring energy efficiency. Versatile colour scanning Scanning colour documents and photos is easy and highly versatile using a resolution as high as 9600 x 9600 dpi. Files can be scanned directly to email, or searchable PDF using the MF Toolbox, enabling them to be quickly retrieved in the future. All-in-One cartridge The All-In-One recyclable cartridge ensures maintenance-free operation and continuous high quality output. Replace the compact cartridge in seconds containing toner, drum and cleaning units with an Authentic Canon Laser Cartridge and your multifunctional is as good as new.

HP remote management features make it easy to manage associations from any computer on the network. - Video inputs on the DSDs provide expansive connectivity options for a range of devices. description-de_DE-mobile: DocuMate 152, 18 ppm simplex, 600 dpi, USB 2.0
description-de_DE-print: Der neue Xerox DocuMate 152 ist ein kompakter Duplex Scanner mit einzigartiger OneTouch Technologie. Er macht das Scannen zu FCM (Enterprise Content Management) und DIM (Dokumenten Image Management) Applikationen erschwinglich. Der Xerox DocuMate 152, ein Farb-, Seiteneinzugs- Dokumenten-Scanner, kann bis zu 30 Bilder in der Minute im Duplex Modus scannen. Der DocuMate 152 wurde speziell als Einzel Arbeitsplatz Scanner entwickelt und bezieht die OneTouch Technologie mit ein. Die OneTouch Technologie erlaubt es dem Anwender auerdem sehr einfach und benutzerfreundlich die "Bestimmungsorte" gescannter Dokumente direkt am Scanner festzulegen. Lediglich durch drcken von nur einer Taste und Auswahl einer von neun vorprogrammierten auch individuell anpabaren Scan Einstellungen.
description-en_US-mobile: DocuMate 152, 18 ppm simplex, 600 dpi, USB 2.0
description-en_US-print: - Convert documents into searchable PDF files with One Touch - 9 Visioneer OneTouch pre-programmed scan-to destinations - Kofax VRS technology delivers perfect scans from imperfect originals - Scans documents at 18 pages per minute/36 images per minute* - Compact Duplex Scanner with 50 page ADF capacity** * 200dpi, black & white ** 75 g/m2 Productivity at your Desktop The Xerox DocuMate 152, colour sheetfed duplex document scanner, scans up to 18 pages per minute (ppm) and 36 images per minute (ipm), includes a 50-page automatic document feeder and has the ability to automatically scan documents in searchable PDF files. The Xerox DocuMate 152 is designed specifically for desktop use and incorporates Visioneer OneTouch technology for eliminating multiple steps in sending scanned documents to predetermined applications or devices. The DocuMate 152 offers a professional software bundle that includes Nuance PaperPort and OmniPage Pro. It also comes with an advanced TWAIN driver to enable communication with advanced electronic content management (ECM) software applications. Scanning at the Touch of a Button Do you want to do more with the paper on your desk? Would you like to copy it, collate it, file it, search it, mail it and make it disappear? Sounds time consuming doesnt it? How about if you could do it all with just one touch? The DocuMate 152 is powered by Visioneer OneTouch technology to scan documents using nine preset buttons for your most common destinations, yet they are completely configurable. This enables your document to be scanned with the proper settings for resolution, colour, duplex, auto-crop, auto-straighten, file format and then delivered to virtually any application, folder or device at the touch of a button! Perfect Scans from Imperfect Originals Visioneer OneTouch with Kofax VRS (Virtual ReScan) technology is integrated into the scanner driver so that you get perfect scans from imperfect originals. VRS also eliminates the need to rescan documents through automatic cropping, straightening, brightness control and edge clean-up. All this is integrated into Visioneer OneTouch so your entire scanning requirements are achieved at the touch of a button. Most new users in document imaging are not scanner experts, so simplified, point-and-click solutions that deliver high quality images and integration with business applications are essential.
description-fr_FR-print:
Technologie Kofax VRS integree. 
Conversion de documents en fichiers PDF interrogeables avec fonctionnalite Une touche. 
9 destinationsnumrisation verspreprogrammees avec fonctionnalite Une touche. 
Numerisation de 30 images par minute en recto-verso. 
Scanner recto-verso compact avec capacite de CAD de 50pages. 
Client de recherche X1 prime pour les documents. 
Visioneer OneTouch pour la numerisation directe
name: Xerox DocuMate 152

description-en_US-mobile: 10/100 Fast Ethernet Internet Camera
description-en_US-print:
Remotely watch and listen with the D-Link Securicam NetworkTM DCS-5300 Internet Camera. The DCS-5300 Internet Camera is a full-featured surveillance system that connects to an Ethernet or Fast Ethernet connection to provide high quality video and audio over the Intranet or the Internet.

The DCS-5300 Internet Camera differs from a conventional PC Camera because the DCS-5300 is a stand-alone device with a built-in CPU and Web server that allows you to access your camera using Internet Explorer 5.X or above from anywhere in the world.

The D-Link DCS-5300 Internet Camera also has a pan, tilt, and digital zoom function that can be controlled from the Web interface or from the included remote control. Auto pan mode enables the camera to move 270 degrees horizontally and the Patrol mode cycles through up to 20 preset positions. The speed of either pan or tilt can be adjusted to your preference. The 4x digital zoom lens enables the camera to obtain a closer view.

The D-Link DCS-5300 Internet Camera comes with a CCD sensor that provides a sharp and clear image with life-like color representation. The sensor is a CCD sensor with resolution of 380 TV lines. The built-in microphone adds sound that accompanies the video. Altogether, you can record streaming video with sound that utilizes high quality MPEG4 Short Header Mode Compression to your hard drive, enable motion detection, and set up automated e-mail alert notification.

A powerful surveillance software is included to enhance the monitoring and management of your DCS-5300. The bundled surveillance software further enhances the security features of the DCS-5300, allowing you to archive streaming video and audio straight to your hard drive, playback video, monitor as many as 16 cameras on a single screen, and set up motion detection to trigger automatic recording.

By signing up with one of the many Dynamic DNS services, you can assign an easy-to-remember name and domain (e.g. www.mycamera.myddns.com). This allows you to remotely access your camera without having to remember the IP address, even if it has been changed by your Internet Service Provider.

The DCS-5300 Internet Camera is a Price/Performance breakthrough, feature rich solution capable of meeting demanding security and home/office monitoring needs. Secure your site with the D-Link Securicam DCS-5300 Internet Camera.
name: D-Link DCS-5300 webcam

description-en_US-mobile: B1260dn - laser mono, 1200x1200, 28 ppm, 64 MD DDR2, 533 MHz AMR 11, A4, 60 - 163 g/m, USB, LAN
description-en_US-print:
Enjoy efficient printing and help improve productivity with the compact DellTM B1260dn Mono Laser Printer. It can bring value to any small office or workgroup.

- Enhance efficiency: Enjoy two-sided printing, high-quality printouts, network connectivity with built-in Ethernet and high-speed printing.
- Print from mobile devices: Its easy to print directly from a wide variety of mobile devices right to your Dell B1260dn.
- Get reliable performance: Experience enduring reliability with a high-duty cycle of up to 20,000 pages per month.

Share your printer:
Enjoy vital office network connectivity with a built-in Ethernet. Easily share your printer with multiple users on the network.

Work efficiently:
Help boost productivity around the office and save paper costs with a duplexer that automatically delivers two-sided printing.

Save time:
Experience the convenience of high-speed mono printing  up to 28 ppm (A4)

The Dell B1260dn lets you and your team easily print documents, photos, images and reports directly from a wide range of mobile phones and tablets.
Fast and easy printing, direct from your Android(TM device
Discover the fast and easy way to print directly from your AndroidTM mobile device with Dell Mobile Print App. Its simple to print documents, photos, web pages and more with this easy-to-use app which supports direct printing from a vast array of applications. Download it for free at Google PlayTM .

Print with AirPrintTM
Directly print from your iPhone , iPad or iPod touch using AirPrint. Airprint works with a variety of apps including Safari, Mail, Photos, iWork and iBooks. So you can print seminar confirmation tickets, photos, vital emails and web pages quickly and easily.

Connect with Google Cloud PrintTM
Using Google Cloud Print, you can make your home and work printers available to you and anyone you choose, from the applications you use every day. Google Cloud Print works on your phone, tablet, Chromebook, PC, and any other web-connected device you want to print from.

Enduring reliability: Get a high-duty cycle of up to 20,000 pages per month and enjoy the convenience of a high-input 250-sheet paper tray. Print large files quickly with a high standard memory of 64MB RAM.

Easy to maintain: Minimize upkeep with just one toner cartridge to replace. The fuser unit is designed to last the life of the printer.

Environmentally-conscious design: Save toner and paper. One touch of the Eco button automatically engages Eco Mode printing. The Dell B1260dn is RoHS and ENERGY STAR 1.2 qualified. You can recycle empty toner cartridges. For details, visit Dell.com/recycle.
name: DELL B1260dn

description-de_DE-mobile: 10MP, 1/2.3" CMOS, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, 3648 x 2736, SD/SDHC, USB 2.0, schwarz
description-de_DE-print: Leistungsstarke Bildverarbeitung mit Schwerpunkt auf unverflschter Bildqualitt. Rckseitig belichteter CMOS-Sensor + Bildprozessor Smooth Imaging Engine IV Die CX6 arbeitet mit einem rckseitig belichteten CMOS-Sensor in Kombination mit dem fortschrittlichen Bildprozessor Smooth Imaging Engine IV. Dunkle Innenrume und Nachtmotive werden in makelloser Qualitt wiedergegeben, genauso wie stark beleuchtete Objekte. Ein Interpolations-Algorithmus fr die Pixel-Ausgabe, der in einem speziellen Schaltkreis des Bildprozessors angesiedelt ist, wirkt gegen Detailverluste in hellsten Bildbereichen. Kontrastreiche Motive werden damit so wiedergegeben, wie man sie mit eigenen Augen wahrnimmt. RICOH Pure Image Quality Technology Die Philosophie, die allen Ricoh-Digitalkameras zugrunde liegt, hat nicht nur "hohe Bildqualitt" zum Ziel sondern "unverflschte Bildqualitt, die der Wahrnehmung mit dem Auge gleichkommt". Dies wird durch drei wichtige Komponenten erreicht: ein Objektiv mit fehlerarmer und wirklichkeitsgetreuer Abbildung, ein Bildsensor mit hoher Lichtempfindlichkeit und ein Bildprozessor, der Fotos mit feinsten Details erzeugt. Aneinander angepasst bilden diese Komponenten eine Einheit, die eine unbertroffene Auflsung und wirklichkeitsgetreue Farbwiedergabe liefert. Herrliche Aufnahmen Bild fr Bild. Bedeutender Fortschritt bei der Rauschreduzierung Der Algorithmus zur Verminderung des Bildrauschens nutzt direkt die aus dem CMOS-Bildsensor kommenden Signale, um das gerade bei hoher Empfindlichkeitseinstellung auftretende Rauschen zu reduzieren. Das Ergebnis sind wunderbar klare Aufnahmen mit Details, Tonwerten und lebendigen Farben wie in der Wirklichkeit. * Fr die Strke der Rauschverminderung kann zwischen den Einstellungen Aus, Automatik, Schwach, Stark und MAX gewhlt werden. * Die Zeit fr das Aufzeichnen eines Bildes differiert mit der gewhlten Rauschreduzierungseinstellung. Die Super-Resolution-Technologie sorgt fr hochauflsende Bilder in jeder Lage bei der "normalen" Fotografie, beim Zoomen, bei Makrofotos. Die Super-Resolution-Technologie der CX6 erkennt im Bild automatisch Umrisse, Details und Tonwertstufen und verarbeitet sie mit den jeweils optimalen Einstellungen. Dies erlaubt der Kamera, Bilder mit noch hherer Auflsung als bei den Vorgngermodellen aufzuzeichnen. Kompensiert wackelige Kamerahaltung. Bildstabilisierung mittels Sensor-Shift Die Bildstabilisierungsfunktion verringert die Gefahr von Verwacklungsunschrfen, wie sie besonders bei Tele- und Makro-Aufnahmen auftreten knnen. Sobald die Kamera unruhiges Halten erkennt, verschiebt sie den CMOS-Sensor gegenlufig, um die Verwacklung auszugleichen.
description-en_US-mobile: 10MP, 1/2.3" CMOS, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, 3648 x 2736, SD/SDHC, USB 2.0, black
description-en_US-print: Imaging processing performance that places a premium on pure image quality. Back-illuminated CMOS sensor + Smooth Imaging Engine IV The CX6 boasts a back-illuminated CMOS image sensor combined with advanced Smooth Imaging Engine IV image processing. Poorly-lit indoor or night scenes are rendered in pure, unblemished quality, as of course are brightly-lit subjects. An output pixel interpolation algorithm residing in dedicated logic circuits in the imaging engine reduces loss of detail in highlights to faithfully recreate high-contrast scenes exactly as they appear to the naked eye. RICOH Pure Image Quality Technology The imaging philosophy that lies at the root of all Ricoh digital cameras: not just "high image quality" but "pure image quality, true to what is perceived by the naked eye." This is achieved through three core technologiesa low-distortion lens with true-to-life imaging properties, an image sensor with superior high-sensitivity performance, and an imaging engine that reproduces images in minute detailthat have been designed and developed as a single mechanism, offering unsurpassed resolution and faithful, unaffected color reproduction. Breathtakingly pure beauty with each shot. Breakthrough noise reduction function The camera's noise reduction algorithm processes the image signal as it is output from the CMOS image sensor, reducing the image noise that tends to occur in photographs taken at high sensitivities. The result is beautiful, limpid photographs with details, tones, and colors as vivid as those seen in the original subject. Super-resolution technology for high-resolution image quality for everything from normal photography to zoom and macro shooting. The CX6's super-resolution technology discerns the outlines, details, and gradations in the image automatically and processes the photograph based on the optimal settings for each. This allows the camera to record images with even higher resolution than with previous models. Corrects for even slight hand-motion blur. Image sensor shift image stabilizer The image sensor shift image stabilizer function reduces the hand-motion blurring that tends to occur in situations such as telephoto and macro shooting. When blurring is detected, the CMOS sensor automatically compensates by shifting in a direction that eliminates the blur.
name: Ricoh CX 6

description-en_US-mobile: B/W, Laser, Duplex, 40ppm, 1200x1200 dpi, 250-sh, A4/Lgl, 802.11b/g/n, Ethernet, USB 2.0, LCD, 64MB, 702W, 59dB, Black
description-en_US-print: MFC-8710DW High-Speed Laser All-in-One with Duplex Printing and Wireless Networking. High-Speed Monochrome Laser All-in-One for Small to Medium Sized Businesses The Brother MFC-8710DW is a cost efficient, monochrome laser all-in-one for your busy office or business. It combines high-speed, reliable printing and copying up to 40ppm, high-quality color scanning, and faxing into one durable design. Share with others on your network via its built-in Ethernet or wireless 802.11b/g/n interfaces or print from your mobile device via: AirPrint, Google Cloud Print, Brother iPrint&Scan, Cortado Workplace and Wi-Fi Direct. Plus, the MFC-8710DW can print two-sided output using the automatic duplex feature and scan or copy bound materials via the legal-size document glass or multi-page documents using the 50-page capacity auto document feeder. Features - Fast, high-quality printing and copying. Produces professional black & white output at impressive print and copy speeds of up to 40 pages per minute. - Flexible connectivity. Print, scan or PC fax over your wireless 802.11b/g/n or Ethernet network or connect locally via its Hi-Speed USB 2.0 interface. - Automatic duplex printing. Print professional two-sided documents and booklets. Also, create two-sided output from one-sided originals when copying and faxing. This feature can reduce your paper use by up to 50% and helps saves money. - Convenient mobile device printing. Print from your mobile device via: AirPrint, Google Cloud Print, Brother iPrint&Scan, Cortado Workplace, Wi-Fi Direct. - Advanced scanning capabilities. Supports a variety of "scan to" functions including: E-mail, file, image, OCR, FTP, USB, Network Folder (CIFS - Windows only) and E-mail Server. - Flexible paper handling. The MFC-8710DW features an adjustable, 250-sheet capacity tray for letter or legal-size paper, plus a 50-sheet capacity multi-purpose tray. - Cost efficient performance. A high-yield 8,000-page toner cartridge is available to help lower your operating costs. - Legal-size document glass. This laser all-in-one allows you to easily copy or color scan bound materials or up to legal-size documents. - 50-page capacity auto document feeder. Use for unattended copying, faxing or scanning of multi-page documents (up to legal size). - Convenient walk-up printing and scanning. A USB Direct Interface is located on the front of the machine for printing files from or scanning files to your USB flash memory drive. - Advanced security features. Provides a wide-range of security features including: secure print, Secure Function Lock, Enterprise Security (802.1x) and more. - Outstanding customer support. The Brother MFC-8710DW offers a 1 year limited warranty with free phone support for the life of your product.
name: Brother MFC-8710DW multifunctional

description-de_DE-print: HDV1080i-Aufzeichnung in herausragender Qualitt - der HV30 ist wie das Vorgngermodell HV20 mit dem Canon HD Camera System ausgestattet: Canon HD-Objektiv, Full-HD-CMOS-Sensor und fr HD optimierter DIGIC-DV-II-Prozessor sorgen fr High Definition Videos. Canon HD Camera System Canon HD-Videoobjektiv, 2,96 Megapixel Full-HD-CMOS-Sensor und fr HD optimierter DIGIC-DV-II-Prozessor das Canon HD Camera System ist die starke Kombination fr starke Leistung. Alle Komponenten des HD Camera Systems sind von Canon selbst entwickelt und gefertigt und perfekt aufeinander abgestimmt ein wesentlicher Faktor fr brillante 1080i High Defintion Videos. Der HV30 zeichnet Videos auf MiniDV-Band auf. Instant AF Die HD-Aufzeichnung stellt mit ihrer HD-Auflsung hohe Anforderungen: so machen sich bereits kleine Fehler bei der Scharfstellung deutlich bei der Bildqualitt bemerkbar. Zur bemerkenswert schnellen und uerst przisen automatischen Scharfstellung ist der HV30 mit dem Instant-AF ausgestattet, einem innovativen Hybridsystem fr auergewhnliche Bildqualitt. Canon HD-Videoobjektiv Canons langjhrige Erfahrung im Bau von Fernsehkamera-Objektiven ist die starke Basis fr die berzeugende Qualitt des Canon HD-Objektivs mit 10fach optischem Zoom.Der optische Super-Range-Bildstabilisator reduziert ungewollte Verwacklungsunschrfe. Der Camcorder fr engagierte Hobbyfilmer ber den erweiterten Zubehrschuh lassen sich Mikrofone, Videoleuchten und andere Peripheriegerte betreiben. Das ermglicht den vielseitigen, kreativen Einsatz des Camcorders fr praktisch jeden Drehort. Fr erstklassige Klangqualitt ist die Tonsteuerung auch manuell przise mglich. Praktisch: die HDMI-Schnittstelle fr die unkomplizierte Wiedergabe der Videos auf HD-ready TV-Gerten mit nur einem einzigen Kabel. Dreh- und schwenkbares LC-Display Der HV30 ist mit einem neuen dreh- und schwenkbaren 2,7-Zoll-LC-Display ausgestattet. Es ermglicht die komfortable Kontrolle der Aufnahmen aus einem weiten Betrachtungswinkel von 135 Grad. Die HCAR-Oberflchenvergtung des LC-Displays wurde auf optimale Darstellung des Farbraums ausgelegt, das Bild wirkt gestochen scharf, die Bildschirmreflexionen bleiben minimal. 25p Vollbildaufnahmen fr echtes Kinoflair Ideal fr engagierte Hobbyfilmer: der 25p-Cinema-Modus fr klassischen Kino-Look. Eine Kombination aus 25p (Progressive) und CINE-Modus.Weiterer Vorteil: mehr Flexibilitt beim Dreh unter schlechten Lichtverhltnissen. Das lange Videovergngen Der HV30 ist mit dem optional als Zubehr erhltlichen Hochleistungsakku (BP-2L24H) fr erhhte Aufnahmezeiten kompatibel. Fortschrittliche Digitalkamerafunktionen Digitale Fotos werden auf einer MiniSD-Karte gespeichert. Zu den fortschrittlichen Fotofunktionen gehrt eine Histogramm-Anzeige auf Knopfdruck zur berwachung der Helligkeitswerte. Groes Plus des DIGIC-DV-II-Prozessors und der getrennten Signalverarbeitung von Fotos und Videos: Auch whrend laufender Videoaufzeichnung sind Standbilder mit 2,07 Megapixel mglich. Fotodirektdruck auf PictBridge-kompatiblen Druckern. Analog-Digital-Wandler ber einen AV-Eingang knnen analoge Aufzeichnungen (z. B. alte private Videoaufnahmen) digitalisiert und auf Band gesichert werden.
description-en_US-mobile: HV30 High Definition Camcorder
description-en_US-print: Successor to the award-winning HV20, the HV30 derives all the benefits of the Canon HD Camera System - Canon HD Lens, Full HD CMOS sensor and DIGIC DV II processor - for outstanding HDV1080i images. Canon HD Camera System The HV30 inherits the HV20s Canon HD Camera System the unique combination of a genuine Canon HD Video Lens, a 2.96MP Full HD CMOS sensor and the DIGIC DV II processor. Designed and manufactured by Canon, these components integrate seamlessly to deliver superb HDV1080i (High Definition Video) images, recorded to tape. Instant AF Focusing in HD can be difficult, since even slight errors are noticeable. The HV30 employs a unique hybrid system called Instant AF for extremely fast, accurate auto focusing making it easier to capture pin sharp HD pictures. Canon HD Video Lens A 10x optical zoom lens, specially engineered for HD video, inherits Canons extensive expertise in broadcast lens manufacture. With Canons Super Range Optical Image Stabilizer, all kinds of camera shake are compensated for. Filmmakers system An Advanced Accessory Shoe lets moviemakers adapt the camcorder to their needs a range of peripherals can be added to suit any shooting situation. Manual audio controls allow sound recording to be finely controlled; an HDMI output jack is the quickest way to connect to a compatible HD TV or computer. Multiangle Vivid LCD The HV30 features Canons advanced 2.7 Multiangle Vivid LCD screen. Making it easier to monitor recording when shooting from particularly high or low angles, it has a wide 135-degree viewing angle. HCAR surface treatment ensures sharp images, a wider range of vibrant colours and reduced screen reflection. Cinema-style 25p shooting For ambitious moviemakers, the HV30 features true 25p (progressive) shooting. Allied to a dedicated CINE image mode, movies have the look and feel of film. 25p shooting also offers improved low-light performance, increasing shooting options even further. Shoot for longer The HV30 is compatible with Canons optional high capacity battery (BP-2L24H) extending shooting times and cutting out the need to carry spares. Advanced photography Digital photos are stored to MiniSD card. Advanced photo features includes a one-push histogram display to monitor brightness levels. Split path processing allows simultaneous video and 2.07MP still capture. Print photos directly on PictBridge compatible printers. Analogue-to-digital conversion Via an AV input connection, analogue footage (including old home movies) can be transferred to digital tape for safekeeping.
description-fr_FR-print: Le HV30, qui succde au modle prim HV20, profite de tous les avantages du systme Canon HD (optique Canon HD, capteur CMOS Canon Full HD et processeur DIGIC DV II) pour vous offrir des images HDV1080i de qualit exceptionnelle. Zoom avanc 41x de Canon L'excellente qualit d'une optique vido Canon allie la puissance du traitement DIGIC DV II dotent le DC310 d'une capacit de zoom suprieure : un zoom avanc offrant un grossissement jusqu' 41x. Enregistrement direct sur DVD Bnficiez des avantages de l'enregistrement direct sur DVD (-R/-RW/-R double couche). Lorsque votre vido est termine, il vous suffit de finaliser le DVD dans le camscope pour pouvoir le visionner sur la quasi-totalit des lecteurs DVD de salon. Fonction "Quick Start" Ne manquez plus aucun grand moment grce la fonction "Quick Start". Une simple pression du bouton de dmarrage rapide permet quasi-instantanment de mettre le camscope sous tension lorsqu'il est en mode veille : vous tes prt commencer filmer en une seconde environ. Commandes intuitives La manette situe sur le cadre de l'cran LCD assure l'accs ais et intuitif aux commandes de prise de vue et de lecture. Des enregistrements plus longs L'utilisation d'un disque DVD-R double couche vous permet d'enregistrer jusqu' 108 minutes de vido. Avec cette augmentation de la capacit d'enregistrement, l'espace d'enregistrement ne vous fera plus jamais dfaut lors des longues excursions. La batterie haute capacit en option prolonge plus encore la dure d'enregistrement. Enregistrement au vritable format 16/9 Les camscopes Canon enregistrent au vritable format 16/9 haute rsolution : vos vidos sont parfaitement adaptes au visionnage sur un tlviseur cran large. Cadrez et prvisualisez vos vidos dans leurs dimensions relles sur l'cran LCD 16/9 2,7 pouces. Pour conomiser votre batterie, filmez plutt l'aide du viseur lectronique (EVF) 16/9 0,35 pouce. DIGIC DV II Dvelopp l'origine pour notre gamme de camscope haute dfinition, le DIGIC DV II quipe dsormais nos modles de camscopes DVD. Ce processeur d'image sophistiqu est dot d'une technologie perfectionne de rduction du bruit, garantissant ainsi des images plus propres et plus nettes. Grce un double traitement du signal, le DIGIC DV II est galement capable de traiter la vido et la photo sparment, optimisant ainsi leurs couleurs, pour l'affichage comme pour l'impression. Eclairage vido via l'cran LCD Orientez l'cran LCD du DC310 vers l'avant pour profiter de sa fonction trs pratique d'clairage vido. Il procure ainsi une source lumineuse supplmentaire permettant de continuer filmer mme dans des conditions de faible clairage. Fonctions Photo avances Le DC310 permet galement de prendre des photos. Ces dernires peuvent tre stockes sur une carte mmoire SD ou SDHC (haute capacit) et peuvent tre imprimes directement sur les imprimantes dotes d'un emplacement pour carte mmoire compatible.
name: Canon HV30 High Definition Camcorder

description-en_US-print: With the e2343Fi, display specialist AOC introduces an intelligent concept targeted at the million-strong Apple fan community. The 58.5 cm (23) model features a universal iPhone and iPod dock integrated in its base. Enlarge the viewing area for your photos on your iPhone or iPod by the factor 37, or listen to your music via SRS premium speakers whilst charging your mobile device at the same time! This super-slim (12.6 mm) and ultra-fast (2 ms response time) model is the all-in-one solution for Apple fans. description-en_US-mobile: PowerShot SX40 HS - 12.1MP, 1/2.3" CMOS, 4000 x 3000, 35x Optical zoom, DIGIC 5, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") LCD, HDMI, USB 2.0, PAL/NTSC, 600g
description-en_US-print: Get closer with the PowerShot SX40 HS. An ultra-wide 35x optical zoom, great low light results of the HS System, Full HD and high-speed shooting make this the travel powerhouse for those who want it all. Features - 35x ultra wide-angle zoom with USM - Image Stabilizer (4.5-stop). Intelligent IS - HS System (12.1 MP) with DIGIC 5 - Full HD, HDMI - 6.8 cm (2.7") vari-angle LCD, EVF - Smart Auto, Multi-area WB - High-speed Burst HQ - Manual modes - Zoom Framing Assist - Range of accessories Go far, get closer with 35x zoom 35x ultra wide-angle zoom with USM A huge optical zoom including 24mm ultra wide-angle provides an incredible range (24-840mm) to suit everything from sweeping landscapes and indoor scenes to long-range close-ups of wildlife. The Ultrasonic Motor ensures highly accurate, near silent zooming even in movie mode. Shake-free images with Intelligent IS A powerful optical Image Stabilizer delivers sharp images in low light or when using the full extent of the zoom. Intelligent IS automatically selects the optimal image stabilisation mode from 7 options, to ensure clear, detailed photos and videos. HS System with DIGIC 5 A powerful combination of the latest DIGIC 5 image processor and high-sensitivity CMOS sensor, the HS System lets you shoot with low noise and high image quality even in low light - reducing the need for flash or tripod, freezing motion without blur and increasing available flash range Full HD Movies with HDMI-CEC Record superb, Full HD (1080p) movies at 24fps with stereo sound. HDMI-CEC connection allows for loss-less viewing on a compatible HDTV and control of playback using the TV remote. Vari-angle LCD and Viewfinder A 6.8 cm (2.7) vari-angle PureColor II VA LCD provides excellent visibility and enables easy framing from difficult angles. The Electronic Viewfinder can give steadier aiming. Smart Auto with Multi-area WB Smart Auto is truly automatic, allowing the camera to detect from 32 different scenes (21 in movies), ensuring optimum results. Multi-area White Balance captures scenes in their natural colours even when illuminated by multiple types of light. High-speed Burst HQ Capture split second action in full 12.1 MP resolution, at up to 10.3 shots/sec. for up to 8 shots, using High-speed Burst HQ mode. Manual modes Manual modes let you take full control of the exposure to get the results you want. Easily choose your own settings such as aperture, shutter speed, white balance and ISO. Zoom Framing Assist Zoom Framing Assist helps you keep track of a distant subject when shooting with maximum zoom. At the press of a button it quickly zooms out of the scene - so you can relocate the subject - zooming back in the moment its released. Range of accessories An optional Lens Filter Adapter lets you attach 67mm lens filters from Canons EOS range. A hot-shoe allows use of Canon Speedlite EX flash units to increase flash range and expand your creativity.
description-fr_FR-mobile: PowerShot SX40 HS - 12.1MP, 1/2.3" CMOS, 4000 x 3000, 35x Optical zoom, DIGIC 5, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") LCD, HDMI, USB 2.0, PAL/NTSC, 600g
description-fr_FR-print: Zoom ultra grand-angle 35x avec Moteur USM (Ultrasonic Motor) Le zoom optique trs puissant comprenant un ultra grand-angle 24 mm couvre une plage de focales incroyable (24-840 mm). Il est adapt toutes les situations, des paysages panoramiques et des scnes d'intrieur aux gros plans distance de faune et de flore. Grce au moteur ultrasonique, le zoom est extrmement prcis et son fonctionnement quasiment silencieux, mme en mode vido. Des images stables grce au stabilisateur d'image intelligent Le stabilisateur d'image optique puissant garantit des images nettes en basse lumire ou lorsque vous utilisez le zoom maximum. Le stabilisateur d'image intelligent slectionne automatiquement parmi les 7 options disponibles le mode de stabilisation d'image optique qui vous garantira des photos et vidos nettes et un niveau de dtail lev. Systme Haute Sensibilit avec DIGIC 5 Grce une alliance parfaite entre le tout rcent processeur d'image DIGIC 5 et le capteur CMOS haute sensibilit, le Systme Haute Sensibilit vous permet de raliser des prises de vues avec un faible niveau de bruit et une haute qualit d'image, mme en basse lumire. Vous avez ainsi moins souvent besoin d'utiliser un flash ou un trpied, les mouvements sont figs sans effet de flou et la porte du flash disponible est plus importante. Vidos Full HD avec HDMI-CEC Enregistrez de magnifiques vidos Full HD (1080p) 24 im./s avec son stro. La connexion HDMI-CEC permet de rduire la perte lors de l'affichage sur un tlviseur HD et de contrler la lecture via la tlcommande du tlviseur. cran LCD orientable et viseur L'cran PureColor II VA LCD orientable de 6,8 cm (2,7 pouces) assure une excellente visibilit et permet un cadrage en toute simplicit sous des angles difficiles. Le viseur lectronique permet de raliser des prises de vues plus stables. Smart Auto avec correction de la balance des blancs multizones Le mode Smart Auto est entirement automatique, ce qui permet l'appareil de dtecter 32 scnes diffrentes (21 pour les vidos). Vous avez ainsi la garantie d'un rsultat optimal. La correction de la balance des blancs multizones permet un rendu des couleurs naturelles, mme lorsque les sources d'clairage sont multiples. Mode Rafale grande vitesse HQ Saisissez l'action en une fraction de seconde dans une rsolution de 12,1 millions de pixels, en ralisant jusqu' 10,3 prises de vues/seconde, pour 8 images maximum, via le mode Rafale grande vitesse HQ. Modes manuels Avec les modes manuels, vous contrlez entirement l'exposition, ce qui vous permet d'obtenir exactement le rsultat que vous voulez. Choisissez facilement vos propres rglages, tels que l'ouverture, la vitesse d'obturation, la balance des blancs et la sensibilit ISO. Assistant de cadrage au zoom L'assistant de cadrage au zoom permet de suivre un sujet distance lorsque vous utilisez le zoom maximum. D'une pression sur un bouton, l'assistant permet de zoomer rapidement en arrire. Vous pouvez ainsi plus facilement retrouver le sujet. Un nouveau zoom est effectu lorsque la touche est relche. Gamme d'accessoires L'adaptateur de filtre pour objectif en option vous permet de fixer des filtres pour objectif 67 mm de la gamme EOS de Canon. La griffe permet d'utiliser les flashes Canon Speedlite EX pour augmenter la porte du flash et stimuler votre crativit.
