description-fr_FR-print: Imprimante laser couleur CLP-775ND - Des impressions couleur rapides et conomiques; - Multifonction 4-en-1; - Tous les groupes de travail bnficient dsormais dimpressions couleur de qualit professionnelle; - Make sharp images and text even sharper. Des impressions couleur rapides et conomiques Les entreprises doivent savoir quil est aujourdhui possible de produire des impressions de qualit leve de manire rapide et conomique. Limprimante CLX-6260FR produit non seulement une qualit de couleurs exceptionnelle, mais combine galement des fonctions de numrisation, photocopie et tlcopie pour plus de praticit. En outre, le biprocesseur vloce, la prise en charge de la connectivit rseau Gigabit et la technologie de fusion instantane offrent une vitesse accrue et un temps d'attente rduit. Ce qui la distingue toutefois sur le plan conomique est son ventail de fonctions innovantes et conomes, telles que loptimisation du toner, la faible consommation dnergie et les fonctionnalits respectueuses de l'environnement. Cette imprimante pour les groupes de travail de taille moyenne rpond ds le dpart aux besoins des utilisateurs soucieux de leurs porte-monnaie. Multifonction 4-en-1 Grce une polyvalence 4-en-1, limprimante Samsung CLX-6260FR simplifie le flux oprationnel et garantit des impressions professionnelles aussi efficaces que possible. Avec ses fonctions dimpression, de copie, de numrisation et de fax, limprimante CLX-6260FR vous offre une flexibilit totale et vous permet de travailler plus librement. En outre, plusieurs fonctionnalits innovantes telles que la copie de pices didentit, la copie multiple, la numrisation vers la messagerie lectronique et la fonction pratique de tlcopie vers lordinateur vous assurent que vos employs disposeront des fonctionnalits ncessaires pour voluer dans le monde professionnel moderne. Tous les groupes de travail bnficient dsormais dimpressions couleur de qualit professionnelle Quels que soient votre emploi du temps ou la taille de votre quipe, vous pouvez compter sur limprimante CLX-6260FR pour fournir tout moment des impressions couleur de qualit professionnelle. Contentez-vous du meilleur. Des images et du texte encore plus nets La technologie ReCP (moteur de restitution dune page nette) unique de Samsung amliore la qualit globale de vos impressions couleur et apporte chacune vitalit et perfection. La nettet est automatiquement accrue sur les images et le texte, tandis que les objets solides se chevauchent pour liminer les espaces blancs. Des couleurs encore plus vives Notre nouveau toner polymris utilise des particules plus petites et plus uniformes que les toners conventionnels. Par consquent, les lignes de vos impressions sont plus nettes, les couleurs plus vives et le papier nondule plus. De plus, sa haute teneur en cire amliore la brillance de l'image et augmente la durabilit en vitant le fondu indsirable. Des performances dimpression suprieures Peu importe le volume, limprimante CLX-6260FR vous offre un dlai dimpression de la premire page de 17 secondes puis 24 pages par minute pour des conomies de temps. Vous pouvez alors vous concentrer sur ce qui est rellement important, plutt que dattendre vos documents. Plus de puissance pour une meilleure productivit Limpression de documents ne requiert pas forcment beaucoup de patience. Avec un double processeur 533 MHz et une mmoire standard de 512 Mo (extensible jusqu 1 Go), vous pouvez compter sur l'imprimante CLX-6260FR pour une gestion optimale de tous les besoins en trafic de votre groupe de travail. Rapidit et souplesse de la gestion du papier Vous souhaitez imprimer ou photocopier des documents sur du papier pais. Aucun souci. Les grammages atteignant jusqu' 220 g/m2 sont grs en toute scurit dans le bac polyvalent de 50 pages ainsi que dans le bac standard de 250 pages. En outre, le bac supplmentaire en option de 250 feuilles vous permet d'augmenter la capacit totale d'alimentation papier jusqu 820 feuilles. Vous pouvez ainsi utiliser pas moins de trois types de support diffrents sans perdre votre temps changer le papier. Allez encore plus loin dans loptimisation de votre productivit grce au chargeur de documents de 50 pages. Il traite la fois les documents une et double face, et ce automatiquement. Des impressions couleur professionnelles votre porte Grce limprimante CLX-6260FR, vous pouvez augmenter le flux de production de l'ensemble de votre groupe de travail au travers dune slection de fonctions conviviales et dun logiciel dassistance ingnieux permettant de gagner du temps. Vous travaillez ainsi plus intelligemment et plus rapidement. Impression pratique par USB Grce lemplacement USB Direct situ lavant de lappareil, juste au-dessous du panneau de commande, vous pouvez lancer des impressions directement depuis une cl USB, ou y transfrer des numrisations, le tout sans ordinateur. Impression scurise et confidentielle If you need to print sensitive data through your printer, you can relax. You can now ensure personal print jobs remain personal. Just enter a password, and you can retrieve a print job at your convenience, away from any prying eyes. And with the integrated numeric key pad it's easier than ever! Un trs haut rendement signifie des cots trs faibles Profitez dimpressions couleur professionnelles tout en matrisant le cot total de possession. Nos cartouches spciales haut rendement sont synonymes de remplacements moins frquents et vous font raliser des conomies chaque impression. Rduisez les cots grce l'impression et la copie recto verso Avec la fonction intgre dimpression recto verso, conomiser du papier na jamais t aussi facile. Le principe est simple : le papier est retourn automatiquement afin de pouvoir imprimer des deux cts. Vous pouvez ainsi diviser par deux votre consommation de papier. Economisez de l'argent tout en prservant l'environnement Chaque entreprise a besoin de rduire ses cots tous les niveaux. Grce au bouton ECO et aux fonctions du pilote Smart Eco, raliser des conomies est un vrai jeu denfant. Effectuez des impressions plus efficaces avec les fonctions N-up (plusieurs pages par feuille) et recto verso, ignorez les pages vierges ou imprimez en niveaux de gris plutt quen couleur. Grce au simulateur de rsultats, vous pouvez mme connatre les quantits de CO2, d'lectricit ou de papier que vous avez conomises. Faible consommation d'nergie Mme avec une liste de fonctionnalits impressionnante, l'imprimante CLX-6260FR consomme moins dnergie que la plupart des modles concurrents. Son toner polymris innovant ncessite des tempratures de fusion moins leves, la technologie de fusion instantane permet de saffranchir du prchauffage pralable la premire impression et tout cela combin notre nouveau biprocesseur en fait lun des priphriques les plus cologiques sur le march actuel. Easy Eco Driver La fonction Easy Eco Driver vous aide compiler des documents numriques dans de nombreux formats et facilite leur partage avec dautres personnes, mme via les rseaux sociaux.
name: Samsung CLX-6260FR multifunctional

description-en_US-mobile: Laser, 19ppm, 7.7sec, 1200 x 600dpi, A4, CIS, 50 - 200%, Black
description-en_US-print: Print, Copy and Scan with the imageCLASS MF3010 Black & White Laser Multifunction Printer The imageCLASS MF3010 is an ultra-compact and easy-to-use multifunction printer that delivers high-quality black and white prints, copies and color scans. It boasts print1 and copy2 speeds of up to 19 pages-per-minute (ppm) for letter-sized output, and delivers Quick First Prints in approximately eight seconds. The unit also offers paper handling of up to 150 pages in a front loading cassette9. Print sharp monochrome output with resolution up to 1200 x 600 dpi and through use of the platen glass color scans are captured in 24-bit color at an interpolated resolution of up to 9600 dpi. For added productivity the MF3010 includes unique features such as the I.D. Card Copy, which allows you to create copies of your identification cards or other small documents to keep for your records on a convenient one-sided document. It offers a simple control panel (7-segment, 1-digit LED) and features Canon's Single Cartridge System, which combines toner, drum and waster toner into one unit for easy maintenance.
name: Canon imageCLASS MF3010

description-de_DE-mobile: CardScan Executive 9 - USB
description-de_DE-print:
Kompakte, preisgnstige Kontakt - Management - System CardScan Personal ist das preisgnstigste und kompakteste System von CardScan.

Der Scanner, der so gro ist wie eine Handflche, verfgt ber einen schliebaren Scanner-Deckel, ein abnehmbares USB-Kabel und eine handliche Transporttasche. Er lsst sich mit Outlook, PDAs und Smartphones synchronisieren. CardScan Personal ist der ultimative Kontaktmanager und somit der ideale Begleiter beim mobilen Lifestyle von heute.

- Synchronisieren oder Exportieren fr Outlook, Outlook Express, Smartphones, Palm, Windows Mobile-Gerte, Windows Contacts, ACT! Standard und Premium for Workgroups, GoldMine v6.7, Lotus Notes.
- Einfaches Kategorisieren von Kontakten, Suchen, Sortieren, Entfernen von Duplikaten, Drucken von Etiketten, Zuordnen von Adressen und vieles mehr.
- Fassen Sie all Ihre Kontaktdaten mittels Drag-and-Drop von E-Mails und Websites zusammen.
- Scannen und lesen Sie Visitenkarten przise in Sekundenschnelle, und erstellen Sie ein digitales Adressbuch.
- Nur Einzelbenutzer, auf Team erweiterbar.
- NEU: Outlook-Add-In, um Visitenkarten direkt in Outlook scannen.
description-en_US-mobile: CardScan Executive 9 - USB
description-en_US-print: Full featured contact management CardScan Executive features a desktop card scanner and full-featured contact management software. It synchronises easily with Outlook, PDA's, smart phones, plus ACT!*, Lotus Notes and GoldMine. Ideal for the power user, CardScan keeps your contacts manageable. - works with standard versions of ACT! And GoldMine - Synchronise or export to Outlook, Outlook Express, smart phone, Palm, Windows Mobile devices, iPods plus single user, standard versions of ACT! and GoldMine, Lotus Notes. - Easily categorise contacts, search, sort, de-dupe, print labels, map addresses and much more. - Consolidate all your contact data using drag-and-drop from email and web sites. - Backup your data online, access from any browser and automatically update contacts with CardScan At Your Service. - Accurately scan and read business cards in seconds and create a digital address book. - Individual users only, upgradeable to Team.
description-fr_FR-print:
CardScan Executive comprend un scanner de cartes de visite de bureau ainsi qu'un logiciel de gestion de contacts complet. Il se synchronise facilement avec Outlook , Outlook Express, des PDA, des smart phones, ainsi que ACT!, Lotus Notes et GoldMine v 6.7. Idal pour l'utilisateur avanc, CardScan vous permet de grer vos contacts facilement.

- Synchronisation ou exportation vers Outlook, Outlook Express, des smartphones, Palm, des appareils Windows Mobile, Windows Contacts, ACT ! Standard et Premium pour groupes de travail, GoldMine v6.7, Lotus Notes.
- Classement facile des contacts, recherche, tri, suppression des doublons, impression d'tiquettes, mise en correspondance d'adresses, etc.
- Consolidation de toutes vos donnes de contact par glisser-dposer depuis des messages lectroniques et des sites web.
- Numrisation et lecture prcises des cartes de visite en quelques secondes seulement, et cration d'un carnet d'adresses numrique.
- Pour utilisateurs individuels uniquement, mise  niveau possible vers Team.
- NOUVEAU : Complment Outlook pour numriser des cartes de visite directement dans Outlook.
name: DYMO CardScan Executive 9

description-en_US-mobile: EOS 600D - 18.0MP, 5184 x 3456, CMOS, DIGIC 4, EF/EF-S Lens Mount, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT LCD, Full HD, USB 2.0, HDMI, PAL/NTSC, 570g, Black + EF 18-55mm IS + EF 55-250mm IS
description-en_US-print: With class-leading 18-megapixel resolution, user-friendly design, and the entire EOS family of lenses and accessories at your disposal, the EOS 600D lets nothing stand in the way of your photography. Features - 18-megapixel CMOS sensor - Scene Intelligent Auto mode - Full-HD EOS Movie - On-screen Feature Guide - Up to 3.7fps continuous shooting - Wide-area 9-point AF - 1,040k-dot vari-angle 7.7cm (3.0) screen - Basic+ and Creative Filters - Built-in wireless flash control - Your EOS adventure starts here 18 MP APS-C CMOS sensor An APS-C sized, 18-megapixel CMOS sensor captures images that are packed with detail and clarity. Such high-resolution allows large print sizes and the flexibility to crop pictures for alternative compositions. ISO 100-6400 sensitivity An ISO range of 100-6400, extendable to ISO 12,800, enables high-quality hand-held shooting in low-light conditions, without the need for flash. 14-bit image processing At the heart of the Canon EOS 600D is a 14-bit DIGIC 4 image processor that provides exceptional colour reproduction, smooth tonal gradation and tight control over noise. Scene Intelligent Auto mode Scene Intelligent Auto analyzes each scene in detail and picks the right camera settings each and every time, leaving you free to concentrate on whats important your photography. On-screen Feature Guide The EOS 600Ds on-screen Feature Guide provides descriptions of many of the cameras functions, as well as advice on how to use them. Full-HD EOS Movie Shoot Full-HD video with manual control over frame rate, exposure and sound. Video Snapshot technology allows short clips of 2, 4 or 8 sec to be merged into a single movie file, for footage that looks like it was edited professionally, while Movie Digital Zoom permits 3-10x magnification. 9-point wide-area AF and iFCL metering Nine AF points, including one central cross-type sensor, spread out across the frame for swift, accurate focusing, even with off-centre subjects. 63-zone iFCL metering ensures accurate exposures time after time. 1,040k-dot vari-angle 7.7cm (3.0) screen Shoot from unique angles with a 7.7cm (3.0) 3:2 Clear View LCD screen, containing 1,040,000 dots for increased clarity. Basic+ Basic+ technology allows photographers to customize basic auto settings according to lighting conditions or ambience. Creative Filter Effects Creative Filter Effects can be applied to Raw and JPEG files post capture, including Toy Camera, Soft Focus, Miniature, Grainy Black & White and Fish Eye simulations. Built-in wireless flash control An integrated wireless Speedlite flash controller and Easy Wireless technology allow off-camera TTL flash without the need for extra accessories. Use with all EF and EF-S lenses The EOS 600D is supported by the complete system: flashguns, remote releases and over 60 lenses trusted by professional photographers the world over.
name: Canon EOS 600D + EF 18-55mm IS + EF 55-250mm IS

description-en_US-mobile: DA-F61 - 20W, Micro-USB, Bluetooth, Sound Share, NFC, Lithium-ion Battery
description-en_US-print: Entertain yourself in style and take your home entertainment to the next level. Using the most powerful magnets possible, the DA-F61 features neodymium speakers in order to produce pure, crisp and clear sound in a compact solid-metal design. SoundShare enhances the sound of your favourite TV shows and movies with greater clarity without making it louder. NFC activates the speaker in one simple touch. Superior sound quality, one-touch connectivity, sleek metallic design and SoundShare are just the few qualities that make this speaker a great add to any room. Experience powerful sound anywhere Listen and discover newfound clarity and depth in your favourite music. Each Neodymium Speaker is specially crafted to be very compact, yet extremely powerful to produce warm and detailed sound. Even in the tightest of spaces, the Passive Bass Radiator enhances bass levels to transform the sound layout of your living room so youre delighted by your favourite movies and songs. Change the way you think of compact sound systems and experience pure sound quality at your disposal. The one-touch sound solution Make life easier and spend more time listening to your entertainment without having to physically connect to another speaker again. With the simplicity of Bluetooth, place a device near the speaker and let Near Field Communication activate the speaker with just one touch. Pairing with Bluetooth is easy and intuitive with NFC equipped mobile devices. Discover an easier solution to connect to external audio speakers. *Android devices using an OS released prior to 4.0 must download the NFC app Colours that suit your every mood Sleekly refined and constructed of metal, the DA-F61 is designed to suit the layout of any room. The compact metal body comes in a clean and sophisticated white silver colour that seamlessly enhances the dcor and functionality to any room that its in. It also comes with a fabric case which makes it easy to take good care of it when carrying it on the go. Turn up your entertainment, not the noise Listen to all your TV shows and movies with greater clarity without turning up the volume on your TV. SoundShare easily synchronises with your Samsung TV through its auto-pairing function and Bluetooth connectivity. Its sure to give you top notch sound to your entertainment that can be heard without disturbing others around you. You can now enjoy superior sound quality from all your favourite TV shows and movies through one powerful and easy-to-use speaker. * SoundShare is compatible with Samsung TVs with Bluetooth produced after 2012. The easy way to listen to music The enhanced auditory UI and LED indicators eliminate the need for physical buttons and add more function and style to your portable sound system. The conveniently placed LED indicators allow easy access and visualisation of the speakers operating status, while the Auditory UI helps you fine-tune settings. Now, listen to music with perfect sound from the perfect speaker system. Enjoy fast and high-quality music Play and listen to whatever you like with the perfect bass level for you. Easily control the bass sound with the one button on the Wireless Audio - Portable. Once the bass level is adjusted to your liking, the passive bass radiator will ensure that anything you listen to will be rich with sound. It also features a LED light that clearly displays the status of the bass setting tailoring the sound experience to you. Controlled bass effect to your liking Play and listen to whatever you like with the perfect bass level for you. Easily control the bass sound with the one button on the Wireless Audio - Portable. Once the bass level is adjusted to your liking, the passive bass radiator will ensure that anything you listen to will be rich with sound. It also features a LED light that clearly displays the status of the bass setting tailoring the sound experience to you.
name: Samsung DA-F61

description-en_US-print: Compact, energy-efficient desktop mono laser printer A space saving, affordable mono laser printer thats perfect for personal use. Delivering quality, maintenance-free prints, this energy-saving device is easy to use and exceptionally quiet. - Space-saving design - 18 ppm, 7.8 seconds First Print Out Time - Energy efficient - Quiet operation - All-in-One cartridge for maintenance free operation Compact and space saving Designed to fit comfortably on the desk, this compact and affordable mono laser printer is perfect for personal use. Its sleek, space-saving design includes a retractable paper tray cover and keeps dimension to a mere 359 x 249 x 198 mm (W x D x H) Productive performance Take advantage of professional laser print speeds of 18 ppm. Canons Quick First-Print technologies ensures quick recovery from sleep mode and with a First Print Out Time of just 7.8 seconds, you can quickly get back to whats important, without waiting around for your prints. Exceptional laser quality Deliver the sharpest, crispest text and most detailed graphics thanks to a print resolution of up to 2400 x 600 dpi with Automatic Image Refinement. Our MS (Magnetic Spherical) Toner has been specifically developed to deliver the optimum results print after print. Efficient and quiet This energy efficient printer uses only 0.8 watts in sleep mode. A convenient front power switch makes it easy to turn off, cutting energy costs even further. Thanks to Canons unique engine design, the i-SENSYS LBP6020 is silent in standby and exceptionally quiet during operation so you can focus on your work without intrusion. All-in-One cartridge The All-in-One recyclable cartridge ensures maintenance-free operation and continuous high quality output. Replace the compact cartridge in seconds containing toner, drum and cleaning units with an Authentic Canon Laser Cartridge and your printer is as good as new.
description-fr_FR-print: Imprimante laser noir et blanc de bureau, compacte et conome en nergie Imprimante laser noir et blanc compacte et conomique, parfaite pour une utilisation personnelle. Impressions de qualit sans aucune maintenance grce ce priphrique conome en nergie, simple utiliser et exceptionnellement silencieux. Points forts - Design peu encombrant - 18 ppm, premire sortie en 7,8 secondes - Faible consommation d'nergie - Fonctionnement silencieux - Cartouche Tout-en-Un pour un fonctionnement sans maintenance Compacte, pour un encombrement rduit Conue pour tre place sans difficult sur tous les bureaux, cette imprimante laser noir et blanc compacte et abordable est parfaite pour une utilisation personnelle. Design pur et peu encombrant avec couvercle de bac papier rtractable pour dimensions de seulement 359 249 198 mm (L P H). Excellente productivit Profitez de tous les avantages d'une vitesse d'impression professionnelle de 18 ppm. Les technologies Quick First Print (premire impression rapide) Canon assurent une reprise rapide aprs le mode veille : la premire impression est effectue en 7,8 secondes, ce qui vous permet de vous consacrer des tches plus importantes sans avoir attendre vos impressions. Qualit laser exceptionnelle Obtenez un texte ultra net et des graphiques aux dtails prcis grce une rsolution d'impression qui atteint 2400 600 dpi et la fonction de lissage automatique d'image. Notre toner MS (Magnetic Spherical - sphrique magntique) est conu pour produire des rsultats exceptionnels, page aprs page. Faible consommation d'nergie et fonctionnement silencieux Cette imprimante trs conome en nergie consomme seulement 0,8 watt en mode veille. L'interrupteur plac l'avant de l'imprimante permet de la mettre facilement hors tension, pour encore plus d'conomies d'nergie. Canon a mis au point un moteur exclusif qui permet l'i-SENSYS LBP6020 d'tre parfaitement silencieuse en veille et incroyablement peu bruyante pendant l'impression. Vous pourrez ainsi vous concentrer sur vos projets en cours sans tre drang par des bruits intempestifs. Cartouche Tout-en-Un La cartouche Tout-en-Un recyclable garantit un fonctionnement sans entretien et des sorties d'une qualit constante. Quelques secondes suffisent remplacer la cartouche compacte (qui comprend le toner, le rouleau et les units de nettoyage) par une cartouche laser Canon authentique, et votre priphrique fonctionnera comme au premier jour.
name: Canon i-SENSYS LBP6020B

description-en_US-print:
Hear beautiful sound from a compact, modern designed, ultra-portable speaker - compatible with laptops, cell phones, portable game devices, MP3 players, tablets, desktop PCs.

- The modern artistic design complements any device - all within an impressively compact palm-sized speaker.
- Conveniently connect using a 3.5 mm headphone jack with laptops, cell phones, portable game devices or MP3 players  Plug, Play, Enjoy!
- Share the music, presentation, videos and more with crisp clear acoustics that can easily be heard throughout the room.
- Beautiful design made even better with your choice of dynamic metallic colors: black, white, red or pink. Also includes a convenient carrying pouch.

description-en_US-mobile: HF R36 - 1/4.85" CMOS, 3.28MP, 1920x1080, 32x optical, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, SD/SDHC/SDXC, HDMI, USB 2.0, 250g, Black
description-en_US-print:
Share your stories effortlessly with Wi-Fi
Its easy to get close to the action in superb Full HD with the compact LEGRIA HF R36. Share your creations effortlessly with Wi-Fi and enjoy steady footage with Intelligent IS.

Wi-Fi with MP4 support
In-built Wi-Fi lets you effortlessly share your creations to social networking sites and view your videos on DNLA certified TVs and iOS devices. Support for MP4 format ensures quick transfer times of HD movies.

51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS
A genuine Canon HD video lens with 51x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV.

Optical Intelligent IS
Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting.

Story Creator
Use Story Creator to effortlessly create memorable movies and help develop your video skills. Choose a theme for your movie and Story Creator gives you on screen suggestions and shooting tips, so you can make captivating videos.

Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration
Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 8 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration.

Store direct to external HDD
Copy movies direct from the inbuilt memory or SDXC card slot to an external hard drive. Just follow the simple on-screen menus for quick and easy storage.

Fingertip control
Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of settings and simplifies playback.

Smart Auto, Face Detection
Effortlessly shoot high quality video with Smart Auto. Intelligent Scene Detection Technology selects the perfect settings from 38 scene modes  all you have to do is point and shoot, whilst Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots.

HD-SD conversion
Convert movies from HD to SD in camera for really easy sharing and web uploading.

8GB Dual Flash memory, SDXC card slot
An in-built 8GB Dual Flash memory lets you store over 3 hours of Full HD movies. Record even longer with the SDXC card slot.
name: Canon LEGRIA HF R36

description-en_US-print:
20.1" LCD Monitor L2010P
FLATRON LCD Professional series - narrow bezel, pivot function, and ergonomic design ensure comfortable work

Built-in Power Adapter

2 Angaben zum Energieverbrauch basierend auf den Ergebnissen von TEC-Vergleichstests mit Einzelfunktions-Farblaserdruckern (aufgefhrt unter energystar.gov und eu-energystar.org Stand: Juni 2010). Die TEC-Tests wurden beim Schwarzweidruck mit entsprechender Druckgeschwindigkeit durchgefhrt. Der tatschliche Stromverbrauch hngt von der individuellen Produktkonfiguration und -nutzung ab.
3 Erfordert eine Internetverbindung zum Drucker. Die Funktion ist mit allen angeschlossenen Internet- und E-Mail-fhigen Gerten verwendbar. Die Druckgeschwindigkeiten knnen variieren. Einige HP LaserJet Produkte erfordern mglicherweise ein Firmware-Upgrade. Eine Liste der untersttzten Dokument- und Bildtypen finden Sie unter www.hp.com/go/eprintcenter. Pour des solutions supplmentaires, reportez-vous la page www.hp.com/go/mobile-printing-solutions. Disponible uniquement sur l'imprimante couleur HP LaserJet Pro CP1025nw.

description-en_US-print: Canon LEGRIA HF R306 Capture stories on the go in stunning Full HD The effortless LEGRIA HF R306 has a 51x Advanced zoom to get you close to the action in stunning Full HD, while Intelligent IS keeps movies steady. Use Story Creator to develop your video skills. 51x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS A genuine Canon HD video lens with 51x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Story Creator Use Story Creator to effortlessly create memorable movies and help develop your video skills. Choose a theme for your movie and Story Creator gives you on screen suggestions and shooting tips, so you can make captivating videos. Cinema-look filters; Touch Decoration Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 8 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration. Write messages straight on the Touch-screen with the Stylus Pen, add stamps or active animations like shooting stars and mix in still images. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of settings and simplifies playback. Smart Auto, Face Detection Effortlessly shoot high quality video with Smart Auto. Intelligent Scene Detection Technology selects the perfect settings from 38 scene modes all you have to do is point and shoot, whilst Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots. Video Snapshot With Video Snapshot its easy to create fun, short movies to share with friends - without a PC. Capture 2, 4 or 8 second clips with just one touch of the record button, create a playlist, add music and your movie is ready. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF R306 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card and are ideal for sharing. Available in a range of sizes allowing you to capture hours of footage.

QuickCam for Enterprise software The software has IT-friendly installation options and offers additional features such as video capture, audio-video mute, and RightLight technology. *Plug-and-play video calling on Linux systems requires the Linux UVC driver to be installed.

Fonction d'appel vido prte l'emploi La configuration s'effectue de faon simple et rapide sous Windows Vista, Windows XP ou Linux*. Il suffit de brancher la camra pour commencer l'utiliser. Conu pour une portabilit optimale Avec sa taille compacte, son tui de transport, son clip pour ordinateur portable rglable et son support pour bureau de 30,5 mm supplmentaire, elle constitue la solution idale pour les nomades. Logiciel QuickCam for Enterprise Le logiciel offre des options d'installation conviviales et des fonctions supplmentaires telles que la capture vido, la mise en sourdine audio/vido et la technologie RightLight. * La fonctionnalit d'appel vido prte l'emploi sur les systmes Linux requiert l'installation du pilote UVC.

description-en_US-mobile: Color Laser, Print, Copy, Scan, Fax, 2400 x 600dpi, 128MB, 533MHz, USB2.0, 14.3kg, White
description-en_US-print: Choose a Samsung CLX-3305FN Colour Laser Multifunction Printer and maximise your print quality as well as your workspace. You can print, copy, fax and scan at the touch of a button. Not only that, but Samsungs ReCP technology and new polymerised toner make sure that your printouts are more vivid, crisp and vibrant than ever. And, thanks to compact ergonomic design, the CLX-3305FN even takes up less space. 4-in-1 Multifunction One push of the ECO button and you can save paper and energy straightaway. Print more onto every page, including 2-up, 4-up and duplex. Easy Document Creator is an application to help you compile and share large documents or other scanned or faxed information digitally. Print exactly what you see on the screen with just one click, saving time. Connect quickly and securely to your wireless network with the touch of a button, via the CLX-3305FN Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS). Enjoy quality printouts Samsungs unique ReCP (Rendering Engine for Clean Page) Technology improves the overall quality and vibrancy of your colour printing, ensuring every printout looks perfect. It automatically sharpens the focus of both graphics and text, while solid objects are overlapped to eliminate white gaps. Polymerized toner Our newly developed polymerized toner has smaller and more uniform particles than conventional toner. Meaning, your printouts will have crisper lines and more vivid colours - helping avoid any paper curling. Also, its higher wax content improves the image gloss and enhances the durability preventing unwanted fading. Ergonomic design Don't worry about this printer crowding your space. Its beautiful and compact design makes it a pleasure to share a desk with. * Small size Footprint With a footprint of just 40.6 x 36.2cm, it's the world's smallest colour laser MFP. * Ergonomic design Its ergonomic design with ebony brown and ice grey colour creates a modern and elegant work environments. Easy to use Designed for simple and intuitive operation the CLX-3305FN saves you precious time and effort. * One Touch Eco Button Just One push of the ECO button and you can save on toner, paper, and energy. Print multiple pages on one sheet, change colour to greyscale or skip blank pages. * One Touch Print Screen Button Print exactly what you see on the screen with just one click, saving time. * One Touch WPS Button Connect quickly and securely to your wireless network with the touch of a button, via the one-touch WPS (Wi-Fi Protected Setup). * Direct USB Printing Easily print images and documents directly from a USB memory stick with the intuitive menu and navigation keys. Easy Colour Manager Create and use your own colour profiles with Samsung's Easy Colour Manager. Match the exact colours of a compay logo or simply give your print outs the individual look you want. Easy Document Creator Easy Document Creator helps you creat digital documents in multiple formats and makes it easy to share them with others - via e-mail, fax or social networks. Easy Solution s upport The printer also brings you software support designed to put you in control of delivering ultimate quality printouts easier than ever before. * Easy Eco Driver Easy Eco Driver helps you compile digital documents in multiple formats and makes it easy to share them with others - even through social networks.
name: Samsung CLX-3305FN

description-en_US-print: For enterprises that need a green, fully functional display screen, with unparalleled visual quality, the ThinkVision LT1952p is the best choice. Compatible with virtually any hardware platform, the LT1952p offers VGA, DVI-D, and DisplayPort connections. The LT1952p is a breeze to use with exceptional LED performance, swivel, tilt, and lift options, 5 milliseconds response time, and a 1000:1 contrast ratio. The LT1952p delivers high energy cost savings, through compliance with go green certifications. The monitors are mercury-free, contain reduced toxic chemicals. The LT1952p delivers the best value on investment for large enterprises.
name: Lenovo ThinkVision LT1952p

description-en_US-mobile: LEGRIA HF M506 - 2.07 MP,1/3 HD CMOS Pro, 10x Optical Zoom, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") , Full HD, SDXC
description-en_US-print: Exceptional video quality for every occasion The LEGRIA HF M506 delivers professional quality video with ease whatever the occasion. Featuring Canons HD CMOS PRO sensor and Audio Scene Select movies look and sound superb. - Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor. - Optical Intelligent IS. - Audio Scene Select. - 10x HD Video lens, iris diaphragm. - Creative cinematic features. - 7.5cm intuitive touch screen. - Smart Auto (38 scenes), Face Detection, Instant AF. - SDXC card slot. Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor The HD CMOS PRO sensor is designed and made by Canon for its professional camcorders. The light gathering area of the pixels is 160% bigger than conventional CMOS sensors, delivering a wider dynamic range and advanced low-light performance. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Audio Scene Select Its simple to make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select and a high-sensitivity, built-in zoom microphone.. Just select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically. Canon HD Video lens A high-quality, Canon HD Video lens with 10x optical zoom features an iris diaphragm for soft background blurring. Creative cinematic features Use Story Creator to develop your video skills and effortlessly create memorable short videos with a story - just choose a theme and follow the in-built scene suggestions. Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters and add fun effects to your movies without a PC using Touch Decoration. Write messages straight on the Touch-screen with the Stylus Pen, add stamps or active animations like shooting stars and mix in still images. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of shooting and playback functions. Effortless shooting Creating high-quality movies is effortless with Smart Auto. Fully automatic, it intelligently selects shooting settings from 38 scenes leaving you free to concentrate on your subject. Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots and Instant AF ensures fast and accurate focusing. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF M506 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card. Available in a wide range of sizes, the cards are easy to carry and ideal for sharing.
name: Canon LEGRIA HF M506

description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Die Zeit ist reif fr problemlose und sofortige Verbindungs- und Kommunikationsmglichkeiten. Die umfassende Kompatibilitt der HP Webcam 1300 erstreckt sich ber alle gngigen Video Calling Services. Features

- In no time flat, you'll be chatting with friends and family. The HP Webcam 1300 is highly compatible with most major video calling services: Skype, AOL, Yahoo, MSN and Google. Plus, 1-click upload to Facebook.
- The HP Webcam 1300 has plenty of extras. Versatile clip mounts anywhere. Wide-reaching 360 pan & 30 tilt freely adjusts. Directional microphone cuts down on background noise. It also doubles as a still camera too.
- Clean lines. Streamlined shape. Light and ultra-compact size. The HP Webcam 1300 is small, space-saving and adds fun to any environment.

Overview
Il est temps de se connecter et de communiquer facilement et immdiatement. La large compatibilit de la webcam HP 1300 s'tend aux services de conversation vido les plus rpandus. Qu'il s'agisse de discuter lors de conversations vido ou d'enregistrer des squences vido, vous apprcierez ses fonctions utilisateur conviviales.

Features
• En un rien de temps, vous serez en conversation avec vos amis et votre famille. La webcam HP 1300 est hautement compatible avec la plupart des principaux services de conversation vido : Skype, AOL, MSN, Yahoo et Google. En outre, tlchargez sur Facebook en 1-clic. (1,2)

• La webcam HP 1300 dispose d'un grand nombre d'extras. Le clip de fixation universel peut tre fix n'importe o. La rotation 360 et l'inclinaison 30 peuvent tre rgles librement. Le microphone directionnel limine le bruit de fond. Elle sert galement d'appareil photo.(2)

• Des lignes pures. Une ligne pure. Format lger et ultra-compact. La webcam HP 1300 est de petite taille, conomise l'espace et est agrable quel que soit l'environnement.

description-en_US-mobile: MG3155 - Color, inkjet, Print/Scan/Copy, A4, 4800x1200 DPI, 9.2/5.0 ipm, 40.5dB, USB 2.0, 802.11 b/g/n, 13.8kg, Wine Red
description-en_US-print: Compact and Stylish All-In-One with Wi-Fi and Auto Duplex Print for the home Excellent quality Perfect for first time buyers, students and families, this compact All-In-One is ideal for everyday printing, scanning and copying. Canons class leading FINE cartridge system using minimum 2pl ink droplet size combined with a print resolution of up to 4800dpi delivers smooth, virtually grain free photo-lab quality prints and crisp text. Lower your printing cost by using optional XL FINE cartridges. Quick printing for the home Print your documents quickly with ISO ESAT speeds of 9.2 ipm for mono documents and 5.0 ipm for colour. A vivid photo-lab quality 10x15cm borderless print is produced in approximately 44 seconds. Enhanced connectivity In-built Wi-Fi makes it easy to share in the home. Print from and scan directly to mobile devices using the Easy-PhotoPrint App. Easy to use and compact Benefiting from the FastFront feature, loading paper and replacing ink can now be done easily from the front and as a result has a more compact design. This allows the All-In-One to be placed closer to the wall or on a shelf - taking up less space. Eco features Use Auto Duplex Print for automatic double-sided printing to reduce your paper consumption and help the environment - all without comprising on print quality. With ECO Information you can see your CO2 and paper savings made by double-sided printing. Save energy by using the Auto Power Off - set the printer to switch off, when not being used for a set amount of time. Intelligent software Turn your movie moments into beautiful prints with Canons unique Full HD Movie Print. New features include Merge Frames and Layout Print to create more striking images. Make your photos even more exciting by applying Fun Filter Effects with Easy-PhotoPrint EX. For easy web printing use Easy-WebPrint EX, combine clips from several web pages so you only print what you need from the web. Get creative with CREATIVE PARK PREMIUM an online service that lets you download photos, illustrations, paper crafts and much more, from internationally recognised photographers & artists. Long lasting, beautiful photos The ChromaLife100 system provides long lasting, beautiful photos. The combination of the PIXMA MG3150, original Canon inks and genuine Canon photo papers preserves memories for a lifetime.
description-fr_FR-mobile: MG3155 - Color, inkjet, Print/Scan/Copy, A4, 4800x1200 DPI, 9.2/5.0 ipm, 40.5dB, USB 2.0, 802.11 b/g/n, 13.8kg, Rouge
description-fr_FR-print: PIXMA Imprimante Multifonction jet d'encre Le PIXMA MG3150 est un multifonction compact et lgant intgrant impression recto verso automatique et connexion Wi-Fi. Rapide et efficace, il offre une qualit suprieure d'impression, de copie et de numrisation. Grce au systme FastFront, le remplacement de l'encre et du papier est un jeu d'enfant. Caractristiques - Multifonction : impression, copie et numrisation - Design compact avec systme FastFront - Rsolution jusqu' 4800 dpi, 2 pl minimum - Vitesse ESAT ISO de 9,2 ipm en noir et blanc/5 ipm en couleur - Photo 10 x 15 cm en 44 secondes environ - Wi-Fi - Impression recto verso automatique - Full HD Movie Print - CREATIVE PARK PREMIUM Multifonction compact et lgant avec connexion Wi-Fi et impression recto verso automatique, idal pour une utilisation la maison Excellente qualit Destin aux nophytes, tudiants et familles, ce multifonction compact est idal pour les impressions, numrisations et copies du quotidien. Le systme de cartouches FINE de Canon gouttes d'encre de 2 pl minimum et la rsolution d'impression maximale de 4 800 dpi garantissent des impressions de qualit professionnelle quasiment exemptes de grain et des textes la nettet irrprochable. Rduisez vos cots d'impression avec les cartouches XL FINE en option. - Impressions rapides la maison Imprimez rapidement vos documents des vitesses ESAT ISO de 9,2 ipm en noir et blanc et 5 ipm en couleur. Produisez des tirages clatants de qualit professionnelle au format 10 x 15 cm sans marge en 44 secondes environ. Connectivit amliore Le Wi-Fi intgr facilite le partage la maison. Imprimez directement depuis des priphriques mobiles et envoyez-leur directement des numrisations grce l'application Easy-PhotoPrint. Compact et simple d'utilisation Grce au systme FastFront, le chargement du papier et le remplacement de l'encre s'effectuent facilement l'avant de l'appareil, ce qui rduit galement l'encombrement. Ce design compact permet de placer l'appareil plus prs du mur ou sur une tagre. Fonctions conomiques Imprimez automatiquement en recto verso pour rduire votre consommation de papier et prserver l'environnement sans transiger sur la qualit de vos impressions. La fonction ECO Information vous informe des conomies de CO2 et de papier ralises grce aux impressions recto verso. conomisez de l'nergie avec la fonction de mise hors tension automatique : rglez le dlai de mise hors tension de l'imprimante en cas d'inactivit. Des logiciels intelligents Crez de magnifiques impressions partir de films avec le logiciel Full HD Movie Print de Canon. Les nouvelles fonctions incluent la fusion des images et l'impression avec mise en page, pour des images encore plus saisissantes. Appliquez des effets de filtre amusants vos photos avec Easy-PhotoPrint EX. Utilisez Easy-WebPrint EX pour combiner des lments de plusieurs pages Web, ce qui vous permet d'imprimer seulement ce dont vous avez besoin sur Internet. Exprimez votre crativit avec CREATIVE PARK PREMIUM, un service en ligne qui vous permet de tlcharger des photos, illustrations, maquettes papier et bien d'autres articles proposs par des photographes et artistes de renomme mondiale. Des photos belles et durables Le systme ChromaLife100 garantit des photos d'une beaut et d'une longvit extraordinaires. Utilisez avec le multifonction PIXMA MG3150 les encres et les papiers photo Canon d'origine, et vos souvenirs resteront jamais intacts.

description-de_DE-mobile: Flachbett, 4800 dpi, 96-bit, USB 2.0, 25W, 5.3 kg
description-de_DE-print:
Es ist mglich, mehrere Fotos, Dias, Folien und Negative gleichzeitig zu scannen. 6-Farb-Scans mit 96 Bit sorgen fr auerordentliche[1] Farbgenauigkeit  das bietet nur HP. description-en_US-mobile: Flatbed, 4800 dpi, 96-bit, USB 2.0, 25W, 5.3 kg
description-en_US-print: The HP Scanjet G4050 Photo Scanner is designed for families and photo enthusiasts with large numbers of photos, slides, negatives or medium/large format transparencies which they want to convert into professional-quality, colour-accurate digital files. HP-exclusive 6-colour high-definition scanning for photos, slides, film and negatives. Convert packs of photos, slides, film and negatives into easy-to-manage digital images. Get superior colour accuracy with industry-leading 6-colour, 96-bit scanning technology exclusive to HP. Capture the finest detail too at 4800 x 9600-dpi resolution2 and get crisp, high definition results for beautiful reprints, enlargements and creative projects. Scan stacks of photos, slides, films or negatives, and automatically remove dust and scratches. Capture multiple originals at once up to sixteen 35 mm slides, 30 negative frames, two medium format (120 mm) film frames, one large format (4 x 5 inch) film frame or four 10 x 15 cm prints and save as separate files. Remove dust and scratches at the touch of a button using built-in infrared technology no need for software touch-ups. Keep important documents safe too, with clear, crisp scans at the touch of a button you can even scan 3-D objects such as books and valuables. Preserve your memories at the touch of a button plus easy colour restoration and photo fixing. Choose one-touch photo or film scanning for optimised settings. Bring old or damaged photos, slides, film and negatives back to life with a range of easy-to-use tools. Restore faded colour, remove red-eye and bring detail out of dark photos, all using HP Real Life technologies. Manage your documents make copies and reprints at the touch of a button too, and save files as PDFs for easy sharing. Organise, edit and email photos without large attachments with HP Photosmart Software.
description-fr_FR-print: Dotez-vous d'une prcision de couleurs suprieure1 avec la numrisation de photos 6 couleurs, 96 bits une exclusivit HP. Numrisez les diapositives et les ngatifs et captez chaque dtail en rsolution matrielle 4 800 x 9 600 ppp2. Ravivez les couleurs passes et restaurez vos anciennes photos et diapositives. Caractristiques Numrisation de photos haute dfinition 6 couleurs, une exclusivit HP, plus adaptateur de diapos/ngatifs. Captures des couleurs qui sont 40 % plus prcises1 que les autres scannets avec la numrisation de photos 6 couleurs, 96 bits (galement numrisation 6 couleurs pour diapositives, pellicules et ngatifs sur le modle G4050). Obtenez des rsultats haute dfinition avec rsolution 4 800 x 9 600 ppp2. Numrisez des piles de photos, diapositives ou ngatifs et enregistrez automatiquement dans des fichiers distincts. Numrisez en mme temps jusqu' quatre photos 10x15 cm originales plus un grand nombre de diapositives ou ngatifs - jusqu' seize diapositives 35 mm, 30 ngatifs, deux pellicules moyen format (120 mm) ou une pellicule grand format avec le modle G4050 - et enregistrez-les dans des fichiers spars. Prservez vos souvenirs d'une simple pression de touche et restaurez facilement les photos et les couleurs. D'une seule touche, numrisez vos vieux souvenirs. Redonnez vie vos anciens originaux avec toute une gamme d'outils intuitifs, notamment la suppression des poussires et des rayures, la restauration des couleurs et l'limination de l'effet yeux rouges , tous bass sur la technologie HP Real Life. - 1 Bas sur des tests indpendants des scanners intgrs, Dec 06. - 2 La rsolution maximale peut tre affecte par des facteurs lis au systme de l'ordinateur

description-en_US-mobile: 10MP, 1/2.3'', CCD x2, 3x, LCD 3.5'', 34Mb, SD, SDHC, HDMI 1.4, USB 2.0, 1280x720, 30fps, 230g, Black
description-en_US-print: Shoot 3D Shoot high-resolution 3D photos and movies effortlessly with 3D Auto. Capture 3DHD Movies and Still Photo Frame your subject, press the shutter, and the scene is captured in a high-quality 3D image. Advanced 3D Modes: Individual Shutter 3D Shooting With Individual Shutter 3D Shooting, you can take two shots of the same subject from different positions, and the camera automatically merges and saves the captured images as a single enhanced 3D photo. After the first image is taken, it appears as a transparent overlay on the monitor to help you align and frame the second shot. Photos of distant subjects like mountains and skyscrapers look amazing in enhanced 3D, while close-up subjects like flowers come to life in natural 3D. Advanced 3D Modes: Interval 3D Shooting With a single press of the button, the camera automatically takes successive shots. Perfect for shooting from a car, train or even an airplane to create a photo with an ultra 3D sense of depth. Imagine shooting clouds from the window of your flight and capturing the scene in super 3D. Fujifilm truly brings a whole new dimension to photo enjoyment! Parallax Control (3D Tuning Function) The camera automatically adjusts parallax in 3D Auto mode for an optimal sense of depth. Manual mode is also possible by operating the Parallax Control lever on the back of the camera to easily fine- tune the sense of depth and alignment of the images. 10.0 Megapixels & Fujinon 3x Optical Zoom This camera is a real multi-tasker! Not only can it shoot in spectacular 3D, but you can also switch to standard 2D mode and use it as a normal camera. There are even special features that allow you to use the fact that the camera has two lenses and two sensors and take two different photos at once! Also, Super Intelligent Flash and Scene Position are featured to automatically make the optical settings to match your scene. Tele/Wide Simultaneous Shooting Zoom in on your subject and also take a wide-angle shot of the same scene at the same time. The twin-lens system lets you freely set the zoom magnification for one lens while the other is set to wide angle, letting you capture the exact same instant with totally different angles of view. Shoot 2D/3D Hybrid The FinePix REAL 3D W3 comes loaded with a variety of functions for both 3D and 2D. Super Intelligent Flash and Scene Position automatically make the optimal settings to match your scene. Fujinon Lens - Two Sets of Lens that Work in the Same Way as Human Eyes Our ability to perceive depth comes from viewing an object along two different lines of sight. This phenomenon is called parallax. The FinePix REAL 3D W3 is fitted with dual lenses to capture realistic images that are unchanged from how human eyes see them. Both optical 3x zoom lenses capture subjects beautifully, even from a distance. The camera's newly developed stainless steel frame maintains the optical axis with high precision. All these features are combined in a light, compact, stylish body.
name: Fujifilm FinePix REAL 3D W3

description-en_US-print: With HD 720p video calling and one-click HD upload to Facebook, now you can share your HD worldanywhere, anytime. HD video calls Youll get HD 720p video calling on most major instant messaging services and Logitech Vid HD. Logitech More HD You and your loved ones can enjoy better HD video calling on more computers thanks to Logitech More HD technology. One-click upload to Facebook You can easily capture HD video (720p) and HD-upload it to Facebook or YouTube with just one click. Fold-and-go design Its easy to slip it into your bag and take it with you. Plus, the 360-degree swivel makes calling and recording easier at any angle. 8-megapixel snapshots You can take high-resolution snapshots at up to 8 megapixels (software enhanced). Includes Logitech Vid HD Now video calling is free, fast and easy for you and anyone you want to talk to. Its built into your webcam setup, so you can call right away. Built-in mic with RightSound It gives you clear conversations without annoying background noise. Face-recognition login Log in to your computer and your favorite sites with the included face-recognition software. Itll save you time and impress your friends. RightLight 2 technology Even if you make a video call in dim or poorly backlit settings, the camera will intelligently adjust to produce the best possible image. Logitech Video Effects Your video calls get an extra dose of fun with Video Effects. Its easy to spice things up with neon splashes, fish-eye distortions and more. IM compatibility Works with Skype, Windows Live Messenger, Yahoo! Messenger, AOL Instant Messenger (AIM) and other popular instant messaging applications. Free video editing software Logitech has teamed up with MAGIX to offer MAGIX Photo Manager 9 and MAGIX Video Easy with your new Logitech webcam. And theyre free.

Le logiciel est intgr la configuration de la camra Web, elle est donc immdiatement prte l'emploi. Instantans de 8 mgapixels Vous pouvez prendre des instantans haute rsolution allant jusqu' 8 mgapixels (avec interpolation logicielle). Microphone intgr avec la technologie RightSound Apprciez le confort des conversations, sans cho ni bruit de fond. Animez vos appels vido l'aide des effets "non", "il-de-poisson", etc. Compatibilit avec les messageries instantanes Fonctionne avec Skype, Windows Live Messenger, Yahoo! Messenger, AOL Instant Messenger (AIM) et les autres principales applications de messagerie instantane. Logiciel de montage vido gratuit Logitech s'est associ MAGIX pour vous faire bnficier des logiciels MAGIX Photo Manager 9 et MAGIX Video Easy avec votre nouvelle camra Web Logitech. En plus, ils sont gratuits.

description-en_US-print: Sophisticated shooter. Flex your photographic prowess and capture the moment perfectly with Sony's exclusive Translucent Mirror Technology DSLR. Experience superior performance whether you're shooting HD movie masterpieces or composing crystal clear still images. Tele-zoom High Speed Shooting of up to 7 frames per second works with continuous auto focus that gets visibly faster in Live View and HD Movie modes. Photography as an Art Get serious about taking your photography skills to the next level with the compact dimensions and highly sophisticated technology of an a37 camera. Bring it everywhere you go, explore creative photographic techniques and start transforming special moments into truly stunning images. Maintain Your Focus The secret to the small bodies and huge performance advantages of Sony A-mount cameras is Translucent Mirror Technology, which simultaneously directs light to the image sensor and AF sensor at all times to realize accelerated, high-precision full-time continuous phase-detection autofocusing. Professional Class Shooting Speeds It's never been easier to capture a game-changing soccer kick or the look of surprise on their face when you're shooting at 7 frames per second in the Tele-zoom Continuous Advance Priority AE mode. By utilizing Full-time Continuous AF you're ensured accurate tracking and clear focusing in every frame. This mode also magnifies the center of the action 1.4x to bring your subjects closer at a clear 8-megapixel resolution. Tiltable Clear Photo LCD Tilt the Clear Photo LCD screen for the flexibility to view almost any kind of scene with clarity. Easily shoot from high perspectives by holding the camera up and tilting the screen down towards yourself. Or try setting the camera on the ground and tilting the screen up you'll have a clear view perfect for framing your subjects. Portfolio-Worthy Portraits Now it's easy to create portraits with a truly professional look. Auto Portrait Framing uses face detection technology and the "rule of thirds" principle to produce optimally trimmed portraits. These sharp, beautifully balanced images feature the same number of pixels as your originals (which are also saved), thanks to By Pixel Super Resolution Technology. Compose With Creativity Enjoy the point-and-shoot convenience of various automatic features including Superior Auto mode, which detects and analyzes shooting conditions, adjusts camera settings accordingly, and activates advanced functions when necessary to achieve optimal results. 8 Scene Selection modes also optimize image quality for the type of scene you shoot.
name: Sony SLT-A37K

description-de_DE-mobile: HF S200 - 1/2.6-CMOS, 8,59 Megapixel, 10x optical zoom, DIGIC DV III, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") LCD, 0.3 Lux, SD/SDHC, USB 2.0
description-de_DE-print: Der LEGRIA HF S200 mit zwei SDHC-Speicherkartenslots bietet vielseitige Aufzeichnungsmglickeiten. Per Relay Recording wechselt er automatisch fr unterbrechungsfreie Aufzeichnung zur nchsten Speicherkarte; das Canon HD Camera System sorgt fr brillante HD-Qualitt. Canon HD Camera System (8 Megapixel) Das einzigartige Canon HD Camera System des LEGRIA HF S200 aus Full HD-CMOS-Sensor mit 8,0 Megapixeln, Canon HD-Videoobjektiv und DIGIC DV III-Prozessor sorgt fr exzellente Bildqualitt und berzeugende Leistung auch bei wenig Licht. 8,8 cm (3,5 Zoll) Touchscreen-LCD und elektronischer Sucher Das hoch auflsende 8,8 cm (3,5 Zoll) Touchscreen-LCD untersttzt Sie beim Aufzeichnen von HD-Videoclips. Das innovative Touch Control LC-Display gibt schnellen Zugriff auf Funktionen wie Nachfhrung, Scharfstellung und Belichtung. Aufzeichnung auf Speicherkarten Die Aufnahmen werden direkt auf SDHC-Speicherkarten (High Capacity) aufgezeichnet. Eine 32-GB-Karte bietet ausreichend Speicherplatz fr ber 12 Stunden Videomaterial. Die Funktion Relay Recording ist dabei besonders praktisch: Es wird automatisch erkannt, wenn eine Speicherkarte voll ist und ohne Unterbrechung zur anderen gewechselt. Einfach Videos (Ver-)Teilen Damit Sie Ihre Videoclips noch einfacher weitergeben knnen, knnen die AVCHD-Dateien (MPEG4) mit dem LEGRIA HF S200 in Standard Definition MPEG2-Dateien mit geringerem Datenvolumen konvertiert werden, zum Brennen auf DVD oder fr den Web-Upload. Professionelle Steuerung ber die Custom-Taste lsst sich das manuelle Whlrad mit einer von fnf Einstellungen, z. B. fr Scharfstellung, Belichtung oder Audiopegel, belegen. ber einen entsprechenden Anschluss lsst sich der Camcorder ber optional erhltliche externe Fernsteuerungen bedienen. Exzellente Tonqualitt ber den Mikrofoneingang und den Kopfhreranschluss erreichen Sie eine hervorragende Tonqualitt. Ein konfigurierbares Mikrofondmpfungselement kompensiert pltzliche Lautstrkenderungen und stellt dabei sicher, dass die Audiospur immer mit optimalem Pegel aufgezeichnet wird. Gestochen scharfe Aufnahmen Der optische Bildstabilisator hat einen neuen Dynamik-Modus, der Verwacklungsunschrfen noch effektiver verringert, auch wenn Sie sich bewegen. Der Powered IS reduziert Verwacklungsunschrfen besonders bei Aufnahmen im Telebereich.
description-en_US-mobile: HF S200 - 1/2.6-CMOS, 8,59 Megapixel, 10x optical zoom, DIGIC DV III, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") LCD, 0.3 Lux, SD/SDHC, USB 2.0
description-en_US-print: With two SDHC memory card slots, the LEGRIA HF S200 offers versatile recording. While Relay Recording automatically switches between cards, the Canon HD Camera System delivers ultimate HD quality. 8MP Canon HD Camera System Get stunning images and superb low-light performance via the Canon HD Camera System: the LEGRIA HF S200 combines an 8.0MP Full HD CMOS sensor, a Canon HD Video Lens, and the DIGIC DV III processor. 8.8cm (3.5) touch-screen LCD A high-resolution 8.8cm (3.5) touch-screen LCD offers a highly detailed, 100% view for shooting HD movies. A unique, gesture-based LCD interface gives you fingertip access to shooting and playback functions, including Touch Tracking, Touch Focus and Touch Exposure modes. Memory card recording Record directly to high capacity SDHC memory cards a 32GB card can store over 12 hours of HD movies. Dual card slots with Relay Recording mean recording will automatically switch between cards when one becomes full. Easy movie sharing For easier sharing of your movies, the LEGRIA HF S200 lets you convert AVCHD (MPEG4) files to smaller, standard definition MPEG2 files, ready for burning to DVD or uploading to the web. Professional control A Custom Key lets you activate one of five variables that can be assigned to the manual Control Dial, including focus, exposure, and audio level. A remote control jack input enables the use of optional external remote controls. Audio excellence Capture and monitor superior audio with a microphone input connection and headphone jack. An configurable Mic Attenuator compensates for sudden volume changes, ensuring that audio is always recorded at the optimum level. Steadier shots An Optical Image Stabilizer with a new Dynamic mode lets you record steadier footage, even when youre moving. Powered IS keeps footage super-steady when shooting at the telephoto end of the zoom range. Dont miss a thing In Pre REC mode, the camcorder starts recording three seconds before the Record button is pressed. These seconds are added to the beginning of each clip, so you can still capture that crucial moment even if you pressed the Record button too late. Instant AF achieves highly accurate focus at speed. Extended colour DIGIC DV III supports x.v.Color for deeper, richer hues during playback on compatible HDTVs. 25p Cinema Mode matches the look of traditional film, and provides enhanced low-light shooting performance. Creative extras With a mini Advanced Accessory Shoe, optional accessories such as a video light can be used. The 58mm lens thread is compatible with professional filters.
description-fr_FR-mobile: HF S200 - 1/2.6-CMOS, 8,59 Megapixel, 10x optical zoom, DIGIC DV III, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") LCD, 0.3 Lux, SD/SDHC, USB 2.0
description-fr_FR-print: Dot de deux logements pour carte mmoire SDHC, le LEGRIA HF S200 offre une grande souplesse d'enregistrement. Le Systme vido Canon HD offre une qualit HD ingale, et sa fonction d'enregistrement "relais" bascule automatiquement entre les cartes. - Systme vido Canon HD 8 millions de pixels - cran LCD tactile 8,8cm (3,5 pouces) - Deux logements pour carte mmoire SDHC - Enregistrement "relais" et conversion HD-SD - Molette de contrle manuel, prise pour tlcommande - Son de haute qualit - Stabilisateur d'image optique dynamique et stabilisateur d'image motoris - Pr-enregistrement, AF instantan - x.v.Color ; mode Cinma 25p - Systme extensible Enregistrement HD flexible : votre imagination est la seule limite. Systme vido Canon HD 8 millions de pixels Obtenez des images poustouflantes et d'excellentes performances en conditions de faible luminosit grce au systme vido Canon HD : le LEGRIA HF S200 associe un capteur CMOS Full HD 8 millions de pixels, un objectif vido HD Canon et le processeur DIGIC DV III. cran LCD tactile 8,8cm (3,5 pouces) Un cran LCD tactile 8,8cm (3,5 pouces) haute rsolution permet un affichage complet et trs dtaill pour l'enregistrement de vidos HD. Grce une interface LCD unique base sur les gestes, les fonctions d'enregistrement et de lecture telles que le suivi tactile, la mise au point tactile et l'exposition tactile sont accessibles du bout des doigts. Enregistrement sur carte mmoire Enregistrez directement vos vidos sur des cartes mmoire haute capacit. Une carte de 32 Go permet de stocker plus de 12 heures de vido HD. Grce aux deux logements pour carte mmoire et l'enregistrement "relais", l'enregistrement bascule d'une carte l'autre lorsque l'une d'entre elles est pleine. Partage de vidos simplifi Pour un partage facile des vidos, le LEGRIA HF S200 vous permet de convertir des fichiers AVCHD (MPEG4) en fichiers MPEG2 de Dfinition Standard moins volumineux, pouvant tre gravs sur DVD ou tlchargs sur Internet. Contrle professionnel La touche personnalisable vous permet d'activer l'une des cinq fonctions pouvant tre attribues la molette de contrle manuel, telles que la mise au point, l'exposition ou le volume audio. Une prise spcifique vous permet d'utiliser les tlcommandes externes disponibles en option. Une qualit audio incomparable Enregistrez et contrlez un son de qualit suprieure avec une entre microphone et une prise casque. L'attnuateur de micro configurable limine les sauts de volume pour garantir un enregistrement audio impeccable. Des images plus stables Grce au stabilisateur d'image optique dot du nouveau mode dynamique, vous raliserez des squences plus stables, mme lorsque vous bougez. Le stabilisateur d'image motoris assure une grande stabilit des images sur l'ensemble de la plage de focales. Ne laissez rien vous chapper ! Lorsque vous slectionnez le mode pr-enregistrement, le camscope commence enregistrer trois secondes avant que vous n'appuyiez sur la touche d'enregistrement. Ces secondes sont ajoutes au dbut de chaque squence vido, ce qui vous vite de manquer un moment crucial, mme si vous appuyez trop tard sur la touche d'enregistrement. L'AF instantan permet une mise au point rapide et extrmement prcise. Couleur tendue Le processeur DIGIC DV III prend en charge l'espace couleurs x.v.Color pour des teintes plus profondes et plus riches lorsque les vidos sont lues sur un tlviseur HD compatible. Le mode Cinma 25p donne vos vidos l'aspect du film de cinma traditionnel et optimise les images en conditions de faible clairage. Accessoires cratifs La mini griffe porte-accessoires perfectionne permet d'utiliser des priphriques en option, tels qu'un clairage vido. Le filetage de l'objectif 58 mm est compatible avec les filtres professionnels.
name: Canon LEGRIA HF S200

description-en_US-print: Enjoy great LED pictures in vivid colours This attractive, slim display is a delight to use. Essential features like SmartContrast that ensure rich, bright images make it a great choice! Great picture quality - LED technology for natural colours - SmartContrast 10,000,000:1 for incredibly rich black details Design that complements any interior - Attractive slim, glossy design - Small footprint to blend into any lifestyle Greener every day - Mercury Free eco-friendly display - Energy Star for energy efficiency and low power consumption Great convenience - Easy display performance tuning with SmartControl Lite LED technology for natural colours White LED's are solid state devices which light up to full, consistent brightness faster saving startup time. LED's are free from mercury content, which allows for eco-friendly recycling and disposal process. LED's allow for better dimming control of the LCD backlight, resulting in a super high contrast ratio. It also gives superior colour reproduction thanks to consistent brightness across the screen. SmartContrast 10,000,000:1 for incredibly rich black details You want the LCD flat display with the highest contrast and most vibrant images. Philips advanced video processing combined with unique extreme dimming and backlight-boosting technology results in vibrant images. SmartContrast will increase the contrast with excellent black level and accurate rendition of dark shades and colours. It gives a bright, lifelike picture with high contrast and vibrant colours. Easy display performance tuning with SmartControl Lite SmartControl Lite is the next generation 3D icon-based GUI monitor control software. This allows the user to fine-tune most parameters of the monitor like Colour, Brightness, screen calibration, Multimedia, ID management etc with the mouse. Mercury Free eco-friendly display Philips monitors with LED backlighting are free of Mercury content, one of the most toxic natural substances, which affects humans and animals. This allows for an eco-friendly display throughout its life-cycle, from manufacturing to disposal. Energy Star for energy efficiency and low power consumption Energy Star is a US EPA sponsored energy efficiency programme also adopted by many other countries. Energy Star certification ensures that you are buying a product which meets the latest power efficiency standards and which operates with maximum power efficiency at all operational levels. New Philips monitors are certified for Energy Star 5.0 specifications and meet or exceed the standard. For example, in sleep mode Energy Star 5.0 requires less than 1 Watt power consumption, whereas Philips monitors consume less than 0.5 Watts.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Profitez de superbes images LED aux couleurs clatantes
description-fr_FR-print: Avec son design fin et lgant, cet cran est facile  utiliser. Les fonctions essentielles, dont SmartContrast, vous permettent de bnficier d'images profondes et lumineuses. Ce modle est exceptionnel!
