description-en_US-print: Full HD 3D experience Slim LED Cutting edge TV technology with Samsung Hospitality Displays. Its a TV that will satisfy guests looking for the best picture quality, along with an utterly absorbing 3D viewing experience. And because Samsung is at the forefront of 3D technology, viewers will experience the future of home entertainment from the comfort of their room. Available in various screen sizes, Samsungs Hospitality Displays produce full HD 3D images that are amazingly realistic and bursting with vivid colour. We achieve the very highest standard in 3D imaging through our intuitive 3D HyperReal Engine. This technology controls the colour, contrast, 3D effects and motion for mind-blowing results. Images are so life-like and crystal-clear that they ensure that the viewing experience is not only captivating, but also comfortable. Enjoying 2D images in 3D is a brilliant reality with Samsung Hospitality Displays. At the push of a button Samsung 3D Converter transforms your favourite TV programmes or movies with amazing 3D-depth. It will reinvent your favourite 2D content. Slim LED Superior TVs in your rooms can provide a valuable part of a quality hotel experience. With the eye-catching yet elegant design of our slim LED Hospitality Displays, you can elevate your guests viewing pleasure like never before. Created specifically for premium hotels, the sophisticated design of our TVs will become the focal point of your rooms Increased wireless connectivity through AllShare Through Samsung Hospitality Displays with AllShare, powered by DLNA, content including movies, photos and music in DLNA en-abled personal devices can be seamlessly shared between the device and the TV, even wirelessly. That means personal content can be enjoyed on the vivid larger screen, helping to enhance the overall entertainment experience. Energy saving of up to 40% Samsungs range of energy-efficient LED TVs is setting the standard when it comes to saving energy and reducing costs. Samsung Hospitality Displays are a cost effective business solution due to their energy-efficient features and ability to decrease maintenance and management oversight. Our Hospital-ity Displays offer a number of energy efficient advantages that are designed to lower power usage and your overall energy bill. Samsung LED technology cuts energy consumption by nearly 50% compared with Energy STAR 4.0. This means a 56 Samsung LED TV consumes the same amount of energy as a conventional 32 LCD TV. Whats more, LED TVs from Samsung are durable, offering a long lifetime without loss of picture quality. Samsung Displays are also built with less harmful materials, so that the manufacturing and recycling processes are much more efficient and friendlier to the environment.

description-en_US-mobile: 46'', 16:9, 1920 x 1080, 400 cd/m2, 1.000.000:1, LED-TV, LED Edge, 3D-TV, 3D FULL HD, HDMI, LAN, SCART, USB, 134W, Black
description-en_US-print: The Toshiba TL933/963 series puts 3D into everyone's reach. So if youd like a great 3D cinema experience in your living room, this is the TV for you. Whether youre watching in 2D or 3D, the picture quality is glorious in 1080p full high definition, and our 200 AMR (Active Motion & Resolution) technology gives a high refresh rate that can easily keep up with the fastest moving sports, games and movies. On top of that its a Smart TV, so you can easily enjoy entertainment from the internet. DIVE INTO 3D Once you dive into the next dimension of 3D, you will never look back. Movies, sports and gaming will never be the same after you enjoy the magic of Toshiba Full HD 3D. Our 2D-to-3D upconversion software is also built in, so you can add 3D effects to movies shot in 2D. (Note: 3D-glasses sold separately). KEEP UP WITH THE ACTION The action stays crisp, fast and smooth thanks to our 200 AMR (Active Motion & Resolution) HD image-processing technology. It cuts motion blur and keeps the refresh rate high, so the TL933/963 series can easily keep up with the fastest moving sports and action sequences. GET INTO SMART TV Now you can watch entertainment from the internet on the best screen in the house. With just a few clicks of the remote, youll be watch videos on YouTube, catching up with Euronews or sharing photos on Flickr. You can also view and share a wide range of other online content via various service providers through the Toshiba Places internet portal GREAT CONNECTIONS Connect your TV to your home network and enjoy all the music, videos and photos stored on your computer on the big screen via WiDi technology*. On top of that four HDMI ports and two USB ports mean theres plenty of room to connect all your other devices and with the USB Video Recording function* you can record your favourite programmes. CONTROL FROM YOUR PHONE You can now control your TV with your smart device based on iOS (iPod Touch, iPhone or iPad) or Android operating system, allowing you to change the channel or turn the volume up with a swipe of your finger. Just download our free app, Toshiba AppsConnect, from iTunes or Android Market. RICHER VIEWING Become a more discerning viewer with our pre-installed MediaGuide, powered by Rovi. It helps you to decide what to watch from a database of over 2.5 million titles and gives richer multimedia background information than standard electronic programme guides.
description-fr_FR-mobile: 116.84 cm (46 ") LED-TV 2D-3D 1920X1080 46TL933F 1M:1 HDMI USB RJ45 IN

description-en_US-print: Compact, energy-efficient desktop mono laser printer A space saving, affordable mono laser printer thats perfect for personal use. Delivering quality, maintenance-free prints, this energy-saving device is easy to use and exceptionally quiet. - Space-saving design - 18 ppm, 7.8 seconds First Print Out Time - Energy efficient - Quiet operation - All-in-One cartridge for maintenance free operation Compact and space saving Designed to fit comfortably on the desk, this compact and affordable mono laser printer is perfect for personal use. Its sleek, space-saving design includes a retractable paper tray cover and keeps dimension to a mere 359 x 249 x 198 mm (W x D x H) Productive performance Take advantage of professional laser print speeds of 18 ppm. Canons Quick First-Print technologies ensures quick recovery from sleep mode and with a First Print Out Time of just 7.8 seconds, you can quickly get back to whats important, without waiting around for your prints. Exceptional laser quality Deliver the sharpest, crispest text and most detailed graphics thanks to a print resolution of up to 2400 x 600 dpi with Automatic Image Refinement. Our MS (Magnetic Spherical) Toner has been specifically developed to deliver the optimum results print after print. Efficient and quiet This energy efficient printer uses only 0.8 watts in sleep mode. A convenient front power switch makes it easy to turn off, cutting energy costs even further. Thanks to Canons unique engine design, the i-SENSYS LBP6020 is silent in standby and exceptionally quiet during operation so you can focus on your work without intrusion. All-in-One cartridge The All-in-One recyclable cartridge ensures maintenance-free operation and continuous high quality output. Replace the compact cartridge in seconds containing toner, drum and cleaning units with an Authentic Canon Laser Cartridge and your printer is as good as new.
description-fr_FR-print: Imprimante laser noir et blanc de bureau, compacte et conome en nergie Imprimante laser noir et blanc compacte et conomique, parfaite pour une utilisation personnelle. Impressions de qualit sans aucune maintenance grce ce priphrique conome en nergie, simple utiliser et exceptionnellement silencieux. Points forts - Design peu encombrant - 18 ppm, premire sortie en 7,8 secondes - Faible consommation d'nergie - Fonctionnement silencieux - Cartouche Tout-en-Un pour un fonctionnement sans maintenance Compacte, pour un encombrement rduit Conue pour tre place sans difficult sur tous les bureaux, cette imprimante laser noir et blanc compacte et abordable est parfaite pour une utilisation personnelle. Design pur et peu encombrant avec couvercle de bac papier rtractable pour dimensions de seulement 359 249 198 mm (L P H). Excellente productivit Profitez de tous les avantages d'une vitesse d'impression professionnelle de 18 ppm. Les technologies Quick First Print (premire impression rapide) Canon assurent une reprise rapide aprs le mode veille : la premire impression est effectue en 7,8 secondes, ce qui vous permet de vous consacrer des tches plus importantes sans avoir attendre vos impressions. Qualit laser exceptionnelle Obtenez un texte ultra net et des graphiques aux dtails prcis grce une rsolution d'impression qui atteint 2400 600 dpi et la fonction de lissage automatique d'image. Notre toner MS (Magnetic Spherical - sphrique magntique) est conu pour produire des rsultats exceptionnels, page aprs page. Faible consommation d'nergie et fonctionnement silencieux Cette imprimante trs conome en nergie consomme seulement 0,8 watt en mode veille. L'interrupteur plac l'avant de l'imprimante permet de la mettre facilement hors tension, pour encore plus d'conomies d'nergie. Canon a mis au point un moteur exclusif qui permet l'i-SENSYS LBP6020 d'tre parfaitement silencieuse en veille et incroyablement peu bruyante pendant l'impression. Vous pourrez ainsi vous concentrer sur vos projets en cours sans tre drang par des bruits intempestifs. Cartouche Tout-en-Un La cartouche Tout-en-Un recyclable garantit un fonctionnement sans entretien et des sorties d'une qualit constante. Quelques secondes suffisent remplacer la cartouche compacte (qui comprend le toner, le rouleau et les units de nettoyage) par une cartouche laser Canon authentique, et votre priphrique fonctionnera comme au premier jour.
name: Canon i-SENSYS LBP6020

description-en_US-mobile: 35mm Slide and Film Scanner, PC/Mac
description-en_US-print: Bring your old pictures back to life! SLIDES 2 PC makes it easy and fun to rediscover your 35mm film negatives and slides on your computer. Incredibly fast, one-touch scanning and a single-cable connection make SLIDES 2 PC perfect for archiving your memories, your family's memories and your friends' memories! If you're like one of the millions of people who have boxes of slide carousels in the attic or a stack of those little yellow boxes in the kitchen, SLIDES 2 PC is perfect for you! Don't know what happened to your projector? Don't know where to buy a replacement bulb for your projector? SLIDES 2 PC eliminates the hassle and brings those memories of family dinners, graduations, vacations, and joyous occasions back into your life. Just install the included software on your computer, connect SLIDES 2 PC using the attached cable, and load up to 20 slides into the included Rapid Slide Feeder for quick, hassle-free scanning; you'll be reliving all of your treasured memories in no time! A blue light even indicates when SLIDES 2 PC is correctly connected to your computer and ready to scan. SLIDES 2 PC is a high-resolution scanner with a high-quality optic element. This outstanding attention to quality ensures that you can capture all of the color and detail in each one of your slides or negatives. Fixed-focus range, automatic exposure and color balance guarantee that your memories are captured optimally with accurate color conversion and perfect imaging. Don't let your memories collect dust or turn yellow one day longer! Enjoy them every day and share them with SLIDES 2 PC.
name: ION Slide 2 PC/Mac

description-en_US-print: LG INTERACTIVE TV(Ready) has been designed for hoteliers who are seeking to provide their guests with value added in-room services at minimum cost. With Pro:Centric solution-enabled LG Interactive TVs, hotels can greet their guests with a welcome message. It can also provide guests with vital hotel information such as local tourist attractions and facility information far more easily. Contents can be updated through a web-based editor and it also allows hotels to remotely manage cloning and channel mapping via a remote server. For hotels without their own server, LG offers Pro:Centric server which has been optimized for hotel users.

Beautiful images are easy thanks to Smart AUTO that picks the perfect camera settings for 32 predefined shooting situations, and Intelligent IS that automatically optimizes image stabilization based on the shooting conditions. In Kombination mit dem leistungsstarken BIONZ Prozessor erhalten Sie fantastische Ergebnisse auch in geschlossenen Rumen oder bei Einbruch der Dunkelheit. Einfach mehr im Bild Bringen Sie wirklich alle ins Bild bei Partys, Geburtstagsfeiern und anderen besonderen Anlssen. description-en_US-mobile: HDR-PJ10E, 30x, 3.3MP, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, CMOS 1/4, USB out, HDMI
description-en_US-print: Let everyone in the room enjoy your special memories. Inside this compact, easy to use Full HD camcorder there's a projector that beams your videos onto any nearby surface. It's the smart, fun new way for everyone to share the action. Best Full HD pictures Move up to the smoothest, most detailed video images you've ever seen from a camcorder. New 1920x1080/50p mode records at a very high frame rate in progressive mode, capturing 50 Full HD frames every second for extra-clear results. Project your image anywhere Sometimes you want everyone to see your video memories, but there's no TV in the room to hook up with. Now Handycam lets you project crisp, detailed video clips directly onto any nearby flat surface - from walls and ceilings to a friend's t-shirt. Sounds amazing Don't your videos deserve a better soundtrack? The precision microphone array captures 5.1-ch surround sound with greater sensitivity and reduced wind noise. Stereo speakers and S-Master technology assure clear sound during playback on your camcorder. Low light, no problem Many camcorders struggle in low light, producing grainy, fuzzy images. Super sensitive Exmor R CMOS Sensor reduces image noise for clearer images. In conjunction with the powerful BIONZ processor youll get great results in dim interiors or at dusk. Pack more into every scene Make sure nobodys left out of the picture at parties, birthdays and other special occasions. The high quality G Lens by Sony features enhanced wide angle performance, capturing a bigger image area without you having to stand back.

description-fr_FR-print: SAMSUNG Electronics, un des leaders mondiaux des crans plats, annonce le lancement de sa toute dernire gamme de tlviseurs  Hospitality TV  pour lhtellerie. Conus pour moderniser les chambres d'htel, ces nouveaux tlviseurs sont dots des toutes dernires technologies pour une diffusion numrique haute dfinition, une consommation dnergie rduite et une installation facile. Leur design lgant aux finitions brillantes est adapt au style de tous les htels, de l'htel conomique  l'htel de luxe. Alors que l'industrie htelire se prpare  vivre lune des transitions les plus importantes de son histoire depuis la tlvision en noir et blanc, SAMSUNG a dot tous ses tlviseurs  Hospitality TV  d'un tuner numrique pour recevoir les programmes en haute dfinition. Cette nouvelle gamme de tlviseurs est galement fabrique avec des matriaux plus cologiques et plus conomes en nergie. (la consommation d'nergie est rduite de 60 % par rapport  un tlviseur traditionnel).  Le secteur de l'htellerie fait dsormais des choix rflchis en matire de technologie. Les hteliers sont sensibles au design et aux conomies d'nergie mais ils dsirent galement remplacer leurs anciens modles analogiques par des crans plats LCD modernes.Ils sont dots de la technologie de clonage via USB, qui permet de dupliquer sur chaque tlviseur les paramtres, les chanes et les logos de l'htel trs facilement. Cette nouvelle technologie constitue une conomie de temps et d'argent considrable pour les htels et une garantie davoir les mmes rglages standards sur tous les tlviseurs. Les hteliers peuvent galement afficher leur logo pendant 3  7 secondes lors de lallumage de lcran (dure rglable), ce qui leur permet de mettre en valeur leur marque auprs de leur clientle. Les tlviseurs Hospitality intgrent galement une prise dalimentation  larrire de lcran pour alimenter directement la Set-Top Box et peuvent tre connects  des enceintes externes installes dans la salle de bain pour profiter au maximum de la radio. Pour une plus grande connectivit entre les crans plats et les appareils multimdia, les tlviseurs Hospitality sont compatibles avec les prises externes Jack Pack qui peuvent tre installes nimporte o dans la chambre dhtel. Les clients peuvent ainsi couter leur musique prfre ou regarder leurs photos sur lcran du tlviseur. Enfin, les tlviseurs Hospitality de SAMSUNG ont une tlcommande multi codes. Cette fonction est particulirement pratique pour les salles de sport ou les caftrias afin de changer le programme sur tous les crans avec une seule tlcommande. Les tlviseurs des sries 450 et 457 disposent de la technologie HD Ready et dune finition noire lgante.

description-en_US-mobile: HF M506 - 1/3" CMOS, 2.37 Mp, 16:9, 1920 x 1080, 10x Optical, 200x Digital, DIGIC DV III, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, USB 2.0, 360g, Black
description-en_US-print: Canon LEGRIA HF M506 Exceptional video quality for every occasion The LEGRIA HF M506 delivers professional quality video with ease whatever the occasion. Featuring Canons HD CMOS PRO sensor and Audio Scene Select movies look and sound superb. Benefits - Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor; - Optical Intelligent IS; - Audio Scene Select; - 10x HD Video lens, iris diaphragm; - Creative cinematic features; - 7.5cm intuitive touch screen; - Smart Auto (38 scenes), Face Detection, Instant AF; - SDXC card slot. Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor The HD CMOS PRO sensor is designed and made by Canon for its professional camcorders. The light gathering area of the pixels is 160% bigger than conventional CMOS sensors, delivering a wider dynamic range and advanced low-light performance. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Audio Scene Select Its simple to make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select and a high-sensitivity, built-in zoom microphone.. Just select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically. Canon HD Video lens A high-quality, Canon HD Video lens with 10x optical zoom features an iris diaphragm for soft background blurring. Creative cinematic features Use Story Creator to develop your video skills and effortlessly create memorable short videos with a story - just choose a theme and follow the in-built scene suggestions. Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters and add fun effects to your movies without a PC using Touch Decoration. Write messages straight on the Touch-screen with the Stylus Pen, add stamps or active animations like shooting stars and mix in still images. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of shooting and playback functions. Effortless shooting Creating high-quality movies is effortless with Smart Auto. Fully automatic, it intelligently selects shooting settings from 38 scenes leaving you free to concentrate on your subject. Face Detection optimises the settings for great people shots and Instant AF ensures fast and accurate focusing. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF M506 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card. Available in a wide range of sizes, the cards are easy to carry and ideal for sharing.

description-en_US-print: With improving the entire scanning process as it's main objective, the Fujitsu fi-6800 Production Scanner builds upon the qualities that have made Fujitsu the industry-leading vendor in Mid-Volume Production market the fi-6800 incorporates many additional features and functions that will can improve your document scanning efficiency. From pure scanning speed, to ease of use for user operation or a full suite of software productivity tools, the fi-6800 is the ideal solution for a wide range of Production Scanning applications. Features include: The ideal blend of features and performance to maximize scanning productivity - Fast, 130 ppm (simplex) / 260 ipm (duplex) scanning in monochrome or color (letter, landscape @ 300 dpi) - Space-saving design with quiet operation and many environmental friendly qualities - Easy to use operator panel with multi-language support - Triple Ultrasonic Double Feed Detection with Intelligent MultiFeed Function and retain image feature - 500-page automatic document feeder with adjustable height hopper - Reduce document preparation and produce outstanding image quality with VRS 4.5 Professional - Full suite of bundled software and industry-leading third party interoperability - Maintain optimal up-time and peak performance with Fujitsu service and support

description-en_US-mobile: NetCam HD - 2MP, 1/3.2 CMOS, Wi-Fi 802.11b/g/n, H.264, 1280x720, -38 dB
description-en_US-print: Watch Your Home in Vivid HD from Mobile Devices Not only does the Belkin NetCam HD allow you to keep tabs on kids or pets from your smartphone or tablet--it also allows you to see all the action in vibrant 720p HD video. Ideal for anyone who has kids, pets, or grandparents at home, the camera captures smooth video and crisp digital audio that makes you feel like you're right there with them. You can watch and hear all the fun on your mobile device, wherever you go. The Next Best Thing to Being There You'll see the HD difference the moment you start watching on your tablet or smartphone. The video is exceptionally smooth, and the details and color are so vivid you'll feel like you never left home. With standard-definition video quickly becoming obsolete, the Belkin NetCam HD ensures that you can take full advantage of your mobile device's high-definition video and audio capabilities. Effortless Setup--No Computer Required Forget hassling with installation CDs and complicated user manuals. All you have to do to get the Belkin NetCam HD up and running is download the free NetCam app to your mobile device. The camera connects to your home's Wi-Fi router and starts streaming video and audio to your smartphone or tablet. You don't even need a computer or laptop. See Everything with Wide-Angle Lens and Night Vision The camera's wide-view lens is ideal for monitoring a large living room or backyard. Additionally, night vision lets you watch after dark or in dim lighting, which is particularly useful for monitoring a child's nursery or bedroom during naptime. Record Remotely to Capture Memorable Moments Whether you're missing a party or playtime back at home, the Belkin NetCam HD has you covered. With the help of the free NetCam app, you can choose to record the sights and sounds directly to your mobile device. The camera's HD video and digital audio keep your recordings crisp and clear, making them more fun to watch again later. Receive Email or Text Alerts When Motion Detected The NetCam app also gives you the option of receiving email or text alerts whenever the camera detects movement. If the kids are asleep, you can stop watching and wait for a text or email notification before you tune in. Compatible with Apple and Android Devices The Belkin NetCam HD works with the following Apple devices with iOS 4.2 or higher: iPod touch, iPhone, and iPad. It also works with Android devices with version 2.2 or higher. A Wi-Fi router with an Internet connection is required.
name: Belkin F7D7602

description-en_US-print: Capture Full HD movies without ever worrying about camera shake with the LEGRIA HF R406. Get closer with 53x Advanced zoom and create movies that sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake by detecting the scene and automatically selecting from four stabilisation modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. The advanced dynamic mode corrects roll and tilt movements that can occur when walking, ensuring sharp steady videos in every situation. 53x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS A genuine Canon HD video lens with 53x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV. Baby Mode Capture your childs first steps, first words, or many other firsts with Baby Mode. Register your childs date of birth in-camera, and add colourful stamps for height and weight. All footage will automatically be sorted to the baby album. Advanced image processing The powerful DIGIC DV4 imaging processor ensures higher image quality in low light and a substantial reduction in image distortion as it works together with the optical image stabiliser. Superb quality recording Bring out the best of Full HD with progressive recording at the highest rates for AVCHD(28Mbps) and MP4 (35Mbps). Whether youre showcasing or sharing, simply select the ideal format and choose from a range of recording rates. Audio Scene Select Its simple to make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select. Just select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically to match the scene youre shooting. So whether youre filming speech at a wedding or music at a concert, you can enjoy immersive, realistic audio. Fingertip control Smooth operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm capacitive touch screen LCD, which gives you intuitive control of settings and simplifies playback. Opening the LCD panel quick starts the camcorder, so youll never miss a moment. Cinema-Look filters; Touch Decoration Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 7 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF R406 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card which are available in a wide range of sizes allowing you to capture hours of footage.
name: Canon LEGRIA 8155B015 hand-held camcorder

description-de_DE-mobile: HP Scanjet N6350 Networked Document Flatbed Scanner
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Vielfltige moderne Dokumentenerfassungstools knnen ber das Wired-Ethernet-Netzwerk gemeinsam genutzt werden: So arbeiten Teams und Bros noch produktiver. Umfangreiche Dokumente lassen sich ein- oder beidseitig in einem Durchgang scannen und via Netzwerkordner oder E-Mail verteilen.

Features
Robuste, vielseitige Leistung fr mehrere Anwender dank integrierter Netzwerktechnologie.
• Mehrere Anwender knnen moderne Scan-Tools gemeinsam nutzen der Scanner muss nur an ein Ethernet-Netzwerk angeschlossen werden. IT-Know-how ist nicht erforderlich. Problemloses Verteilen und Versenden digitaler Dateien ber den PC direkt vom Scanner aus. Optionale PIN-Sicherheit. ISIS-, TWAIN- und WIA-Treiber.

Dank autom. Dokumentenzufhrung mit Duplexfunktion werden auch mehrseitige Dokumente schnell und zuverlssig gescannt.
• Hhere Produktivitt im Bro: Dokumente werden automatisch erfasst. Autom. Dokumentenzufhrung bietet Platz fr bis zu 50 Blatt. Scangeschwindigkeit: bis zu 15 S./Min. oder 6 Bilder/Min. Visitenkarten, geheftete Dokumente, Fotos und Kleinbilddias/Negative knnen mithilfe des Flachbettscanners verarbeitet werden.

Benutzerfreundliche Kurzbefehle und automatische Bildoptimierung fr noch effektiveres Scannen.
• Eine aufgabenbasierte Benutzeroberflche und Direkttasten fr Scannen und Kopieren verbessern die Effizienz1. Fr Alltagsaufgaben (z. B. Scannen in PDF) lassen sich Kurzbefehle festlegen. Automatisches Begradigen, Zuschneiden, Drehen und Color-Dropout fr noch przisere OCR.

1 Gescannte Bilder lassen sich ber den vorhandenen Standarddrucker ausgeben
description-en_US-mobile: HP Scanjet N6350 Networked Document Flatbed Scanner
description-en_US-print:
Overview
Enhance workteam or office productivity share a range of advanced document capture tools over your wired Ethernet network. Automatically scan multi-page documents single or double-sided and share to networked folders or via email.

Features
Share robust, versatile performance across multiple users via integrated networking.
• Share advanced scanning tools between multiple users just connect to an existing Ethernet network, no IT expertise necessary. Easy sharing and sending of digital files direct from the scanner. Optional PIN security. ISIS, TWAIN and WIA drivers.

Scan multi-page documents quickly and reliably with the duplex automatic document feeder.
• Boost office productivity with unattended document capture. Load up to 50-sheets into the automatic document feeder and scan at up to 15 ppm/6 ipm. Handle business cards, stapled documents, photos and slides/negatives using the flatbed scanner.

Streamline your scanning processes with easy shortcuts and automatic image enhancement.
• Improve efficiency with a task-based user interface and one-touch scan and copy1 buttons. Set shortcuts to common tasks such as scan-to-PDF. Automatically deskew, crop and rotate, and choose colour drop-out to improve OCR accuracy.

1 Print a copy of a scanned image to an existing default printer
description-fr_FR-mobile: HP Scanjet N6350 Networked Document Flatbed Scanner
description-fr_FR-print:
Overview
Amliorez le travail en quipe ou la productivit au bureau: partagez un ventail d'outils de capture de documents avancs sur votre rseau Ethernet filaire. Numrisez automatiquement des documents de plusieurs pages (recto ou recto verso) et partagez-les sur des dossiers en rseau ou par e-mail.

Features
Partagez des performances solides et polyvalentes entre plusieurs utilisateurs grce la fonction rseau intgre.
• Partagez des outils de numrisation avancs entre plusieurs utilisateurs: il suffit de vous connecter un rseau Ethernet existant, aucune expertise informatique n'est ncessaire. Partage et envoi aiss de fichiers numriques directement partir du scanner. Scurit avec PIN en option. Pilotes ISIS, TWAIN et WIA.

Numrisez des documents de plusieurs pages de faon rapide et fiable avec le chargeur automatique de documents recto verso.
• Augmentez la productivit au bureau avec la capture de document sans surveillance. Chargez jusqu' 50feuilles dans le chargeur automatique de documents et numrisez une vitesse pouvant atteindre 15ppm/6ipm. Traitez les cartes de visite, les documents agrafs, les photos et les diapositives/ngatifs sur le scanner plat.

Rationalisez vos processus de numrisation avec des raccourcis et l'amlioration automatique d'image.
• Amliorez l'efficacit avec une interface utilisateur reposant sur des tches et des boutons de numrisation et copie1. Dfinissez des raccourcis vers des tches courantes telles que la numrisation vers PDF. Ralisez automatiquement la correction d'alignement, le rognage et la rotation, et choisissez le dtourage de couleur pour amliorer la prcision de reconnaissance des caractres.

1 Imprimez une copie d'une image numrise sur une imprimante par dfaut existante
name: HP Scanjet N6350

Zu den weiteren Optionen zhlen Netzwerkscan und Netzwerkdruck, doppelseitige Drucke und Heftung. Welche Anforderungen Sie also auch immer haben, mit diesen Kompaktgerten knnen Sie auf professionelle Leistung und berragende Ergebnisse vertrauen. Ausgezeichnete Zuverlssigkeit und unbertroffener Support Die verbesserte Lebensdauer und Betriebsfhigkeit garantieren dauerhaft hochwertige Ausdrucke und ein sorgloses Arbeiten. Nutzen Sie das herausragende Service- und Supportangebot von Canon mit fachkundiger Installation, Schulung und Vor-Ort-Service sowie festgelegten SLAs (Service Level Agreements). ber die Abrechnung per Klick zahlen Sie nur fr tatschlich gedruckte Seiten, sodass Sie immer die volle Kontrolle ber Ihre Kosten haben. Herausragender Kundenservice von A bis Z ist unsere oberste Prioritt, daher sind 93 %* unserer Kunden mit der Reparaturzeit fr ihre Brosysteme zufrieden. Geringere Umweltbelastung Diese ENERGY STAR-Modelle bieten eine beeindruckende Energieeffizienz mit einem Energieverbrauch von nur 4,5 Watt im Schlaf-Modus. Damit sparen Sie Energie und Kosten. Die Fixier-Technologie ohne Vorwrmzeiten von Canon ermglicht ein sofortiges Aufwrmen aus dem Ruhezustand, sodass die Produktivitt von den Energiesparfunktionen nicht beeintrchtigt wird. * Laut einer Umfrage zur Servicezufriedenheit von TNS NIPO. description-en_US-mobile: imageRUNNER 2420, Mono Laser Multifunctional, Copy, Local (USB) Print, Optional Network Print, Scan, 20ppm/cpm, 7.9 s, 150 Mhz, 64 MB, A3, USB 2.0, LCD,
description-en_US-print: Compact, cost-effective black and white copiers with local printing The new space-saving range of copiers provides highly efficient copying plus local printing via USB. They are ideal for busy, small workgroups looking for a productive solution with low cost of ownership. Be more productive Users can do more, faster, with the simple and intuitive to use backlit 5-line LCD. With high-quality copies at 20ppm and exceptional responsiveness 7.9 seconds first copy out time the imageRUNNER 2420 saves you time. Scalable to suit your requirements These compact models can be configured to cope with big challenges. With a choice of additional paper drawers, you can select the capacity that best suits your needs up to 1,080 sheets, in a variety of paper sizes up to A3. Other options include network printing and scanning, double-sided output and stapling. So whatever your needs, you can expect professional performance and the superb results you require. Excellent reliability and support Continuous high-quality output and peace of mind are provided with improved durability and serviceability. Canons world class service and support provides expert installation, training and on-site services, plus pre-determined Service Level Agreements. With click charging you only pay for what you actually print, which helps you gain a greater control of costs. Excellent total customer service is our priority 93%* of customers are satisfied with the time it took to repair their equipment. Lower environmental impact These ENERGY STAR qualified models offer impressive energy efficiency, as low as 4.5 watts power consumption in sleep mode, to save energy and cost. With Canons On-Demand fixing technology there is rapid recovery from sleep mode, so you can save energy without affecting productivity. *Based on TNS NIPO, post service visit survey. Data from January to July 2009. 16,059 customers took part. The image shown above is the device with optional paper cassettes.

Le service et la maintenance de niveau international de Canon garantissent l'installation par des experts, la formation et les interventions sur site, ainsi que des contrats de niveau de service prdtermins. Grce au calcul forfaitaire du cot par page, vous ne payez que ce que vous imprimez. Ainsi, vous contrlez mieux les cots. Avec la technologie de fixation la demande de Canon, la rcupration est rapide aprs le mode veille : ainsi, vous pouvez conomiser l'nergie sans affecter la productivit. *D'aprs une enqute post-visite d'entretien TNS NIPO. And, with Bluetooth 3.0 and the advanced apt-X codec, you can enjoy it all with high sound-quality and fast data-streaming. description-en_US-mobile: 3-in-1: print/copy/scan, 1200 x 600 dpi, 23ppm, 65 MB, LCD, USB 2.0, 43 dB, 11.5kg, Black
description-en_US-print: Stylish and compact This multifunctional offers high quality print, copy and scan functionality in one space saving, highly affordable package. With its small footprint and stylish all black design, its a welcome addition to any desk and is ideal for use at home or in the office. Superior image quality An enhanced print resolution of up to 1200 x 600 dpi delivers professional laser output for all your work, with sharp text and fine graphics. 35-sheet Automatic Document Feeder Copy and scan multiple page documents quickly and easily with the 35-sheet Automatic Document Feeder. Easy to use The i-SENSYS MF4430 features a simple and intuitive LCD interface designed for easy operation. With 5 lines of text plus animations, features can be quickly and easily accessed and more information can be communicated saving time and effort. Save time and energy With an output speed of 23 ppm and a Fast First Copy Out Time of less than 9 seconds, prints and copies are delivered the moment you need them. With quick recovery from sleep mode, thanks to Quick First-Print technologies, long waits for your documents are a thing of the past. Additionally, this economical device uses only 3 watts in sleep mode, ensuring energy efficiency. Versatile colour scanning Scanning colour documents and photos is easy and highly versatile using a resolution as high as 9600 x 9600 dpi. Files can be scanned directly to email, or searchable PDF using the MF Toolbox, enabling them to be quickly retrieved in the future. All-in-One cartridge The All-In-One recyclable cartridge ensures maintenance-free operation and continuous high quality output. Replace the compact cartridge in seconds containing toner, drum and cleaning units with an Authentic Canon Laser Cartridge and your multifunctional is as good as new.
name: Canon i-SENSYS MF4430

description-de_DE-mobile: fi-6670, CCD, 600 DPI, A8-A3, SCSI, USB 2.0, 53 dB, 216 W, 17 kg, Schwarz/Wei
description-de_DE-print:
Verbessern Sie Ihre Produktivitt mit fortschrittlicher Scanner-Intelligenz und hherer Verarbeitungsgeschwindigkeit
Die automatische Einzugsvorrichtung kann bis zu 200 Bltter gleichzeitig aufnehmen und lsst Ihnen somit die Freiheit, andere Dinge zu tun. Der Fllschacht kann sowohl rechteckige als auch gefcherte Papierstapel aufnehmen und hilft dadurch, Papierstau zu vermeiden und die Scanner-Produktivitt zu erhhen.

Darber hinaus kann der fi-6670 Bltter mit einer Lnge von bis zu drei Metern scannen. Somit knnen Elektrokardiogramme, Instrumentenausdrucke und lange Dokumente digitalisiert werden. Die Ausrstung mit VRS Professional (Softwareversion) garantiert beste Bildqualitt und zudem einfache Handhabung des Scanners und des Papiers. Der fi-6670 wird auch zusammen mit ScandAll PRO Bilderfassungssoftware ausgeliefert, die die folgenden Merkmale bietet:

Automatische Job-Trennung
Die mit dem fi-6670 ausgelieferte Barcode- und Patchcode-Lesefunktion ermglicht es dem Gert, verschiedene Jobs mit der automatischen Job-Trennungsfunktion zu trennen. Das Ergebnis ist eine verbesserte Digitalisierungseffizienz.

Nahtlose Verbindung zu Microsoft Office SharePoint Server
ScandAll PRO ermglicht dem fi-6670 die nahtlose Verbindung zu Microsoft Office SharePoint Server fr einfache gemeinsame Benutzung und Sichtungsverwaltung digitalisierter Dokumente. Das Ergebnis ist eine noch einfachere Dokumentenverwaltung. Der fi-6670 verfgt ber zwei "intelligente" High-End-Funktionen der fi-Reihe, die es erlauben, gemischte Dokumentbndel mit verschiedenen Papierstrken, Qualitten und Formaten effizient zu scannen.

Intelligente Mehrfachzufuhrfunktion
Die intelligente Mehrfachzufuhrfunktion vereinfacht die Scan-Vorbereitung und verbessert die Effizienz, indem sie Dokumente ignoriert, die dazu neigen, falsche Mehrfachzufuhralarme auszulsen, z.B. Fotos und Haftnotizen auf Dokumenten. Funktionen fr trapezfrmige Dokumente und Dokumente mit Haftnotizen und zur Entfernung von Stanzlchern Neben einer Funktion, die sicherstellt, dass trapezfrmige Dokumente und Dokumente mit Reitern oder Haftnotizen komplett gescannt werden, bietet der fi-6670 eine Funktion, die runde oder rechteckige Stanzlochbilder entfernt, die beim Scannen von losen Blttern, Kurierdienstformularen und hnlichen Dokumenten entstehen.

description-en_US-print: Intelligent scanning for the intelligent office - Fast scanning up to 90 ppm/180 ipm in color or monochrome, landscape - Ultrasonic double-feed detection with advanced control - Loaded with "intelligent" functions for more efficient scanning - Advanced image processing in hardware with color graphics adapter (CGA) - Valuable bundled software tools and applications including Kofax VRS 4.5 Professional - Service options to fit specific requirements and budget including Next Business Day, 4-hour or 24/7 contracts available

description-fr_FR-print:
Augmentez la rentabilit de la production grce  une intelligence de numrisation et une vitesse de traitement avances
Son chargeur automatique accueille jusqu' 200 pages, vous pouvez ainsi disposer de votre temps pour d'autres tches. Le bac papier accepte  la fois des piles de papier dram ou de type dos carr contribuant ainsi  liminer les bourrages papier et  accrotre la productivit globale du scanner.
De plus, le fi-6670 peut numriser des supports pouvant atteindre 3m, tels que les lectrocardiogrammes, les mesures de donnes d'appareillage et tout autre document de cette longueur.
VRS Professional (version logicielle) assurera une qualit d'image optimale ainsi qu'une simplification de la numrisation et de la manipulation du papier.
Le fi-6670 est aussi dot du logiciel de capture d'images ScandAll PRO, offrant les fonctionnalits suivantes:

Sparation automatique des tches
Sa capacit de lecture des codes barre et des codes patch  permet au fi-6670 de procder  la sparation automatique des tches et par corollaire, de bnficier dun plus grand rendement en termes de numrisation.

Interfaage sans problme avec Microsoft Office SharePoint Server
ScandAll PRO permet un interfaage sans problme de fi-6670 avec Microsoft Office SharePoint Server pour faciliter le partage et la visualisation des documents numriss. Il en dcoule une meilleure gestion des documents.

Le fi-6670 est lui-mme quip de deux fonctions de pointe fi-Series  intelligentes  qui lui permettent de numriser des lots de documents mixtes, contenant des papiers de grammage, de qualit et de dimensions diffrents.

Fonction intelligente de dtection de chargements multiples
Cette fonctionnalit simplifie la prparation prcdant la numrisation et en amliore lefficacit en ne tenant pas compte des documents tendant  dclencher les fausses alertes d'un mauvais chargement, tels que des photos et des notes autocollantes jointes  des documents.

Fonctionnalit de gommage des perforations et de recadrage des documents fixs  l'aide d'un onglet ou en oblique
Outre la fonctionnalit garantissant la numrisation intgrale des documents en oblique ainsi que des informations indiques sur une note autocollante ou indexes par un onglet, le fi-6670 offre galement une fonction de suppression des trous circulaires et angulaires laisss lors de la numrisation de feuilles volantes perfores, de circulaires et de tout autre document similaire.
name: Fujitsu fi-6670

description-en_US-mobile: 119.38 cm (47 ") LED Full HD, 1920 x 1080, 100Hz, DLNA, USB 2.0, 3x HDMI 1.4, 15.4kg, Black
description-en_US-print: Super-slim, eco-friendly and with a sharper, more detailed picture and stunning contrasts ratio, LED TV is a revolution in image quality and design and its low profile makes it perfect for wall-mounting. INCREDIBLE CLARITY, VIBRANT COLOURS FULL HD 1080p provides the pinnacle of picture resolution with incredible clarity and vibrant colours. With up to five times the resolution compared to standard definition TVs and twice that of HD-Ready TVs, FULL HD 1080p is the only way to enjoy the full potential of Blu-ray and HD gaming. A TVs motion clarity index (MCI) gives you a comprehensive indicator of its ability to handle fast motion without blurring. LGs expertise here makes good use of detailed backlight scanning, advanced local dimming and a powerful clarity engine to deliver a lifelike, detailed picture every time. ECO-FRIENDLY REVOLUTION LG Intelligent Sensor technology automatically finds the optimal brightness, sharpness, colour and contrast picture settings to enhance the picture quality and reduce power consumption. SEAMLESS NETWORKING Create a home network to talk to your PC, digital camera, mobile phone and even Blu-ray player. This connection to multiple DLNA certified devices anywhere in your home lets you to watch your favourite media directly on the big screen (ethernet connection from TV to Router required) High-Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI) carries both sound and picture in a single cable from your devices to your high definition TV. Now you can easily connect your games console, satellite box, Blu-ray or Home Cinema System through the three HDMI ports for a true high definition entertainment experience Connect your digital camera, M-P-3 player or USB stick through the USB port to show off your latest holiday snaps, music collection or High Definition movies for a true multimedia experience. Get ready for the digital switch-over. All LG TVs come with built-in Digital Freeview making sure you're ready for the digital switch-over. With LG TVs you'll have access to over 40 Freeview TV and radio channels, 8 day on-screen guide and access to digital interactive services. Smart Energy Saving technology controls the brightness of the TV to reduce the power consumption and therefore help you save money off your electricity bills. The Screen-Off function even lets you listen to music from the TV whilst the screen is off
name: LG 47LS5600 LED TV

description-en_US-mobile: FinePix Z1000EXR - 1/2" CMOS, 16MP, 4608 x 3456, 5x optical, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") touch LCD, SD/SDHC/SDXC, USB 2.0, 141g, Pink
description-en_US-print: Fujifilm FinePix Z1000EXR: Stay connected in style Fujifilms Z-series cameras have always combined the very latest in style with cutting-edge technology, and the new FinePix Z1000EXR is no exception. The cameras super-stylish exterior contains a premium 16 megapixel EXR-CMOS sensor and Fujifilms latest imaging technologies for great results every time. In addition, the FinePix Z1000EXR adds a Wireless Image Transfer function that allows users to connect their Android smartphone/tablet or iPhone/iPad with the camera and upload high-quality images to social networking sites in seconds. Perfect pictures, every time The FinePix Z1000EXRs 16 mega-pixel EXR-CMOS sensor helps users to always get great results, regardless of the conditions. The EXR-CMOS sensor has also been redesigned to prioritise light sensitivity with a 30% reduction in digital noise over its predecessor, ensuring smoother tones in both highlight and shadow areas at higher ISO settings. Fujifilms acclaimed EXR AUTO mode assesses the amount of available light, establishes the type of scene, tracks motion and locates any people within the frame before applying Advanced Anti Blur technology and choosing one of three optimised settings: High Resolution Priority mode for well-lit subjects and optimum image quality, Dynamic Range Priority mode for scenes of high-contrast or High Sensitivity and Low Noise Priority mode for smooth, sharp images taken in dark environments. Users can also choose to select the modes themselves, but with EXR Auto modes 103 different shooting patterns that can be applied to a scene, its unlikely theyll need to! Always connected With the FinePix Z1000EXR, fast image upload to social networking sites no longer means low quality pictures. The camera can be connected with any Android smartphone/tablet or iPhone/iPad via the simple download of the "FUJIFILM Photo Receiver" free app to their device, which includes easy to follow instructions to get them quickly connected. To start uploading, users press the FinePix Z1000EXRs touch icon to connect to their smartphone and the images can be transferred to Android smartphone/tablet or iPhone/iPad ready for uploading to social networking sites. Despite the advanced imaging technology contained within the FinePix Z1000EXR, the cameras menu system is designed to be both intuitive and easy to operate. The FinePix Z1000EXRs wide 3.5-inch LCD offers touchscreen control with multi-touch capabilities for smartphone-style navigation. Whats more, the screen offers a 460,000 dots resolution for exceptional clarity when reviewing images and movie or composing a shot. Capture the perfect face In addition to the advanced imaging technologies offered by the FinePix Z1000EXR, the camera also contains several features for improving the appearance of people in their photographs. Face tracking combines Face Detection with Tracking Auto Focus to ensure any faces in a scene are always sharp, no matter where they move. The camera itself has a wide-angle Frame Assist Mirror located and specially engineered to show the whole of a scene to assist users when framing a shot of themselves. If theres more than one person to capture on camera, the FinePix Z1000EXR offers innovative image timer technology for both couples and groups: activating Couple Timer and the camera waits until two faces are close together before capturing an image, while Self-portrait Timer detects up to four individual faces, giving friends and family time to get ready for their close-up. The beautification doesnt stop when the shutter buttons pressed. After capture, users can choose to apply face retouching functions (Skin smoothing/brighten) to improve appearance even further. Choose your own shooting style The FinePix Z1000EXR isnt just about still images it also offers Full 1080p HD movie capture at a rate of 30fps for smooth and clear movies. Face Tracking Auto Focus locks on to any faces in the scene and will keep them sharp throughout filming, regardless of motion or the user recomposing the shot using the cameras Fujinon 5x optical zoom lens. Stereo sound capture adds more realism to movies captured on the camera, and both stills and movie can be reviewed on an HD ready TV - when connected using the cameras mini HDMI output. When capturing still images, the optical zoom lens range can be extended using the cameras Intelligent Digital Zoom function. This assesses the zones of the photo and selectively applies image processing to increase the length of zoom to 10x without reduction in quality thats normally associated with digital zoom enhancement. And if users want to get closer, the FinePix Z1000EXR offers a minimum focusing distance of 9cm for macro pictures full of colour and sharp detail. Substance and style It may be packed with innovative photographic technology, but the FinePix Z1000EXR doesnt compromise on appearances. Even though its only 18mm thick at its thickest point, the FinePix Z1000EXR appears even more sleek, streamlined and ready for anything.
name: Fujifilm FinePix Z1000EXR

Image quality is unsurpassed, thanks to the camcorder's newly designed, professional-level Canon HD CMOS Pro Image Sensor. The high-sensitivity sensor provides outstanding resolution, better low-light performance, and beautiful, natural detail in both shadow and highlight areas. Intelligent IS and SuperRange Optical Image Stabilization designed for the Genuine Canon 10x HD Video Lens make every scene clear and steady, and new built-in features make it easy to give your videos added creativity. Operation is fun and simple with a Flat Touch Panel LCD you'll control with your fingertips. This camcorder has the flexibility you crave: enjoy the convenience of recording in AVCHD or MP4 format to the internal flash drive or to a removable SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card. And now with built-in Wi-Fi, you can immediately upload video from the camcorder directly to social networking sites via CANON iMAGE GATEWAY, or your own home computer. You can also choose to upload video to your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch by installing the Canon Movie Uploader app, and enjoy wireless viewing on your DLNA-compatible TV.

description-en_US-mobile: Experience modern design that stands out and feels natural.
description-en_US-print:
The Series 7 LED monitors stunning curves and premium look are warm as well as edgy. With Mobile High-Definition Link, built-in stereo speakers and Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio youll enjoy optimised multimedia from mobiles or PCs. Inputs like 2HDMI deliver all your content, and Eco Saving lowers costs. The LED Monitor Series 7 brings harmony to your viewing and environment.
The total audio-video solution with built-in speakers
With a built-in Samsung Stereo Speaker, a 5 Way Speaker delivers high-quality stereo sound and a richer multimedia experience. Youll enjoy enhanced movies and music, as if you were in a theatre or concert, thanks to Samsungs outstanding audio. Experience total convenience and make the most of home or office space with cost-efficient built-in speakers.
Enhance viewing from mobile to monitor
With Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL), experience entertainment with full-size monitor luxury and higher-quality HD viewing. MHL lets you watch video and other content on the move, then easily connect the mobile device to a monitor with the included cable. You can finish viewing in stunning HD anywhere you want, and charge devices while connected, too. Combine portability with home comfort for an optimised view.
Captivate the senses with stunning curves
Choose a monitor with a premium aesthetic that will brighten up any surroundings. Elegant curvilinear design and a harmonious blend of black and white offer an organic look that appears warmer and more natural than other monitors. This combination of straight lines and gentle contours was developed to be more appealing. So, blend minimalism with stylish curves and discover the future of monitor design.
Expand your experience with various inputs
Why not bring more than just your favourite films to life? Samsung LED Monitor Series 7 2HDMI with its wide range of inputs ensures that everything from gaming to chatting with friends online is easily achieved. The various inputs such as DP, HDMI and DVI, ensure that your monitor is more compatible and ready to handle all of your content.
Control power consumption, conserve energy
Eco Saving makes saving energy easy. It adjusts the brightness of your Samsung monitor based on the amount of energy you want to save. Choose from three energy saving modes (50%, 25% and Power Saving off) to tailor your monitor use. By consuming 50% less, you can really make a positive impact on your eco footprint. Take the effort out of saving energy and take control with Eco Saving.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Le S27B750 est un moniteur LED cologique et conomique avec un temps de rponse exceptionnel de 2 ms, des haut-parleurs intgrs et la fonction MHL pour profiter du contenu de votre tlphone portable ou tablette sur grand cran.
description-fr_FR-print:
Une solution complte avec haut-parleurs intgrs
Les haut-parleurs intgrs de 5 watts dlivrent un son stro de haute qualit pour une exprience multimdia accrue. Vous redcouvrirez vos films et vos musiques comme si vous tiez au cinma ou dans une salle de concert. Pratiques et conomiques, les enceintes intgres permettent de profiter dun son de qualit la maison ou au bureau.
Le moniteur de votre Smartphone
Grce la technologie MHL (Mobile High-Definition Link), faites lexprience indite dafficher vos contenus mobiles sur grand cran en HD. La technologie MHL vous permet de regarder des vidos, dafficher des photos et de jouer simplement en connectant votre tlphone compatible Android laide du cble fourni. La technologie MHL permet de profiter des contenus tout en rechargeant la batterie du tlphone. Combinez mobilit et plaisir dtre la maison pour une exprience enrichie en confort.
Captivez les sens grce un design hors normes
Egayez votre intrieur avec un moniteur lesthtique haut de gamme. Son design lgant et futuriste est un mlange harmonieux de noir et de blanc offrant un rendu plus agrable et naturel. Cette combinaison de lignes droites et de contours purs a t dveloppe pour relever son originalit. Au final, mlangez simplicit et lgance pour dcouvrir lavenir du design des moniteurs.
Une exprience sans limite grce de nombreuses entres vido
Ne vous limitez plus seulement vos films prfrs ! Les moniteurs Samsung srie 7 possdent 2 entres HDMI ainsi quun large ventail dentres permettant tous les usages : jeux vido, photos, vido, chaque exprience devient intense et incroyablement vivante. Les diffrentes entres telles que Display Port, HDMI et DVI, assurent une parfaite compatibilit de votre moniteur tous vos priphriques.
Contrlez la luminosit tout en conomisant de l'nergie
La fonction Magic Eco vous permet dconomiser facilement de lnergie. En effet, elle ajuste la luminosit du moniteur Samsung en fonction de la quantit dnergie que vous souhaitez conomiser. Vous avez quatre possibilits : consommation nergtique de 100% ou 75%, 50% et sans conomie dnergie. Si la fonction Magic Eco est dsactive, vous pouvez recourir la technologie Magic Bright de Samsung pour ajuster manuellement la luminosit de lcran. Prenez les commandes avec MagicEco et conomisez de lnergie en toute simplicit.

description-en_US-mobile: Alpha 77 - 24.3MP, 23.5 X 15.6mm CMOS, 6000 x 3376, 0.50" XGA OLED Viewfinder, Full HD Movie, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT LCD, USB 2.0, HDMI, 653g + 18-135mm
description-en_US-print: Never miss another shot. Whether you're shooting a sequence of your preschooler's somersault, or the game-changing instant when ball meets bat, the 77 flawlessly captures fast action and fleeting moments with up to 12 fps continuous shootingall at full 24.3-megapixel resolution with uninterrupted auto focus. And packed with cutting-edge technologieslike the world's first OLED electronic viewfinder2 and Sony's award-winning Translucent Mirror Technologyit's easier than ever to capture professional-grade photos that burst with unimaginable richness, clarity and detail. Spectacular 24.3MP Resolution Capture incredibly-detailed images that make for gorgeous enlargements thanks to an impressive 24.3- megapixel sensorthe world's first among APS-C DSLR cameras. With resolution this high, each shot captures a massive amount of detail for greatly reduced noise and vibrant images that explode with clarity and richness. Ultra High Speed Shooting Introducing the world's fastest DSLR. By harnessing the power of Sony's Translucent Mirror Technology, you can shoot up to 12 fps at full 24.3-megapixel resolution with continuous auto focus. It's perfect for snapping a unique sequence of photos or capturing the defining moment in high-speed sports photography. World's First OLED Viewfinder There's never been anything like the Tru-Finder OLED electronic viewfinder. Boasting 2359K dots for ultra-high resolution, images pop with richness, clarity and detail. A high contrast ratio lends superb depth, while motion blur is reduced to a minimum. You can even see the results of camera adjustments in real time through the viewfinder. Amazing HD Movies The choice is yours. Shoot super smooth 60p, standard 60i or cinematic 24p moviesall at Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution4. Capture high-quality AVCHD video that looks great on your HDTV, or shoot MP4 videos to upload to the web. Plus, maintain creative control of your movies with access to shutter priority, aperture priority, manual mode and more. Rugged Magnesium Alloy Body Don't let its pretty face fool you. With a strong-yet-lightweight magnesium alloy body, the 77 delivers on the promise of its good looks with the strength and rugged reliability your active lifestyle demands. Plus, all ports, doors and controls are weather-resistant for worry-free shooting, come rain or shine. Incredible Speed and Precision Some DSLRs can shoot. Others can focus with the speed and precision of Phase Detection AF. The 77 does both at once. Infused with the latest version of Sony's award-winning Translucent Mirror Technology, light is directed to the image sensor and Phase Detection AF sensor simultaneously for ultra-fast shooting up to 12 fps with continuous auto focus.
name: Sony Alpha 77 + 18-135mm

description-en_US-print:
Until now, color added high cost as well as impact to your documents. OKI C9300 Digital Color printers can lower your expenses and increase your productivity.

These wide-format color printers are the efficient and affordable answer, especially if presentations, ad layouts, spreadsheets, large photos and illustrations, signs, posters or banners are part of your business.
No more running down to the corporate or neighborhood copy center every time you need ledger-size color documentsor postcard-size or any size up to 12.9" by 47.24" banners! You can simply print them in-house. OKI C9300 printers are available with MonacoEZmatch color matching software1 to ensure accurate and consistent color whenever its required.

OKI Single Pass Color Digital technology and long-lasting, individually replaceable OKI toner cartridges and image drums mean fewer interventionsi.e. more productivityand a lower cost per printed page than color laser printers, solid ink or inkjet printers and, especially, outside copy services.

Further, the cost of a black-and-white page is comparable to that of most mono laser printersso you can use OKI C9300 color printers for all your business printing.

description-en_US-print: Streamlined Reliability A smart, reliable option for bringing duplex printing, copying, scanning and high-speed faxing into one machine, with up to 40 ppm and the ability to scan documents straight to e-mail or a flash drive. As Easy as It Gets Right out of the box, youll power through tasks at exceptionally fast speedsup to 40 ppm. Its a breeze to set up, install, and start enjoying the benefit of doing all those multiple tasks on one user-friendly machine. Smarter Printer, Smarter Business The large LCD color touch screen offers amazingly simple access to a rich range of features, including duplex scanning, advanced copying and easy user authorization for enhanced security. You can even customize the touch screen to meet your workgroups specific needs. Small in Size, Huge on Features Enjoy an intelligent, efficient combination of built-in features like duplex printing, copying and scanning plus a front Direct USB port. Gives you the ability to scan to multiple destinations, letting your workgroup breeze through intense workloads. Save the Earth and Money Lower your cost per page while helping conserve resources with up to 9,000*-page or 15,000*-page replacement cartridges. Add that to the automatic duplex printing and the energy savings of consolidating to one smart device, and youre taking big steps toward an eco-conscious workplace. (*Declared yield in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752.)

description-en_US-mobile: Colour, 9600 x 600dpi, 24ppm, 250-Sheet In, 150-Sheet Out, CPU ARM11 533MHz / ARM9 150MHz, 256MB, 2-Line LCD, USB 2.0, RJ-45, Gigabit LAN, WLAN 802.11b/g/n, 52dBA, 450W, 20.15kg
description-en_US-print: Easy Mobile Printing Print from your compatible mobile devices in colour easily, quickly and conveniently without the need for installing any print drivers. Easy 3 Step Mobile Printing Samsung's easy 3 step mobile print download and install application*, select device & print file. Fast Mobile Printing Print from all your compatible mobile devices in glorious colour easily, quickly and conveniently. Wi-Fi Direct With Wi-Fi Direct, you can print from your compatible mobile devices even in a non-network environment. Enjoy quality printouts Samsungs unique ReCP (Rendering Engine for Clean Page) Technology helps deliver outstanding quality and vibrancy ,helping to ensure printouts look exceptional. It can automatically sharpen the focus of both graphics and text, while solid objects are overlapped to minimise white gaps. Polymerised toner Our newly developed polymerised toner has small and highly uniform particles. Meaning, your printouts will have crisp lines and vivid colours - helping minimise any paper curling. Also, its high wax content helps improve the image gloss and helps enhance the durability. High power printing performance Lots of power, great productivity With the CLP-680s 533MHz Dual CPU, and 512MB standard memory (expandable up to 1GB) you can be sure that this printer will handle the entire load of your workgroup's printing needs. Speedy and flexible paper handling If you want to print or copy onto heavy weights of paper, you can. Weights of up to 220g/m are handled with ease through the 50 page multipurpose tray. Plus, with the optional 520 sheet second cassette you can increase your total paper input capacity to 820 sheets. That way you can also use up to three different media types with minimal need to waste time changing paper. You can help enhance your productivity further still with the 50 page document feeder that can process single as well as double sided documents automatically. Easy Operating Panel With the CLP-680DW's two line liquid crystal display and intuitive 5 key compass navigation you can control the device's status, browse the menu and access each unique feature with ease. Convenient USB printing With the USB Direct slot located on the front of the device just below the operating panel, you can print from, or scan to, a USB key right from the device, without the need of a computer. Secure, confidential printing Print sensitive data If you need to print sensitive data through your printer, you can relax. Just enter a password, and you can retrieve a print job at your convenience. Being economical and printing vibrant colour documents goes hand in hand Extra high yield Enjoy exceptional colour copies and print-outs while staying in almost complete control. Our specially developed high yield cartridges means ample time between changes. With the integrated duplex feature, minimising paper use is easy. That's because the paper is turned automatically so tha you can print on both sides. Print lots on each page with the N-up and duplex functionality, skip blank pages. Easy Solution support The printer also brings you software support designed to put you in control of delivering exceptional quality printouts. The Easy Eco Driver helps you compile digital documents in multiple formats and makes it easy to share them with others - even through social networks. Easy Colour Manager Create and use your own colour profiles with Samsung's Easy Colour Manager. Match the exact colours of a company logo or simply give your print outs the individual look you want. Take the stress out of print management For outstanding control, Easy Printer Manager lets you manage all your linked devices from one location. Check device and toner status, re-order toner, change device settings or set alerts even through e-mail. Mobile Printing With amazing Samsung Mobile Printing solution, you dont have to install any drivers to your compatible mobile devices. Simply Just Install Samsung Mobile Print application on your mobile devices, and you can print directly from your compatible mobile device. Easy toner replacement Toner cartridge changes are all made easy with a push loading drawer. Whats more, the high yield cartridges mean few changes.
description-fr_FR-print:
nbsp;
Une haute qualit couleur
La technologie ReCP de Samsung (Rendering Engine for Clean Page) offre une qualit d'image suprieure et une meilleure dfinition des caractres pour un rsultat net et prcis. Avec une rsolution de 1200 x 1200 dpi, cette technologie d'image novatrice permet aux utilisateurs de crer des documents professionnels.
Toner polymris nouvelle gnration
La nouvelle gnration de toner Samsung contient des particules plus fines et plus uniformes pour des tracs plus nets et plus prcis. De plus, avec sa formule la cire, il vous garantit durabilit et rendu glossy.
Des performances ingales
La productivit de votre entreprise depend de la performance de votre imprimante. Avec une vitesse d'impression de 24 / 24 pages par minute et un temps de sortie de 1re page de 17 secondes, la CLP-680DW ne vous laissera pas tomber. * Des performances sans compromis Gagnez en productivit grce au double processeur de 533 MHz qui offre une impression et une numrisation rapide. La mmoire de 512 Mo (Max. 1Go) vous permet galement d'imprimer rapidement et en grandes quantit. L'imprimante laser couleur CLP-680DW deviendra trs vite un outil indispensable pour votre bureau.
Une gestion papier simplifie
Il vous est dsormais possible d'imprimer et copier de grands volumes, avec l'imprimante laser couleur CLP-680DW. Cette imprimante dispose d'un bac papier pouvant contenir jusqu' 250 feuilles de 220 g/m2. Augmentez la capacit papier grce au second bac papier (en option) de 520 feuilles en standard et de 820 feuilles maximum. Ne perdez plus de temps changer de bac, la CLP-680DW dispose de 3 types de support.

Fast, reliable and easy to use - Print speeds of 33ppm for time critical print jobs - Built on tried and tested, award winning digital LED technology - Ideal for use by a wide range of organisations thanks to its flexible media handling, from labels to spreadsheets, invoices, proposals, forms, technical drawings and more - Perfect for businesses that require fast mono printing with the added functionality of copying, scanning and faxing Great features to improve workplace productivity The MB461 is packed full of outstanding standard features, including: - 50-sheet RADF enabling you to copy, scan and fax two sided documents - Front facing USB port enabling you to directly print from a USB stick - Overlay function enables you to save logos or forms in the MFP memory, for re-use in other documents - Compatible with mobile printing applications allowing you to print directly from your mobile device over wireless networks Looking after the environment The MB461 is one of the most environmentally conscious A4 mono MFPs on the market, incorporating a wide range of features to help your organisation reduce its energy consumption, impact on the environment and ongoing costs.: - Reduced energy usage through combining several devices in one - Advanced LED technology - Eco and Deep Sleep modes - Reduced toner usage with a Toner Save function, Duplex printing and advanced fax functionality that helps to reduce the amount you print Plus, extra peace of mind We are so confident in the reliability of the MB461 you can benefit from OKIs 3 year warranty at no extra cost by registering your product within 30 days of purchase.

Support for MP4 format ensures quick transfer times of HD movies. Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor The HD CMOS PRO sensor is designed and made by Canon for its professional camcorders. The light gathering area of the pixels is 160% bigger than conventional CMOS sensors, delivering a wider dynamic range and advanced low-light performance. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake. It automatically detects the scene and selects exactly the right optical Image Stabilizer settings from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. It ensures sharp, detailed videos in every situation - leaving you free to concentrate on shooting. Fingertip control Operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm (3.0) gesture-based Touch-screen LCD, which gives you intuitive fingertip control of shooting and playback functions. Effortless shooting Creating high-quality movies is effortless with Smart Auto. Fully automatic, it intelligently selects shooting settings from 38 scenes. description-de_DE-mobile: fi-6670A, CCD, 600 DPI, 31 - 209 g/m, A8-A3, USB 2.0/1.1, SCSI, 53 dB, 216 W, 17 kg, Schwarz/Wei
description-de_DE-print:
Verbessern Sie Ihre Produktivitt mit fortschrittlicher Scanner-Intelligenz und hherer Verarbeitungsgeschwindigkeit

Die automatische Einzugsvorrichtung kann bis zu 200 Bltter gleichzeitig aufnehmen und lsst Ihnen somit die Freiheit, andere Dinge zu tun. Der Fllschacht kann sowohl rechteckige als auch gefcherte Papierstapel aufnehmen und hilft dadurch, Papierstau zu vermeiden und die Scanner-Produktivitt zu erhhen. Darber hinaus kann der fi-6670A Bltter mit einer Lnge von bis zu drei Metern scannen. Somit knnen Elektrokardiogramme, Instrumentenausdrucke und lange Dokumente digitalisiert werden.

Der fi-6670A ist standardmig mit dem Produktionslevel VRS Professional und einem VRS CGA-Board ausgerstet, das eine noch bessere Bildverarbeitungsfunktionalitt und leistung bietet. Seine Fhigkeit, mit diesem CGA-Board schrfere Bilder aus befleckten Dokumenten oder Dokumenten mit dunklem Hintergrund zu erstellen, garantiert hoch effizientes Scannen. Die Ausrstung mit VRS Professional (Softwareversion) garantiert beste Bildqualitt und zudem einfache Handhabung des Scanners und des Papiers. Der fi-6670A wird auch zusammen mit ScandAll PRO Bilderfassungssoftware ausgeliefert, die die folgenden Merkmale bietet:

Automatische Job-Trennung
Die mit dem fi-6770A ausgelieferte Barcode- und Patchcode-Lesefunktion ermglicht es dem Gert, verschiedene Jobs mit der automatischen Job-Trennungsfunktion zu trennen. Das Ergebnis ist eine verbesserte Digitalisierungseffizienz.

Nahtlose Verbindung zu Microsoft Office SharePoint Server
ScandAll PRO ermglicht dem fi-6670A die nahtlose Verbindung zu Microsoft Office SharePoint Server fr einfache gemeinsame Benutzung und Sichtungsverwaltung digitalisierter Dokumente. Das Ergebnis ist eine noch einfachere Dokumentenverwaltung. Der fi-6670A verfgt ber besitzt zwei "intelligente" High-End-Funktionen der fi-Reihe, die es erlauben, gemischte Dokumentbndel mit verschiedenen Papierstrken, Qualitten und Formaten effizient zu scannen.

Intelligente Mehrfachzufuhrfunktion
Die intelligente Mehrfachzufuhrfunktion vereinfacht die Scan-Vorbereitung und verbessert die Effizienz, indem sie Dokumente ignoriert, die dazu neigen, falsche Mehrfachzufuhralarme auszulsen, z.B. Fotos und Haftnotizen auf Dokumenten. Funktionen fr trapezfrmige Dokumente und Dokumente mit Haftnotizen und zur Entfernung von Stanzlchern Neben einer Funktion, die sicherstellt, dass trapezfrmige Dokumente und Dokumente mit Reitern oder Haftnotizen komplett gescannt werden, bietet der fi-6670A eine Funktion, die runde oder rechteckige Stanzlochbilder entfernt, die beim Scannen von losen Blttern, Kurierdienstformularen und hnlichen Dokumenten entstehen.

description-fr_FR-print:
Son chargeur automatique accueille jusqu' 200pages, vous pouvez ainsi disposer de votre temps pour d'autres tches. Le bac papier accepte  la fois des piles de papier dram ou de type dos carr contribuant ainsi  liminer les bourrages papier et  accrotre la productivit globale du scanner.
De plus, le fi-6670A peut numriser des supports pouvant atteindre 3m, tels que les lectrocardiogrammes, les mesures de donnes d'appareillage et tout autre document de cette longueur.
Livr avec un niveau de production VRS Professional par dfaut, le fi-6670A est quip d'une carte de contrleur matriel VRS (CGA Board) qui assure un meilleur traitement de l'image et des performances optimales. Sa capacit  gnrer des images plus nettes  partir de documents tachs ou prsentant des arrire-plans trs sombres grce  la carte CGA garantit une numrisation extrmement rentable. VRS Professional (version logicielle) assurera une qualit d'image optimale ainsi qu'une simplification de la numrisation et de la manipulation du papier.
Le fi-6670A est aussi dot du logiciel de capture d'images ScandAll PRO, offrant les fonctionnalits suivantes:

Sparation automatique des tches
Sa capacit de lecture des codes barre et des codes patch  permet au fi-6670A de procder  la sparation automatique des tches et par corollaire, de bnficier dun plus grand rendement en termes de numrisation.

Interfaage sans problme avec Microsoft Office SharePoint Server
ScandAll PRO permet un interfaage sans problme de fi-6670A avec Microsoft Office SharePoint Server pour faciliter le partage et la visualisation des documents numriss. Il en dcoule une meilleure gestion des documents.
Le fi-6670A est lui-mme quip de deux fonctions de pointe fi-Series  intelligentes  qui lui permettent de numriser des lots de documents mixtes, contenant des papiers de grammage, de qualit et de dimensions diffrents.

Fonction intelligente de dtection de chargements multiples
Cette fonctionnalit simplifie la prparation prcdant la numrisation et en amliore lefficacit en ne tenant pas compte des documents tendant  dclencher les fausses alertes d'un mauvais chargement, tels que des photos et des notes autocollantes jointes  des documents.

Fonctionnalit de gommage des perforations et de recadrage des documents fixs  l'aide d'un onglet ou en oblique
Outre la fonctionnalit garantissant la numrisation intgrale des documents en oblique ainsi que des informations indiques sur une note autocollante ou indexes par un onglet, le fi-6670A offre galement une fonction de suppression des trous circulaires et angulaires laisss lors de la numrisation de feuilles volantes perfores, de circulaires et de tout autre document similaire.

description-de_DE-mobile: MiWand 2L Pro - Flatbed, CIS, 600 x 600 dpi, 4.572 cm (1.8 ") LCD, 1.2 W, Li-ion
description-de_DE-print: - Kein PC ntig - Einfache Bedienung - Ideal zum Scannen von Bchern - Vorschaubild auf dem 1,8-Farb-LCD - Farb- und Schwarz-Wei-Modus - Scannt Farbe A4 in 1,6 Sekunden - Scannen auf das iPad (mit separat erhltlichem Kamera-Kit) - Untersttzt SD - Karten bis zu 32 GB - Scans wahlweise als JPEG oder PDF speichern - 4 GB Micro - SD-Karte im Lieferumfang - Scanauflsung von 600 dpi - Dokumentengre bis 21 35,5 cm - Stromversorgung via Lithium-Ionen Akku (MiWand 2L, MiWand 2L Pro) via AA-Akku (MiWand 2, MiWand 2 Pro) Aufladeoptionen - MiWand 2: Ladegert - MiWand 2 Pro: Ladegert - MiWand 2L: USB - MiWand 2L Pro: Dockingstation (Netzteil), USB - Stromversorgungskabel
description-en_US-mobile: MiWand 2L Pro - Flatbed, CIS, 600 x 600 dpi, 4.572 cm (1.8 ") LCD, 1.2 W, Li-ion
description-en_US-print: A mobile scanner that scans anywhere, anytime Experience the efficiency and convenience of a truly mobile scanner! Powered only by 2x AA alkaline batteries, the MiWand 2 Pro is a mobile scanner that allows you to scan without a computer or software. Simply gliding the scanner over the surface of a page and the scan is done. The images are then saved to a Micro SD card up to 32G. Wireless design, scan images anywhere The brand new portable scanner can be operated with a single hand. Powered by alkaline batteries, you do not need to carry a heavy power adapter and hunt for an electric outlet anymore! Since no computer is required to start a scan, you can carry it to anywhere, anytime! Whenever on the road, in a plane, a car or a caf, you can digitize almost everything right away! Whether standing or sitting, you can complete your scan by simply gliding it over a surface. Even the posters on the wall or a pretty carton can be easily digitized! Start instant scan with the feeder dock When the scanner is attached to the feeder dock, the Avisions MiWand 2 PRO allows you to start instant scan as soon as a page is fed into the feeding slot. The scan will be automatically started and the image is saved into a memory card with a predefined image mode and resolution. Furthermore, the whole unit allows you to scan paper up to legal size (216 x 355 mm or 8.5 x 14 inch). Preview images with 1.8 color LCD display The Preview feature allows you to view your JPEG image on the color LCD screen for 2 seconds immediately after a scan to confirm the images you have just captured. In addition, you can also view all images individually or as a slideshow. View images in iPad Through the mini USB port, the scanned documents can be easily transferred to iPad (with additional iPad Camera Kit) or any SmartPhone which supports USB Host or OTG capability. Patented Double-Roller and Bookedge Design The innovative double roller technology delivers outstanding feeding reliability and image quality by significantly reducing the risk of skewing and distortion. The bookedge design makes book scanning fast and easy.
name: Avision MiWand 2L Pro

description-de_DE-print:
