description-en_US-mobile: dLAN LiveCam
description-en_US-print: The dLAN LiveCam gives you an eye on your home at all times. Ensuring the safety of your house, children or pets  the LiveCam provides the images to you. Even while on holiday or at work: the direct Internet connection and app for Apple iPhone/iPad and Android devices makes individual monitoring possible anywhere in the world. You can set up the dLAN LiveCam in no time: with devolo's dLAN Powerline technology, all you need for connection is a power cable  the flexible LiveCam can be used close to any power outlet in the home and simply moved to another one if desired. Video is transmitted securely via the power line.
description-fr_FR-print: Avec dLAN LiveCam, gardez un il sur votre domicile. Maison, enfants ou animaux, la LiveCam les a toujours en images. Mme en vacances ou sur votre lieu de travail : la connexion Internet directe et l'application pour Apple iPhone/iPad et pour Android permettent la surveillance individuelle aux quatre coins de la plante. Et pourtant, la camra dLAN LiveCam est configure en un rien de temps : grce  la technologie CPL dLAN de devolo, la connexion requiert juste un cble lectrique. La LiveCam peut ainsi tre utilise  proximit de chaque prise de courant en toute simplicit ! La transmission vido est scurise via les cbles lectriques.
name: Devolo dLAN LiveCam

The XP100 is waterproof to 10m, shock proof to 2m, sealed against dust and sand, and even works in temperatures down to -10C. description-de_DE-print: Mit dem 8fach Zoomobjektiv, Full HD und HS-System fr optimierte Aufnahmen beischwachen Lichtverhltnissen ist die schlanke IXUS 230 HS der ideale Begleiter fr Nachtschwrmer. Die speziell gehrtete Glasschicht sorgt fr eine robuste Oberflche. Full-HD-Movies, Powered IS Im Moviemodus entstehen 1080p-Full-HD-Movies mit Stereoton; die teilt man gern mit Freunden. Mit dem optischen Zoom kommen Sie ganz nah an das Geschehen heran; dank des optischen Bildstabilisators entstehen gestochen scharfe Movieclips. ber eine spezielle Taste wechseln Sie sofort vom Foto- in den Moviemodus; die Kamera ist mit einem HDMI-CEC-Anschluss fr die bequeme Wiedergabe auf einem HD-Fernseher ausgestattet. Intelligenter AUTO-Modus (Smart Auto) Im intelligenten AUTO-Modus (Smart Auto) entstehen ganz komfortabel hochwertige Fotos oder Movies. 32 Aufnahmesituationen (21 bei Movies) werden unterschieden und automatisch die richtigen Einstellungen ausgewhlt. Sie mssen nur noch das Motiv anvisieren und auslsen. Highspeed-Serienbilder. Superzeitlupe-Movie Die Funktion Highspeed-Serienbilder ermglicht die ununterbrochene Aufnahme mit 8,7 Bildern pro Sekunde (bei 3,0 MP), Sie verpassen nichts mehr. Beispielsweise mit dem Spielzeugkamera-Effekt fr einen altmodischen Look, dem Miniatureffekt, der ein Foto oder eine Filmszene wie in einer Miniaturwelt darstellt oder dem Monochrom-Effekt. description-en_US-print: iiyama's Business LED-backlit LCD, the ProLite B2274HDS follows full HD resolution of 1920 x 1080. It comes with Height Adjustable and Portrait Mode base providing the greatest comfort in use . High specifications include 2msec Response Time and 5M : 1 Advanced Contrast Ratio for vibrant images and blur free Video. Triple Input support of Analogue, DVI and HDMI ensures compatibility with the latest installed graphics cards and embedded Notebook outputs! And VESA mount compliance means you can easily mount your monitor to a wall. LED-Backlit A typical CCFL LCD uses four backlight lamps. Using LED diodes considerably lowers the power consumption and reduces the CO2 emission into the environment making this LCD a true ECO-Friendly product. Full HD With true 1920 x 1080p resolution your monitor is ready to display high definition images. This means you can accommodate more information on your screen; e.g. 60% more in comparison to a 1280 x 1024 monitor. ACR Contrast Ratio is a measurement of the difference between the darkest black and the brightest white your monitor can display. Advanced Contrast Ratio is a feature that automatically adjusts contrast and brightness of the screen to assure perfect picture quality while watching films and playing games. Speakers This LED monitor is equipped with two high quality stereo speakers. HDMI HDMI stands for High-Definition Multimedia Interface. Much smaller and more convenient than DVI, HDMI also has the significant advantage over DVI that it supports audio as well as video signals. OverDrive ON / OFF When very fast graphics are displayed your monitor can sometimes get blurry. Turning on the OverDrive feature will eliminate that. VESA VESA mount compliance means you can easily mount your monitor to a wall. Pivot Screen rotation means you can change the position of the screen from landscape into portrait. This feature can be very handy while working with long spreadsheets or texts. Height Adjustable Stand A Height Adjustable Stand allows you to set the perfect position of the screen ensuring ergonomic posture and optimal viewing comfort which benefits not only your health but also productivity.

description-en_US-mobile: Ferox, 2x3W, 3.5mm jack, USB, 150Hz-20KHz, 470mAh
description-en_US-print: The Razer Ferox is the definitive audio reference for mobile gamers. With its state of the art expandable resonance chamber, 360 omni-directional sound and its digitally enhanced amplifier efficiency, this pocket-sized speaker system features exceptional audio and powerful bass that belies its size. Take it around in the included carrying case to enjoy a full-bodied sound experience for up to 12 hours wherever you are. 360 Omni-directional Sound for all-round clarity Unlike forward-facing speakers that only send sound in one direction, the Razer Feroxs drivers are strategically positioned to produce a phenomenal omnidirectional soundstage that fills your surroundings in every direction evenly and completely. Expanded Bass Resonance Chamber for powerful bass Replicating a subwoofers resonance with auto-expanding resonance chambers, the Razer Ferox guarantees strong bass despite its diminutive size, while its distinctive driver construction ensures rich acoustics for an immersive sound stage. Optimized Digital Amplification for exceptional audio quality Experience crystal-clear audio with lower distortion levels thanks to the Razer Feroxs digital amplification that enhances its power efficiency substantially. Enjoy loud and clear audio on the go with true-to-life quality acoustics.
name: Razer Ferox

description-en_US-mobile: DR-7550C - High Speed Document Scanner - 75 ppm, 200/300 dpi, 500 sheets A4/A3, 15.000 scans/day
description-en_US-print: If you need a robust high speed scanner designed with users in mind, look no further than the imageFORMULA DR-7550C. Features - High speed colour scanning 75 ppm at 200 & 300dpi. - Front feed user friendly design. - High capacity 500 sheet feeding. - Fast energy-saving warm up time. - Advanced image processing. - Robust - duty cycle of 15,000 scans/day. - Bundled Capture Perfect. Productivity when it matters The DR-7550C captures a super-quick 75 ppm while scanning in colour, and black and white, at resolutions of 300dpi (A4, Portrait). A dedicated onboard image-processing chip achieves full rated speeds even when multiple image processing functions are selected. Operator conscience design The frontfeed design of the DR-7550C provides both comfort and convenience allowing you to load, feed and remove documents effortlessly whilst seated. Furthermore, the control panel and job buttons are all designed to be easily viewable at eye-level. Flexible and highly efficient Invoices, delivery notes, reports, charts some of the many documents businesses process every day. The DR-7550C comfortably handles them all, increasing efficiency and reducing paper workload costs. An automatic A3 feeder deals with batches of up to 500 sheets and supports 3 different paper feed modes. The robust feeding mechanism feeds and separates mixed documents with ease and, in the rare event of an error, an ultrasonic double feed detection sensor immediately notifies the user for instant problem resolution. The DR-7550C boasts strong environmental credentials too and is one of the most energy efficient scanners in its class. Advanced image processing A huge range of powerful features such as Auto-colour Detection, Text Orientation Recognition, Auto Paper Size and Deskew detection ensure superb quality and optimum efficiency. Built for tough workloads The DR-7550C is designed to take on your toughest workloads and reliably handles suggested daily duty cycle of up to 15,000 scans a day. Software included and options Canons CapturePerfect software is bundled with the DR-7550C, with a Capture Perfect Software Developers Kit (SDK) also available for easy, customised integrations.
name: Canon DR DR-7550C scanner

description-de_DE-print: Mit dem 8fach Zoomobjektiv, Full HD und HS-System fr optimierte Aufnahmen beischwachen Lichtverhltnissen ist die schlanke IXUS 230 HS der ideale Begleiter fr Nachtschwrmer. Dank intelligentem AUTO-Modus (Smart Auto) werden brillante Aufnahmen zum Kinderspiel. Vielseitige und intelligente Kamera fr gestochen scharfe Fotos Das 28-mm-Weitwinkelobjektiv mit 8fach optischem Zoom ist ideal fr detailreiche Fotos weit entfernter Motive, fr Gruppen- und fr Landschaftsaufnahmen Mit 7 Modi passt Intelligent IS den Bildstabilisator automatisch an das Motiv an; das Resultat: minimierte Verwacklungsunschrfe und gestochen scharfe, detailreiche Fotos und Movieclips. HS-System Das innovative HS-System, die Kombination aus leistungsstarkem DIGIC-4-Bildprozessor und hoch empfindlichem Sensor, sorgt fr exzellente Bildqualitt in nahezu allen Aufnahmesituationen. Es brilliert besonders bei schwachen Lichtverhltnissen ideal, um den Zauber einer Stimmung auch ohne Blitz und Stativ festzuhalten. Die Kombination aus hoch empfindlichem Bildsensor und leistungsstarkem DIGIC-4-Bildprozessor sorgt fr exzellente Bildqualitt in nahezu allen Situationen. Smart und kompakt Die IXUS 230 HS ist mit ihrem kompakten, eleganten Metallgehuse eine der schlanksten Kameras mit 8fach Zoom und klein genug fr die meisten Taschen. 7,5 cm PureColor II G LCD Das groe, hochwertige LC-Display ermglicht mit 460.000 Bildpunkten die bequeme Mennavigation, komfortable Bildauswahl und Motivberprfung aus nahezu jedem Winkel. Die speziell gehrtete Glasschicht sorgt fr eine robuste Oberflche. Full-HD-Movies, Powered IS Im Moviemodus entstehen 1080p-Full-HD-Movies mit Stereoton; die teilt man gern mit Freunden. Mit dem optischen Zoom kommen Sie ganz nah an das Geschehen heran; dank des optischen Bildstabilisators entstehen gestochen scharfe Movieclips. ber eine spezielle Taste wechseln Sie sofort vom Foto- in den Moviemodus; die Kamera ist mit einem HDMI-CEC-Anschluss fr die bequeme Wiedergabe auf einem HD-Fernseher ausgestattet. Intelligenter AUTO-Modus (Smart Auto) Im intelligenten AUTO-Modus (Smart Auto) entstehen ganz komfortabel hochwertige Fotos oder Movies. 32 Aufnahmesituationen (21 bei Movies) werden unterschieden und automatisch die richtigen Einstellungen ausgewhlt. Sie mssen nur noch das Motiv anvisieren und auslsen. Highspeed-Serienbilder. Superzeitlupe-Movie Die Funktion Highspeed-Serienbilder ermglicht die ununterbrochene Aufnahme mit 8,7 Bildern pro Sekunde (bei 3,0 MP), Sie verpassen nichts mehr. Im Super Slow Motion Movie Modus werden Szenen mit schneller Action bei der Wiedergabe auf 1/8 ihrer eigentlichen Geschwindigkeit reduziert. 720p-iFrame-Movie Filmtagebuch PC- und Mac-kompatible 720p-HD-Movies filmen Sie im optimierten Apple iFrame-Format ideal fr den schnellen Import, die mhelose Bearbeitung und bequeme Weitergabe. Im Modus Filmtagebuch wird vor jedem Foto eine 4 Sekunden lange Moviesequenz in VGA-Qualitt aufgenommen; die Movieclips eines Tages knnen zu einem interessanten Bonus-Video zusammengefgt werden. Kreativmodi Entdecken Sie mit interessanten Aufnahmemodi Ihre kreative Ader. Beispielsweise mit dem Spielzeugkamera-Effekt fr einen altmodischen Look, dem Miniatureffekt, der ein Foto oder eine Filmszene wie in einer Miniaturwelt darstellt oder dem Monochrom-Effekt. Hinweise und Tipps Mit einfachen und auf dem Display einblendbaren Hinweisen und Tipps lernen Sie die Funktionsweise Ihrer Kamera besser verstehen und optimieren Ihre Ergebnisse.
description-en_US-mobile: 1/2.3 type CMOS, 12.1M, DIGIC 4, 5.0 - 40.0 mm, f/3.0  f/5.9, 7.5 cm (3.0) PureColor II G LCD (TFT), SD, SDHC, SDXC, Hi-Speed USB
description-en_US-print: With an 8x zoom lens, Full HD and the low-light skills of the HS System, the fashionably slim IXUS 230 HS is the perfect partner for nights out. Smart Auto lets you focus on living life to the full. Sharp, versatile, intelligent A powerful 8x optical zoom lets you home in on details of far away objects or fit more in the frame with the 28mm wide-angle lens for great group shots and landscapes. Intelligent IS automatically adjusts the optical Image Stabilizer to the scene from 7 modes to prevent blur and deliver sharp and detailed photos and videos. HS System HS System excels in low light allowing you to capture the real atmosphere of the moment without flash or tripod. A high performance DIGIC 4 processor and high sensitivity sensor combine to give superior image quality in all situations. Smart and compact One of the slimmest 8x zoom cameras available, the IXUS 230 HS has a compact, elegant metal body thats small enough to carry in your pocket. 7.5 cm (3.0") PureColor II G LCD A large, high quality 460k dot LCD screen allows easy framing and reviewing of images from any angle and effortless menu navigation. A tempered glass outer layer gives excellent durability. Full HD movies, Powered IS Create Full HD (1080p) movies with stereo sound youll be proud to share. Use the optical zoom to get close to the action while the optical Image Stabilizer keeps your movies steady. A dedicated movie button lets you switch instantly from stills to movie mode; an HDMI-CEC connector allows easy playback on an HDTV. Smart Auto Effortlessly shoot high quality photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and selects the perfect settings from 32 variables (21 in movie). All you have to do is point and shoot. High-speed Burst. Super Slow Motion Movie High-speed Burst delivers non-stop photo shooting, capturing 8.7 shots per second (3.0 MP), so you never miss a thing. Super Slow Motion Movie slows fast-paced action up to an 1/8th of the real speed. iFrame movie (720p). Movie Digest Shoot PC and Mac friendly HD video (720p) in the optimised Apple iFrame format for fast importing, easy editing and simple sharing. Movie Digest records up to 4-seconds of action before each still shot, joining the days clips into a bonus VGA movie. Creative modes Explore your creativity with fun shooting modes. Effects include Toy Camera for an older style camera look, Miniature to transform a photo or movie scene into a scale model and Monochrome. Hints & Tips Simple Hints & Tips interface messages offer step-by-step menu guidance making it easy to understand camera features and settings.

description-fr_FR-print: Avec son zoom 8x, sa fonctionnalit Full HD et les excellentes performances en basse lumire de son Systme Haute Sensibilit, l'appareil photo compact lgant IXUS 230 HS sera le partenaire idal de vos soires. Le mode Smart Auto vous permet d'immortaliser la vie en Full HD en toute simplicit. Soyez au cur de la vie Prcis, polyvalent, intelligent Le puissant zoom optique 8x vous permet de saisir au mieux les dtails des objets distants. L'objectif grand-angle de 28 mm largit le champ : trs pratique pour les photos de groupe et les paysages. Le stabilisateur d'image intelligent rgle la stabilisation d'image optique en fonction de la scne, en choisissant parmi 7 modes qui vitent le flou et garantissent des photos et vidos nettes et un niveau de dtail lev. Systme Haute Sensibilit Le Systme Haute Sensibilit est particulirement performant en conditions de faible clairage : vous pouvez restituer l'atmosphre relle de l'instant sans utiliser de flash ou de trpied. Le processeur DIGIC 4 hautes performances et le capteur haute sensibilit assurent une qualit d'image optimale dans toutes les situations. Intelligent et compact L'IXUS 230 HS est l'un des appareils photo zoom 8x les plus plats du march : son botier mtallique compact et lgant tient facilement dans la poche. cran LCD PureColor II G de 7,5 cm (3 pouces) Le grand cran LCD haute qualit 460 000 points permet de cadrer et de visionner facilement les images depuis n'importe quel angle et assure une navigation aise dans les menus. Sa protection par verre tremp lui confre une grande rsistance. Vidos Full HD, stabilisateur d'image lectronique Crez des vidos Full HD (1080p) en stro que vous pourrez partager avec fiert. Utilisez le zoom optique pour tre au cur de l'action, tandis que le stabilisateur d'image lectronique vite les flous. La touche vido spcifique vous fait passer instantanment du mode photo au mode vido. Le connecteur HDMI-CEC facilite la lecture sur les tlviseurs HD. Mode "Smart Auto" Ralisez facilement des photos et vidos en mode Smart Auto, qui dtecte le type de scne et slectionne les meilleurs rglages possibles parmi un choix de 32 configurations (21 pour les vidos). Il ne vous reste plus qu' cadrer et dclencher. Rafale grande vitesse Super ralenti vido Le mode rafale grande vitesse vous permet d'enregistrer des photos en continu une vitesse de 8,7 clichs par seconde (3 millions de pixels). Vous ne manquerez plus rien. Le mode super ralenti vido ralentit les mouvements jusqu' 1/8e de la vitesse relle. Vido iFrame (720p). Pr-enregistrement vido Tournez des vidos HD (720p) compatibles PC et Mac, rapides importer, faciles monter et simples partager avec le format optimis Apple iFrame. La fonction de pr-enregistrement vido enregistre jusqu' 4 secondes d'action avant la prise de vues effective et runit toutes les squences ralises le mme jour en une vido VGA. Modes cratifs Donnez libre cours votre crativit avec des modes de prise de vue amusants. Les effets incluent l'appareil photo-jouet pour un aspect de photo ralise avec un modle ancien, la miniature pour transformer une photo ou scne vido en modle rduit et le mode monochrome. Vous apprenez ainsi facilement utiliser les fonctions et rglages de l'appareil.

description-en_US-mobile: Web Camera VC-C50iR with 26x optical zoom
description-en_US-print: The VC-C50iR features a state-of-the-art optical system for high level security monitoring. Benefits include a wide surveillance range and exceptional performance in low-light conditions. Features - Pan/Tilt/Zoom camera with 9 pre-set positions - 26x Optical Zoom with powered telephoto lens - Superior performance in low-light conditions - Built-in Infrared illuminator - Easy set up and advanced connectivity - Cascade control facility for up to 9 cameras Powerful Pan, Tilt and Zoom Communication Camera With a 26x optical zoom provided by a powered Canon telephoto lens, the VC-C50iR communication camera can produce extremely close-up images. Furthermore, a 12x digital zoom allows any area to be digitally enlarged for detailed examination. This enhanced optical system is based on Canon's long heritage in lens technology - making the camera ideal for critical surveillance monitoring, where accuracy and precision are essential. Superb performance in low-light conditions This camera can deliver colour images even when operating in very poor lighting conditions as low as 1 lux thanks to a bright f/1.6 lens and a slow shutter speed. The VC-C50iR can also produce monochrome images in total darkness (0 lux), using its Infrared Night Mode. An integral LED illuminator provides a viewing range of up to 3 metres, showing up objects which are not visible to the naked eye. Additional infrared lighting can extend the viewing range still further. Extended range with crystal-clear recorded images The VC-C50iR is designed to be fixed to a ceiling, and has an extensive 340 pan and 100 tilt range for all-round visibility. Additionally, there are 9 preset positions for instant recall of camera angles, zoom and AE settings. A 400K pixel CCD ensures sharp recorded images, while Automatic Noise Reduction further improves image quality by processing the image before transmission. Advanced connectivity for easy integration A single 20-pin multi-connector accommodates S-Video and RS-232C control signals. This provides quick and easy connectivity to other devices, for simple integration into your existing system with minimal cabling. A cascade facility allows up to 9 cameras to be connected together, via the RS-232C interface. The cameras are fully compatible with Canon's VB150 Camera Server. And, although the camera can be connected to a host PC or camera server, an Infrared remote control handset is available allowing an operator to control the PTZ functions locally.
name: Canon Web Camera VC-C50iR

description-de_DE-mobile: AV186+, Sheetfed, Color, Duplex, ADF, CCD, 40ppm/80ipm, 600dpi, USB 2.0, 256MB SDRAM, 3.1kg, Schwarz/Grau
description-de_DE-print: Kompakt und Zuverlssig - Scannen mit einem einfachen Tastendruck Portabel, Leicht, Preiswert Mit seinem schlanken Design ist der Avision AV 186+ Scanner ideal fr alle, die Ezient arbeiten wollen. Mit einer kleinen Stellche bietet der AV186+ Ihnen hervorragende Qualitt und er passt auf jeden Schreibtisch. Farbe, Grauskalierung und Schwarz-Wei scannt der AV186+ mit einer Geschwindigkeit von bis zu 30 Seiten pro Minute (Simplex) oder 60 Bilder pro Minute (Duplex). Der automatische Papiereinzug (ADF) des AV186+ hat ein Fassungsvermgen von maximal 50 Blttern. Das hat den Vorteil, dass sie eine groe Anzahl an Dokumenten ohne Unterbrechung einscannen knnen. Der Einzug des AV186+ ist so konzipiert, dass auch Kredit- oder andere Plastikarten ohne Beschdigungen eingescannt werden knnen. Was liegt dem Gert bei? Der Avision AV 186+ Scanner wird mit TWAIN und ISIS Treibern und Avision Button Manager, ScanProfolio und PaperPort 11SE geliefert.
description-en_US-mobile: AV186+, Sheetfed, Color, Duplex, ADF, CCD, 40ppm/80ipm, 600dpi, USB 2.0, 256MB SDRAM, 3.1kg, Black/Grey
description-en_US-print: New Generation of High-Speed Scanning Solution The AV186+ is a compact, high-speed color duplex scanner. Designed to scan both documents up to legal size and plastic ID cards, the AV186+ can be used to capture all the information you need in a fast, and reliable performance. The scanner's straight paper path provides smooth and reliable paper transmit and less document jam. It also ensures thicker paper up to 400 g/m2 and embossed plastic cards up to 1.25mm can be transmitted smoothly. With the 50-page auto document feeder, the AV186+ offers fast scan rate of 30 pages per minute for single-sided documents and 60 pages per minute at 300 dpi for double-sided documents. For ease of use, nine scanning presets can be custom programmed for different applications. The entire scanning process is then as simple as selecting a preset and pressing the simplex or duplex scan button. Tasks such as scanning, and storing or sending the images to application become completely automated processes. The AV186+ is also equipped with various innovative features such as automatic color detection, automatic blank-page detection, skew correction and ultrasonic multi-feed detection to catch overlapped pages. These features help users to digitize document effectively and efficiently. New Generation of High-Speed Scanning Solution Avision is pleased to announce the new generation of sheet-fed duplex scanner. The small footprint, compact and reliable TRUE CCD scanner is your perfect scanning solution for front desk service, document distribution, business card management or digitalizing family photos and invoices. With the ability to scan mixed paper size document with thickness up to 1.25mm plastic cards, the AV186+ offers unparalleled performance and sets a new standard in card scanning. Faster scan speed The AV186+ delivers fast scan rates of 40 pages per minutes in simplex and 80 images per minutes in duplex at 200 dpi color or 30 pages per minutes in simplex and 60 images per minutes in duplex at 300 dpi color mode, providing a truly breathtaking digitalizing experience. Long Page Scanning up to 118" The reliable paper feed system also lets you scan unusually long document up to 3 meters (118) at 300 dpi in color, grayscale, or black and white. This is ideal for scanning engineering diagram, insurance bill, health record or other special documents. New TWAIN driver support AV186+ incorporates the latest TWAIN driver with new features and enhancement such as the ability to adjust sensitivity of dynamic threshold, document/photo color matching, custom color dropout, automatic multiple cropping, intelligent multi-feed, reduce despeckle, image count, digital imprinter, and transport timeout. We are committed to improving the TWAIN driver continuously to enrich your scanning experience as never before. What we have bundled The Avision AV186+ scanner comes with TWAIN and ISIS drivers, exclusive Avision Button Manager, AVScan 5.0 and ScanSoft PaperPort 11SE. Avision's Button Manager For typical users, Avision's Button Manager provides ease of use with 9 pre-configured file formats and destinations. For advanced users, Avision's Button Manager allows full customization. With a simple touch of the button, users can conveniently scan and send images to E-mail software, specific folder, favorite software application, your printer, or convert into searchable PDF format! AVScan 5.0 AVScan 5.0 is the latest version with a new structure used to replace AVScan 4.3. The enhanced user interface increases ease of use such as new tree structure, TWAIN interface with advanced scan settings, integrated FTP upload function, batch import/export of images, new image editing tools and enhancing filters, split batch documents and tons more, while still retaining a familiar layout.
name: Avision AV186+

description-en_US-mobile: EOS 550D, SLR, 18MP, CMOS, 3:2, Digic 4, ISO12800, 30-1/4000 s, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT 1040K px, Exif 2.21, RAW, 5184 x 3456 px, MOV, H.264, 1920 x 1080 px, OSD, PAL, NTSC, USB, HDMI, 3.5 mm in, PictBridge, SD, SDHC, SDXC, Black
description-en_US-print: EOS Digital SLR Camera Capture your story in stunning detail with the EOS 550D. With the creative freedom to capture the decisive shot, see all the detail of your holiday sunset or follow action in the local football match. - 18 MP APS-C CMOS sensor. - DIGIC 4. - ISO 100-6400, H:12800. - Up to 3.7fps shooting. - Full HD movies. - 7.7cm (3.0) 3:2 Clear View LCD with 1,040k dots. - iFCL metering. - Quick Control screen. - Ext. Mic socket. - Movie crop. 18 MP CMOS sensor Ideal for those who want to create large, poster-size prints or crop images without losing any of the detail necessary for printing EOS 550Ds 18MP CMOS sensor is outstanding in low light, and produces images with incredibly low noise. DIGIC 4 Canons DIGIC 4 processor works with the CMOS sensor to deliver 14-bit image processing, for smooth gradations and natural looking colours. DIGIC 4 also powers advanced Noise Reduction when shooting at higher ISO speeds, plus split-second start-up times and near-instant image review after shooting. High ISO for low light When light levels fall, the EOS 550D offers an ISO range of up to 6400 expandable to 12800 for those environments where using flash is undesirable. Full HD movie recording The EOS 550D combines exceptional still shooting with the ability to shoot Full HD (1080p) video. To satisfy your creativity the EOS 550D features full manual control and selectable frame rates. You can also shoot high speed 50/60fps movies at 720P for when the action is really fast. An HDMI connection allows High Definition playback of footage and images on any HDTV. Also with compatible TVs playback can be controlled using the TVs remote control. 7.7cm (3.0) 3:2 Clear View LCD Detailed checks on images and video are possible with a 7.7cm (3.0) 3:2 Clear View LCD screen, which features an ultra-high 1,040,000 dots for increased clarity. Switch to Live View mode and use the real-time visual feed to shoot from awkward angles. iFCL metering system A new 63-zone dual layer metering sensor analyses Focus, Colour and Luminance information, providing accurate and consistent metering. Quick Control screen Accessible using a dedicated button it provides easy access to commonly used functions, ensuring that you are ready to take the shot as it happens. External Microphone Socket Add an additional microphone for better quality sound using the 3.5mm stereo jack socket. Movie Crop Shoot VGA movies with an effective zoom of 7x. Movie crop uses only the centre part of the sensor and allows long distance shooting without having to change lenses. Create a shooting system as unique as you are The EOS 550D is compatible with Canons full range of EF and EF-S lenses and EX-series Speedlites.

description-en_US-mobile: 5.3 MP, 1920 x 1080 Full HD, 25x optical zoom, MS Pro duo/SD/SDHC/SDXC, 210 g, Black
description-en_US-print:
Crowd pleaser.

Capture incredibly crisp 1920x1080/60i Full HD video and thrill your audiences by making anytime movie time with a built-in high contrast projector. Use the brilliant 2.7" LCD touchscreen to simplify switching up menu settings on the fly for a fun, easy way to set up the shots, better preserving the memories you'll treasure forever. Running out of daylight? Not a problem. Back-illuminated Exmor CMOS sensor gets phenomenal results even when lighting conditions are less than optimal so you can keep going long after the sun is gone.

The Makings of a Masterpiece

Immortalize precious moments in time by shooting in exquisitely rich Full 1920x1080/60i HD and special occasions become even more special the second time around. Capture 5.3MP still images for yet another way to share the excitement.

Ready, Set, Project

Light up the room and everyone in it by sharing treasured memories whenever and wherever you choose with nothing more than the camcorder you used to record them. Transform your Handycam camcorder into a mobile movie theater capable of projecting up to a 100" diagonal image using the projector cleverly built into the LCD panel. Savor the true-to-life sound Clear Phase stereo speakers provide when combined with S-Master digital amplifier technology during playback.

Better Shots in Low Light

Experience stunning low-light sensitivity with improved image clarity and drastically reduced grain with a back-illuminated Exmor R CMOS sensor. Engineered specifically for compact cameras and camcorders, the Exmor R CMOS sensor is designed to let you shoot video in lower lighting conditions with better results.

30x Zoom

Extended digital zoom works in conjunction with 25x optical zoom to get you 30x closer to the action while maintaining HD image quality, even as you pan in for that extreme close-up.

Legendary Lens

Step it up with a professional-quality Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens designed specifically for compact camcorders. Precision ground optics help maintain the sharpness and contrast of larger lenses, while SteadyShot image stabilization helps reduce bothersome blur caused by camera shake.

A Brilliant Touch

Vibrant 2.7" Clear Photo LCD touch screen (230k) makes framing up and reviewing footage a breeze. Sharp, vivid images make subjects pop off the screen  even outdoors  while enabling you to switch up menu settings on the fly ensuring the best shoot possible.
name: Sony HDR-PJ200

description-en_US-mobile: MHS-PM5K 1920x1080 HD, 6.096 cm (2.4 ") LCD, 5MP CMOS, 4x Digital Zoom
description-en_US-print:
When fun happens, the all-new pocket-sized bloggie camera lets you capture, upload and share the action in high definition. It plays nicely with sites like YouTube, so it's easy to upload your photos and videos to the web.

Record everything in beautiful, 1920x1080 high definition MP4 (H.264) format. MP4 is a popular multimedia format that compresses the size of your audio and video, making files small enough to easily transfer to your compatible PC or Mac.

Swing out the built-in USB arm and connect your camera directly to your compatible PC or Mac. It's the quick and easy way to upload videos and charge your battery without having to hunt for cables.

Show your videos to the world. Just use the pre-installed Picture Motion Browser (PMB) Portable software to pre-select videos and images in the camera and easily upload them to a compatible PC and popular internet sharing sites. No additional software needed.

At approximately 0.9" thick and 2.2" wide, the bloggie is ultra-compact and easy to carry in your bag or pocket. And don't worry about the lensit swivels out of the way for protection while not in use.

The bloggie camera features a unique lens that swivels up to 270 degrees and instantly powers on the camera when you rotate it outward. It's perfect for spontaneous momentsjust grab the camera and start shooting immediately.

La technologie SteadyShot permet de stabiliser votre appareil lorsque vous photographiez sans trpied et la fonction Dtection des visages permet de rgler automatiquement les paramtres de l'appareil photo pour des portraits d'une nettet extraordinaire. The advanced dynamic mode corrects roll and tilt movements that can occur when walking, ensuring sharp steady videos in every situation. 53x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS A genuine Canon HD video lens with 53x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light. Baby Mode Capture your childs first steps, first words, or many other firsts with Baby Mode. Register your childs date of birth in-camera, and add colourful stamps for height and weight. All footage will automatically be sorted to the baby album. Simultaneous Recording Movies can be recorded in both AVCHD and MP4 simultaneously. Simply capture once and showcase exceptional quality videos or share footage to portable devices and social networking sites. Videos are stored to the internal memory and SD card. Advanced image processing The powerful DIGIC DV4 imaging processor ensures higher image quality in low light and a substantial reduction in image distortion as it works together with the optical image stabiliser. The processor handles high recording rates of MP4(35 Mbps) and AVCHD (28Mbps). Audio Scene Select Make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select. Select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically to match the scene youre shooting. So whether youre filming speech at a wedding or music at a concert, you can enjoy immersive, realistic audio. Fingertip control Smooth operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm capacitive touch screen LCD, giving you intuitive control of settings and simplifies playback. Opening the LCD panel quick starts the camcorder, so youll never miss a shot. 8GB Dual Flash memory, SDXC card slot A 8GB Dual Flash memory lets you store over 3 hours of movies to the built-in memory. Record even longer with the SDXC card slot.
name: Canon LEGRIA HF R46

With the Xerox WorkCentre 7500 series multifunction printer, youll achieve high-impact color documents that impress customers and deliver results while minimizing costs. With 1200 x 2400 dpi, photoquality color images and rich, crisp text, your output always makes a huge impact. - Always accurate image quality. The WorkCentre 7500 series multifunction printer employs advanced print heads with Digital Image Registration Control Technology, which ensures consistently outstanding image registration. - Impressive results. Print brilliant, attentiongrabbing images on a variety of stock as large as 12.6 x 19 in. and on paper weights up to 300 gsm, and take advantage of impressive finishing capabilities from saddle-stitch booklets to folded brochures. - Harness the power of Fiery. description-en_US-mobile: Travel Scanner 150 - simplex, 600 dpi, CIS, USB 2.0, 10 sec/page, 24-bit, TWAIN
description-en_US-print: - Instant scan to searchable PDF for easy search and retrieval - USB Powered No external power supply needed - Auto-crop, Auto-straighten, Auto-brightness - Lightweight ( 300g / 10.6 oz.) - Scans items up to 216 mm ( 8.5) wide and 356 mm (14) long What is the benefit of being able to scan from anywhere? Whether youre on a business trip or work in a mobile environment, you collect paper on your travels. Business cards, receipts, contracts, forms, and photos. And it all has to wait in an overcrowded bag or briefcase (sometimes even pockets, wallets and purses) until you get back to your office, where you are already burdened with a to-do list. If you can get your documents organised while you are on the road, you will have less to worry about when you get back to the office. The Xerox Travel Scanner 150 is lightweight, compact and needs no AC outlet. Just connect the USB cable to your laptop, insert a document and youre scanning. And not just scanning, but scanning to popular and productive destinations such as email and Word, local/network/cloud storage or Microsoft SharePoint. The secret to staying organised. If you take care of paper when you first receive it, then you wont have big piles to deal with later. Documents from the road cant always wait for your trip home. With the Xerox Travel Scanner 150 you can scan business cards after your meeting; they will be intelligently recognised and the data is syncd with your Outlook Contacts or smartphone, immediately. Your receipts will no longer get lost (and youre not out of pocket for a lost cab fare receipt). Work on and complete your expense report before your plane lands. Who needs to scan documents? The Business Traveller: The road warrior... all the tools of the office need to be in their bag, not just at their desk. The Insurance Adjuster: Every client has photos and forms. Every body shop has bills that need to be paid. No time to wait. They need to be scanned and sent now. The Construction Contractor: Plans, permits, contracts, invoices. These important documents need to be captured to keep business moving and to keep it secure. The Estate Agent: Timing is the difference between a sale made and a sale lost. Agreements, deposits, notes and drawings need to be shared with banks, clients, builders, lawyers. These are just a small example of professionals that rely on high-quality mobile scanners with which they can travel to capture, secure and share the documents that keep their business moving. The Xerox Travel Scanner 150 is the secret of their success. Visioneer OneTouch OneTouch is an easy-to-use utility that connects the Travel Scanner 150 with a powerful set of scanner settings to greatly improve the efficiency of your workflow so that with one touch the document is scanned automatically to email, Microsoft Word, your printer, a file folder, or to one of many cloud destinations. Visioneer DriverPLUS DriverPLUS is a new generation of driver technology that is based on TWAIN 2.1 specifications that provides advanced features and greater reliability for both users and system integrators. DriverPLUS combines the features of advanced 32- and 64-bit native Windows-based TWAIN and WIA drivers PLUS new Acuity optimisation software and a sophisticated user interface. Visioneer Acuity Acuity enables your scanner to instantly improve the visual clarity of every document that you scan. Using advanced algorithms and dynamic thresholding Acuity will intelligently correct documents containing imperfections, improve quality of scanned images for archiving, increase OCR accuracy, and save time. Nuance PaperPort Millions of professionals rely on PaperPort to save time and money by transforming paper documents into searchable digital documents. PaperPort combines the efficiency of document management, the convenience of superbly scanned documents and the power of creating PDF files, to bring a new level of operational proficiency to your organisation. Nuance OmniPagePro OmniPage Pro provides a precise OCR and layout retention solution, quickly turning scanned documents into editable, formatted text. The text can then be used in virtually any word processing, desktop publishing or web publishing program.
name: Xerox DocuMate Travel Scanner 150

description-en_US-mobile: 3'' AMOLED, VGA (640 x 480), 20.3MP, CMOS, SD, SDHC, SDXC, USB 2.0, Wi-Fi IEEE 802.11n, MP4 (H.264), Black
description-en_US-print: Share life in stunning detail with the Samsung NX210 Smart Camera. You can unleash the professional photographer within, thanks to the detail delivered by its 20.3MP APS-C CMOS sensor. Meanwhile, the NX210s High Speed Capture capabilities give the precision you need to capture split-second shots in superb focus. Premium metal design not only looks great but makes the camera more practical, with its compact shape and light weight adding to portability. And, with built-in Wi-Fi, youll be able to share images wirelessly on social networks, save them to computers or cloud services and even print or email them. Reality never looked so real 20.3MP APS-C Sensor Customised for the NX System, the brand-new, professional-grade, 20.3MP APS-C CMOS Sensor produces images that rival those of any premium DSLR. Each individual pixel has a large sensor area and receives more light, guaranteeing low noise levels, high dynamic range and accurate colour differentiation. The higher sensitivity allows you to shoot during low-light situations without graininess or other noise. The new sensor also provides Full HD video output capabilities. Picture performance that meets its design Premium Metal Design The NX210 packs the power of a professional-grade digital camera within a sleek and compact design. Its ergonomically crafted exterior fits perfectly within your hand, while the topside design feels solid and looks just as sturdy. The NX System gets its charming good looks through the perfect combination of modern metallic styling and classic clean lines. On the inside, the large CMOS Sensor replaces any mirrors for a smaller camera body. The lightweight body makes it more portable and easier to shoot in a variety of angles and positions, making it the ultimate professional-grade camera that you can carry in your pocket. A cameras that quick on the draw High Speed Capture The NX210 features super-fast High Speed Capture capabilities provide an simple yet sophisticated way to capture images in total focus. The ultra-high speed Auto Focus (AF) that can rival almost any system camera and is core component of the system. The result is a fast and precise AF System that captures lifes fleeting moments. And with a sequential rate of 8fps, capturing fast-moving objects in perfect clarity are no longer a challenge. Instant sharing and saving, simply Wi-Fi Connectivity The NX210s Wi-Fi connectivity lets you connect your digital camera to a wireless network. Save photos and videos directly to a computer or cloud service while you shoot, email them, print them wirelessly, or upload them straight to Facebook or YouTube. Youll never have to worry about losing a great shot, running out of storage space, or remembering to bring the right cable along. Discover the true beauty of HD video 1080p Full HD Stereo Movie Recording Built with 1080 30p Full HD movie recording capabilities, the NX210 transforms shooting video with a still camera into an art form. Choose from a wide range of viewing angles and zoom with confidence. The mirrorless CMOS image sensor offers precise auto focus even while you shoot. For a truly cinematic experience, the NX System has been fitted with an 18 - 200mm lens exclusively for Full HD video. Wide Range ISO for perfect exposure Wide Range ISO (12800, 7 steps) The wrong exposure can ruin even the most carefully framed shot. The NX Systems imaging sensor offers a wide ISO sensitivity range of up to 12800 at normal settings. Even indoors or at night, you can create images with minimal noise, rich tonal gradations and faithful colourswithout a flash. Youll also capture clearer, crisper images of fast-moving objects. Take full control of your pictures i-Function 2.0 No more fumbling to find the right buttons while you try to capture a fleeting moment. With i-Function 2.0, you can adjust key settings using the focus ring right on the lens. Whether youre a novice or a seasoned pro, you can quickly choose the perfect settings for your shot.

description-de_DE-print: Weil unternehmenskritische Arbeitsvolumen nach wirklich hoher Geschwindigkeit verlangen Schon auf dem Papier bertrifft der KODAK i780 Scanner mit einer Geschwindigkeit von bis zu 130 Seiten pro Minute die Konkurrenz. description-en_US-print:
- No presorting neededwith the automatic orientation feature, document content is analyzed on the fly and your images are automatically displayed in the correct reading orientation.

- Auto color detection for threshold-based automatic color scanning.
- Electronic color dropout allows the scanner to eliminate the form color, capturing only the information you need.

- Five output options meet virtually any imaging requirementblack-and-white, color or grayscale, plus two dual stream options: color and black-and-white, or grayscale and black-and- white.

description-en_US-mobile: S27A850T - 27" LED 16:9, 2560X1440, 5ms, 300 cd/m, DVI, DisplayPorts, Black
description-en_US-print: A bigger, better picture and lower energy use - Reduce energy costs and environmental impact; - Get a bigger picture with 2560 x 1400 resolution; - See images with more natural sRGB colour; - Enjoy an extra-wide 178 degree viewing angle. Product Features Conserves Energy and Preserves the Environment Engineered with the ecologically responsible homeowner in mind, the Samsung monitor reduces power consumption by 40%;, making it much more efficient than conventional monitors. By reducing the number of LED and defaulting to standby power, which requires less than 0.3W as opposed to the typical 1.0W, the Samsung monitor is poised to make a difference. How big a difference? If your monitor saves 120W each day, thats the annual equivalent of eliminating 10.8kg of CO2 emitted from an oil-burning power plantwhich produces the same effect as planting four pine trees. See more content with unbelievable screen resolution The Samsung SA850 Monitor showcases an astounding WQHD display with 2560 x 1440 pixel resolution, which is four times the resolution of HD (720p). It is perfect for businesses and industries that rely on access to extremely fine monitor detail. The wide screen, which features dual link DVI and display port, allows for more detail to be viewed and is ideal for work places such as hospitals, clinics and studios. The enhanced screen resolution provides greater efficiency and quality, and really is the must-have business tool. Picture Perfect, Natural-Looking Images Whether its video from an HD camcorder or photos from your digital camera, sRGB support makes sure that nature looks just as natural on your Samsung Monitor as it did when you shot it or filmed it. No matter what digital device the image was captured on, its as picture perfect on screen as Mother Nature intended it to be. So you can view, edit, and save images in their original format with no picture quality degradation whatsoever which translates to 100%; pure digital satisfaction.

description-de_DE-mobile: A4, A5, A6, A8, CIS, 600dpi, USB 2.0, 1400g + Rack2-Filer Smart and Magic Desktop
description-de_DE-print:
- Rack2-Filer Smart and Magic Desktop
- S1300i Scanner
- Fr Windows und Mac OS
- Ideal unterwegs oder im Bro
- Perfekt zum Einscannen fr E-Mail-Anhnge oder zum Ausdrucken
- Scannen direkt in Word-, Excel- und PowerPoint-Dateien (nur PowerPoint fr Windows)
- ScanSnap Organizer 4.1 : Verwaltung und Suchfunktionen fr PDF-Dateien (nur Windows)
- CardMinder (Windows) oder CardIris (Mac): Scan-Software fr Visitenkarten
- Mit iPad, iPhone und Android-Gert scannen
- Scannen zu Cloud-Anwendungen wie Dropbox, Google Docs, Evernote, SugarSync oder Salesforce CRM

ScanSnap Deluxe ist ein Produktpaket der neuesten Scanlsung von Fujitsu auf einen Knopfdruck: ScanSnap S1300i und das digitale Rack2-Filer Dateiarchivierungssystem. Die beiden Produkte ergnzen einander nahtlos und erfllen alle Anforderungen an die persnliche Dokumentenverwaltung im Bro, daheim und unterwegs.

ScanSnap S1300i kann entweder direkt ber den USB-Anschluss des Laptops oder mittels Netzstrom betrieben werden und ist damit ideal fr vielbeschftigte, vielreisende Geschftsleute - im Auto, bei Kundenbesuchen usw. (Reduzierte Scan-Geschwindigkeit bei der Nutzung von USB-Leistung.)

Der S1300i wird mit 2 ScanSnap Manager-Versionen geliefert  einer fr Windows und einer fr den Mac.

Die ScanSnap-Software erstellt automatisch Adobe PDF-Dateien, die mittlerweile den de-facto-Standard fr den Dokumentenaustausch bilden und so gewhrleisten, dass Sie Dokumente weltweit verschicken knnen und der Empfnger die Dokumente genauso sieht wie Sie. Sie knnen Suchfunktionen fr die PDFs hinzufgen  entweder im Hintergrund im ScanSnap Organizer oder unmittelbar whrend des Scan-Vorgangs.

Damit der Scanprozess mglichst unkompliziert abluft, prft ScanSnap jedes Dokument und entscheidet, ob es in Schwarzwei oder in Farbe eingelesen werden sollte und welche Gre die Dokumentenseite hat. Das Programm lscht leere Seiten, beschleunigt so den Scan-Prozess und minimiert die erforderliche Speicherkapazitt. Darber hinaus werden schief eingelegte Bltter korrekt ausgerichtet (Auto Deskew) und die Seiten automatisch gedreht.

Der ScanSnap S1300i ist mit einer automatischen 10-Seiten-Einzugsfunktion, Duplex-Fhigkeit und Farbscan-Modus ausgestattet. Dabei ist das Gert berraschend kompakt und da es direkt von Ihrem Laptop betrieben werden kann, ist es ideal fr Geschftsreisende.

Der ScanSnap S1300i besitzt einen Quick-Men-Modus, bei dem Sie Ihre Dokumente nur in den Einzug legen und die Scan-Taste des S1300i drcken mssen. Alle Seiten werden eingelesen und im aufgerufenen Quick-Men knnen Sie problemlos die erstellte PDF-Datei im ScanSnap Organizer oder in der Dateistruktur ablegen, als E-Mail versenden oder ber einen Drucker ausdrucken.

Der S1300i bietet als direkte Verknpfungsfunktionen zu beliebten Cloud-Diensten wie Dropbox, Google Docs, Evernote, SugarSync und Salesforce CRM. So knnen Sie eingescannte Dokumente praktisch berall und jederzeit auch mit der Cloud verknpfen. Falls keine Scanner-Schnittstelle zur Verfgung steht, knnen Windows-Nutzer innerhalb der Cloud-Applikation die Option ScanSnap folder whlen, die es ihnen durch die Import-Funktion ermglicht, direkt zur Cloud zu scannen.

Scannen Sie zu Ihrem iPad und iPhone  und jetzt auch zu anderen Android-Gerten*  mit der herunterladbaren ScanSnap Connect Applikation. Uploaden Sie Ihr Dokument schnell, sicher und einfach zum sofortigen Anzeigen und Teilen.
description-en_US-mobile: A4, A5, A6, A8, CIS, 600dpi, USB 2.0, 1400g + Rack2-Filer Smart and Magic Desktop
description-en_US-print:
- Rack2-Filer Smart and Magic Desktop
- S1300i Scanner
- For Windows and Mac OS
- Ideal for mobile and static use in the office
- Perfect for scan to Email, Scan to Print
- Scan to Word, Excel & PowerPoint (PowerPoint only for Windows OS)
- ScanSnap Organizer 4.1 : PDF Managment & Search (Windows only)
- CardMinder (Windows) or CardIris (Mac) : Business Card scanning software
- Scan to iPad, iPhone and Android devices
- Scan to cloud services such as Dropbox, Evernote, Google Docs and SugarSync

ScanSnap Deluxe is a product package of Fujitsus latest one-button scanning solution, ScanSnap S1300i and Rack2-Filers digital file organising system. The two products complement each other seamlessly, and as a combined solution meet the demands of personal document organisation perfectly, may it be in a professional business environment, at home or on the move

ScanSnap S1300i can be powered either directly from the laptop USB ports or via an AC adapter, making it ideal for business people on the move - in the car, in clients premises etc etc. (Scanning speed is reduced when using USB power).

The S1300i is supplied with two versions of ScanSnap Manager: one for Windows and one for Mac.

The ScanSnap software automatically creates Adobe PDF files which have become the de-facto standard for document exchange, enabling you to send documents anywhere in the world safe in the knowledge the recipient will see the document exactly as you see it. The PDFs can be made searchable, either in the background of ScanSnap Organizer or directly at scan time.

To make scanning as simple as possible, ScanSnap inspects each document to decide if a document should be scanned in black and white or colour, what the size of the page being scanned is and eliminate blank pages, all of which serve to speed the scanning operation and minimise your storage requirements. In addition each document will have misaligned text corrected (Auto Deskew) and each page will be have its orientation automatically adjusted.

ScanSnap S1300i incorporates a 10 page automatic document feeder, duplex capability and colour scanning within a surprisingly small footprint and it can be powered directly from your laptop making it ideal for business travellers.

ScanSnap S1300i offers a Quick Menu mode. Just place documents onto the input hopper and press the S1300's scan button. All pages are scanned and the user is presented Quick Menu, from where you can easily direct the resulting PDF file to either ScanSnap Organizer, Email recipients, file folders or even printing devices.

The ScanSnap S1300i Deluxe comes with a linking function to popular cloud services including Dropbox, Google Docs, Evernote, SugarSync and Salesforce CRM. It is now easy to seamlessly link and save your scanned image data virtually anywhere and anytime. If no scanning interface is available Windows users can select the ScanSnap folder option within the cloud application which then allows you to scan directly to the cloud through the import capability

Scan to iPad and iPhone, and now to Android devices*, via the downloadable ScanSnap Connect application. Upload your document fast, securely and easily; instantly display and share.
description-fr_FR-mobile: A4, A5, A6, A8, CIS, 600dpi, USB 2.0, 1400g + Rack2-Filer Smart and Magic Desktop
description-fr_FR-print: Caractristiques Principales - Rack2-Filer Smart and Magic Desktop - Scanner S1300 - Compatible avec les systmes dexploitation Windows et Mac - Idal pour les utilisations mobiles et statiques au bureau - Idal pour le scan vers email et scan vers imprimante - Scan vers Word, Excel et PowerPoint (PowerPoint uniquement pour Windows) - ScanSnap Organizer 4.1 : archivage et recherche de PDF (Windows uniquement) - Scan-to-iPhone, iPad, appareils Android - Des intgrations avec Services Cloud, tels que Dropbox, Evernote, Google Docs et SugarSync Les deux produits se compltent et offrent une solution integre. Ils conviennent parfaitement aux exigences de larchivage des documents personnels, que ce soit dans un environnement professionnel, domicile ou en dplacement. Le ScanSnap S1300i peut tre connect directement sur le port USB d'un ordinateur portable et sur un adaptateur CA, ce qui en fait le scanner idal pour les hommes d'affaires en dplacement, que ce soit en voiture, dans les locaux des clients, ou ailleurs (la vitesse de numrisation peut tre rduite en USB). Le S1300i est livr avec 2 versions de ScanSnap Manager, l'un pour Windows et l'autre pour Mac. Le logiciel ScanSnap cr automatiquement des fichiers Adobe PDF, qui est devenue la norme de partage de documents, vous permettant denvoyer vos documents dans le monde entier en tant assur que le destinataire verra le document exactement comme vous le voyez. Vous pouvez activer la reconnaissance du texte dans le ficher PDF du ScanSnap Organizer posteriori a partir ou directement au moment de la numrisation. Afin de faciliter la numrisation, ScanSnap inspecte chaque document pour dterminer si le document doit tre numris en noir et blanc ou en couleur, quelle est la taille de la page numrise et supprime les pages blanches, ce qui permet dacclrer le processus de numrisation et de rduire lespace de stockage ncessaire. En outre, il corrige les dfauts dalignement de chaque document (Auto Deskew) et adapte automatiquement lorientation de chaque page. Le ScanSnap S1300i comprend un chargeur automatique de 10 pages, offre la possibilit de numriser en duplex et en couleur tout en rduisant considerablement l'encombrement. Il peut tre connect directement votre ordinateur portable, ce qui en fait loutil idal pour les hommes daffaires en dplacement. Le ScanSnap S1300i comprend un menu rapide. Placez vos documents dans le chargeur, puis appuyez sur le bouton de numrisation de la S1300. Une fois les pages numrises, lutilisateur peut facilement envoyer le fichier PDF vers l'application ScanSnap Organizer, par email aux destinataires de son choix, dans son dossier, ou vers son imprimante, partir du menu rapide. Le scanner S1300i est fourni avec un connecteur reliant le scanner aux services Cloud les plus utiliss tels que Dropbox, Google Docs, Evernote, SugarSync et Salesforce CRM.Il est dsormais trs facile d'associer et d'enregistrer vos images numrises n'importe o et quand bon vous semble. Si aucune interface de numrisation nest disponible, les utilisateurs de Windows peuvent slectionner loption dossier ScanSnap au sein de lapplication Cloud, ce qui vous permet ensuite deffectuer directement la numrisation vers le nuage laide de la capacit dimportation. Numrisez vers un iPad et un iPhone et dsormais vers les appareils de type Android*, grce lapplication tlchargeable ScanSnap Connect. Tlchargez votre document rapidement, aisment et en toute scurit ; affichez-le et partagez-le instantanment.
name: Fujitsu ScanSnap S1300i Deluxe

description-de_DE-mobile: 18.2MP Exmor R, 10facher optischer Zoom, AVCHD Full HD, 3D, 6.7cm groes LC-Display, hervorragender Automatikmodus, JPEG, DCF, DPOF, MicroUSB 2.0, Mini HDMI, silber
description-de_DE-print: Schlanke, fortschrittliche Cyber-shot mit leistungsstarkem Zoom, Full HD-Film und 3D-Aufnahme - Superschlank mit starkem optischen 10fach-Zoom. - Gestochen scharfe HD-Videos und Standbilder, selbst im Gehen. - Wunderbar scharfe, detailreiche Bilder in schwierigen Lichtverhltnissen. Die weltweit kleinste und leichteste Kamera mit optischem 10fach-Zoom Die erste Kamera ihrer Klasse, die ber einen starken optischen 10fach-Zoom in einem so wunderbar schlanken Gehuse verfgt. Die bedienfreundliche Cyber-shot WX100 nimmt detailreiche Standbilder, 3D-Aufnahmen und beeindruckende Full HD-Videos mit unzhligen kreativen Mglichkeiten auf. Schlank und mit Superzoom Fr beeindruckende Nahaufnahmen ist nicht unbedingt eine groe, sperrige Kamera erforderlich. Die schlanke Cyber-shot verfgt ber ein uerst leistungsstarkes Zoomobjektiv. Mit dieser kompakten Kamera knnen Sie sowohl Weitwinkel- als auch detaillierte Nahaufnahmen einfangen. Magische Momente Nehmen Sie brillante, klare Full HD-Videos auf. Freuen Sie sich auch beim Gehen oder Zoomen auf stabile, verwacklungsfreie Bilder. Die ganze Bildbreite einfangen Atemberaubende Aufnahmen von Landschaften oder Stadtszenen sind kein Problem. Cyber-shot ermglicht High-Speed-Serienaufnahmen bei einem Kameraschwenk (von einer Seite zur anderen oder von oben nach unten) und setzt diese dann automatisch zu einem Bild zusammen. So erzielen Sie beeindruckende Panoramaansichten. Ergebnisse wie bei DSLR-Kamera leicht gemacht Es war nie leichter, erstklassige Bilder aufzunehmen. Mit dem hervorragenden Automatikmodus werden Belichtung und andere Kameraeinstellungen fr optimale Ergebnisse in nahezu jeder Situation angepasst. Der High-Speed-Autofokus hlt Ihr Motiv fr gestochen scharfe Ergebnisse fest. Kreieren Sie wirkungsvolle Effekte Sie bentigen keinen PC oder teure Bildbearbeitungssoftware, um mit der Kamera schne Effekte zu erzielen, die nicht nur Portraits und Panoramaaufnahmen den letzten Schliff verleihen. Whlen Sie aus verschiedenen Bildeffektmodi, um ihr Meisterwerk zu optimieren.
description-en_US-mobile: 18.2MP Exmor R, 10x optical zoom, AVCHD Full HD, 3D, 6.7cm LCD, Superior AUTO, JPEG, DCF, DPOF, MicroUSB 2.0, Mini HDMI, silver
description-en_US-print: Slim, advanced Cyber-shot with powerful zoom, Full HD and 3D shooting. - Super slim with high 10x optical zoom. - Blur-free HD movies and stills, even when walking. - Beautifully clear, detailed images in low light. World's smallest and lightest with 10x optical zoom It's the first camera in its class to pack a powerful 10x optical zoom lens into such a slim, beautiful body. The easy to use Cyber-shot WX100 shoots detail-packed stills, 3D and smooth Full HD video with limitless creative options. Slim with super zoom Big, bold close-ups don't have to mean a big, bulky camera. Cyber-shot packs a powerful zoom lens into its incredibly slim body. So you can capture everything from wide-angle shots to detail-packed close-ups with less to carry. Magical movies Shoot brilliantly crisp, detailed Full HD video clips: you'll enjoy stable, blur-free images even while walking or zooming. Experience the whole picture It's easy to grab breathtaking views of landscapes or city scenes. Cyber-shot stitches together a high-speed burst of frames when you sweep the camera from side to side (or up and down!) to create one amazing panoramic image. DSLR-style results made easy It's never been easier to achieve superb images. Superior Auto Mode adjusts exposure and other camera settings for optimum results in virtually any situation.High-speed autofocus locks onto your subject for pin-sharp results. Create artistic effects You don't need a PC or expensive image editing software to create beautiful 'in camera' effects that enhance portraits, landscapes and more. Pick from a choice of Picture Effect modes to enhance your masterpiece.

description-en_US-mobile: IXUS 500 HS, 10.1MP, 3648 x 2736 px, 1/2.3" CMOS, DIGIC 5, 12x/4x, 14/12, TTL, 1 - 1/4000 s, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") LCD 461000 px, 1920 x 1080 px, 24 fps, Exif 2.3, DCF, DPOF 1.1, MOV, micro SD, micro SDHC, micro SDXC, USB 2.0, HDMI, A/V out, 155 g, Red
description-en_US-print: Digital Compact Camera The IXUS 500 HS brings a big 12x zoom to a compact, stunning metal body - getting you closer, in style. With HS System, Intelligent IS and Smart Auto, shooting great images is easy, even in low light. - 12x zoom in tiny and stunning metal body. - HS System: 10.1 MP CMOS and DIGIC 5. - Intelligent IS. - 7.5 cm (3.0") PureColor II G LCD. - Full HD movies. - Smart Auto (58 scenes). - Face ID. - High-speed shooting. - Movie Digest (720p). - Optional 3m waterproof case. Amazing by design. Tiny, 12x zoom IXUS. 12x zoom in tiny and stunning metal body With a tiny metal body in an amazing finish the IXUS 500 HS packs a powerful 12x optical zoom extending to 21x with ZoomPlus. The huge zoom offers a wide range of shooting options and lets you get right up close to distant objects whether shooting stills or movies. HS System: 10.1 MP CMOS The HS System excels in low light so you can capture the real atmosphere of the scene without flash or tripod. Advanced DIGIC 5 processing and a high sensitivity 10.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor give excellent image quality in all situations. Intelligent IS Intelligent IS automatically adjusts the optical Image Stabilizer to the scene from 7 modes counteracting movement to prevent blur and delivering sharp and detailed photos and movies at full zoom and in low light. 7.5 cm (3.0") PureColor II G LCD A large, high quality 460k dot LCD screen with excellent visibility allows easy framing and reviewing of images from any angle plus effortless menu navigation. A tempered glass outer layer gives excellent durability. Full HD movies Record superb Full HD (1080p) movies at 24fps with stereo sound and optical zoom. Intelligent IS keeps footage steady while filming, even at full zoom. An HDMI connection ensures high quality playback on an HDTV. Smart Auto (58 scenes) Effortlessly shoot great photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and selects perfect settings from 58 variables. It also works with faces registered with Face ID and adapts shooting settings to the persons age for example turning off flash and sounds when a sleeping baby is detected or engaging continuous auto-focus when children over 2 years old are detected. Face ID Face ID lets you register up to 12 faces of family and friends, so they are automatically the focusing priority in every shot, and tags images with their names so they are easy to find in playback. High-speed shooting Never miss a moment. Capture fast-paced action with High-speed Burst or slow down fast movement with Super Slow Motion Movie. Handheld Night Scene combines a sequence of high-speed shots into one file to capture nightscapes without a tripod. Movie Digest (720p) Movie Digest records up to 4-seconds of action before each still shot, joining the days clips into a bonus HD (720p) movie. Optional waterproof case Protect your camera outdoors and shoot underwater down to depths of 3m with an optional waterproof case.
name: Canon Digital IXUS 500 HS

description-en_US-mobile: i2800 (for Government), dual CCD, 600 dpi, USB 2.0, 32 W
description-en_US-print: Energize your information for a competitive edge Todays business runs on information. But when that information is on paper, it can slow you down. Get things flowing faster with the KODAK i2800 Scanner. It lets you extract critical information from documents at the point of entry, for quick distribution to decision-makers who need it. So money to be gained isnt left waiting for choices to be made. No matter what size your business or department is, the reliable performance of the KODAK i2800 Scanner can enable collaboration right from your desktop. It decreases processing time for information that needs to be shared for review, reference, approval, and legal and compliance reasons. This helps increase both internal and external customer satisfaction, and saves your company time and money. Plus, if your business has branch offices or field agents, distributed capture allows document images to be immediately sent to a central location for easy access. Help your company get ahead with a scanning solution that can bring you increased security, faster internal processes, better teamwork, and a host of other business benefitsthe KODAK i2800 Scanner.
name: Kodak i2800 for Govt

description-en_US-mobile: IXUS 240 HS - 16.1MP, 4608 x 3456, 1/2.3" CMOS, DIGIC 5, Full HD, 8.128 cm (3.2 ") LCD Touch screen, USB 2.0, HDMI, IEEE802.11b/g/n, 145g, Black
description-en_US-print: With HS System and a huge touch screen for capturing any moment with ease, the slim IXUS 240 HS offers Wi-Fi connection for instantly sharing your stunning shots. Features - Slim metal body; 24mm, 5x optical zoom - HS System: 16.1 MP CMOS and DIGIC 5 - Intelligent IS - Wi-Fi for easy image sharing - 8.0 cm (3.2") touch screen with Touch Shutter - Full HD movies, HDMI - Smart Auto (58 scenes) - Face ID - High-speed shooting - Movie Digest (720p) Stay in touch with IXUS Slim metal body; 24mm, 5x optical zoom With an elegantly slim metal body, you can take the IXUS 240 HS everywhere. Fit more in the frame with ultra-wide 24mm or get close to distant subjects with 5x optical zoom or up to 10x with ZoomPlus - an advanced zoom technology with more visible detail and sharpness than conventional digital zoom. HS System: 16.1 MP CMOS and DIGIC 5 HS System excels in low light so you can capture the real atmosphere of the moment without flash or tripod. Advanced DIGIC 5 processing and a high-sensitivity 16.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor give exceptional image quality in all situations. Intelligent IS Intelligent IS combats camera shake to ensure all your photos and videos are sharp and detailed even at full zoom or in low light. It automatically adjusts the optical Image Stabilizer to the scene from 7 modes to prevent blur. Wi-Fi for easy image sharing Wi-Fi lets you connect your camera wirelessly with other devices* such as your smartphone, for quick and easy sharing of photos and movies with friends and family. Fingertip control A widescreen, high-resolution 8.0 cm (3.2") PureColor II Touch LCD with customisable smart touch interface provides intuitive control for fast, easy operation and pleasurable playback. Touch Shutter allows you to touch on the point of focus and then to trigger the shot. Full HD movies, HDMI Record superb Full HD (1080p) movies at 24fps with stereo sound and optical zoom. Intelligent IS keeps footage steady while filming, even at full zoom. An HDMI connection ensures high quality playback on an HDTV. Smart Auto (58 scenes) Effortlessly shoot great photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and selects optimal settings from 58 variables (21 in movies). It also works with faces stored in Face ID and adapts shooting according to registered age for example turning off flash and sounds when a sleeping baby is detected. Face ID Face ID registers up to 12 faces of family and friends, so they are automatically the focusing priority in every shot, and tags images with their names so they are easy to find in playback. High-speed shooting Use High-speed Burst to capture non-stop, fast-paced action or slow things down with Super Slow Motion Movie. Movie Digest (720p) Movie Digest records 4 seconds of video before each photo is shot and then joins all the recorded short clips into a bonus HD (720p) movie.
name: Canon Digital IXUS 240 HS

description-en_US-mobile: SmartLF Ci 40
description-en_US-print: The SmartLF Ci 40 is a high speed, large format scanner designed for the CAD & GIS markets. This 40 user friendly, networkable solution features an optical resolution of 600dpi and recreates fine lines and detailed images with exceptional clarity. Features: * Accurate Large Format Scanning 600dpi resolution and CIS technology. * Convenient Face-up feed and exit document scanning for easy operation. * Space saving Compact and lightweight design. * Scan/Copy/E-Mail Straight Away SmartLF ready to run software included. Further Information The SmartLF Ci 40 allows you to scan and copy large format documents quickly with precision and detail without having to outsource your work. When combined with a Canon Large Format Printer, this is an ideal solution for the CAD and GIS markets, where speed and accuracy are paramount. Accurate Document Scanning In the CAD and GIS markets, precision and accuracy are crucial to the success of any project. The Smart LF Ci 40 uses CIS technology and has a 600dpi optical resolution to enable you to re-create fine lines and detailed images when scanning and copying documents, giving you precise reproductions of plans and maps. Space Saving Space is one of the most important assets in most offices. The Ci 40 has been designed with a compact and lightweight design, to be able to fit into small spaces and when required, move with ease. Easy to Use Simple controls and an LCD display, as well as face-up feed and exit document scanning, make scanning and copying easy for all users. Energy Efficient The Ci 40 is Energy Star compliant, powering down when idle to guarantee it uses the minimum amount of power. Network Ready The gigabit ethernet connection means you can easily connect the Ci 40 to your business LAN and enable fast and efficient file transfers. High Productivity Speed is crucial in all businesses, especially when working towards deadlines. The Ci 40 ensures that scans and copies are completed quickly with the ability to scan up to 10 per second. Start Scanning Straight Away The Ci 40 has a plug and play set-up through USB2 and comes with SmartLF all in one scan and copy software to begin scanning and copying straight away.
description-fr_FR-print: Le SmartLF Ci 40 est un scanner haute vitesse, grand format conu pour les domaines de la CAO et du SIG. Prenant en charge les documents d'un mtre de largeur maximum, cette solution conviviale et compatible rseau est dote d'une rsolution optique de 600 ppp et recre les lignes fines et les images riches en dtails avec une clart exceptionnelle. Caractristiques: * Numrisation grand format prcise : rsolution de 600 ppp et technologie CIS. * Pratique : alimentation et sortie recto vers le haut pour la numrisation de documents, permettant une utilisation aise. * Encombrement rduit : design compact et lger. * Numrisez/copiez/envoyez les numrisations par e-mail instantanment grce au logiciel SmartLF prt l'emploi inclus. Informations complmentaires Le SmartLF Ci 40 vous permet de numriser et de copier des documents grand format avec prcision et rapidit, sans devoir faire appel un imprimeur. Utilise conjointement avec une imprimante grand format Canon, cette solution est idale pour les domaines de la CAO et du SIG, o vitesse et prcision sont indispensables. Numrisation prcise de documents Exactitude et prcision sont essentielles la russite des projets des secteurs de la CAO et du SIG. Le Smart LF Ci 40 emploie la technologie CIS et une rsolution optique de 600 ppp qui garantissent la reproduction des lignes fines et des dtails lors de la numrisation et de la copie de documents. Vous obtenez ainsi des copies de plans et de cartes d'une prcision exceptionnelle. Encombrement rduit L'espace est l'une des ressources les plus importantes dans la plupart des bureaux. Le design compact et lger du Ci 40 lui permet de s'insrer dans des espaces rduits et, au besoin, d'tre dplac avec facilit. Simplicit d'utilisation Des commandes simples, un cran LCD, ainsi qu'une alimentation et une sortie recto vers le haut pour la numrisation de documents mettent la numrisation et la copie la porte de tous les utilisateurs. conomies d'nergie Le Ci 40 est conforme la norme Energy Star, s'teignant lors de la mise en veille afin de garantir une consommation lectrique minimale. Mise en rseau simplifie Grce la connexion Gigabit Ethernet, vous pouvez connecter facilement le Ci 40 votre LAN d'entreprise et permettre ainsi des transferts de fichiers rapides et efficaces. Productivit leve La rapidit est essentielle dans toutes les entreprises, en particulier lorsque l'on travaille avec des dlais. Le Ci 40 garantit la rapidit de la numrisation et de la copie des documents grce sa capacit de numrisation pouvant atteindre 25 cm par seconde. Numrisation oprationnelle en un instant Le Ci 40 bnficie d'une installation Plug-and-Play via USB2 ; il est fourni avec le logiciel de numrisation et de copie tout-en-un SmartLF, afin de dbuter la numrisation et la copie sans plus attendre.
name: Canon CanoScan SmartLF Ci 40
