description-de_DE-print: Dank des ergonomischen Designs liegt der Camcorder VP-MX20 ganz bequem in der Hand des Filmenden. Darber hinaus kann er Videos aus vielen verschiedenen Winkeln gleichzeitig aufnehmen. Einfache Handhabung auch ohne Hnde Sie wollen drehen, brauchen aber Ihre Hnde? Dabei hilft Ihnen Ihre eigene Berichterstatter-Ausrstung; der Memory Camcorder. Befestigen Sie das zustzliche Objektiv kabelgebunden oder funkgesteuert und stecken Sie den Camcorder geschtzt in Ihre Tasche. Aufnahme, Start und Stopp steuern Sie direkt am Objektiv.
description-en_US-mobile: VP-MX20 Flash Memory Camcorder Black
description-en_US-print: H.264 technology A smarter way to shoot. The VP-MX20 flash memory camcorders offer a more exciting approach to home movie making. With longer battery and recording time, they make sure that you never miss the opportunity to record a magical moment and give you more memories to treasure, forever. i-Check Without turning the power on you can have a quick view of remaining battery and memory by pressing the i-Check button. Share your memories, share your life Sharing your life with friends and family becomes easier with the VP-MX20. By selecting Web & Mobile mode, you can shoot in a format perfected for H.264 supporting MP3 players and YouTube. The video files recorded by the VP-MX25/MX20 can easily be applied to a transfer program and played on an H.264 supporting MP3 player. The YouTube uploader in the Mediashow software bundle enables direct YouTube upload which bypasses the YouTube homesite. Free style shooting Fits easily into the palm for quick-and-easy shooting. For further convenience, Samsung's proprietary swivel hand-grip enables the newly launched camcorders to record from multiple angles, including regular and hard-to-reach low angle shots. A world class lens, a world class camcorder With a 680K CCD, a 34x optical zoom and a prestigious Schneider lens, the VP-MX20 is designed for budding film makers. It's also bulit for the road: with 10 automatic scene modes, the iScene feature ensures quality footage is captured no matter what the surrounding envirnmoent throws at the user. 2.7" touch screen You'll never miss a shot with the 2.7" touch screen LCD display. Catch more of the action and guarantee that the entire image is recorded. Face Detection for Better Results Support Samsung's Face Dectection technology. This innovative feature automatically detects up to 12 faces within a frame and adjusts focus and exposure to make sure that the subjects are in the best possible light.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Ce camscope HD est le tout dernier modle de sa ligne.
description-fr_FR-print:
Il fait partie des camscopes HD les plus petits et les plus lgers au monde. Grce ses capacits HD, vous obtiendrez du camscope SD une exceptionnelle qualit dimage aussi bien sur son cran que sur votre tlviseur compatible HD.
technologie SAMSUNG DNIe et nouveau systme de puce intgre
Dcouvrez des images plus naturelles et plus belles avec notre technologie DNle. Profitez des nombreuses fonctions avances du camscope: Rduction du bruit 3D, Rendu des couleurs avanc, Hyper stabilisateur dimage numrique, Super LCD plus et Autofocus Dtection de visages. La puce SAMSUNG rallonge la dure de vie de la batterie, augmente le temps denregistrement et offre une bien meilleure qualit d'image numrique. En intgrant au camscope un systme de contrle muni dune puce puissante, la consommation dnergie est nettement rduite. Cela vous permet de filmer toujours plus dinstants prcieux et de les conserver toute votre vie.
rduction du bruit 3D
Grce la rduction du bruit 3D, le MX20 repousse toutes les frontires tablies. Il limine considrablement les bruits tout en conservant larte et le motif de limage. L'analyse du mouvement des images permet de les sparer en deux groupes: les artes et motifs et les images diffrentielles. Elles sont ensuite traites par diffrents filtres qui conservent les artes et les motifs tout en supprimant les bruits. Aprs la phase de filtrage, les images sont recomposes et votre vido ne contient plus aucun parasite!
des couleurs plus clatantes
Le traitement Digital Natural Color (Couleurs Naturelles Numriques) cre une palette de couleurs plus complte qui se rapproche davantage de celle que l'on peut admirer dans la nature. Le MX20 va plus loin que le RVB, il ajuste automatiquement les images partir d'un spectre de quatre couleurs CMJV. De cette faon, il recre plus fidlement les couleurs que vous voyez et conservez dans vos souvenirs: des couleurs d'un ralisme tonnant.
technologie AF Dtection de visages
Le MX20 est bien plus volu que les camscopes classiques grce sa technologie avance dAutofocus Dtection de visages qui lui permet de faire la mise au point sur plusieurs visages. Avec la fonction intelligente AF Dtection de visages, la mise au point des visages est automatique mme sils ne sont pas au centre de lcran. Cette technologie SAMSUNG vous permet de raliser des vidos plus nettes et dune meilleure qualit.
une dure denregistrement plus longue pour conserver davantage de souvenirs
Enregistrez plus de vidos de grande qualit avec le SAMSUNG MX20. Grce aux hautes performances de son codec H.264, le MX20 vous permet d'enregistrer plus de souvenirs qu'un camscope qui utilise le codec MPEG2. A capacit identique, le MX20 est capable d'enregistrer deux fois plus quun camscope quip du codec MPEG2. Les fichiers vido compresss peuvent tre plus facilement envoys par mail ou tlchargs sur Internet. Le partage de fichiers devient un jeu d'enfant, sans perte de qualit!
name: Samsung VP-MX20 Black

description-en_US-print: Stunning photos in seconds Getting great pictures has never been easier thanks to the NX100's i-Function lens. Thats because NX100s built-in i-Scene mode allows your camera to automatically recognize what type of lens has been attached, and suggests which kind of scene a particular lens type is best-suited forsimply select and choose the scene you like, and your camera is optimized to take the perfect shot. Additionally, with the i-Function Lens and its convenient i-Function button, you can easily change composition parameters (ISO, shutter speed, aperture, EV, WB) adjusting for ideal exposure settings in any type of shooting situation. Snap stunning photos in style The Samsung NX100 incorporates innovative design, advanced features and professional quality into a compact form. DSLR cameras typically offer the highest level of performance available but tend to be bulky and cumbersome in design. The Samsung NX100s sleek, leaf-like design revolutionizes the traditional camera with a compact form. Typically, DSLR cameras require more space between the lens and CMOS sensor (flangeback size). Thanks to the reduced flangeback size as well as the Live View System which eliminates the need for a space-consuming pentaprism, the NX100 is small, slim, and compactbut still delivers professional results. Also, youll see how easy and comfortable it is to hold NX100 with its curved sides and smooth exterior finish. The NX100 goes wherever you go for professional, high-quality photos that you never thought were possible from a camera that fits in your pocket or purse. Super large image sensor offers utmost image quality and rich natural colors The Samsung NX100 is equipped with a super large APS-C size CMOS sensor that reproduces rich and natural colors for exquisitely clear images even in low light settings.
name: Samsung NX 100

description-en_US-print: imageFORMULA DR-6010C Production Scanner The imageFORMULA DR-6010C departmental scanner delivers high speed, reliable document handling, and high quality images, in a small package. Flexibility, rich features, and ease-of-use, help maximize return on investment at all levels of the business system. The DR-6010C was developed to offer another option for decentralized capture scanning needs. In combination with its sister product, the imageFORMULA DR-4010C, these scanners offer competitive document imaging platforms designed to increase efficiencies and workflows in decentralized scanning environments. Features: High Speed: Capable of maintaining the same high scanning speeds in color, grayscale and black and white up to 200 dpi up to 60 ppm and 120 ipm. Suggested Daily Volume: Built to match the volume requirements of decentralized departmental scanning. Advanced Sensor: Employ advanced three line CIS sensors enable prompt transition of hardcopy documents into electronic files. High Flexibility: Capable of reliably handling a wide variety of document sizes, from 2.1 by 2.8 inches up to 8.6 by 14 inches. A Long Document Mode enables scanning of documents up to 118 inches in length. Flexible paper feed and output trays enhance reliable scanning of batches of mixed document sizes. Reliable Feeding: Employ Canon's advanced and unique feeding mechanism as well as such features as Ultrasonic Double Feed Detection and Rapid Recovery to ensure smooth and reliable document feeding. Combined with solid body design and heavy-duty feed and eject trays to help minimize downtime and help maintain business continuity. High Image Quality: Employ advanced three line CIS sensors with an automatic dust-free shading calibration mechanism to capture intricate details with up to 600 dpi resolution. Image quality can be further enhanced using such features as Advanced Text Enhancement, Moire Reduction, and Remove Bleed Through. Small size: Easily fits on a desktop. Ease-of-use: User friendly operation through programmable pre-registered Scan-To-Job buttons. Front Side Operation: Ergonomic design with a U-Turn paper path, that allows a user to conveniently feed and retrieve documents from the front side, and an advanced document feed tray space saving design, that employs the front cover as document feed tray when open.
name: Canon DR DR-6010C

description-en_US-print: Light, compact, easy to use Cyber-shot camera 16.1 megapixels, 5x zoom, 720p HD movie, Optical SteadyShot, 6.7 cm LCD, Sweep Panorama and iAUTO. - Carl Zeiss lens with 5x optical zoom. - Shoot extra-wide images with 360 Sweep Panorama. - Easy operation, even for beginners. Superb images made simple Light, compact and comfortable to carry, the Cyber-shot W630 digital camera is your perfect companion for holidays, family get-togethers and more. Superb image quality is teamed with simple, uncluttered operation - even if you're a first-time digital camera user. Magical movies Shoot brilliantly crisp, detailed HD video clips: you'll enjoy stable, blur-free images even while walking or zooming. Better looking pictures made easy Not sure how to pick the perfect camera settings to suit a particular scene? Help is at hand. Intelligent Auto (iAUTO) mode automatically adjusts exposure and other camera settings for optimum results in a wide range of shooting situations. Experience the whole picture It's easy to grab breathtaking views of landscapes or city scenes. Cyber-shot stitches together a high-speed burst of frames when you sweep the camera from side to side (or up and down!) to create one amazing panoramic image. Beautiful portraits Capture beautiful, smiling portraits of friends and family. Face Detection adjusts camera settings for clear, crisp results with natural skin tones. Smile Shutter fires the shutter automatically to capture those happy moments. - 16.1 effective megapixels CCD sensor - Captures extremely high quality images, allowing detail-packed enlargements. - 5x optical zoom/25mm wide angle lens - High quality zoom lens by Carl Zeiss covers a wide range of shooting situations, with wide angle for group shots / landscapes. - BIONZ processor - Powerful image processing ensures clear, detailed, low-noise images and quick, responsive shooting. - Intelligent Auto Mode - Camera recognises a wide range of common shooting situations, optimising settings for clear, natural results without fuss. - Artistic Picture Effect modes - Create four exciting 'in camera' effects - Toy Camera, Partial Colour, Soft High-Key, Pop Colour. - 720p HD movie - Record smooth, high quality HD video clips using Motion JPEG format (720p): optical zoom possible during video shooting. - Optical SteadyShot Active Mode - Cuts shaky camera movements when shooting video, even while walking or zooming: Optical SteadyShot cuts blur when shooting stills. - 360 Sweep Panorama - Sweep the camera and grab extra-wide images of landscapes, city scenes and tall buildings; new 360 mode captures an all-round view. - 6.7cm/2.7" Clear Photo LCD - High quality LCD screen (230k dot resolution) offers excellent detail, high contrast and wide viewing angle. - HD output - View video and still images on HD TV (requires optional cable): PhotoTV HD enhances viewing on compatible BRAVIA. - Face Detection - Automatically adjusts focus, exposure and white balance for clearer portraits and priority selectable for children / adults. - Smile Shutter - Automatically fires shutter when subject smiles: with adjustable smile threshold and priority selectable for children / adults. - Self Portrait Timer - Detects correct framing when camera is held at arm's length; shutter fires automatically for great self portraits. - Easy Shooting mode - Fuss-free operation for beginners with large, easy-to-read on-screen instructions. - In-Camera Guide - Get on-screen tips and information on operating your camera without leafing through instruction manuals. - In-camera retouching - Fun in-camera still image retouching functions including Trimming, Red-Eye correction, Unsharp Masking. - PlayMemories Home - Pre-installed software makes it easy to transfer images to PC for viewing, editing, printing, emailing, web uploads and more. - Memory card compatibility - Cyber-shot accepts a wide range of cards, including Memory Stick and SD/SDHC - see Technical Specifications for compatibility.
name: Sony W630

description-en_US-mobile: 1/2.3 type CMOS, 12.1M, DIGIC 4, 5.0 - 40.0 mm, f/3.0  f/5.9, 7.5 cm (3.0) PureColor II G LCD (TFT), SD, SDHC, SDXC, Hi-Speed USB
description-en_US-print: With an 8x zoom lens, Full HD and the low-light skills of the HS System, the fashionably slim IXUS 230 HS is the perfect partner for nights out. Smart Auto lets you focus on living life to the full. Sharp, versatile, intelligent A powerful 8x optical zoom lets you home in on details of far away objects or fit more in the frame with the 28mm wide-angle lens for great group shots and landscapes. Intelligent IS automatically adjusts the optical Image Stabilizer to the scene from 7 modes to prevent blur and deliver sharp and detailed photos and videos. HS System HS System excels in low light allowing you to capture the real atmosphere of the moment without flash or tripod. A high performance DIGIC 4 processor and high sensitivity sensor combine to give superior image quality in all situations. Smart and compact One of the slimmest 8x zoom cameras available, the IXUS 230 HS has a compact, elegant metal body thats small enough to carry in your pocket. 7.5 cm (3.0") PureColor II G LCD A large, high quality 460k dot LCD screen allows easy framing and reviewing of images from any angle and effortless menu navigation. A tempered glass outer layer gives excellent durability. Full HD movies, Powered IS Create Full HD (1080p) movies with stereo sound youll be proud to share. Use the optical zoom to get close to the action while the optical Image Stabilizer keeps your movies steady. A dedicated movie button lets you switch instantly from stills to movie mode; an HDMI-CEC connector allows easy playback on an HDTV. Smart Auto Effortlessly shoot high quality photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and selects the perfect settings from 32 variables (21 in movie). All you have to do is point and shoot. High-speed Burst. Super Slow Motion Movie High-speed Burst delivers non-stop photo shooting, capturing 8.7 shots per second (3.0 MP), so you never miss a thing. Super Slow Motion Movie slows fast-paced action up to an 1/8th of the real speed. iFrame movie (720p). Movie Digest Shoot PC and Mac friendly HD video (720p) in the optimised Apple iFrame format for fast importing, easy editing and simple sharing. Movie Digest records up to 4-seconds of action before each still shot, joining the days clips into a bonus VGA movie. Creative modes Explore your creativity with fun shooting modes. Effects include Toy Camera for an older style camera look, Miniature to transform a photo or movie scene into a scale model and Monochrome. Hints & Tips Simple Hints & Tips interface messages offer step-by-step menu guidance making it easy to understand camera features and settings.

Mode "Smart Auto" Ralisez facilement des photos et vidos en mode Smart Auto, qui dtecte le type de scne et slectionne les meilleurs rglages possibles parmi un choix de 32 configurations (21 pour les vidos). description-en_US-mobile: imageCLASS D1350 - 4-in-1, Laser, 35 ppm, 6s, 600 x 600 dpi, LCD Display, 128 MB, 33.6 Kbps, Fast Ethernet, USB 2.0, White
description-en_US-print:
The new imageCLASS D1350 offers your small or medium business speed, convenience and reliability. This device was designed to exceed all of your business needs. It combines the ability to copy, print, scan and fax into one easy-to-use machine.

The D1350 has multiple features that will allow you to be productive throughout the entire day. It features a 500-sheet cassette plus 50-sheet multipurpose tray1 and has print and copy speeds of up to 35 pages-per-minute2. With Quick First Print Technology, your first copy will be ready in approximately 8 seconds3. The 50-sheet Duplex Automatic Document Feeder (DADF) will allow you to copy or color scan from one or two-sided originals and produce two-sided output effortlessly, reducing your paper usage to as much as half.

A step up from the D1320, you have the ability to send and receive faxes with the D1350. This model uses a built-in 33.6 Kbps Super G34 fax modem. This machine includes fax features such as 19 one-touch speed dial numbers, 181 coded speed dial numbers, memory capacity of up to 512 sheets5, and duplex faxing.

The intelligent Energy Saver Mode reduces your power consumption to approximately 2.3 watts of energy and the product meets Energy Star guidelines, helping you save money on energy costs. The D1350 also features Department ID Management which allows you to set limits on who can use the machine and how much they can print, copy or scan. This can also be another effective solution for saving money.

The imageCLASS D1350 also incorporates the Canon Single Cartridge System, which combines the toner and drum in one unit making it easy to replace. The result is outstanding image quality and eliminating the complication and warehousing of separate toner and drum consumables.
name: Canon imageCLASS D1350

description-en_US-print: Samsung S Series is built with great features and capabilities. The S series is an innovative approach to monitor stand design due to its ability to house circuitry and other devices within its casing. This facilitates a slim design and minimises the amount of loose cables and wires. The S series can also be wall mounted, providing businesses with great versatility and interior design options. The S series model comes in three different screen sizes and two different models to suit individual business needs. All-in-one design Samsung's innovative Cloud Display integrates a thin client into the LED* screen. Its contemporary and innovative design ensures that keeping your work environment clean and tidy is simple. The benefit of not having a separate thin client box is that you can use your desk space in a productive manner. These innovative features come together perfectly for an all-in-one design that increases desktop space. * Samsungs LED TVs utilise LCD Screens with LED edge lights. Remote management S/W Samsungs Cloud Monitor delivers amazing levels of convenience by using the remote management software of MagicRMS Pro. It delivers a more centralised operation and saves administrators the time and hassle associated with physically having to visit each device for routine checks. Other benefits include real-time device status monitoring, an efficient and accurate inventory process and finally remote upgrading of firmware to all devices. With so many standout benefits for day-to-day operations, the MagicRMS software really is essential to any efficient office environment. Citrix Zero Cliend Monitor Innovative zero client technology allows consolidation of most of your IT resources into a data centre, and provides high-performance computing via the web interface network without reduction in performance or information, this provides a virtualised set of hardware to the operating system. It lets you run virtual multiple machines. The HDX chipset and onboard processing distributes video, audio and data contents while preserving high performance and real-time graphics. Little Maintenance Because all software and data is stored on the centralised host platform. The network is easy to install and easy to maintain.
name: Samsung TS190C

description-de_DE-mobile: HP LaserJet Pro P1606dn Printer
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Steigern Sie die Produktivitt in Ihrer Broumgebung mit Ethernet-Netzwerktechnologie, automatischem beidseitigen Druck und benutzerfreundlichen Funktionen. Sparen Sie Geld und Energie mit der Instant-on-Technologie. Mit der HP Auto-On/Auto-Off Technologie4 sparen Sie noch mehr Energie.

Features
Dieser schnelle HP LaserJet Drucker ist perfekt geeignet fr die Druckaufkommen in einem kleinen, betriebsamen Bro.
• Durch integrierte 10/100 Ethernet-Netzwerktechnologie lsst sich der kompakte Drucker in kleinen Bros anschlieen und gemeinsam nutzen.

Bleiben Sie fokussiert mit einfachem mobilen Drucken1 und schneller Einrichtung.
• Drucken Sie praktisch berall mit HP ePrint1. Einfaches Drucken von Smartphones oder anderen Internet-fhigen Gerten aus. Und mit AirPrint knnen Sie auf einfache Weise Wireless von Ihrem iPad, iPhone und iPod touch aus drucken2.

Entscheiden Sie sich fr einen Drucker, mit dem Sie Papier, Energie und Geld sparen.
• Sparen Sie mithilfe der Instant-on-Technologie3 bis zu 50 Prozent an Energie gegenber Laserdruckern anderer Anbieter.

Nutzen Sie kosteneffektiven Laserdruck, und berzeugen Sie andere von Ihren Profiqualitten.
• Erstellen Sie Geschftsdokumente in Spitzenqualitt mit brillanten, gestochen scharfen Texten und Bildern.

1 Das mobile Endgert muss fr Wireless aktiviert sein und sich im Wireless Bereich des Druckers befinden. Drucker muss fr HP ePrint aktiviert sein und erfordert gegebenenfalls ein Firmware-Upgrade. Funktion kann den Download von Treibern oder Apps auf das mobile Endgert erfordern, verfgbar unter www.hp.com/go/printercenter.
2 Untersttzt Gerte mit iOS 4.2 (iPad, iPhone 4, iPhone 3GS und 3. und 4. Generation von iPod touch), die Multitasking untersttzen. Funktioniert mit Druckern und All-in-One Gerten, die fr HP ePrint aktiviert sind. AirPrint und Gerte mit iOS 4.2 erfordern eine 802.11 Wireless Netzwerkverbindung zum Drucker. Die Wireless Leistung ist abhngig von den Umgebungsbedingungen und der Entfernung vom Zugangspunkt. AirPrint und das AirPrint Logo sind Marken von Apple Inc. iPad, iPhone und iPod touch sind eingetragene Marken von Apple Inc. in den USA und anderen Lndern.
3 Energieersparnis laut HP Tests, wobei der typische Stromverbrauch, wie im ENERGY STAR-Programm vorgegeben, fr HP LaserJet Produkte mit Instant-on-Technologie berechnet und mit dem Wert entsprechender Modelle anderer Anbieter verglichen wurde (Stand: Mrz 2009).
4 HP Auto-On- und Auto-Off-Funktionen hngen vom Drucker und den Einstellungen ab.
description-en_US-mobile: Laser, 25 ppm, 600 x 600, Duplex printing, 60 - 163 g/m, 400 MHz, 32 MB, PCL 5e, USB 2.0/Fast Ethernet, Black
description-en_US-print: Boost your small office's efficiency with Ethernet networking, automatic two-sided printing and easy-to-use features. Save money and energy with Instant-on Technology. Save even more energy with HP Auto-On/Auto-Off Technology. For small offices where a shared, fast laser printer helps reduce environmental impact with automatic two-sided printing and energy-saving features. Fast laser printing with built-in productivity features designed for small offices. - Connect and share this compact printer among a small office, using 10/100 Ethernet networking. Ethernet connectivity makes it easy for you to connect your printing network. - Print documents fastup to 26 ppm letter/25 ppm A4. With Instant-on Technology, pages start and finish printing fasterget a first page out in as fast as 7 seconds. - Choose the media that best suits your business purpose. The 250-sheet paper tray and 10-sheet priority input slot handle a wide variety of media typescard stock, transparencies, labels, envelopes and paper up to legal size. - Save time and boost your printing productivity with automatic two-sided printing. Print on both sides of the paper without manually flipping pages Innovative technology that saves you paper, energy and money. - Reduce your impact on the environment and use up to 50 percent less paper with automatic two-sided printing. - Get up to 50 percent energy savings over competitive laser products, using Instant-on Technology. And get additional, effortless savings with HP Auto-On/Auto-Off Technologyit senses your printing activity, turning on and off automatically. - Reduce wasted paper by printing only the content you want. HP Smart Web Printing delivers more usable web pages by printing web pages without cutoff edges and blank pages. - Minimal packaging is made from 10 to 30 percent recycled material, reducing your impact on the environment. Cardboard packaging is 100% recyclable. Get free, easy and responsible recycling of cartridges through HP Planet Partners. Professional, cost-effective laser printing. - Produce professional-quality printsHP spherically shaped toner consistently delivers bold, crisp text and sharp images. - When printing professional black-and-white documents, HP FastRes 1200 delivers sharp, clear output quickly. HP FastRes produces smaller print files, crisp text, even tones and smooth business graphics. - Save space with an ultra-compact, space-saving printer with a sleek, industrial design. Improve your office environment by selecting the "quiet" mode. - HP Page Description Language (PCL5e) helps ensure consistent communication across a wide range of devices and is more likely to be compatible with your company's existing infrastructure. Reliable performance with ease-of-use. - Get out-of-the-box driver installation. HP Smart Install makes it easy to quickly set up the printer without a CDjust plug in and install. - Set up and start printing right away with an easy-to-use, intuitive control panel. The simplified interface includes four LED lights a lighted power button, cancel button and a "go" button for easy access to functions. - Receive reliable, outstanding resultspage after page, cartridge after cartridgeusing Original HP supplies designed for your printer. When it's time to replace a toner cartridge, HP SureSupply helps you find and purchase the right supplies. - HP Total Care gives you more value and results from your technology, for your business. The portfolio of services, software, solutions and support from HP and our partners helps manage, protect and grow your businessno matter what stage its in.
description-fr_FR-print:
Overview
Renforcez l'efficacit de votre petite entreprise avec mise en rseau Ethernet, impression recto verso automatique et fonctionnalits simples d'utilisation. conomisez de l'argent et de l'nergie avec la technologie Instant-on. Ralisez des conomies d'nergie supplmentaires grce la technologie HP Auto-On/Auto-Off4.

Features
Faites face aux exigences d'impression d'une petite entreprise trs active grce cette imprimante rapide HP LaserJet.
• Connectez et partagez cette imprimante compacte au sein d'une petite entreprise grce la mise en rseau Ethernet 10/100 intgre.

Gardez le cap avec l'impression mobile facile1 et la configuration rapide.
• Imprimez o que vous soyez avec HP ePrint1. Imprimez facilement depuis votre smartphone ou d'autres priphriques compatibles Internet. Et avec AirPrint, vous pouvez simplement imprimer sans fil partir de votre iPad, iPhone ou iPod touch2.

Choisissez une imprimante vous aidant conomiser du papier, de l'nergie et de l'argent.
• Ralisez jusqu' 50% d'conomies d'nergie de plus qu'avec des produits laser concurrents grce la technologie Instant-on3.

Offrez une image professionnelle grce une impression laser rentable.

1 Le priphrique mobile doit tre compatible sans fil et dans la porte sans fil de l'imprimante. L'imprimante doit tre compatible HP ePrint et peut ncessiter une mise niveau du micrologiciel. La fonction peut ncessiter le tlchargement de pilotes/d'applications sur le priphrique mobile (www.hp.com/go/eprintercenter).
2 Prend en charge les priphriques iOS 4.2 (iPad, iPhone 4, iPhone 3GS et iPOD de 3e et 4e gnration) qui prennent en charge le traitement multitche. Fonctionne avec les imprimantes et tout-en-un compatibles HP ePrint. AirPrint et les priphriques iOS 4.2 ncessitent une connexion rseau sans fil 802.11 l'imprimante. Les performances sans fil dpendent de l'environnement physique et de la distance par rapport au point d'accs. AirPrint et le logo AirPrint sont des marques commerciales d'Apple Inc. iPad, iPhone et iPod touch sont des marques commerciales d'Apple Inc., aux tats-Unis et dans d'autres pays.
3 conomies d'nergie reposant sur des tests HP utilisant la mthode TEC (consommation nergtique typique) du programme ENERGY STAR sur les produits HPLaserJet quips de la technologie Instant-on par rapport aux modles les plus comptitifs en mars 2009.
4 Les fonctions HP Auto-On et Auto-Off dpendent de l'imprimante et des paramtres.

description-de_DE-mobile: HP HD-5210 Webcam
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Die hochwertige HP HD 5210 Webcam bertrgt Videos per Streaming schnell, exakt und reibungslos bei wesentlich geringerer Bandbreite. Profitieren Sie von noch nie da gewesener herausragender Technologie und innovativen Funktionen.

Features
• Die bahnbrechende H.264-Technologie ist Bestandteil der HP HD 5210. Die Bildqualitt ist so hoch, dass sie Skype-zertifiziert wurde. Nur mit dieser Auszeichnung sind H.264-basierte HD-Web-Chats ber Skype gewhrleistet.

• Die Blu-ray--Qualitt der aufgezeichneten Bilder ist beeindruckend. Wenn Sie maximale Auflsung und spektakulre Videoqualitt im Breitbildformat wnschen, dann ist diese Webcam mit nativem HD-Widescreen (1.920 x 1.080) wie fr Sie geschaffen.

• Autofokus und die ber HP TrueVision verfgbare automatische Belichtung sind im Lieferumfang enthalten. Gesichtserkennung und digitales Zoomen (Fnffachzoom). Die vielseitig einsetzbare Befestigung bietet 270 Schwenkwinkel/30 Neigungswinkel und lsst sich berall anbringen. Das uerst kompakte Design unterstreicht die erstklassige Glaslinse.

• War es jemals einfacher? Einmal klicken zum Hochladen, und schon stehen Ihre Inhalte fr Ihre Onlinekontakte bereit. Es besteht schneller Zugriff auf Facebook, YouTube und zum ersten Mal auch auf Twitter und Flickr.

• Hochwertige Materialien mit attraktiver gebrsteter Metallleiste runden das uerst kompakte Design ab. Obwohl die HD 5210 nur etwa halb so gro wie vergleichbare Webcams ist, ist sie mit mehr Technik ausgestattet.
description-en_US-mobile: HD-5210 Webcam - Full HD 1080p sensor, H.264, USB 2.0
description-en_US-print:
- HP's HD 5210 high-end webcam streams faster, clearer and smoother video over much less bandwidth. It's superb technology and advanced features than you've experienced before.
- The ground-breaking H.264 technology is right here in the HP HD 5210. Your image quality is so high, its been Skype-certified. That stamp of approval is the only way to ensure true H.264 HD web chats via Skype.
- You'll be amazed by the Blu-ray quality images you can record. If you're looking for the highest resolution and the most spectacular video quality in true widescreen format, this webcam with a native HD 1920 x 1080 widescreen was made just for you.
- Auto-focus and HP's TrueVision auto-light exposure are included. Face tracking and 5x digital zoom capabilities. Versatile swivel clip270 pan/30 tiltmounts anywhere. Ultra-compact design highlights the premium glass component lens.
- Have you ever seen it this easy? Just a 1 click upload and you're sharing with your on-line world. You've got fast access to Facebook, YouTube and for the first time- Twitter & Flickr.
- High-end materials with attractive brushed metal trim frame this ultra- compact style. And, although the HD 5210 is almost 1/2 the size of comparable webcams, it's packed with more technology.
description-fr_FR-print:
Overview
La webcam HD haut de gamme HP 5210 offre un flux vido plus rapide, plus nette et plus agrable en utilisant une bande passante bien moindre. Une technologie fantastique et des fonctionnalits avances comme vous n'en avez jamais rencontres auparavant.

Features
• La technologie rvolutionnaire H.264 quipe le HP HD 5210. La qualit de l'image est tellement leve que ce modle a reu la certification Skype. Cette homologation est la seule garantir de vritables conversations vido HD avec le codec H.264 HD sur Skype .

• Vous serez conquis par les images de qualit Blu-ray Intel que vous pouvez enregistrer. Si vous recherchez la rsolution la plus leve et la qualit vido la plus spectaculaire dans un format cran large vritable, cette webcam qui offre un mode HD cran large 1920 x 1080 de srie est faite pour vous.

• Les fonctions autofocus et auto-exposition la lumire HP TrueVision sont incluses. Suivi des visages et zoom numrique 5x. Cette pince polyvalente et pivotante (rotation 270/inclinaison 30) s'adapte partout. La conception ultra-compacte met en vidence l'objectif dot d'un verre de qualit.

• Avez-vous jamais vu quelque chose d'aussi facile ? Tlchargement en un seul clic pour partager avec votre monde en ligne. Vous avez un accs rapide Facebook, YouTube et, pour la premire fois, Twitter et Flickr.

• Des matriaux haut de gamme avec un mtal bross sduisant donnent du style ce modle ultra-compact. Et, mme si la HD 5210 a une taille de presque la moiti de celle de webcams comparables, elle renferme davantage de technologie.

description-en_US-print: Advanced image quality Capture every detail with 18-megapixel resolution, and enjoy the smooth tones and accurate colours of 14-bit DIGIC 5 image processing. The EOS 650D produces files big enough to print at large sizes or crop for alternative compositions without sacrificing quality. Produce Full HD movie projects Capture premium-quality movies at 1080p resolution, enjoying the right level of automatic or manual control for you. Autofocus is possible while filming, and a built in microphone enables the recording of high-quality stereo audio. Keep up with fast moving action Track moving objects accurately across the frame with an autofocus system comprising nine cross-type AF points. Continuous shooting at 5 fps for bursts of up to 22 frames means youll never miss that decisive moment. Explore new viewpoints The EOS 650D has a Vari-angle 7.7cm (3.0) 3:2 ratio Clear View LCD II Touch screen that hinges away from the cameras body and rotates through 270. This enables video and still-image shooting from alternative viewpoints such as over the top of crowds or from waist level. Touch-screen control Enjoy alternative access to the EOS 650Ds controls through a Vari-angle Clear View LCD II Touch screen. Shoot and focus with a single tap and use pinch and swipe gestures when reviewing images. Low-light performance The EOS 650D can capture images over a sensitivity range of ISO 100-12,800, enabling hand-held shooting in low light without using flash. Integrated Speedlite Transmitter Explore creative lighting options by positioning Canon Speedlite flashes off camera and controlling them with the EOS 650Ds Integrated Speedlite Transmitter. Scene Intelligent Auto Canons Scene Intelligent Auto technology analyses each scene and sets the most appropriate combination of cameras settings automatically. Great results in difficult conditions HDR Backlight control captures three different exposures and combines them into one, retaining shadow and highlight detail. The EOS 650Ds hand-held night scene mode captures multiple images at fast shutter speeds and blends them together for a blur-free result.

description-en_US-mobile: 5130cdn - laser, 45 ppm A4, 1200 x1200 dpi, USB2.0, Gigabit Ethernet
description-en_US-print:
Discover excellent print quality, exceptional value and outstanding reliability with the blazing-fast DellTM 5130cdn Colour Laser Printer.

- High Performance: Up to 45 ppm (A4) (actual print speed will vary with use), excellent print quality
- High Productivity: Monthly duty cycle of up to 110,000 pages
- Lasting Value: Low cost per page; energy-conscious design
Superb Performance
The Dell 5130cdn Colour Laser Printer slashes printing and waiting time while delivering high-quality laser prints.

Blazing Print Speeds: The Dell 5130cdn delivers A4-sized pages at a speed of up to 45 ppm (pages per minute) in both mono and colour. (Actual print speeds will vary with use.) Print duplex pages at up to 36 ppm (A4) in both mono and colour. (Actual print speeds will vary with use.)
- Fast Warm-Up: The Dell 5130cdn delivers a first-print-out time (FPOT) as fast as 8.5 seconds in mono and 10 seconds in colour.
- Excellent Print Quality: ColourbyDell technology incorporates an innovative print engine, advanced image-enhancement algorithm and advanced toner technology to deliver brilliant colour printouts with crisp, clear text.
- Rich, Glossy Colour Images: Advanced EA-Eco Toner emulsion aggregation process saturates paper with superfine toner particles for brilliant colour reproduction.

Designed to help control print and office expenses, the Dell 5130cdn offers one of the most compelling total costs of printing (TCOP) and costs per page (CPP) in the industry.
Cost-Effective Controls:
Dell ColourTrack Pro technology can lower your total cost of printing by remotely defining colour-printing rights and setting print-volume limitations.

Power-Efficient Design:
Energy Star 1.1 qualified, the Dell 5130cdn Colour Printer reduces power consumption up to 31% compared to the previous-generation Dell 5110cn with the new EA-Eco Toners.
name: DELL 5130cdn

description-en_US-mobile: Print, Copy, Fax, Scan, 50/55ppm, 2400dpi, 80GB HDD, 2048MB RAM, Duplex, USB 2.0, Gigabit Ethernet
description-en_US-print:
The Xerox Color 550/560 Printer is a high-performance, professional, light production/multifunction printer best suited for graphic arts, pay-for-print, commercial print and corporate environments. It copies and prints with incredible color control up to 2400 x 2400 dpi resolution. It also can fax, as well as scan at high speed  in color or monochrome  to PC, USB or email. Numerous finishing and color server options make it flexible to fit your unique needs, and grow along with your business.

- A true multifunction product  print, copy, fax and scan, including scan to PC, USB or email, and mobile printing.
- Enhanced productivity at 50 ppm color/65 ppm black in copy mode; 50 ppm color/ 80 ppm black in network scanning mode.
- Benchmark image quality with 2400 x 2400 dpi resolution and EA low melt toner for a smooth, offset-like finish.
- Makes mobile printing simpler and more convenient.
- Expansive media range lets you print everything from postcards to posters, both coated and uncoated stock, up to 300 gsm.
- Xerox Extensible Interface Platform (EIP) allows you to connect to third-party software solutions that you can access from the touch-screen of the device.
- Your choice of 2 internal color servers and 3 powerful external color servers to best fit your environment:

- Xerox Integrated Color Server
- Xerox Integrated Fiery Color Server
- EX Print Server, powered by Fiery
- CX Print Server, powered by Creo
- Xerox FreeFlow Print Server

- Inline finishing options offer a professional polish with stapling, hole-punching, folding and booklet making for presentations, brochures, reports and newsletters.
- Be secure with integrated security features such as IP filtering, image overwrite, secure print, encrypted scan-to-email, authentication and IPv6 support.
name: Xerox Color 550 R

description-en_US-mobile: NX1000 - 20.3MP, CMOS, 5472 x 3648, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT LCD, 640 x 480, Full HD Video, SD/SDHC/SDXC, USB 2.0, HDMI 1.4a, 222g, White
description-en_US-print: From its sleek and stylish design to its incredibly simple user interface, the NX1000 has been designed to be an extension of your creativity. As simple as it is to use, the NX1000 is a highly capable camera. Its super high-resolution APS-C sensor (20.3 megapixels) allows for photos with incredible detail that allow high quality enlargements to be made. With built-in WiFi features, the NX1000 keeps you connected to friends and family wherever you go. It makes showing and sharing your photos as simple as the push of a button. Its a lightweight camera that is great for vacations and comes in three colour variations (black, white, and pink). Shoot like a pro! 20.3 MP APS-C Sensor The professional-grade, 20.3 MP APS-C CMOS Sensor produces images that rival those of any premium DSLR. Each individual pixel has a large sensor area and receives more light, guaranteeing low noise levels, high dynamic range and accurate color differentiation. The higher sensitivity allows you to shoot during low-light situations without graininess or other noise. The NX1000 features super-fast High Speed Capture capabilities and an ultra-high speed Auto Focus (AF) that can rival almost any system camera. The result is a fast and precise AF System that captures lifes fleeting moments. And with a sequential rate of 8fps, capturing fast-moving objects in perfect clarity are no longer a challenge. Light and stylish Simple & Emotional Design The camera is extremely portable and the perfect travel companion. The lightweight body also makes it easier to shoot stills or video for longer periods of time. The exterior of the NX1000 is just as impressive. The modern and sleek body adds another layer of elegance and sophistication to something thats usually more functional than beautiful. The body of the NX1000 is available in three different colors (black, white, and pink). Share your moments wirelessly Wi-Fi (Smart Link) With Built-in Wi-Fi capability, you can share any special or exciting moment on the move. Send photos by uploading to Facebook, Picasa, Photobucket or email directly from the camera. You can also upload videos to YouTube then sit back to wait for the raves. Samsung Mobile Link allows you to directly send your images to your smartphone or tablet. You can also save the images to your PC by just one click with Auto Backup. No more searching for the cable, it is that easy. Discover the true beauty of HD video 1080p Full HD Stereo Movie Recording Built with 1080 30p Full HD movie recording capabilities, the NX1000 transforms shooting video with a still camera into an art form. Choose from a wide range of viewing angles and zoom with confidence. The mirrorless CMOS image sensor offers precise auto focus even while you shoot. For a truly cinematic experience, the NX System has been fitted with an 18 - 200 mm lens exclusively for Full HD video. The simple way to go pro Smart Auto 2.0 The NX1000s Smart Auto 2.0 automatically analyzes the shooting environment and then chooses the appropriate scene mode for the best possible results. Smart Auto 2.0 analyzes key elements in the composition and automatically adjusts its 16 photo modes and 4 movie modes to capture the best shot. A camera thats quick on the draw High Speed Capture The NX1000s High Speed Capture capabilities let you catch fleeting moments and fast-moving objects without requiring a separate sensor module. The NX System features an ultra-high-speed Auto Focus that can rival that of almost any system camera. Its all-new, advanced algorithm delivers faster and more accurate auto focus. The NX1000 can shoot at 8 frames per second for better continuous shooting. Wide Range ISO for perfect exposure Wide Range ISO (12800, 7 steps) Wide Range ISO makes any lighting situation the perfect one. The ability to shoot as high as ISO 12800 at normal settings means that even in low light, youll get rich tonal gradations and true colors. Youll also capture clear, crisp images of fast-moving objects. i-Function 2.0 The i-Function 2.0 system makes it easy to adjust key camera settings through a single button and the value ring located on the lens, instead of the body. Designed for the novice and expert alike, i-Function 2.0 lets you quickly choose the settings that best fit the momentand your expertise. Smart Filter & Selective Color Smart Filter 2.0 options make it easy to create special moods. Choose the Tilt & Shift Lens Effect for a miniaturized look, the Vignetting Effect for striking contrasts, Half-Tone Dot for a comic-book look, and more. With the Selective Color feature, you can even choose the colors you want to emphasize. Panorama, 3D Panorama Capture the sweeping beauty of a natural landscape or the grandeur of a vast skyline. The NX1000s panoramic capabilities let you catch every detail on the horizon with the push of a button. You can even create 3D panoramic photos and wow your friends by displaying them on a 3D-ready HDTV. LCD Display The 3-inch LCD screen on the back of the NX1000 provides a perfect, glare-free way to review your photos. The wide and bright screen reproduces the images so they look as they truly appear - even in direct sunlight.
name: Samsung NX 1000

description-de_DE-mobile: NEX-FS100E, 12.3MP, 1/2.88'' Exmor Super35 CMOS, AVCHD 1080/50p, 28Mb/s, 16:9, Dolby Digital 2ch, 170min, 3.5'' XtraFine LCD 1920x480, Composite-Out, Component-Out, USB, HDMI, MS PRO Duo/MS PRO-HG Duo/MS PRO-HG Duo HX/SD/SDHC/SDXC, GPS, 1.04kg, Schwarz
description-de_DE-print: Hochwertige Filmproduktion fr kleinere Budgets Der NXCAM Super-35-mm-Camcorder NEX-FS100E wurde speziell fr hochwertige Filmproduktionen entwickelt, die dennoch nicht viel kosten sollen. Der hochempfindliche, groe CMOS-Sensor erlaubt progressive Aufnahmen im Format 1920 x 1080 mit einer geringen Schrfentiefe wie bei einer Filmkamera. Noch mehr Flexibilitt fr kreative Einstze wird durch die erweiterte, durchgehende Aufzeichnung und simultane Aufzeichnung von HD-Video mglich, das auf einer Flash-Memory-Einheit HXR-FMU128 als Backup abgelegt werden kann. Dank dieser und anderer wertvoller Funktionen ist diese kompakte, hochleistungsfhige Kamera ideal fr die Produktion von Werbeclips, Musikvideos, Dokus oder Hochzeitsvideos zu einem gnstigen Preis. Die NEX-FS100E wird ohne Objektiv geliefert, damit Sie jene Optik auswhlen knnen, die Ihrer Kreativanwendung am besten entspricht. Erst mit dem Wechselobjektivsystem E-Mount von Sony haben Filmemacher kreative Freiheiten, die mit Camcordern frher nicht mglich waren, und mit optionalen Adaptern knnen viele Objektive von verschiedenen Herstellern verwendet werden. Dieses Produkt wird mit einem PrimeSupport-Vertrag geliefert, mit dem Sie technische Untersttzung durch unsere Helpline und schnelle, unkomplizierte Reparaturleistungen in Anspruch nehmen knnen. So knnen Sie sich darauf verlassen, dass Ihr Produkt durch Sony geschtzt ist. Exmor-Super35-CMOS-Sensor fr Filmaufnahmen Dank eines CMOS-Sensors, der hinsichtlich der Gre Super-35-mm-Film entspricht, ermglicht die NEX-FS100E Aufnahmen mit derselben kreativen Schrfentiefe wie die PMW-F3. Durch die optimale Anzahl von effektiven Pixeln erlaubt der Sensor auch HD-Filmaufnahmen. Mit nicht weniger als 50 Bildern/Sekunde im All-Pixel-Scan-Modus werden die Bilder mit weniger Farb-Aliasing, Verzerrung und Rolling-Shutter-Effekt als bei DSLR-Kameras eingefangen, whrend dank hoher Lichtempfindlichkeit bereits ein Minimum von 0,28 Lux ausreicht. Ein weiterer Vorteil der Exmor-Technologie ist geringes Bildrauschen bei Low-light-Szenen. Wechselobjektivsystem E-Mount Erst mit dem Wechselobjektivsystem E-Mount von Sony haben Filmemacher kreative Freiheiten, die mit Camcordern frher nicht mglich waren. Durch den geringen Abstand des E-Mounts zwischen Objektivfassung und Sensor (18 mm) knnen Anwender mit einem Adapter zahlreiche Objektive nutzen. So knnen mit dem optionalen Adapter LA-EA1 etwa die A-Objektive der "a"-Serie verwendet werden. Mit Adaptern anderer Hersteller lsst sich die Auswahl an Objektiven zustzlich erweitern. Modulares Design fr verschiedene Einstze Mit ihrem kompakten, leichten Gehuse mit abnehmbarem Griff und Sucher ist die NEX-FS100E ideal fr verschiedenste Einstze. Bei Freihandaufnahmen lsst sich der Winkel des Griffs nach Bedarf verstellen und die Aufnahme kann ber eine Taste auf dem Griff gestartet und beendet werden. Start-/Stopp-Tasten fr die Aufnahme finden sich zudem auf der Oberseite und rechts unten auf der Kamera. Fr die Montage verschiedener Peripheriegerte stehen zudem 1/4''- und 3/8''-Schraublcher auf dem Griff und auf der Unterseite der Kamera zur Verfgung. Plus: ein Haken fr ein Maband und ein Positionsindex fr den Bildsensor auf dem Gehuse. XtraFine-LCD-Display Das 3,5''-XtraFine-LCD-Panel befindet sich auf der optischen Achse und erleichtert die intuitive Bildaufnahme, insbesondere bei Freihandaufnahmen. Und dank des drehbaren LCD-Panels sind auch Aufnahmen aus der Froschperspektive und Produktionen fr Digital Signage ein Kinderspiel. Damit die Fokussierung bei Tageslicht einfacher und prziser ist, kann eine abnehmbare Sucherlupe mit 1,2-facher Vergrerung montiert werden. 1920 x 1080p Slow & Quick Motion Dank der Mglichkeit, fr Aufzeichnung und Wiedergabe verschiedene Bildwechselfrequenzen zu verwenden, wird der Einsatz noch vielfltiger und ermglicht Slow- und Quick-Motion-Aufnahmen. Auerdem sind mit der NEX-FS100E progressive Aufnahmen in Full HD (1920 x 1080) Slow- und Quick-Motion mglich. Als Bildwechselfrequenz stehen 50 Bilder/s, 25 Bilder/s, 12 Bilder/s, 6 Bilder/s, 3 Bilder/s, 2 Bilder/s und 1 Bild/s zur Auswahl. Wird beispielsweise mit 1080/25p aufgezeichnet und ist die Bildwechselfrequenz auf 50 Bilder/s eingestellt, werden die Bilder in 2-facher Zeitlupe aufgezeichnet. So knnen ganz ohne komplizierte Schnittsysteme beeindruckende Zeitlupenaufnahmen gedreht werden. Hybridaufzeichnung Mit der direkt aufsetzbaren Flash-Memory-Einheit HXR-FMU128 ist eine durchgehende Aufnahme ber 10 Stunden mglich, ohne das Speichermedium wechseln zu mssen. Die gleichzeitige Aufnahme auf Speicherkarten und andere Medien fr Sicherungszwecke ist ebenfalls mglich, wenn Aufnahmen gedreht werden, die nicht wiederholt werden knnen. NXCAM-Aufnahmeformat Wie die anderen Kameras der Serie NXCAM verwendet die NEX-FS100E das bewhrte Aufnahmeformat AVCHD, das von zahlreichen nonlinearen Schnittsystemen untersttzt wird. Und damit die Aufnahmequalitt noch hher wird, ist sogar die Aufzeichnung mit einer maximalen Bildwechselfrequenz von 1920 x 1080/50p (28 Mb/s) mglich. Fr mehr Flexibilitt ist es auch mglich, im Format MPEG2 in Standard Definition aufzuzeichnen. Unkomprimierte Ausgabe in 4:2:2 mit Embedded Timecode Die NEX-FS100E kann unkomprimiertes 4:2:2-Material ber HDMI (mit einem embedded SMPTE-Timecode) ausgeben, das auf externen Medien, etwa HDD, gespeichert werden kann. Geotagging mit integriertem GPS-Empfnger Nicht zuletzt aufgrund ihres integrierten GPS-Empfngers wird die NEX-FS100E die erste Wahl fr professionelle Filmemacher werden. Mit dem Empfnger knnen die Drehorte mit Geotags markiert werden. Das erleichtert das Zurckfinden zur selben Stelle oder das Erstellen eines Logs bei der Vermessung entfernter Standorte. Die Standorte knnen dann auf Google Maps getrackt werden und alle GPS-Daten lassen sich mithilfe eines PC extrahieren. Auerdem stellt der Empfnger die Uhr des Camcorders automatisch auf die jeweilige Zeitzone um. Picture Profile Standardmig stehen sechs Bildprofileinstellungen fr verschiedene Aufnahmebedingungen zur Verfgung. Wenn ein Bildprofil fr eine bestimmte Umgebung ausgewhlt wird, knnen die Aufnahmen problemlos kreativ verndert werden. Ansicht der letzten Szene Ein Tastendruck gengt und die zuletzt aufgenommene Szene wird angezeigt. Expanded Focus Durch die Bettigung einer Taste wird die Bildmitte des angezeigten Bildes verdoppelt - besonders praktisch bei wichtigen Fokuseinstellungen. Histogramm Die Anzeige eines Histogramms auf dem Display erleichtert die Belichtungseinstellung. Das Histogramm zeigt zudem den Punkt an, an dem das Zebramuster (der Zebrapunkt) erscheint. So knnen die allgemeine Helligkeitsverteilung und die Helligkeitsstufe fr die Zebrafunktion berprft werden. Damit wird nicht nur berbelichtung vermieden, sondern es dient auch als Orientierungshilfe, wenn die optimale Belichtung fr bestimmte Bildausschnitte, etwa Gesichter, gefunden werden soll. Peaking-Funktion Die Peaking-Funktion zieht eine definierte Linie um das auf dem LCD-Monitor und im Sucher angezeigte Objekt. Fr eine przisere Fokussierung knnen die passende Hchstempfindlichkeit und Farbe (Rot, Wei, Gelb) ausgewhlt werden. Marker Marker fr Center, Aspect, Safety-Zone, Guide-Frame und andere Marker knnen auf dem LCD angezeigt werden. Aktualisierung der Firmware Sony hat eine Firmware-Aktualisierung fr zuknftige Funktionen vorgesehen.
description-en_US-mobile: NEX-FS100E, 12.3MP, 1/2.88'' Exmor Super35 CMOS, AVCHD 1080/50p, 28Mb/s, 16:9, Dolby Digital 2ch, 170min, 3.5'' XtraFine LCD 1920x480, Composite-Out, Component-Out, USB, HDMI, MS PRO Duo/MS PRO-HG Duo/MS PRO-HG Duo HX/SD/SDHC/SDXC, GPS, 1.04kg, Black
description-en_US-print: Affordable high quality motion picture production The NXCAM NEX-FS100E Super 35mm camcorder has been developed specifically for shooting truly stunning images at low cost. The high sensitivity, large format CMOS sensor is capable of producing full 1920 x 1080 progressive images with shallow depth of field similar to that of a film camera. For even more creative flexibility, the NEX-FS100 also enables extended continuous recording and simultaneous recording of HD video footage for instant backup with an HXR-FMU128 Flash Memory Unit. These and other valuable features make this compact, high performance camera ideal for producing everything from low budget commercials, music videos and documentaries to wedding videos. The NEX-FS100E is supplied without lens so you can choose the optics which best suit your creative requirements. Sony's E-mount interchangeable lenses let you enjoy a level of creative freedom unimaginable with camcorders of the past and optional adaptors enable use of a vast array of lenses from a wide variety of manufacturers. This product also comes with the full PrimeSupport package. Thats fast, hassle-free repairs, a helpline offering expert technical advice, and a free loan unit while yours is repaired. Plus the peace of mind that Sony is looking after your equipment and your business. Exmor Super35 CMOS Sensor for Shooting Motion Pictures Equipped with a large CMOS sensor equivalent in size to Super 35mm film, the NEX-FS100E enables shooting with the same creative depth of field as the PMW-F3. The sensor also features the optimum number of effective pixels for shooting HD moving images. At a high 50fps in all-pixel scan mode, this allows images to be captured with less colour aliasing, jaggedness and rolling shutter than DSLR cameras, while providing the sensitivity to shoot at a minimum illumination of 0.28lux. Another advantage of Exmor technology is minimal noise when shooting low-light scenes. E-Mount Interchangeable Lens System Sony's E-mount interchangeable lenses let you enjoy a level of creative freedom unimaginable with camcorders of the past. Thanks to the E-mount's short 18mm flange-back distance, using a mount adaptor allows shooting with a wide range of existing lenses. For example, with the optional LA-EA1 mount adaptor, you can take advantage of the abundant lenses (A-mount lenses). Third-party lens adaptors enable use of an ever wider -variety of additional lenses. Modular design for a variety of shooting styles Featuring a compact, lightweight body with detachable grip, handle, and viewfinder, the NEX-FS100E is ideal for a wide range of shooting situations. During hand-held shooting, the angle of the grip can be changed as desired, and recording started and stopped with a button on the grip. Recording start/stop buttons are also provided on the top and lower right of the camera. There are also 1/4- and 3/8-inch screw holes on both the handle and the bottom of the camera body for mounting various peripheral devices. Plus a tape measure hook and an image sensor position index on the body. XtraFine LCD panel Located on the optical axis, the 3.5-inch-type XtraFine LCD panel enables easier, more intuitive framing, especially during hand-held shooting. And the LCD panel can be rotated for stress-free operation when shooting low-angle scenes and digital signage footage. For easier, more precise focusing in daylight, the viewfinder comes with a detachable 1.2x magnifier. 1920 x 1080P Slow and Quick Motion Recording images at a different frame rate from that used for playback provides the extra versatility of slow and quick motion shooting. Furthermore, the NEX-FS100E enables Full HD (1920 x 1080) progressive slow and quick motion. Frame rates are selectable from among 50fps, 25fps, 12fps, 6fps, 3fps, 2fps and 1fps. So, for example, when recording at 1080/25p, if the frame rate is set to 50fps, images are recorded in 2 times slow motion. This means you can create impressive slow motion scenes without the need for troublesome editing. Hybrid recording Recording to the directly mountable HXR-FMU128 Flash Memory unit allows continuous recording for over 10 hours without changing the recording medium. Simultaneous recording using memory cards and other media is also possible for secure backup when shooting footage that can't be reshot. NXCAM Recording Format Like other NXCAM series cameras, the NEX-FS100E uses the well established AVCHD recording format supported by a wide range of nonlinear editing systems. Better still, it's ready to shoot with a maximum frame rate of 1920 x 1080/50p (28Mbps) for even higher quality recording. For more flexibility, it's also possible to record in Standard Definition MPEG-2 format. Uncompressed 4:2:2 Output with Embedded Time code When shooting, the NEX-FS100E can output uncompressed 4:2:2 footage via HDMI (with an embedded SMPTE Time Code) which can be recorded onto external media, such as HDD. Geotagging with built-in GPS receiver A built-in GPS receiver makes the NEX-FS100E an ideal choice for professional videographers. The receiver gives you the ability to geo-tag shooting locations - making it easy if you need to return to the same location or to create a log when surveying remote locations. Your locations can be tracked on Google Maps and all GPS data can be extracted with a PC. Additionally, the receiver automatically adjusts your camcorders clock to the proper time zone when international travel is part of your assignment. Picture Profile Six picture profile settings for different shooting conditions are provided as default settings. Selecting a picture profile for a particular scene offers an easy way to creatively change your shoot. Last Scene Review Press a single button to immediately review the last recorded scene. Expanded Focus Press a button and this enlarges the centre of the displayed image by 2x, a particularly useful feature when making critical focusing adjustments. Histogram Onscreen display of a histogram enables easier exposure adjustment. The histogram also shows the point where the zebra pattern appears (the zebra point). This enables confirmation of overall brightness distribution and the brightness level set with the zebra function. As well as preventing overexposure, this is useful as a guide when aiming for optimum exposure of certain parts of an image, such as faces. Peaking A peaking function draws a defined line around the subject displayed in the LCD monitor and viewfinder. Peaking sensitivity and colour (red, white, yellow) can be selected to enable more precise focusing. Markers Centre, aspect, safety zone, guide frame and other markers can be displayed on the LCD. Firmware Update Sony has implemented a firmware update scheme for future functions.
name: Sony NEX-FS100E hand-held camcorder

description-en_US-print:
Logitech QuickCam Fusion is a high-end webcam that delivers true 1.3 megapixel images, superior video quality, and clear, echo-free audio. QuickCam Fusion's next-generation image sensor uses Logitech RightLight technology for great performance even in low light conditions, and its sleek shape provides a lower lens position for more personal, eye-to-eye contact.

QuickCam Fusion also features a built-in microphone with Logitech RightSound technologyto ensure that your audience can hear you as well as they see you. RightSound makes headset-free conversations a reality by canceling unwanted echoes that can occur during video calls. You can talk naturally to your friends and family without tangled wires getting in the way. A high quality stereo headset is also included, for privacy during important conversations. 

Compatible with Logitech Video Effects 
Express your unique personality by using Logitech Video Effects. Choose 3D animated avatars that imitate your facial expressions and head movements, or 2D face accessories that allow you to change your look with glasses, hats and more. They're fun and easy to use with programs such as MSN Messenger Video Conversation, Yahoo! Messenger, AOL Instant Messenger, and others.
name: Logitech QuickCam Fusion

description-en_US-mobile: Film2SD Pro Rapid Feeder
description-en_US-print:
Rediscover your long-lost 35mm slides and film negatives with FILM 2 SD PRO. This high-quality scanner transfers your images directly onto an SD card so you can enjoy your old pictures with the latest technology. Thanks to FILM 2 SD PRO's large, full-color LCD screen, you don't even need a computer to make it work!

You can view your images on your digital picture frame, your television if it has an SD card slot, your mobile phone with a micro SD slot (SD-to-micro adaptor not included), computer, and other portable devices. Imagine all of your memories with you at home or anywhere you go.

FILM 2 SD PRO is fast and easy to use. Just one button starts the scan, which takes an average of one to two seconds! Convenient auto focus, auto exposure, and auto-color balance mean you don't have to be a photo whiz to make great digital images. FILM 2 SD PRO does all the hard work for you.

FILM 2 SD PRO has a built-in SD card slot, so you can scan directly to most SD, SDHC, and micro SD cards without needing a computer. FILM 2 SD PRO comes with an SD card to get you started, and additional cards are available from nearly any electronics retailer. If you have a computer, you can also connect FILM 2 SD using the included USB cable. When connected to your Mac or PC, FILM 2 SD PRO becomes a handy SD card reader, so you can drag and drop your pictures from the card onto your hard drive.

FILM 2 SD PRO makes high-resolution, scans of all of your color and black & white slides and film negatives. FILM 2 SD PRO is portable, lightweight, and has an ultra-small footprint so you can take it with you and scan your friends' and family's pictures too. Start rediscovering your old pictures today with FILM 2 SD PRO.
name: ION Film2SD Pro

description-en_US-print:
Overview
Hear beautiful sound from a compact, modern designed, ultra-portable speaker - compatible with laptops, cell phones, portable game devices, MP3 players, tablets, desktop PCs.

Features
• The modern artistic design complements any device - all within an impressively compact palm-sized speaker.

• Conveniently connect using a 3.5 mm headphone jack with laptops, cell phones, portable game devices or MP3 players Plug, Play, Enjoy!

• Share the music, presentation, videos and more with crisp clear acoustics that can easily be heard throughout the room.

description-en_US-print: SX21E Standard Definition Memory Stick camcorder Light and compact: easy shooting with very high zoom SD on optional Memory Stick, 57x optical / 67x extended zoom, 6.7 cm LCD (2.7 inch) , SteadyShot, Face Detection This product is a previous model and could be no longer available at your local dealer. - Very high power 57x optical zoom - SteadyShot for clear, stable shooting - Intelligent AUTO for great results with any scene Fun, easy shooting with high-power zoom Light and so easy to use, this compact camcorder features a high-quality lens with powerful zoom range to bring distant objects closer. Record crisp video and stereo sound onto optional Memory Stick. Enjoy easy web uploads with built-in PMB Portable software. Get closer than ever before It's like packing a telescope with your camcorder. Ultra-powerful Extended Zoom boosts magnification to a huge 67x range. It's more than enough to pull distant subjects close with superb detail and clarity. Small and light enough to keep with you With less size and weight to carry, its easy to slip your camcorder into a pocket or bag: you can be sure its always with you, wherever you go. Brighten up your subject Dont get left in the dark. A video light illuminates your subject for great results when youre shooting in low light at parties, indoors or with night-time scenes. Sharing made simple Don't keep all those great memories stuck inside your camcorder. PMB Portable software inside Handycam lets you upload videos to popular web sharing sites like YouTube from almost any connected PC. Preserve your memories Why not save those memories onto DVD for safekeeping or sharing with friends? It's easy with the super-speed DVDirect Express disc burner Alternatively, Handycam lets you transfer footage straight to an external hard disk drive... with no PC needed.
name: Sony DCR-SX21E

description-en_US-mobile: CCD, 600 dpi, 60 ppm, LCD, USB 2.0, 60 dB, 15.8 kg
description-en_US-print: The Kodak i2900 Scanner is a robust rotary A4 desktop scanner with an ingenious book-edge flatbed scanner built right in. It features a 250-sheet feeder/elevator and consistently high throughput speed, even when imaging double-sided and color documents at up to 300 dpi. Add in Intelligent Document Protection, as well as Kodak's Perfect Page technology and Smart Touch functionality, and you've got a fiercely powerful scanner in a remarkably compact package. Smaller Footprint Smaller footprint, bigger impact. A robust design that takes up less space but can still take on heavy-duty scanning challenges. Feeds 250 Give productivity a lift. With a 250-sheet feeder/elevator you can neatly and efficiently scan large or small batches of mixed-size documents with ease. Flatbed Flatbed at your fingertips. Our integrated book-edge A4 flatbed scanner is designed to handle all kinds of exception documents. So book pages, passports, folders, fragile documents and more are simply no match for the Kodak i2900. Paper Path An exit strategy for long documents. Our selectable rear-exit paper path is ideal for longer or thicker documents that can be an unexpected challenge for traditional rotary scanners. No Tear Upgrade your uptime. With Intelligent Document Protection you can scan confidently, knowing that each document is safeguarded from the potential of damage during feeding. Smart Touch Total control with a touch. Kodak's Smart Touch functionality streamlines repetitive tasks, simplifies information sharing, and makes your scanning life easier. Perfect Page Better than ever. Kodak's Perfect Page technology optimizes image quality for data extraction and intelligently handles image-processing tasks delivering extended functionality to many applications. Service Protect your investment. Ensure the optimal operation of your equipment and software with Kodak Essential Productivity Services and Kodak Advanced Proficiency Services. Our array of service offerings helps maximize efficiency and value in your business.
name: Kodak i2900

description-en_US-mobile: EOS 650D BODY - 22.3 x 14.9 mm CMOS, 18 MP, 3:2, DIGIC 5, 30-1/4000 s, JPEG 5184x3456, MOV 1920x1080, SD, SDHC, SDXC, USB
description-en_US-print: An ideal entry to the world of EOS imaging. The EOS 650Ds 18.0-megapixel sensor is superb for both still images and Full HD movies. A Vari-angle Clear View LCD II Touch screen makes shooting simple. Features - 18.0 MP APS-C CMOS sensor. - Full-HD movies with manual controls and continuous AF. - 5 fps continuous shooting. - Vari-angle Clear View LCD II Touch screen. - ISO 100-12,800 sensitivity, extendable to ISO 25,600. - 9-point wide-area AF. - Integrated Speedlite Transmitter. High-quality, entry-level EOS. First choice for those starting their DSLR adventures. Advanced image quality Capture every detail with 18-megapixel resolution, and enjoy the smooth tones and accurate colours of 14-bit DIGIC 5 image processing. The EOS 650D produces files big enough to print at large sizes or crop for alternative compositions without sacrificing quality. Produce Full HD movie projects Capture premium-quality movies at 1080p resolution, enjoying the right level of automatic or manual control for you. Autofocus is possible while filming, and a built in microphone enables the recording of high-quality stereo audio. Keep up with fast moving action Track moving objects accurately across the frame with an autofocus system comprising nine cross-type AF points. Continuous shooting at 5 fps for bursts of up to 22 frames means youll never miss that decisive moment. Explore new viewpoints The EOS 650D has a Vari-angle 7.7cm (3.0) 3:2 ratio Clear View LCD II Touch screen that hinges away from the cameras body and rotates through 270. This enables video and still-image shooting from alternative viewpoints such as over the top of crowds or from waist level. Touch-screen control Enjoy alternative access to the EOS 650Ds controls though a Vari-angle Clear View LCD II Touch screen. Shoot and focus with a single tap and use pinch and swipe gestures when reviewing images. Low-light performance The EOS 650D can capture images over a sensitivity range of ISO 100-12,800 (extendable to ISO 25,600), enabling hand-held shooting in low light without using flash. Integrated Speedlite Transmitter Explore creative lighting options by positioning Canon Speedlite flashes off camera and controlling them with the EOS 650Ds Integrated Speedlite Transmitter. Scene Intelligent Auto Canons Scene Intelligent Auto technology analyses each scene and sets the most appropriate combination of cameras settings automatically. Great results in difficult conditions HDR Backlight control captures three different exposures and combines them into one, retaining shadow and highlight detail. The EOS 650Ds hand-held night scene mode captures multiple images at fast shutter speeds and blends them together for a blur-free result.
name: Canon EOS 650D BODY

description-en_US-print: Conveniently adjust monitor height, tilt and perspective The Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450 has been designed to help boost work efficiency, delivering a tailored experience with its choice of viewer settings. The height-adjustable stand ensures that the screen can always be set at the optimal eye level, which enhances the visual experience while also helping maintain the viewers body posture. Other features include the tilt and pivot capabilities, which not only increase comfort levels but also introduce new ways of working. The SA450 Monitor can rotate 90 degrees, allowing for more appropriate view depending on the work. So, now you can take convenience and efficiency to amazing heights with the Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450. Maximise workspace with an efficient detachable adaptor If you need a work monitor that uses office space efficiently, then Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450 is the perfect choice. It features an innovative new detachable adaptor, which allows the monitor to be easily moved and installed. From physically moving the monitor with the carrying handle to quickly installing, the SA450 is ready to deliver an efficient and clean work space. The SA450 is also equipped and prepared for you as a VESA Wall mount, providing a multi-screen or wall mounted monitor. Optimising your office space is now easily achieved with the Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450.

description-en_US-mobile: PFA 9111/Video Conferencing loudspeaker, 2x25W, 40-20000Hz, 110-230V, Black
description-en_US-print: The PFA 9111 (RS232-485) loudspeaker is especially developed for video conferencing. The loudspeaker is equipped with patented technology which produces unparalleled, clear (vocal) sound reproduction. Because of this special filter technology the sound reaches much further into the room, even at low volumes, than conventional loudspeakers. The PFA 9111 loudspeaker exactly matches the PFF 5100 video conferencing furniture.\n\nIn addition to the usual audio input, the built-in digital amplifier has a port for RS232-485 communication. This makes it possible to operated and control the loudspeaker remotely in larger installations.
description-fr_FR-mobile: PFA 9111 Haut-parleur de luxe pour vidoconfrences, 2x25W, 40-20000Hz, 110-230V, Noir
description-fr_FR-print: Le haut-parleur PFA 9111 (RS232-485) est spcialement conu pour la vidoconfrence. Le haut-parleur est quip d'une technologie brevete qui garantit une reproduction sonore claire (vocale) ingale. Cette technologie de filtre permet galement au son d'tre mieux diffus dans la pice, mme  faible volume, par rapport aux haut-parleurs classiques. Le haut-parleur PFA 9111 correspond exactement au meublre de vidoconfrence PFF 5100.\n\nOutre l'entre audio habituelle, l'amplificateur numrique intgr a un port pour communication RS232-485. Ceci permet d'activer le haut-parleur  distance dans de plus grandes installations.
name: Vogel's PFA 9111/Video Conferencing loudspeaker

Features
Easy wireless printingfrom virtually anywhere12

Convenient and compact to help you do more at home

description-de_DE-mobile: HP LaserJet Pro P1102w Printer
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Der HP LaserJet ermglicht daheim oder im Bro von praktisch berall aus den kostengnstigen, gemeinsam und kabellosen Druck1. Plug-and-Print dank HP Smart Install ohne CD 3. Mit dem stromsparendsten Laserdrucker weltweit7 knnen Sie Geld und Ressourcen sparen.

Features
Hohe Produktivitt durch kostengnstiges Wireless-Drucken2 und beeindruckende Mobilitt.

Einfach und zuverlssig Drucken mit HP LaserJet.
• Installation im Handumdrehen dank HP Smart Install ist keine CD erforderlich4.

Die Umwelt schonen mit einem der energieeffizientesten Drucker1 weltweit.
• Sparen Sie Energie mit der HP Auto-On/Auto-Off Technologie5, die Ihre Druckaktivitt erkennt und den Drucker automatisch ein- und ausschaltet.

Professionelle Qualitt, kostengnstige Ausdrucke.
• Verbesserte Druckqualitt durch HP FastRes 12006 kleinere Druckdateien, fettgedruckter, gestochen scharfer Text, feinste Schattierungen, hohe Bildschrfe und gleichmige Geschftsgrafiken.

1 Die verbrauchte Gesamtenergie basierend auf den TEC-Messergebnissen anderer Unternehmen laut www.energystar.gov, www.eu-energystar.org und den Datenblttern der Hersteller fr Schwarzwei- und Farblaserdrucker mit Einzel- und Multifunktion vom Januar 2012. Der tatschliche Stromverbrauch hngt von der individuellen Produktkonfiguration und -nutzung ab.
2 Wireless-Drucken nur verfgbar auf P1102w. Die Wireless-Leistung ist abhngig von den Umgebungsbedingungen und der Entfernung zum Access Point.
3 Erfordert eine Internetverbindung zum Drucker. Die Funktion ist bei allen Internet- und e-Mail fhigen Gerten verwendbar. Erfordert die Registrierung eines HP Web Services-Kontos. Die Druckdauer kann variieren. Eine Liste der untersttzten Dokumente und Bildtypen steht Ihnen unter www.hp.com/go/eprintcenter zur Verfgung. Wenn Sie Informationen ber weitere Lsungen bentigen, besuchen Sie uns unter www.hp.com/go/mobile-printing-solutions.
5 Untersttzt Multitasking-fhige Gerte mit dem Betriebssystem iOS 4.2 (iPad, iPhone 4, iPhone 3GS und iPod touch der dritten und vierten Generation). Gerte mit iOS 4.2 erfordern eine Wireless-Netzwerkverbindung gem 802.11. Zu AirPrint-fhigen Druckern knnen Wireless- oder Ethernet-Verbindungen hergestellt werden. AirPrint und das AirPrint Logo sind Marken von Apple Inc. iPad, iPhone und iPod touch sind eingetragene Marken von Apple Inc. in den USA und anderen Lndern.
4 HP Smart Install funktioniert nur unter Windows fr USB- und Netzwerk-Verbindungen.
5 HP Auto-On- und Auto-Off-Funktionen hngen vom Drucker und den Einstellungen ab.
6 HP FastRes 1200 bietet die beste Einstellung fr die Druckqualitt fr dieses Gert. Whlen Sie HP FastRes 600 fr schnelles Drucken aus.
7 Die Merkmale des Programms und die Verfgbarkeit knnen je nach Land variieren. Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter www.hp.com/learn/suresupply.

HP LaserJet sans fil abordable, partag et imprimant de pratiquement partout la maison ou au bureau1. Branchez et imprimez avec l'installation intelligente HP - Aucun CD requis3. L'imprimante laser la plus conergtique de la plante7 vous permet d'conomiser argent et ressources.

Features
Rester productifs avec l'impression sans fil abordable2 et une mobilit impressionnante.
• Mettez l'imprimante en rseau sans cbles supplmentaires et accdez-y depuis n'importe o votre domicile ou au bureau l'aide de la mise en rseau sans fil 802.11b/g/n.1

Faites l'exprience d'une impression fiable et mobile avec HP LaserJet.
• Installez votre imprimante rapidement - aucun CD requis avec HP Smart Install.4

Rduire votre impact sur l'environnement avec l'une des imprimantes les plus conomes en nergie1 de la plante.
• conomiser encore plus grce la technologie HP Auto-On/Auto-Off5 qui dtecte votre activit d'impression, avec mise sous tension et hors tension automatiquement.

Crer des impressions conomiques de qualit professionnelle.
• Obtenez une meilleure qualit d'impression avec HP FastRes 12006 qui gnre des fichiers d'impression plus petits, du texte net, des tonalits uniformes et des graphiques d'entreprise clairs.

1 Consommation d'nergie base sur les calculs de TEC de la concurrence disponibles sur www.energystar.gov, www.eu-energystar.org et les fiches techniques publies par les fabricants en janvier 2012 pour les imprimantes laser monochromes et couleur fonction unique. La configuration individuelle du produit et son utilisation influencent la consommation.

Les priphriques iOS 4.2 ncessitent une connexion rseau sans fil 802.11, Imprimante AirPrint peut tre connecte sans fil ou via Ethernet. AirPrint et le logo AirPrint sont des marques commerciales d'Apple Inc. iPad, iPhone et iPod touch sont des marques commerciales d'Apple Inc., aux tats-Unis et dans d'autres pays.
4 HP Smart Install fonctionne avec Windows uniquement - pour les connexions USB et rseau.
5 Les fonctions HP Auto-On et Auto-Off dpendent de l'imprimante et des paramtres.
6 HP FastRes 1200 offre une qualit d'impression optimale pour ce priphrique. Choisissez HP FastRes 600 pour une impression rapide.
7 Les fonctions et la disponibilit du programme dpendent du pays. Pour en savoir plus, voir www.hp.com/learn/suresupply.
