Le capteur CMOS Full HD offre une excellente reproduction des couleurs mme en basse lumire : vos vidos auront fire allure sur votre tlviseur HD. Stabilisateur d'image optique intelligent Le stabilisateur d'image intelligent compense les effets de vibration comme aucun autre systme. Il dtecte automatiquement la scne et slectionne parmi 4 modes les paramtres de stabilisateur d'image optique les mieux adapts pour compenser le mouvement et viter les flous de boug. Il garantit une image vido nette et dtaille dans tous les cas de figure, vous permettant ainsi de porter toute votre attention sur la prise de vues. Cration de Scnarios Utilisez le mode Cration de Scnarios pour crer en toute simplicit des vidos inoubliables et dvelopper vos talents de ralisateur. Une fois le thme de votre squence choisi, le mode Cration de Scnarios vous fournit l'cran des suggestions et des conseils de prise de vues qui vous permettront de raliser des vidos captivantes. Filtres effet Cinma ; fonction Touche Dcoration Exprimez votre crativit avec les filtres effet Cinma. Choisissez l'un des 8 filtres de nuances de couleurs rglables pour obtenir la scne de cinma idale. Avec la fonction Touche Dcoration, ajoutez des effets amusants vos vidos en toute simplicit, sans ordinateur. Stockage direct sur disque dur externe Copiez des vidos directement partir de la mmoire intgre ou du logement pour carte SDXC vers un disque dur externe. Accdez aux options de stockage rapidement et en toute simplicit partir des menus conviviaux l'cran. Le contrle au bout des doigts Le fonctionnement est ais grce l'cran LCD tactile haute rsolution de 7,5 cm (3 pouces) qui garantit un contrle intuitif des paramtres et simplifie la lecture. Mode Smart Auto, dtection de visage Enregistrez facilement des vidos de haute qualit grce au mode Smart Auto. La technologie de reconnaissance de scne intelligente slectionne les paramtres appropris parmi 38 modes scne ; il ne vous reste plus alors qu' cadrer et dclencher. La technologie de dtection de visage optimise quant elle les paramtres de prise de vues pour des portraits toujours russis. Conversion HD-SD Convertissez, depuis le camscope, des vidos du format HD SD pour un partage et un tlchargement sur Internet faciles. Double mmoire Flash de 8 Go ; logement pour carte SDXC Une double mmoire Flash intgre de 8 Go vous permet de stocker plus de 3 heures de vido Full HD. Le logement pour carte SDXC permet une dure d'enregistrement encore plus longue.

description-de_DE-print:
-Einzigartig: Ultraschall-Doppeleinzugserkennung.
-Scannt Papierdokument bis zu A4 mit 20 Seiten pro Minute (simplex) bzw. 40 Bilder pro Minute (duplex) bei 300 dpi in Farbe.
-Microsoft Vista kompatibel.
-Scannt zu Microsoft Office SharePoint (MOSS 07).
-Scannt A3-Formate mit beiliegender Trgertasche.
-OCR-Funktionen: Scan-to-Word, Scan-2-Exel, Scan-to-PowerPoint.
-Card Minder V 4.0 Visitenkartensoftware.
-ScanSnap Organizer V 5.0.
-Automatische Farb-/ Schwarzweierkennung.
-Automatische Papiergrenerkennung und Erkennung leerer Seiten.
-Automatische Schrglagenkorrektur / Ausrichtung.
-bis zu 600dpi optische Auflsung.
-Simplex/Duplex.
-50-seitiger ADF.

Durch einen einzigen Knopfdruck lassen sich PDF-Dateien erzeugen  in Farbe oder einfarbig, aus mehreren Seiten oder doppelseitigen Dokumenten. Diese Dateien lassen sich effizient archivieren, organisieren, gemeinsam bearbeiten oder per E-Mail versenden.

Das Quick Men des ScanSnap S1500 maximiert Ihre Produktivitt. Legen Sie einfach Seiten ein, drcken Sie auf Scan und whlen Sie dann die Zielanwendung im Quick Menu.

Der ScanSnap erzeugt automatisch Adobe PDF-Dateien, das Dateiformat, das sich als Standard fr den Dokumentenaustausch etabliert hat. Dies ermglicht weltweit den sicheren elektronischen Versand von Dokumenten mit der Gewissheit, dass der Empfnger das Dokument genau so erhalten wird, wie Sie es auf Ihrem Bildschirm sehen.

Anhand der in der ScanSnap Software integrierten Scan-to-xxxx Funktionen kann der ScanSnap S1500 Informationen ebenfalls via OCR direkt in Word, Excel oder PowerPoint bergeben oder PDF Dateien an den ScanSnap Organizer senden und dort ablegen, um diese spter in Word, Excel oder PowerPoint editierbare Dokumente zu konvertieren.

Um das Scannen so einfach wie mglich zu machen, prft ScanSnap jedes Dokument und entscheidet dann, ob ein Dokument in schwarz-wei oder in Farbe gescannt werden soll, welche Gre die zu scannende Seite hat und ob leere Seiten automatisch entfernt werden mssen. All dies beschleunigt den Scan-Prozess und minimiert die physikalischen Speicheranforderungen.

Zustzlich werden Schieflagen der Papierdokumente oder deren Inhalte, wie Sie bei Faxbertragungen hufig auftreten, automatisch korrigiert (Auto Deskew) und die Ausrichtung jeder Seite wird angepasst.

Mit Hilfe der mitgelieferten Trgerblatt-Vorrichtung lassen sich A3 Scans anfertigen. Die A3 Seiten werden gefaltet und in die Trgertasche gesteckt. Nach dem Scannen fgt ScanSnap die zwei Bilder (Vorder- und Rckseite) automatisch zusammen, um das gesamte A3 Bild zu erzeugen. So lassen sich auch unregelmig geformte Dokumente, Fotos oder empfindliche Dokumente scannen, die leicht zerkratzt werden knnten.

Der ScanSnap verfgt ber eine automatische Dokumentenzufuhr von bis zu 50 Blatt, deren beide Seiten in Farbe, Graustufen oder monochrom beim Scannen simultan erfasst werden. Die bentigte Stellflche fr den Scanner ist zudem berraschend klein (Flche eines A4 Blattes).
description-en_US-print: Ideal for Windows users Ultrasonic MultiFeed Detection 20ppm /40 ipm colour @ 300dpi, A4 -Up to 600 dpi. -Simplex/Duplex. -50 page ADF. -A3 Scanning (via carrier sheet). -Auto deskew/cropping/orientation. -Auto colour/mono detection. -Auto page size. -Auto blank page detection. -CardMinder application for business card management. -OCR functions : Scan2Word, Scan2Excel, Scan2PowerPoint.. -ScanSnap Organiser. -Scan to SharePoint. -Adobe Acrobat V9.0. -Fully MS Vista compatible. -Includes ScanSnap Manager for MAC OS. ScanSnap S1500 - Paper Capture for the modern office New Features of S1500 -S1500 can OCR Keywords for Acrobat by marking text with highlighter pen. -S1500 can crop document areas based on highlighter pen marked section. -S1500 can detect and warn of multiple paper feed. (Ultrasonic detection). -ScanSnap Manager supplied for both Windows and MAC operation. A complete desktop solution, simply press one scanner button to convert colour or mono multi page, double sided documents into digital PDF files which you can file, organise, share and email The Quick Menu allows users to maximise their productivity with the S1500, just insert pages, press Scan, select destination function from the Quick Menu The ScanSnap software automatically creates Adobe PDF files which have become the de-facto standard for document exchange, enabling you to send documents anywhere in the world safe in the knowledge the recipient will see the document exactly as you see it. ScanSnap S1500 can also scan information directly into either Word, Excel or PowerPoint 2003 via OCR using the Scan2xxxx functions integrated into the ScanSnap software or Drag and drop files within ScanSnap Organiser to convert to Word, Excel or PowerPoint 2003 editable documents. To make scanning as simple as possible, ScanSnap inspects each document to decide if a document should be scanned in black and white or colour, what the size of the page being scanned is and eliminate blank pages, all of which serve to speed the scanning operation and minimise your storage requirements. In addition each document will have misaligned text corrected (Auto Deskew) and each page will have its orientation automatically adjusted. Using the supplied carrier sheet provides A3 scanning capability, A3 pages are folded and placed in the carrier sheet, when scanned, Scansnap will automatically stitch the 2 (front & back) images together to recreate the full A3 image The carrier sheet can also be used for scanning photos/documents which might be easily scratched or irregular shaped documents which are difficult to feed otherwise and may cause paper jams. ScanSnap incorporates a 50 page automatic document feeder, duplex capability and colour scanning within a surprisingly small footprint and is supplied with a full version of Adobe Acrobat 9.0
description-fr_FR-print: -Compatible avec Microsoft Vista. -Numrisation et envoi de vos documents sur SharePoint. -Fiche support pour des modles A3. -Fonctions OCR : Scan2Word, Scan2Excel, Scan2PowerPoint 2003. -Programme de gestion de cartes de visite : CardMinder V4.0. -ScanSnap Organiser V5.0. -Reconnaissance automatique des couleurs / du noir et blanc. -Reconnaissance automatique du format de papier et des pages vierges. -Reconnaissance automatique des pages vierges. -Correction du dsalignement / rognage / alignement automatique des pages et des images. -20 pages/minute ou 40 images/minute (en format A4 et en couleur). -Design compact et peu encombrant. -Rsolution max. 600 dpi. -Numrisation Simplex(= recto) ou Duplex (= recto-verso). -Chargement automatique de 50 pages. -Dtection ultrasonique de chargements multiples (Ultrasonic MultlFeed Detection). -Adobe Acrobat V9.0 standard. ScanSnap S1500 - Gestion optimale du papier ! La fonction Quick Menu permet l'utilisateur de maximiser sa productivit avec le ScanSnap S1500. Il suffit d'insrer les pages, d'appuyer sur la touche numrisation, puis de slectionner la destination du document numris partir de ce Quick Menu La numrisation avec le ScanSnap se gre sur le bureau virtuel de votre ordinateur. Un clic sur le bouton de numrisation suffit pour numriser les documents couleur ou monochromes, imprims sur une ou deux faces. Le programme convertit les documents en donnes numriques pour en faire ensuite un fichier PDF qui peut tre organis, structur, distribu et transmis par voie lectronique Les fichiers crs par le logiciel de gestion ScanSnap sont tous de type Adobe PDF, format qui constitue le standard actuel pour l'change de donnes. Dans ce format, l'utilisateur peut envoyer ses documents partout dans le monde sans craindre de perdre la mise en page. Le logiciel ScanSnap S1500 OCR initie le processus OCR pour les documents qui viennent d'tre scanns ; de plus, il est en mesure d'exporter les informations numrises directement Word, Excel ou PowerPoint 2003. Pour que le processus de numrisation soit le moins compliqu possible, ScanSnap vrifie chaque document et dcide d'une numrisation en noir et blanc ou en couleur, vrifie le format du papier et si le document a un verso vierge pouvant tre effac sans instruction supplmentaire. Cette automatisation des processus raccourcit considrablement la saisie des donnes et rduit encore l'occupation de la mmoire. De plus il corrige automatiquement les contenus dsaligns (fonction Auto Deskew) ainsi que l'alignement de chaque page. La fiche support (ou poche porte-document) jointe au programme permet de numriser en format A3. Les pages au format A3 sont plies et places dans la fiche support et, lors de la numrisation, ScanSnap associe automatiquement le recto et le verso du document afin de gnrer ainsi ledit format A3. La fiche support se prte galement la numrisation de photos et de documents sensibles qui sont sinon vite endommags. Les documents froisss difficiles introduire ou susceptibles de provoquer un bourrage de papier se traitent parfaitement l'aide de la fiche support. Le ScanSnap est en mesure de charger automatiquement feuille par feuille une pile de 50 documents (ADF), dispose du mode de numrisation duplex pour les documents en couleur et est quip du logiciel Adobe Acrobat 9.0 standard. Grce son encombrement rduit, il n'exige que peu de place.
name: Fujitsu ScanSnap S1500

description-de_DE-mobile: HP Compaq LE2002xi 20-inch LCD Monitor with IWC Stand
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Dieser LED-Monitor mit Hintergrundbeleuchtung und Integrated Work Center-Standfu kombiniert umweltschonende Features mit gestochen scharfen Darstellungen und eignet sich hervorragend fr Umgebungen mit geringer Stellflche.

Features
Platzsparend
• Der elegante, flache HP Compaq LE2002xi LCD-Monitor ist in jeder Umgebung ein Blickfang und zeichnet sich durch sein flaches Profil und seine geringe Aufstellflche aus.

Geringere Umweltbelastung
• Dieser Monitor schont die Umwelt dank quecksilberfreien LEDs, BFR/PVC-freien Komponenten, arsenfreiem Bildschirmglas1, ENERGY STAR Zertifizierung und EPEAT Silver Registrierung2 sowie einer TCO Displays Zertifizierung.

Bessere Leistung
• Gestochen scharfe Ansichten auf einem Monitor mit einer Diagonalen von 50,8 cm (20"), einer systemeigenen Auflsung von 1600 x 900, einem dynamischen Kontrastverhltnis von 3.000.000:1, Betrachtungswinkel von bis zu 170 und einer Reaktionszeit von nur 5 ms3. Die DVD-D- und VGA-Eingnge bieten noch mehr Anschlussmglichkeiten.

Sorgenfrei dank HP Zuverlssigkeit
• 3 Jahre Herstellergarantie auf Teile, inklusive Hintergrundbeleuchtung, und Arbeit sowie Vor-Ort-Service. Verfgbarkeit je nach Region. Es gelten bestimmte Einschrnkungen und Ausschlussklauseln. Details erhalten Sie bei der HP Kundenhotline.

1 Arsen und Arsenverbindungen wurden mit den Testmethoden 3052/6010b der US-amerikanischen EPA durch ICP-AES nicht festgestellt.
2 EPEAT Silver fr registrierte kommerzielle HP Monitorprodukte. Unter www.epeat.net erfahren Sie den Registrierungsstatus im jeweiligen Land.
3 Bei smtlichen Leistungsangaben handelt es sich um die typischen Spezifikationen laut den mit HP kooperierenden Komponentenherstellern,; die tatschliche Leistung kann darber oder darunter liegen.
description-en_US-print: HP Compaq LE2002xi 50,8 cm (20) LCD Monitor with IWC Stand This LED backlit monitor with an Integrated Work Center stand, features eco-solutions and a crisp, clear display ideal for space constrained environments. Space efficient - The stylish, slim HP Compaq LE2002xi LCD Monitor looks great in any environment with a thin profile and modest footprint. - The built-in HP Integrated Work Center stand helps create a compact and comfortable work station. Attach an HP t5335z Smart Client or Ultra-slim Desktop (USDT) to the back of the stand to help free up valuable desk space. - The HP Compaq LE2002xi features adjustable height, tilt and swivel settings to allow for comfortable positioning. Reduce your impact With the use of Mercury-free LEDs, BFR/PVC-free components, Arsenic-free display glass, an ENERGY STAR qualification, an EPEAT Silver registration, and a TCO Displays certification, this monitor can help reduce your impact. Boost your performance Get crisp, clear, views on a 50,8 cm (20) diagonal, 1600 x 900 native resolution screen with a 3M:1 DCR, up to a 170 viewing angle, and fast 5ms response times. As well, DVD-D and VGA inputs enable advanced connectivity. Relax with HP reliability Limited three-year parts, labor, and on-site service, including backlight. Availability varies by region. Certain restrictions and exclusions apply. For details, contact HP Customer Support.

Ce moniteur rtroclair LED quip d'un socle IWC (Integrated Work Center) intgre des solutions cologiques et offre un affichage net et clair idal pour les environnements restreints en espace.

Features
conome en espace

Respect de l'environnement
• Avec l'utilisation de LED sans mercure, de composants sans BFR/PVC, d'un verre d'cran sans arsenic1, une qualification ENERGY STAR, un enregistrement EPEAT Silver et une certification d'cran TCO, cet cran contribue rduire votre impact environnemental.

Des performances optimises

Par ailleurs, les entres DVD-D et VGA offrent une connectivit avance.

Dtendez-vous avec la fiabilit HP
• Garantie limite 3ans, pices, main-d'uvre et intervention sur site, rtroclairage compris. La disponibilit varie selon les rgions. Certaines restrictions et exclusions sont applicables. Pour en savoir plus, contactez l'Assistance clientle HP.

1 Les mthodes de test U.S. EPA 3052/6010b d'ICP-AES n'ont dtect ni arsenic ni composs d'arsenic.
2 Toutes les spcifications de performance sont les spcifications nominales fournies par les fabricants de composants HP; les performances relles peuvent tre plus leves ou plus faibles.

description-en_US-print: High Quality Photos & Movies with the New EXR AUTO The 16 megapixel EXR CMOS sensor creates ultimate image quality. The FinePix Z950EXR prevents blur with Motion Detection and captures bright image in dark scene. EXR AUTO 99 Shooting Patterns The new EXR AUTO with new Motion Detection instantly recognizes 54 scene types, automatically optimizes every setting from exposure to white balance, and even switches to the ideal sensor mode: HR High Resolution for well-lit conditions, SN High Sensitivity/Low Noise mode for low light, and DR Dynamic Range mode for high-contrast scenes. EXR AUTO + Motion Detection - Capture Still Night Scenes with Breathtaking Quality - Shoot Dynamic Night Shots with Stunning Results Advanced Anti Blur When shooting dark scenes, Advanced Anti Blur adds the power of EXR CMOS and Multi Frame technology to combine 4 frames into a single, sharp blur image with remarkably low noise. Super High Quality Full HD Movies Able to capture both photos and movies in high-definition 16:9 format, the FinePix Z950EXR lets you discover the impact of full-screen HDTV image display. Powerful zoom Super-high Resolution in a Compact Body Capture superb image with Fujinon Lens. Powerful zoom and high speed function is featured in a compact body. High-precision Molded Glass Aspheric Lens By precisely focusing light at the same point on the focal plane, aspheric lens design eliminates the need for additional corrective lens elements. While this lens reduces distortion at wide angles, improves resolution in both center and edge areas, cuts glare and reflections, and minimizes chromatic aberration throughout the zoom range, the lens also makes possible a lighter and more compact design. Image Stabilization (CMOS Shift + High ISO) Long telephoto shots usually suffer from camera shake and subject movement which can ruin photos by producing blurred results. The FinePix Z950EXR's highly effective CMOS-shift and high ISO image stabilization ensures that your shots stay extra-crisp and clear, even at the full 5x zoom. (Left) Conventional Digital Camera (Right) FinePix Z950EXR. High Speed Continuous Shooting Capture every detail of the action with the FinePix Z950EXR's continuous 12-frame shooting mode at an amazing 12fps, at 4 megapixel resolution. 3.5-inch High-contrast LCD Featuring high contrast for a brighter display and 460,000 dots of resolution for easy reading of icons, menus and, of course, exceptional image viewing quality, the large 3.5-inch LCD sets FinePix Z950EXR apart in the ultra-compact class. Face Detection Timer Function The Face Detection Self-timer automatically sets off after the number and position of faces in a scene are detected, snapping the photo at the right moment, with the faces in focus and properly exposed.
name: Fujifilm Z950EXR

description-de_DE-mobile: MF5980dw, Print/Copy/Fax/Scan, 33 ppm, 1200 x 600 DPI, Fast Ethernet, Wi-Fi 802.11b/g, USB 2.0, 1200W, 19.1kg
description-de_DE-print: Kompaktes Laser-Multifunktionssystem Die herausragende Leistung dieses kompakten, netzwerkfhigen Multifunktionsgerts erfllt die Anforderungen kleiner, vielbeschftigter Arbeitsgruppen. Der benutzerfreundliche i-SENSYS MF5980dw bietet Duplexdruck (beidseitig), Scan-, Kopier- und Faxfunktionen in einem schlanken Gert. Zeitsparend Der i-SENSYS MF5980dw steigert mit seiner Ausgabegeschwindigkeit von 33 Seiten pro Minute und schneller Ausgabe der ersten Seite nach weniger als 8 Sekunden die Produktivitt. Auerdem gewhrleistet die Quick First Print-Technologie minimale Wartezeiten fr Ausdrucke. Der automatische Dokumenteneinzug mit Duplexfunktion fr bis zu 50 Blatt zum Scannen, Kopieren oder Faxen doppelseitiger Dokumente und die optionale Papierkassette, die die Papierkapazitt auf insgesamt bis zu 800 Blatt erweitert, garantieren ebenfalls schnelleres und effizienteres Arbeiten. Zielwahl-Tasten fr einfache Bedienung Das intuitive 5-zeilige LCD-Display zeigt mehr Informationen an, damit Anwender die verfgbaren Funktionen optimal nutzen knnen. Fr einen noch hheren Bedienkomfort sorgen Zielwahltasten, die direktes Scannen auf den PC, umweltfreundliches Kopieren mehrerer Seiten auf einen Ausdruck zum Einsparen von Papier und Kosten und sicheren Druck von vertraulichen Dokumenten ermglichen und Ressourcen schonen. Beschleunigte Arbeitsablufe Mit den SEND-Funktionen von Canon knnen Sie Ihre Dokumente schneller und effizienter verteilen. Sie bieten die Mglichkeit direkt in eine E-Mail, einen Netzwerkordner oder auf einen USB-Stick zu scannen. Darber hinaus erstellt die Compact PDF-Komprimierungstechnologie kleinere Dateien mit bis zu einem Zehntel der Gre, die standardmige Komprimierung bietet ohne Qualittsverlust, sodass Dokumente einfacher gesendet und gemeinsam genutzt werden knnen. Einfaches Einbindung in Netzwerk mit und ohne Kabel Mit diesem leistungsstarken, netzwerkfhigen Gert, auf das jedes Mitglied der Arbeitsgruppe zugreifen kann, sparen Sie Platz und Kosten. Der i-SENSYS MF5980dw kann ber das Netzwerk problemlos verwaltet werden, und die Wi-Fi-Kompatibilitt ermglicht eine einfache Integration in das WLAN. Nahtlose Integration Dieses Gert verfgt ber eine integrierte Netzwerkkarte und untersttzt die Druckersprachen PCL 5c/6 und PostScript Level 3 fr eine problemlose Integration in bestehende Druckumgebungen. Energie sparen und Kosten senken Schtzen Sie die Umwelt, und reduzieren Sie gleichzeitig Kosten. Der i-SENSYS MF5980dw erfllt die Energy Star-Richtlinie und ist mit seinen geringen durchschnittlichen Energieverbrauch (TEC) von nur 1,4 kWh branchenfhrend. Im Ruhezustand ist er mit einem Verbrauch von lediglich 2,3 Watt noch energiesparender. Automatischer Duplexdruck fhrt durch geringeren Papierverbrauch zu weiteren Kosteneinsparungen.
description-en_US-mobile: MF5980dw, Print/Copy/Fax/Scan, 33 ppm, 1200 x 600 DPI, Fast Ethernet, Wi-Fi 802.11b/g, USB 2.0, 1200W, 19.1kg
description-en_US-print: Compact laser All-in-One Meet the demands of small, busy workgroups with the exceptional performance of this compact, network-ready multifunctional. The easy to use i-SENSYS MF5980dw offers double-sided printing, scanning, copying and faxing in a single slim device. Time-saver The i-SENSYS MF5980dw boosts productivity with its 33 ppm output speed and class-leading First Copy Out Time of less than 8 seconds. There is also minimal waiting time for print outs, thanks to Quick First-Print technologies. The 50-sheet Duplex Automatic Document Feeder for scanning, copying or faxing double-sided documents, together with the optional cassette that expands paper supply capacity up to 800 sheets, also ensure faster and more efficient working. One touch, ease of use The intuitive 5-line LCD display presents more information on screen, so users make the most of the available functions. For even greater ease of use, there are one touch solution keys that allow quick scanning direct to your PC; eco-copying for combining several pages into a single print out, saving paper and money; and secure print, which is a secure way to print sensitive documents and reduce waste. Accelerate workflows Distribute your documents faster and more efficiently using Canons SEND functionality. With this you can scan direct to email, a network folder or a USB memory key. In addition, Compact PDF compression technology creates smaller files up to 1/10th of the size achievable with standard compression without compromising quality, making it much easier to send and share documents. Easy networking wired and wireless Save space and cut costs with one high performance network-ready device thats available to everyone in the workgroup. The i-SENSYS MF5980dw is easy to manage over the network and Wi-Fi compatibility enables you to easily integrate it into your wireless network. Seamless integration This network-ready unit offers PCL 5c, PCL 6 and PostScript Level 3 support for easy integration into your existing print environment. Save energy and cut costs Reduce your impact on the environment, while cutting costs. Energy Star compliant, the i-SENSYS MF5980dw leads the way with one of the lowest Typical Energy Consumption (TEC) figures just 1.4 kWh. In sleep mode it only consumes 2.3 Watts for greater energy efficiency. Automatic double-sided printing cuts costs further by reducing paper usage.
description-fr_FR-mobile: MF5980dw, Print/Copy/Fax/Scan, 33 ppm, 1200 x 600 DPI, Fast Ethernet, Wi-Fi 802.11b/g, USB 2.0, 1200W, 19.1kg
description-fr_FR-print: - Impression, copie, tlcopie et numrisation recto verso automatiques - 33 ppm/cpm, temps de sortie de la premire copie de 8 secondes - Touches permettant une numrisation aise, une copie conomique et une impression scurise - Numrisation vers messagerie lectronique, dossier rseau et cl USB - Ethernet et Wi-Fi - PCL5e/6 et PostScript - Faible consommation d'nergie - Solution multifonction flexible pour les petits groupes de travail forte activit. Multifonction laser compact Rpondez aux besoins des petits groupes de travail forte activit grce aux performances exceptionnelles de cet appareil multifonction compatible rseau compact. Simple d'utilisation, l'i-SENSYS MF5980dw offre des fonctions d'impression recto verso, de numrisation, de copie et de tlcopie runies en un seul appareil au design compact. conomie de temps L'i-SENSYS MF5980dw permet d'optimiser la productivit grce sa vitesse de sortie de 33 ppm et son temps de sortie de la premire copie ingal infrieur 8 secondes. Les technologies Quick First-Print (premire sortie rapide) permettent galement un temps d'attente minimal pour les impressions. Son chargeur automatique de documents recto verso de 50 pages pour la numrisation, la copie ou la tlcopie de documents recto verso, associ la cassette en option permettant d'tendre la capacit papier jusqu' 800 feuilles, contribuent galement accrotre la rapidit et l'efficacit de travail. Simplicit d'utilisation partir d'une seule touche L'cran LCD intuitif de 5 lignes prsente plus d'informations l'cran de sorte que les utilisateurs tirent le meilleur parti des fonctions disponibles. Pour une simplicit d'utilisation encore accrue, des commandes par simple pression d'une touche permettent la numrisation rapide directement vers votre PC ; la copie conomique en combinant plusieurs pages en une seule impression, ralisant ainsi des conomies de papier et d'argent ; et l'impression scurise, qui permet d'imprimer en toute scurit les documents sensibles tout en rduisant le gaspillage. Acclration des flux de travail Distribuez vos documents plus rapidement et efficacement l'aide de la fonctionnalit ENVOI de Canon. Cette fonctionnalit vous permet d'effectuer une numrisation directement vers un courriel, un dossier rseau ou une cl USB. En outre, la technologie de compression Compact PDF permet de crer des fichiers de plus petite taille (jusqu' 1/10me de la taille obtenue en utilisant la compression classique) sans pour autant compromettre la qualit, facilitant ainsi nettement l'envoi et le partage de documents. Mise en rseau (filaire et sans fil) aise conomisez de l'espace et rduisez les cots en mettant ce priphrique compatible rseau hautes performances unique la disposition de tous les membres du groupe de travail. L'i-SENSYS MF5980dw est facile grer sur le rseau et sa compatibilit Wi-Fi vous permet de l'intgrer votre rseau sans fil en toute simplicit. Intgration transparente Cette unit compatible rseau prend en charge le PCL 5c, PCL 6 et le Postscript 3, facilitant ainsi son intgration dans votre environnement d'impression existant. Rduisez vos cots tout en faisant des conomies d'nergie Attnuez votre impact sur l'environnement tout en rduisant les cots. Conforme la norme Energy Star, l'i-SENSYS MF5980dw donne l'exemple en affichant l'une des consommations relles d'lectricit (TEC) les plus faibles, savoir 1,4 kWh seulement. Il consomme uniquement 2,3 watts en mode veille, pour une efficacit nergtique accrue. L'impression recto verso automatique contribue minimiser les cots en rduisant l'utilisation de papier.
name: Canon i-SENSYS MF5980dw

description-en_US-mobile: i2400 - dual CCD, 600 dpi, USB 2.0, 32 W
description-en_US-print: Add a Smart Touch to your office Take a moment to think about those multiple-step scanning operations that are done again and again, day after day. Scanning, editing, naming, choosing a file formatits so repetitive. Now imagine the time and money you could save by doing all that at the press of a button. Thats what Kodaks Smart Touch functionality is all about. The KODAK i2400 Scanner with built-in Smart Touch functionality lets you capture, manage, process, and deliver PDFs and other file formatsautomating processes that previously were time-consuming. For example, a business could configure its purchase orders scanning process as Option 3. Then anyone who needs to scan purchase orders can just press a button to choose 3 and the documents would be scanned and sent to their proper destinationno training or programming required. Make your work easier, faster, and smarter with Kodaks Smart Touch functionality. More ways to get business done More productivity, more imaging power Dual LED illumination gets you started faster by eliminating lamp warmup time to provide immediate response, plus image clarity, consistency, and color stability. More versatility Our extendable, self-storing output tray and flexible paper handling will take care of just about anything you want to scansmall documents or large, thick or thin, ID cards, even embossed hard cards. More reliability The highly reliable 50-sheet feeder and integrated paper tray make it easy to get scanning done. More possibilities Conveniently scan exception documents with the optional KODAK A4 Flatbed Accessory, which connects or detaches in seconds via USB connectivity.
name: Kodak i2400

description-en_US-mobile: DocuMate 742 Scanner, A3, 50ppm, 600dpi, USB 2.0
description-en_US-print: Xerox DocuMate 742 The Xerox DocuMate 742 delivers high quality production scanning to any organization at an affordable price. With its powerful combination of image quality, easy to use features and fast scanning speeds, it is the perfect solution for businesses looking to achieve high levels of flexibility within a low volume production scanning environment. The DocuMate 742 scans documents at 50 ppm (simplex) and 100 ipm (duplex) and includes a 100-page capacity Automatic Document Feeder (ADF). It has the ability to scan a wide range of mixed document sizes (up to A3 / 11 x 17) and supports long document scanning up to 38 (965 mm). Total Flexibility You dont always know what documents you will need to scan next you might have clean laser quality pages today but tomorrow there maybe multi-colored forms, A3 documents or even long legal forms the DocuMate 742 can handle it all with ease. The 100-page ADF makes short work out of any stack of paper of varying size and it scans with a black background to provide a wide range of cropping techniques. Powerful Technology The DocuMate 742 is powered by Visioneer OneTouch technology to scan documents to up to 9 preset, yet completely configurable destinations. This enables your document to be scanned with the correct settings for resolution, color, duplex, auto-crop, auto-straighten, file format and then delivered to virtually any application, folder or device at the touch of a button! Working together with Kofax VRS (VirtualReScan) technology, imagine the workflow possibilities of delivering a perfect scanned paper documents in a searchable PDF format to email, Xerox DocuShare or a custom web application for your enterprise all at the touch of a button. Not only is this a great productivity gain but greatly reduces the training requirements for scanner users, further helping your return on investment. Intelligent Productivity Ultrasonic Double Feed Detection is built into the DocuMate 742 so youll never miss a page due to a misfeed or a stapled document going through the scanner. The DocuMate 742 offers a professional software package together with advanced TWAIN and ISIS drivers to enable communication with advanced electronic content management (ECM) software applications. Productivity has never been so easy or affordable. And the DocuMate 742 is as serious as you are about scanning. Visioneer OneTouch Visioneer OneTouch is an easy to use utility that connects the buttons on the DocuMate scanner with a powerful set of scanner settings to greatly improve the efficiency of your workflow so that with onetouch, the document is scanned automatically to email, or Word, or your printer, or simply a file folder. In addition to scanning directly to all popular destinations, Visioneer OneTouch also links the DocuMate scanner with industry-leading document management software such as, Xerox DocuShare, DocuWare & Microsoft SharePoint, forming an easy to use workflow from paper to a selected destination. A Software Development Kit (SDK) is also available which provides the ability to develop specific links and integrate them into the Visioneer OneTouch control panel quickly and easily. Kofax VRS Visioneer OneTouch with Kofax VRS is an integrated software solution that combines the ease of Visioneer OneTouch scanning with the superior image quality achieved with Kofax VRS. Kofax VRS is an award winning patented technology that automatically ensures the best possible image quality and OCR accuracy for scanned document images. As pages pass through the scanner, VRS performs a multipoint inspection of each document, instantly checking and adjusting alignment (skew), brightness, contrast and image clarity. Kofax VRS Professional A separate scanner model with VRS Professional is available which provides additional features such as, advanced clarity, auto color detect, auto rotation, blank page detection, bleed through detection and lots more. Text Searchable PDF Transform volumes of paper or photos into organized digital files that can be quickly found, used and shared. In searchable PDF format, the user can instantly search documents for keywords or phrases. This provides additional archival benefits beyond traditional storage, and the widely accepted PDF format lets everyone view and print documents on any computer. Nuance OmniPage Pro Provides a precise OCR and layout retention solution, quickly turning scanned documents into editable, formatted text. The text can then be used in virtually any word processing, desktop publishing or web publishing program.
name: Xerox DocuMate 742

description-en_US-mobile: ThinkPad Tablet, 25.654 cm (10.1 ") TFT 1280 x 800 px, NVIDIA Tegra 2 1.0 GHz, 1GB RAM, 32GB Flash, 802.11b/g/n, UMTS, mini HDMI, USB 2.0, micro USB, Dock Connector, 24.1 W, 3250 mAh, 756.1 g, Black, Android 3.1
description-en_US-print: The do anything, anywhere, anytime tablet Our ThinkPad all-business, Flash-supported tablet has all the security, access, and power you demand. Get more done when you combine those dynamic features with Android and its robust world of apps. Optimized for business. From the makers of the revolutionary ThinkPad line of laptops comes the anything, anywhere, anytime DO business machine. This powerful Android 3.1 tablet delivers a professional multimedia and unbeatable entertainment experience. - NVIDIA Tegra 2 Dual-Core 1GHz processor. - 10.1 WXGA (1280x800) 16:10 IPS panel with Corning Gorilla Glass. - Multitouch display with digitizer input (pen optional). - Starts at 1.65 lbs, with up to 8 hours of battery life (with WiFi enabled) and up to 64GB storage. - Corporate email and security features like network passwords for safe communication inside and outside your network. - Protect all of your confidential data with robust security features, including full device and SD card encryption, lost device disablement and anti-theft software. - HD display and HDMI output for crisp and defined presentations on large monitors. - Fully supports Adobe Flash for online media. - Native USB 2.0 and micro-USB ports. - Integrated cloud sharing and storage to easily move large files between team members and offices. Keep connected on-the-go. - Enjoy Internet access from anywhere with WiFi, Bluetooth and 3G connectivity. - Combine your email, social networking, and instant messaging streams into one universal inbox with Lenovo's exclusive SocialTouch app. - Participate in superior, professional video conferences with front and back mounted webcams. Make the most of your downtime whether with work or play. If it's productivity software you want, magazines, video calls, instant movies, or even games like the ever-popular Angry Birds in high-def, we've got you covered. The ThinkPad Tablet comes with more than 25 free preloaded apps. - Get work done safely and securely with business apps specially enabled for the ThinkPad: Good for Enterprise, Cisco AnyConnect and Computrace Mobile by Absolute Software. - Share and distribute company-purchased apps to numerous devices through a custom, client-controlled app shop. - Access unique corporate preloads from the Lenovo Image Technology Center. Enhance your tablet experience with optional accessories. ThinkPad Tablet Pen converts your handwriting to text. - ThinkPad Tablet Keyboard Folio case protects your tablet when traveling and allows for more productive and comfortable typing. Keyboard includes red TrackPoint for easy navigation. - ThinkPad Tablet Dock instantly charges the battery, allows for data synching and device expansion. - Screen protectors and various hard and soft cases keep your tablet safe while you're on-the-go. - Stay powered on with the AC adapter or car charger. Backed by award-winning service & support. Lenovo's award-winning ThinkPlus Services provide a single-source solution for your enterprise. - Each ThinkPad Tablet is protected by a one-year base warranty, which can be extended to up to three years. - Lenovo is the only Android OEM to offer complete protection against non-warranted operational or structural damage due to drops, minor spills, electrical surges, and other accidental damage incurred under normal operating conditions. - With on-site support options, we also meet the essential IT support needs that keep you and your business productive.
name: Lenovo ThinkPad Tablet

description-de_DE-mobile: 12.1 Megapixel, 1/2.3" CMOS, 4000 x 2248 pixels, Digital Zoom 4x, TTL, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT Color LCD, 15-1/3200 sec, SD/SDHC/SDXC, NTSC/PAL, Mini-HDMI, 231g
description-de_DE-print: 25-mm-Weitwinkelobjektiv, 20fach optisches Zoom; kompaktes Gehuse Alles im Blick mit dem 25-mm-Weitwinkelobjektiv oder extrem nah ran mit 20fach optischem Zoom und bis zu 39fach ZoomPlus, der modernen Zoomtechnologie, die weit mehr Detail und Bildschrfe bietet, als der konventionelle Digitalzoom. Und trotzdem ist das Gehuse so kompakt, dass die Kamera berall zur Stelle sein kann, um die schnsten Momente einzufangen. HS System: 12,1 MP CMOS und DIGIC 5 Das HS System brilliert bei schwachen Lichtverhltnissen ideal, um den Zauber einer Stimmung auch ohne Blitz und Stativ festzuhalten. Der fortschrittliche DIGIC 5 Prozessor und der hoch empfindliche 12,1 MP starke CMOS-Sensor sorgen gemeinsam fr berzeugende Bildqualitt in allen Situationen. GPS* GPS versieht Fotos und Movies mit Standortdaten und dokumentiert so Ihre Abenteuerreisen. Mit der Map Utility Software (im Lieferumfang) kann die Location sogar auf der Karte aufgezeigt und an Freunde weiter gegeben werden. Intelligent IS Der Intelligent IS kompensiert Kamerawackler, so dass die Aufnahmen auch dann noch scharf und deutlich sind, wenn mit hohem Zoomwert oder bei wenig Licht fotografiert wird. Er passt den optischen Bildstabilisator je nach Szene auf einen von sieben verschiedene Modi an und minimiert Verwacklungsunschrfen. Full-HD-Movies Die Movie-Taste startet unmittelbar die Aufzeichnung in Full-HD (1080p) mit optischem Zoom und Stereoton und der Intelligent IS hlt die Aufnahmen frei von Verwacklungsunschrfen. Die HDMI-Schnittstelle erlaubt den Anschluss an einen kompatiblen HD-Fernseher fr die Wiedergabe in Topqualitt. 7,5 cm PureColor II G LCD Das groe, hochwertige LC-Display mit ca. 460.000 Bildpunkten ermglicht die bequeme Mennavigation sowie Bildkomposition und -berprfung aus nahezu jedem Winkel. Die speziell gehrtete Glasschicht sorgt fr eine robuste Oberflche. Smart Auto (intelligenter AUTO-Modus fr 58 Aufnahmesituationen), Gesichtserkennung Im intelligenten Automatik-Modus (Smart Auto) entstehen ganz einfach hochwertige Fotos oder Movies. 58 Aufnahmesituationen (21 bei Movies) werden unterschieden und automatisch die richtigen Einstellungen ausgewhlt. Smart Auto funktioniert auch bei Gesichtern im Motiv dank Face ID erfolgt die Anpassung der Aufnahmeeinstellungen sogar an das Alter der Person. So werden etwa bei einem schlafenden Baby Blitz und Kameragerusche deaktiviert. In Face ID knnen bis zu 12 Gesichter registriert werden, die dann in jeder Aufnahme besonders priorisiert werden. Manueller, Av und Tv Modus Mit den manuell whlbaren Modi Tv, Av und Manuell macht das kreative Experimentieren mit Belichtungszeit und Blende besonderen Spa. High-Speed-Reihenaufnahmen Ganz wie Sie wollen: Per High-Speed-Reihenaufnahmen erfassen Sie dynamische Action, und mit Super Slow Motion Movie lassen sich schnelle Bewegungen verlangsamt darstellen. Optionales Unterwassergehuse fr bis zu 40 m Tauchtiefe Das optional als Zubehr erhltliche Unterwassergehuse schtzt Ihre Kamera beim Outdoor-Einsatz und Unterwasseraufnahmen bis 40 m Tiefe. *Die Verwendung von GPS kann in bestimmten Lndern oder Regionen eingeschrnkt sein. Bei der Verwendung von GPS mssen die Gesetze und Vorschriften des Landes bzw. der Region eingehalten werden, in dem das Gert betrieben wird. Dazu gehren auch eventuelle Einschrnkungen in Bezug auf die Verwendung solcher Gerte.
description-en_US-mobile: 12.1 Megapixel, 1/2.3" CMOS, 4000 x 2248 pixels, Digital Zoom 4x, TTL, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT Color LCD, 15-1/3200 sec, SD/SDHC/SDXC, NTSC/PAL, Mini-HDMI, 231g
description-en_US-print: 20x zoom, 25mm wide-angle lens; compact body Fit more in the frame with 25mm or get extremely close to distant subjects with 20x optical zoom or up to 39x with ZoomPlus- an advanced zoom technology with more visible detail and sharpness than conventional digital zoom. The compact body means you can capture every precious memory wherever you go. HS System: 12.1 Megapixel CMOS and DIGIC 5 HS System excels in low light allowing you to capture the real atmosphere of the moment without flash or tripod. Advanced DIGIC 5 processing and a high sensitivity 12.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor give excellent image quality in all situations. GPS* GPS tags the location of your photos and videos while the Logger function can keep track of your journey. Use the supplied Map Utility software to pinpoint shooting locations and to share them with friends. Intelligent IS Intelligent IS combats camera shake to ensure all your photos and videos are sharp and detailed even at full zoom or in low light. It automatically adjusts the optical Image Stabilizer to the scene from 7 modes to prevent blur. Full HD movies Use the movie button to instantly record Full HD (1080p) movies in stereo with optical zoom, while Intelligent IS keeps footage steady. An HDMI connection ensures high quality playback on an HDTV. 7.5 cm (3.0") PureColor II G LCD A large 460k dot LCD screen with excellent visibility allows easy framing and reviewing of images from any angle plus effortless menu navigation. A tempered glass outer layer gives great durability. Smart Auto (58 scenes); Face ID Effortlessly shoot great photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and selects optimal settings from 58 variables (21 in movies). It also works with faces stored in Face ID and adapts shooting according to registered age for example turning off flash and sounds when a sleeping baby is detected. Face ID lets you register up to 12 faces, so they are the focusing priority in every shot. Manual, Av and Tv modes Experiment with different effects using Manual modes (Tv, Av and M), which give you creative control over shutter speed and aperture. High-speed shooting Capture fast-paced action with High-speed Burst or slow down fast movement with Super Slow Motion Movie. Optional 40m Waterproof Case Protect your camera outdoors and shoot underwater down to 40m with a waterproof case. *GPS use may be restricted in certain countries or regions. Use of GPS should comply with the laws and regulations of the country and area in which it is being operated including any restriction on the use of electronics.
description-fr_FR-mobile: 12.1 Megapixel, 1/2.3" CMOS, 4000 x 2248 pixels, Digital Zoom 4x, TTL, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT Color LCD, 15-1/3200 sec, SD/SDHC/SDXC, NTSC/PAL, Mini-HDMI, 231g
description-fr_FR-print: Objectif grand-angle de 25 mm avec zoom 20x ; botier compact largissez le champ grce au grand-angle de 25 mm ou rapprochez-vous des sujets distants l'aide du zoom optique 20x, extensible 39 avec le mode ZoomPlus. Cette technologie de zoom avance permet d'obtenir une plus grande richesse de dtail et une plus grande nettet qu'un zoom numrique traditionnel. Et grce au botier compact de l'appareil photo, vous pouvez capturer tous vos meilleurs moments, o que vous alliez. Systme Haute Sensibilit : capteur CMOS 12,1 millions de pixels et processeur DIGIC 5 Le Systme Haute Sensibilit est particulirement performant en conditions de faible clairage : vous pouvez restituer l'atmosphre relle de l'instant sans utiliser de flash ou de trpied. Le traitement avanc du processeur DIGIC 5 et le capteur CMOS haute sensibilit de 12,1 millions de pixels garantissent une qualit d'image exceptionnelle en toutes circonstances. GPS* Golocalisez vos photos et vos vidos et retracez votre itinraire grce aux fonctions de marquage et d'enregistrement GPS. Vous pouvez ensuite utiliser le logiciel Map Utility fourni pour marquer les endroits o vous avez ralis vos prises de vues et les partager avec des amis. description-en_US-print: The Professional Monitor with a Touch of Play - IPS panel with 100% sRGB coverage and 178 wide viewing angle - Every unit is factory-calibrated for superior color fidelity - QuickFit Virtual Scale instantly boosts design efficiency by providing real-size document, photo and grid on screen Ultimate Color Precision High Color Accuracy with Low Delta E Each PA238Q is pre-calibrated with a maximum E (Delta E) of less than 5. Resulting in smooth gradation and accurate color resolution User-friendly Solutions QuickFit Virtual Scale The ASUS-exclusive QuickFit built in the monitor provides real-size document, photo, and grid mode on top of the operating windows on the screen. It can activated via a hotkey on monitor and used as a guide to accurately view and edit photos. Supporting Formats: - Document: A4, letter - Photo: 8x10, 5x7, 4x6, 3x5, 2x2 - Grid: Alignment, Centimeters, Inches Versatile Comfort with Ergonomic Design The ergonomically-designed PA238Q Professional Monitor comes with swivel, tilt, pivot, and height adjustments for ideal viewing position. Customized Color Adjustment Customized hue and saturation control with 6 color adjustment allows user to adjust six colors (red, green, blue, cyan, magenta and yellow) independently without effecting other colors. Picture-in-Picture and Picture-by-Picture Picture-in-Picture and Picture-by-Picture allows users to view images from different signals in almost anyway they want Hassle-Free Connection PA238Q comes with rich connectivity including DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI, D-sub. It is also equipped with four USB 2.0 ports so that users could easily connect PA238Q to many peripherals, such as USB drives, keyboard, mouse, digital camera, etc. Mercury-free LED-backlit panel Embedded LED backlight panel helps power saving and environmental protection with no mercury usage. description-en_US-print: Samsung S Series is built with great features and capabilities. The S series is an innovative approach to monitor stand design due to its ability to house circuitry and other devices within its casing. This facilitates a slim design and minimises the amount of loose cables and wires. The S series can also be wall mounted, providing businesses with great versatility and interior design options. The S series model comes in three different screen sizes and two different models to suit individual business needs. All-in-one design Samsung's innovative Cloud Display integrates a thin client into the LED* screen. Its contemporary and innovative design ensures that keeping your work environment clean and tidy is simple. The benefit of having not a separate thin client box is that you can use your desk space in a productive manner. These innovative features come together perfectly for an all-in-one design that increases desktop space. * Samsungs LED TVs utilise LCD Screens with LED edge lights. Remote management S/W Samsungs Cloud Monitor delivers amazing levels of convenience by using the remote management software of MagicRMS Pro. It delivers a centralised operation and saves administrators the time and hassle associated with physically having to visit each device for routine checks. Other benefits include real-time device status monitoring, an inventory process and finally remote upgrading of firmware to all devices. With so many standout benefits for day-to-day operations, the MagicRMS software helps to make the office environment productive. Security you can trust Consolidate almost all of your resources on the data centre and deliver your applications and data over LAN/WAN via a number encrypted protocol including RDP,HDX and PColP to your thin client. Access your critical data and applications while they are maintained and controlled in the data centre Little Maintenance Because all software and data is stored on the centralised host platform. The network is easy to install and easy to maintain.
description-fr_FR-print:
nbsp;
Dalle LED
Assurez vous un impact positif sur l'environnement. Les solutions d'affichage cloud de Samsung utilisent l'innovation LED Black Light Unite (BLU). C'est une technologie qui permet de rduire jusqu' 40% votre facture nergtique compar aux crans traditionnels (CCFL). Encore mieux, cet cran LED est produit sans mercure ni halogne, vous permettant de prserver les ressources naturelles de la plante tout en rduisant votre empreinte carbone.
Logiciel de gestion distance des moniteurs
Les moniteurs cloud Samsung sont faciles d'usage grce au logiciel de gestion distance MagicRMS Pro. Il permet ainsi de centraliser vos oprations et de faire gagner du temps aux administrateurs en leurs vitant le tracas d'aller visiter physiquement chaque unit pour un simple contrle. Il y a aussi d'autres avantages comme la surveillance des moniteurs en temps rel, un processus d'inventaire efficace, une mise niveau des logiciels distance. Avec de nombreuses plus-valus pour votre travail au quotidien, le logiciel MagicRMS est vraiment l'outil essentiel pour tout environnement de travail performant.
name: Samsung TS190W

description-en_US-mobile: Monochrome Laser Printer/Copier/Fax/Scanner, 600x600DPI, 256MB, CIS, LCD Display, USB, Ethernet, 1.5kWh, White
description-en_US-print:
The new imageCLASS D1370 will help your small or medium business stay ahead of the curve. This reliable machine combines all of your needs into one easy-to-use compact design, making it a cost effective choice for your business.

The D1370 offers you multiple ways to maintain a productive environment throughout the work day. It features a 500-sheet cassette plus 50-sheet multipurpose tray and has print and copy speeds of up to 35 pages-per-minute. With Quick First Print Technology, your first copy will be ready in approximately 8 seconds. The 50-sheet Duplex Automatic Document Feeder (DADF) will allow you to copy or color scan from one or two-sided originals and produce two-sided output effortlessly, reducing your paper usage to as much as half.

The D1370 is a step up from its sister model the D1350 as it provides Canon's Send Lite feature which allows you to scan digital document information and send it to e-mail addresses and network folders. It also adds the secure print feature which can be an excellent solution for professionals in the medical field as well as law firms. You can feel free to print confidential information and not have to be concerned that another person will take it off of the printer.

The imageCLASS D1370 gives you the ability to send and receive faxes using the built-in 33.6 Kbps Super G34 fax modem. This model has a strong list of fax features, including 19 one-touch speed dial numbers, 181 coded speed dial numbers, memory capacity of up to 512 sheets, and duplex faxing.

The imageCLASS D1370 also incorporates the Canon Single Cartridge System, which combines the toner and drum in one unit making it easy to replace. The result is outstanding image quality and eliminating the complication and warehousing of separate toner and drum consumables.
name: Canon imageCLASS D1370

The P702 is ideal in quick-service restaurants, airports, public information environments, healthcare facilities and retail stores.

- Industrial-strength, premium-grade panel with additional thermal protection, internal temperature sensors with self-diagnostics and fan-based technology, allows for 24/7 operation
- Open Pluggable Specification is the industry's first standardized option slot that simplifies digital signage installations

- TileMatrix allows you to create video walls up to 10 x 10

description-en_US-mobile: OKI B6200n network laserprinter 128MB 24ppm 1200x1200dpi A4
description-en_US-print:
Oki has a more holistic view of Mono Printing - why offer faster speed of printing if you do not have the processor power to handle the information on the page? Why worry about first page to print times if you do not have enough memory to complete printing your job? Oki offers class leading printers like the B6200 with impressive speed, processor power, memory, duty cycle, toner capacity, trays and reliability which will improve your business productivity. 
 
Speed, Versatility,flexibility and Reliability - these are the qualities that productive professionals in busy workgroups tell us they must have in a printer. And thats what the B6200 printer deliver for small to medium workgroups - a cost-effective solution for all their printing requirements. The fast time to first page makes the printer ideal for heavy duty customer-facing applications or medium workgroups where time at the printer needs to be minimised. The B6200 offers a number of productivity enhancing features including optimal paper handling. The additional paper trays offer large capacity storage of multiple paper types and envelopes which speeds up mailshots or mail merges. 
Okis stringent quality and design standards together with the capability to print up to 75,000 pages per month ensure uninterrupted reliability. That means busy workgroups can be assured of continuous, consistent output no matter how hard the B6200 is working. There are many features on the B6200 printer that contribute to the machines efficiency and workgroup productivity, yet all this functionality comes at a very competitive price, making the B6200 the best ever value in serious workgroup printers.
  24 pages per minute  
  128mb Memory  
  266mhz Processor  
  True 1200dpi x 1200dpi for sharp, crisp business documents  
  Standard input 400 maximum 1500 sheets.  
  Flexibility to choose your options (network, duplex, memory, HDD, Offset Tray, Face-up tray)
name: OKI B6200n NON 128MB 24ppm 1200x1200dpi A4

description-en_US-mobile: 1/5.8" CMOS, 2.1 MP, 1920x1080, opt. zoom 27x, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") LCD, USB 2.0, MS PRO Duo, SD/SDHC/SDXC, 210g, black
description-en_US-print: 1920x1080 Full HD 24p/60p w/8.9MP Exmor R CMOS Sensor Create cinematic video in high definition 1920x1080 24p/60p and high quality 8.9MP still images. Experience stunning low-light sensitivity with improved image clarity and drastically reduced grain with Sonys back-illuminated Exmor R CMOS sensor. Designed for compact cameras and camcorders, the Exmor R CMOS sensor relocates the photo diodes above the support circuitry, maximizing the light gathering area per pixel so you can shoot with better results in lower lighting conditions. SteadyShot image stabilization w/ Active Mode SteadyShot image stabilization with Active Mode compensates for greater degrees of camera shake to deliver stunningly smooth video from wide angle to full telephoto shooting. In addition, innovative 3-Way Shake-Canceling adds electronic roll stability for even smoother video capture 2.7 wide Clear Photo LCD The 2.7 (16:9) Clear Photo LCD displays sharp, bright, vivid images, letting you compose a shot more easily - even outdoors, while enabling you to change settings to best represent the scene. Direct Copy to external HDD without PC13 Store your memories in a whole new way with the ability to copy videos from your camcorder directly to an external hard disk drive13 (sold separately), all without a computer. Your camcorder can also access videos stored on the external hard drive for playback on your HDTV, allowing you to utilize the camcorders handy playback features. Up to 3hr 10min recording with 8GB embedded Flash Memory The built-in 8GB embedded Flash memory can record and store up to 3 hours 10 minutes of high definition video footage (HD LP mode). 29.8mm Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens The professional-quality 29.8mm Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens is designed specifically for compact camcorders. Precision ground optics help maintain the sharpness and contrast of larger lenses, and SteadyShot image stabilization helps reduce blur caused by camera shake. Highlight Playback creates movies with transitions for you Why spend hours editing your movies when you can let your camcorder do it for you? Highlight Playback identifies and compiles key scenes into a short, entertaining movie complete with music and transitions. You can even pinpoint the exact scene you want to include in the highlight reel. Intelligent Auto Intelligent Auto mode goes a step beyond traditional auto modes by analyzing your shot and then automatically selecting the appropriate settings from ten distinct scene modes and wind noise reduction. There are 60 different combinations possible: Portrait, Baby, Tripod , Backlight, Landscape, Spotlight, Twilight, Macro, Low light. Built-in High-Contrast Projector The high-contrast projector built-in to the LCD panel gives you the freedom to share your favorite memories virtually anywhere. With 13 lumens of brightness, this projector is powerful enough to project up to 100diagonally. 32x Extended Zoom to get even closer to the action Extended Zoom works in conjunction with 27x optical zoom to get even closer to the action while maintaining HD image quality. Shoot high quality AVCHD or web optimized MP4 video Select between HD video in the AVCHD or MP4 format for highest quality or easy transfer and sharing.AVCHD provides premium video that can be enjoyed on large screen HDTVs, and is ideal for capturing precious memories at special occasions, family vacations and other moments you want to treasure for a lifetime. MP4 is great for those moments that you want to quickly share on your social networks or store on the cloud. Built-in USB cable for easy file transfer/charge The high-speed, built-in USB 2.0 cable allows for easy connection to your computer for charging or file transfer without having to remember separate cables. It also fits conveniently into the hand strap so its out of the way until you need it. Charging your camcorder is faster than ever now through the USB; for every two minutes of charge time you get one minute of recording time.
name: Sony HDR-PJ230/B

description-de_DE-print: Fr eine universelle Nutzung als Heim-oder Brodrucker bedarf es wirklich eines ungewhnlichen Druckers. Der kompakte CLP-320N erledigt die Arbeit mehrerer groer Drucker. Die Netzwerkfhigkeiten ermglichen auch fr Ihre Familie oder Kollegen eine Druckleistung mit lebendigen, qualitativ hochwertigen Farben, sodass weitere Drucker berflssig sind Mit bis zu 2.400 x 600 dpi bietet der CLP-320N problemlos maximale Farbqualitt und mit seinem schicken schwarzen und cremefarbenen ueren einen stilvoll sportlichen und minimalistischen Look. Trotz dieser Vielseitigkeit und Leistung passt der kompakte CLP-320N problemlos nahezu berall hin. Verbinden Sie sich mit Ihren Kollegen Stellen Sie in Ihrem Bro fr alle eine Netzwerkverbindung her und sorgen Sie fr einen reibungslosen Arbeitsablauf. Sie knnen alle einen gemeinsamen Drucker verwenden, was Ihnen Zeit spart-auch bei der Wartung Und mit der Ethernet-Schnittstelle knnen Sie die Leistung durch Anbindung an das Netzwerk erhhen. Optimieren Sie mit dem CLP-320N Laserdrucker Ihre Kommunikationsfhigkeiten und bleiben Sie allzeit bereit. Ideal fr enge, stilvolle Ecken und viel genutzte Pltze Der sehr kompakte Samsung CLP-320N passt mit seinen 388 x 313 x 243 mm bequem auf jeden Schreibtisch, ohne Ihnen die gesamte Arbeitsflche zu nehmen. description-en_US-mobile: CLP-320N, 16 ppm, 2400 x 600 dpi, 47 dB, Fast Ethernet
description-en_US-print:
The compact CLP-320N from Samsung does the job of several larger printers. Its network capabilities let your family or colleagues connect and get vivid, high-quality colour printing performance, without having to rely on a fleet of printers to meet their needs. With up to 2400 x 600dpi, the CLP-320N effortlessly delivers maximum colour while stylishly sporting a minimal design, with its chic black and crme grey faade. All this style and power, yet the compact CLP-320N fits easily almost anywhere.
Connect with your colleagues
Connect everyone in your office to one network and keep everything running smoothly. Theyll share a common printer and youll save time from servicing multiple machines. And with the Ethernet interface you can increase your performance by hooking it up to the network. Improve your communication skills with the CLP-320N laser printer and keep your lines of communication open.
Ideal for small, stylish spaces and busy places.
Measuring an ultra compact 388 x 313 x 243mm (15.3 x 12.3 x 9.6inch), the Samsung CLP-320N easily fits on any desktop leaving plenty of room for you to get your work done. It also offers the perfect blend of beauty and practicality. With rounded edges, chic black top and glossy crme grey finish everywhere else, you wont want to hide this printer under a pile of papers. And youll really enjoy the convenient power switch located on the front panel for fast, easy access. Hows that for accommodating design?
Capture what catches your eye
Samsungs AnyWeb Print software lets you go hunting and gathering on the Web. You can utilise the CLP-320N to easily select, drag, and drop content from different web pages onto a printable scrap board in your browser window, all while you surf the web. Its an easy way to collect, arrange, and edit useful reference points and resources you can only find on the web for big projects or even just for fun.
Your printing experience just got a lot more colourful.
The CLP-320N easily delivers colour accuracy through premium quality 2400 x 600dpi resolution with absolute ease. Also, with toner particles that are smaller and more uniform in shape than traditional toner particles, youll be impressed with accurate colours and beautiful, glossy printouts.
Lessen your wait, not your expectations
Quit losing productivity waiting around for your documents to print the Samsung CLP-320Ns fast print speed (16ppm for mono, 4ppm for colour) will have you back to work in no time. In Ready Mode, the CLP-320N features a First Page Output Time (FPOT) of only 14 seconds for black and 26 seconds for colour, satisfying your need for speed. An impressive 2400 x 600dpi print resolution satisfies your demand for quality.

description-fr_FR-print:
Cependant la CLP-320N peut vous offrir la productivit de plusieurs imprimantes grce son port Ethernet et sa rsolution 2400 x 600 dpi. Ajoutez cela le bouton dimpression dcran qui vous permet d'imprimer rapidement ce qui se trouve sur votre cran et vous obtenez le compagnon bureautique idal!
Restez connect avec vos collgues!
Grce son port Ethernet embarqu, la CLP-320N vous permet de connecter jusqu' 4 utilisateurs sur la mme imprimante.
Un design unique pour une compacit hors norme
La CLP-320N est une imprimante laser remarquable par sa compacit! Avec des dimensions de rve, 388 x 313 x 243 mm, vous pouvez la poser o bon vous semble sur votre bureau. Sans oublier la touche dimpression directe de lcran et le bouton marche-arrt installs en faade pour un accs facile et rapide. Ajoutez cela un design noir et gris laqu et vous rvolutionnez votre espace de travail.
Capturez et imprimez ce que vous voyez!
Le logiciel AnyWeb Print de SAMSUNG vous permet de slectionner et de glisser-dposer des contenus issus de diffrentes pages Web ou autre pour les placer dans un nouveau document vierge, sans devoir les redimensionner ou les diter de quelque manire que ce soit. AnyWeb Print est un moyen facile de rassembler des informations. Vous pouvez ensuite sauver les documents que vous avez crs en format tiff ou pdf. Vous pouvez galement imprimer ces documents l'aide de la touche impression capture d'cran ou du menu d'impression habituel.
Transcendez vos impressions en couleur
Limprimante CLP-320N possde une rsolution d'impression de 2400 x 600 dpi sublimant ainsi vos travaux couleur. Grce son savoir faire en matire d'impression, Samsung a galement fabriqu de nouveaux toners amliorant la qualit de vos sorties couleur.
Silence, vous travaillez!
En plus de sa petite taille, la srie CLP-320 est silencieuse. Moins de 50 dcibels (ce qui quivaut un niveau sonore infrieur une conversation entre deux personnes). Vous pouvez ainsi imprimer discrtement sans perturber votre environnement.

description-en_US-mobile: S24A450MW - 24" LED, 16:10, 250 cd/m, 1920 x 1200, Full HD, 5ms, 16.7M, DVI, SOG, 5.1kg, Black
description-en_US-print: With the Samsung S24A450MW Professional Monitor, uncomfortable viewing is in the past. You can improve posture and enhance your visual experience by maintaining optimal eye level with simple and flexible adjustment of height, tilt and pivot. The lightweight and compact S24A450MW also helps make the most of your working environment with space-saving innovations like the detachable adaptor and easy VESA wall-mounting, and conserve the natural environment with energy-saving features and efficient design. Conveniently adjust monitor height, tilt and perspective The Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450 has been designed to help boost work efficiency, delivering a tailored experience with its choice of viewer settings. The height-adjustable stand ensures that the screen can always be set at the optimal eye level, which enhances the visual experience while also helping maintain the viewers body posture. Other features include the tilt and pivot capabilities, which not only increase comfort levels but also introduce new ways of working. The SA450 Monitor can rotate 90 degrees, allowing for more appropriate view depending on the work. So, now you can take convenience and efficiency to amazing heights with the Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450. Maximise workspace with an efficient detachable adaptor If you need a work monitor that uses office space efficiently, then Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450 is the perfect choice. It features an innovative new detachable adaptor, which allows the monitor to be easily moved and installed. From physically moving the monitor with the carrying handle to quickly installing, the SA450 is ready to deliver an efficient and clean work space. The SA450 is also equipped and prepared for you as a VESA Wall mount, providing a multi-screen or wall mounted monitor. Optimising your office space is now easily achieved with the Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450. Enjoy energy savings with the lightweight LED display Samsungs lightweight LED Business Monitor SA450 provides another energy saving option through its low consumption levels. This reduction in energy helps both financial and environmental aspects of the business, and is an important part of any work operation. The LED Business Monitor SA450 is also remarkably lightweight and reduces the hassles associated with transporting monitors, and is just one more way that Samsung is helping enhance the working environment. Go green with Samsungs Adaptor On Off 0W The ultimate energy saving measure has been created by Samsung with the new Adaptor On Of mode. By simply flicking the mechanical switch found on the Samsung LED Business monitor SA450, you can cut energy output while not using the monitor down to an amazing 0 Watts. Conventional standby modes reduce energy output to about 1 Watt, but the SA450 goes one stop further for greater results. This helps minimises both environmental impact and operating costs, and is just one more step by Samsung in creating a greener environment. Clear your desk with Samsungs Cable Arrangement A tidy and clean workspace is paramount when it comes to showing professionalism at work. Thats why the Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450 comes with a Cable Arrangement. It conveniently organises the cables coming from the monitor into a simple bundle along the stand and helps minimise clutter around the screen. With the Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450, you can finally enjoy a neat workspace, where annoying cables are kept out of sight. Upgrade to the next level with Mega Dynamic Contrast Experience amazing new levels of colour, brilliance and picture quality through the very latest in Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio. The Samsung LED Business monitor SA450 delivers images so real-to-life that it will transform your whole viewing experience. Packed with breathtaking 5000000:1 contrast ratio, the highest level currently available, the SA450 ensures that blacks are at their absolute darkest and (with pristine whites) colours are at their brightest. You will immediately notice the crystal clear picture and its unbelievable intensity. It is like an explosion of colours and leaves other screens seeming dull in comparison. A monitor design to match business needs The Samsung LED Business Monitor SA450 has been designed to enhance work conditions and efficiency. Featuring Front Tactile Buttons, the SA450 minimises costly errors found with high usage, which is a common problem with touch type button monitors. Furthermore, with its smarter design, users can still access these buttons when wall mounted, which can be an issue when monitors feature side panel buttons. Adding to the visual experience, the SA450 features a Narrow Matt Bezel. This reduces distraction around display area and delivers an experience that is immersive and engaging. Magic Angle Vertical delivers perfection every time The Samsung LED Business monitor SA450 feature the Magic Angle Vertical to deliver a picture-perfect screen even when not viewed from directly in front. This means that you can watch your monitor sitting down, standing up or lying on the couch and still enjoy a great view. And with 20 different angle steps (10 up and 10 down) you will always have a choice to match your position. So, when watching with Magic Angle Vertical, which is even also specialised for LED Business monitor, it feels like youre always standing right in front of the screen even if you arent.
name: Samsung S24A450MW

Dieser unglaublich kompakte Farblaserdrucker steht fr beeindruckend brillante Farbqualitt und eine Bedienung, die leicht von der Hand geht. description-en_US-print: Vivid printing even from mobile devices - Quick and easy 3-step wireless printing from your mobile; - Print vividly thanks to new polymerised toner; - Save space thanks to compact ergonomic design; - Eco-optimise or connect to WiFi networks. Now you can make sure you print with vibrant colour even from mobile devices. The Samsung CLP-365W Colour Laser Printer lets you print wirelessly from smartphones, tabs and other devices in just three simple steps. Its delivered with stunning print quality thanks to Samsungs Rendering Engine for Clean Page (ReCP) technology. Whats more, its compact, ergonomic design helps you to save space and make the most of your home or workplace. Easy Mobile Printing Print from all your mobile devices in colour easily, quickly and conveniently without the need for installing any print drivers. Easy 3 step Mobile Printing Samsung's easy 3 step mobile print - install application, select device & print file. Fast Mobile Printing Print from all your mobile devices in glorious colour easily, quickly and conveniently. Wi-Fi Direct With Wi-Fi Direct, you can print from your mobile devices even in a non-network environment. Enjoy quality printouts Samsungs unique ReCP (Rendering Engine for Clean Page) Technology improves the overall quality and vibrancy of your colour printing, ensuring every printout looks perfect. It automatically sharpens the focus of both graphics and text, while solid objects are overlapped to eliminate white gaps. Polymerized toner Our newly developed polymerized toner has smaller and more uniform particles than conventional toner. Meaning, your printouts will have crisper lines and more vivid colours - helping avoid any paper curling. Also, its higher wax content improves the image gloss and enhances the durability preventing unwanted fading. Ergonomic design Don't worry about this printer crowding your space. Its beautiful and compact design makes it a pleasure to share a desk with. Small size Footprint With a footprint of just 38.2 x 30.9cm the CLP-365W is one of the world's smallest colour laser printers. Ergonomic design Its ergonomic design with ebony brown and ice grey colour creates a modern and elegant work environments. Easy to use Designed for simple and intuitive operation the CLP-365W saves you precious time and effort. One Touch Eco Button Just One push of the ECO button and you can save on toner, paper, and energy. Print multiple pages on one sheet, change colour to greyscale or skip blank pages. One Touch Print Screen Button Print exactly what you see on the screen with just one click, saving time. One Touch WPS Button Connect quickly and securely to your wireless network with the touch of a button, via the one-touch WPS(Wi-Fi Protected Setup). Easy Colour Manager Create and use your own colour profiles with Samsung's Easy Colour Manager. Match the exact colours of a company logo or simply give your print outs the individual look you want. Easy Solution support The printer also brings you software support designed to put you in control of delivering ultimate quality printouts easier than ever before. Easy Eco Driver Easy Eco Driver helps you compile digital documents in multiple formats and makes it easy to share them with others - even through social networks.
description-fr_FR-print:
Imprimante laser couleur Wi-Fi
Impression de votre mobile simplifie
Avec l'application Samsung Mobile Print plus besoin d'installer des pilotes, vous pouvez imprimer en couleur depuis votre smartphone ou tablette en toute simplicit. * 3 tapes suffisent Installez l'application, Selectionnez l'appareil et Imprimez! * Une impression rapide Imprimez des couleurs eclatantes simplement, rapidement et efficacement. * Wi-Fi Direct Plus besoin d'un point d'acces central, imprimez distance depuis vos appareils mobiles grce la fonction Wi-Fi Direct.
Une haute qualit couleur
Bnficiez d'une haute qualit d'impression grce la technologie couleur ReCP (Rendering Engine for Clean Page) de Samsung. Cette technologie novatrice vous permet d'obtenir une meilleure qualit d'image et une meilleure definition des caractres pour des rsultats nets et prcis.
Toner polymris nouvelle gnration
Le nouveau toner polymris Samsung contient des particules plus petites et plus uniformes pour des lignes plus nettes et plus prcises. De plus, avec sa formule la cire, il vous garantit durabilit et rendu glossy.
Une imprimante efficace et compacte
Le design et la compacit de l'imprimante laser couleur CLP-365W en feront un compagnon de travail idal. *Compacte Avec une dimension de 38.2 x 30.9 cm, la CLP-365W est la plus petite imprimante de sa gamme. *Un design pur Son design ergonomique et ses couleurs modernes donne une touche de style tout environnement professionnel.
Facile utiliser
Conue pour tre utiliser de manire simple et intuitive, l'imprimante laser couleur CLP-365W vous permet d'conomiser temps et effort. *Bouton Eco Economisez toner, papier et nergie par simple pression sur la touche ECO. Le mode ECO vous permet de grer vos impressions grce l'impression de plusieurs pages par feuille, la gestion d'echelle de gris, ou encore la suppression de pages blanches. *Bouton imprime cran Capturez et imprimez ce que vous voyez l'cran l'aide de la touche imprime cran. *Bouton WPS Connectez votre imprimante en Wi-Fi rapidement et simplement en appuyant sur la touche WPS (Wi-Fi Protected Setup).

Windows Live Call-Taste Drcken Sie einfach diese Taste, um auf Ihre Windows Live Messenger-Kontaktliste zuzugreifen. Whlen Sie dann einen Onlinekontakt aus, und beginnen Sie eine Videounterhaltung. LifeCam Dashboard Fgen Sie vom Windows Live Messenger-Fenster aus Effekte hinzu, und steuern Sie Ihre Webcam. Kompatibel mit vielen IM-Programmen Kompatibel mit Windows Live Messenger, Skype, Yahoo! Messenger, AOL Instant Messenger und Microsoft Office Communicator. 3-facher digitaler Zoom Die Zoomfunktion ermglicht naturgetreue Videonahaufnahmen, damit Ihnen kein noch so kleines Lcheln entgeht. Fr Desktops und Notebooks Kann an den meisten Monitoren, Flachbildschirmen und Notebooks oder direkt an Ihrem Schreibtisch befestigt werden.
