description-en_US-mobile: SmartLF Gx 42
description-en_US-print: Ideal in production and print for pay applications, the Smart LF Gx 42 scanner allows you to scan and copy high quality colour large format documents, quickly and easily without outsourcing the work. Features: * Large Format Document Scanning 40 max. image width/44 max. doc. width. * Quick Scanning Up to 6 per sec. * High Quality with CCD technology. * 1200dpi high resolution scanning. * Safe document scanning ATP technology. Further Information The SmartLF Gx 42 scanner allows you to scan and copy high quality colour large format documents easily, without outsourcing your work. Combined with a Canon Large Format Printer, its the ideal solution for use in print for pay and production applications where scanning, copying and printing large documents is crucial to business operations. High Quality Colour Scanning Re-creating vivid colours and fine detail is crucial when scanning and copying documents, especially in the print for pay environments, where the customer is paying for an accurate reproduction of their document. The Smart LF Gx 42 uses CCD technology and has a 1200dpi resolution, enabling you to scan and copy bright and vivid coloured documents and images accurately. Safe Document Scanning In print for pay applications the customers document cannot be damaged when being scanned and copied. The Advanced 2 + 3 all-wheel-drive Active Paper Transport (ATP) used in the Smart LF Gx 42 is designed to move your documents through the scanner safely and help you scan and copy quickly and easily. Start Scanning and Copying Straight Away In print for pay environments, a key part of your business is to be able to work quickly, as the more prints you can output the more customers you can service. The Smart LF Gx 42 comes with SmartLF ready to run software, a software package that enables you to begin scanning and copying as soon as the product is installed. Handle thick media The SmartLF Gx 42 scanner includes a motorised, thick media system allowing documents between 2mm and 20 mm to be scanned, including mounted images on materials like Foamex and Kappa board. Designed to Meet Your Needs The Smart LF Gx 42 can be upgraded from black and white to colour in situ, by simply downloading an upgrade saving you the cost and hassle of buying and installing a new machine. Easy to live with For maximum compatibility the devices are designed for use with Windows Vista, Windows XP and Windows Home. Documents can be side or centre loaded. And Plug and Play USB2 ensures you can easily connect to all new computers. Flexible Scanning For real versatility the Smart LF Gx 42 can scan documents that are 48 wide with images that are up to 42 wide.
description-fr_FR-print: Parfaits pour les applications de production et de reprographie, les scanners Smart LF Gx 42 et GxT 42 permettent la numrisation et la copie couleur en haute qualit de documents grand format, rapidement et facilement, sans devoir faire appel un imprimeur. Caractristiques: * Numrisation de documents grand format : largeur d'image maximale de 40 pouces/largeur maximale de document de 44 pouces. * Numrisation rapide : jusqu' 6 pouces par seconde. * Haute qualit garantie grce la technologie CCD. * Numrisation en haute rsolution de 1200 ppp. * Numrisation de supports pais : jusqu' 20 mm (GxT uniquement). * Numrisation de documents en douceur grce la technologie ATP. Informations complmentaires Les scanners SmartLF Gx 42/GxT 42 vous permettent de numriser et de copier rapidement et en toute simplicit des documents grand format en couleur et en haute qualit, sans devoir faire appel un imprimeur. L'utilisation conjointe d'une imprimante grand format Canon en fait la solution idale pour les applications de reprographie et de production o la numrisation, la copie et l'impression de documents grand format sont indispensables l'activit commerciale. Numrisation couleur de haute qualit La reproduction des couleurs vives et de la finesse des dtails est essentielle lors de la numrisation et la copie de documents, en particulier dans les environnements de reprographie, o le client paie pour que son document soit reproduit avec prcision. Le Smart LF Gx 42 emploie la technologie CCD et est dot d'une rsolution de 1200 ppp pour vous permettre de numriser et de copier des documents et des images sans rien perdre de leurs couleurs. Numrisation de documents en douceur Dans les applications de reprographie, le document du client ne doit pas tre abim lors de sa copie ou de sa numrisation. Le Smart LF Gx 42 est dot d'un systme d'entranement sophistiqu 2 + 4 roues Active Paper Transport (ATP) conu pour acheminer les documents travers le scanner tout en douceur et faire de la copie et de la numrisation un vritable jeu d'enfant. Oprationnelle en un instant Dans les environnements de reprographie, la vitesse est un lment clef : plus votre rendement est important, plus vous pouvez servir de clients. Le Smart LF Gx 42 s'accompagne d'un logiciel prt l'emploi qui vous permet de commencer numriser et copier ds que le produit est install. Prise en charge des supports pais Le scanner SmartLF GxT 42 est quip d'un systme de support motoris qui permet la numrisation de documents d'une paisseur de 2 20 mm, y compris les images montes sur des matriaux tels que des panneaux Foamex et Kapa. Conu pour rpondre vos besoins Le Smart LF Gx 42 peut tre mis niveau de noir et blanc couleur sur place : il suffit de tlcharger une mise niveau, ce qui vous vite l'achat et l'installation d'un nouvel appareil et tous les tracas qui vont avec. Simplicit d'utilisation Afin d'offrir une compatibilit maximale, ces priphriques sont conus pour tre utilis sous Windows Vista, Windows XP et Windows Home. Le chargement des documents peut se faire par le ct ou par le centre. Par ailleurs, la connectivit Plug and Play via USB2 garantit le raccordement simple tous les nouveaux ordinateurs. Numrisation flexible Le Smart LF Gx 42 permet de numriser des documents de 48 pouces de largeur contenant des images jusqu' 42 pouces de large, offrant ainsi une vritable polyvalence. Avec la version GxT, vous pouvez galement numriser des documents d'une paisseur allant jusqu' 20 mm. Vous pouvez ainsi numriser un nombre incroyable de formats.
name: Canon CanoScan SmartLF Gx 42

description-de_DE-mobile: @V2800 - Color Charged-Coupled Device (CCD), 600 dpi, 9.5MB Flash ROM, 258MB DRAM, USB 2.0
description-de_DE-print:
Der @V2800 ist eine innovative Scanlsung, der Scan-to-E-Mail, Scan-to-Server und digitale Kopie-Fhigkeiten beinhaltet. Die Scan-to-E-Mail-Funktion ermglicht das Scannen in Farbe von Dokumenten und sendet sie per E-Mail (PDF, JPEG, TIFF) direkt vom @V2800 ohne einen PC.Mit der der Scan-to-Server-Funktion knnen Sie Dokumente scannen und sie auf einem bestimmten Serverpfad speichern.
Wenn der @ V2800 an Ihrem kompatiblen Laser-Drucker angeschlossen ist, knnen sie qualitativ hochwertig digitale Kopien anfertigen und somit viele fr den Broalltag unentbehrliche Funktionen mit nur einem Gert durchfhren.

description-en_US-print: The product offers an unprecedented document delivery technology, transmitting paper documents electronically over the internet.  With @V2800, you can instantly scan single-sided or double-sided paper-based document and deliver the electronics image to various destinations including e-mail addresses, printer, fax machine, ftp servers, web site, or someone else's computer on the network.\n\nThe new way to distribute documents is faster, more cost effective, and safer than any traditional methods such as mail, or copier.

description-de_DE-mobile: HP Scanjet Enterprise 7000nx Document Capture Workstation
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Verbessern Sie Arbeitsablufe und steigern Sie die Produktivitt mit einer gemeinsam benutzten Workstation fr die Dokumenterfassung. Sie zeichnet sich durch eine gute Verwaltbarkeit aus und bietet erweiterte Netzwerk- und Sicherheitsfunktionen sowie einen leicht zu bedienenden Farb-Touchscreen fr den alltglichen Gebrauch.

Features

• Steigern Sie Ihren Return-on-Investment: Mit dieser leistungsfhigen und doch einfach zu bedienenden Workstation fr die Dokumenterfassung knnen Sie dokumentbezogene Arbeitsablufe optimieren.

HP Web Jetadmin bietet zuverlssige Sicherheitsfunktionen und eine einfache Netzwerkverwaltung.
• Steigern Sie die Produktivitt und ermglichen Sie die gemeinsame Nutzung mit einem Netzwerk mit 10/100/1000 Mbit/s mit hochentwickelten Sicherheitsfunktionen wie IPsec, SSL, SNMPv3 und Kerberos.

Schnelle, einfache und zuverlssige Dokumentenerfassung mit vielseitigen Funktionen fr die Dokumentenhandhabung.
• Sie knnen beidseitig bedruckte Dokumente mit bis zu 40 S./Min. bzw. 80 Bildern/Min. in Schwarzwei und Graustufen schnell scannen; bis zu 35 S./Min. bzw. 70 Bilder/Min. in Farbe1.

Sie profitieren von personalisierten, flexibel einsetzbaren Lsungen.
• Sie profitieren von der nahtlosen Integration mit Untersttzung einer Vielzahl unternehmensweiter Dokumentenmanagement-Systeme und einem breiten Angebot an vollstndig kompatiblen Lsungen von zertifizierten HP Partnern.

1 Geschwindigkeit von bis zu 200 dpi (Schwarzwei, Farbe und Graustufen) mit Smart Document Scan Software, Papier im Format DIN A4.
description-en_US-mobile: HP Scanjet Enterprise 7000nx Document Capture Workstation
description-en_US-print:
Overview
Improve workflow and boost productivity with a shared document capture workstation offering efficient manageability, and advanced networking and security features, along with an easy-to-use colour touchscreen for everyday users.

Features
Manage documents and workflows directly from this shared, departmental document capture workstation.
• Improve your return on investment: streamline document workflows with this powerful yet easy-to-use document capture workstation.

Experience robust security, and easy network management with HP Web Jetadmin.
• Boost productivity and enable sharing using 10/100/1000 Mbit/s networking with advanced security features including IPSec, SSL, SNMPv3 and Kerberos.

Fast, easy and reliable document capture with versatile document handling features.
• Quickly scan two-sided documents at up to 40 ppm/80 ipm in black and greyscale; up to 35 ppm/70 ipm in colour1.

Benefit from personalised, flexible solutions.
• Get seamless integration with support for a variety of enterprise document management systems, and a broad portfolio of fully compatible HP Certified Partner solutions.

1 Speeds attained at 200 dpi black and white, colour and greyscale using Smart Document Scan Software, A4 paper.

description-fr_FR-print:
Overview
Amliorez le flux de travail et la productivit avec une station de travail de capture de document partage offrant une gestion efficace et des fonctions de scurit et de mise en rseau avances, ainsi que d'un cran couleur tactile pour les utilisateurs quotidiens.

Features

Profitez d'une scurit solide et d'une gestion rseau aise avec HP Web Jetadmin.

description-en_US-mobile: 1100D + EF-S 18-55mm + 100EG + 4GB SD + DVD - 22.2 x 14.7mm CMOS, 12.2MP, 3:2, DIGIC 4, EF/EF-S, TTL-CT-SIR, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") TFT, USB 2.0, PAL/ NTSC, HDMI mini, SD, SDHC, SDXC, 495g
description-en_US-print: 12-megapixel resolution Step up to DSLR image quality with a 12-megapixel APS-C-sized sensor. A 14-bit DIGIC 4 image processor provides up to 3.2fps continuous shooting and images that are packed with detail and tonal range. Intuitive, on-screen feature guide The EOS 1100Ds Feature Guide provides descriptions of many of the cameras functions, as well as advice on how to use them in your own photography. Easy to use Scene modes and Basic+ Theme-based Scene modes automatically pick the most suitable exposure, focus and drive-mode settings for the subject being photographed, while Creative Auto mode portrays adjustable functions in an easy to understand way. With Canons Basic + technology, the look and feel of these basic auto modes can be fine-tuned according to ambience and lighting type. HD EOS Movie mode Shoot stunning HD video at 25 or 30fps, with automatic exposure control leaving you free to concentrate on the action. Footage can be edited on your PC or Mac, or played directly on an HD TV via the cameras HDMI connection. ISO 100-6400 sensitivity Low-light shooting without flash is possible thanks to the EOS 1100Ds ISO 100-6400 sensitivity range. The cameras 14-bit DIGIC 4 processor helps to control noise and maintain image quality. Wide-area 9-point AF system The EOS 1100D focuses quickly and accurately on static and moving subjects, thanks to nine AF points, spread out across the frame. A central cross-type AF point is sensitive to both horizontal and vertical lines. 63-zone iFCL exposure metering Advanced iFCL exposure metering dissects a scene into 63-zones before analyzing it to find the perfect combination of shutter speed, aperture and ISO. 6.8cm (2.7), 230,000-dot LCD screen Compose and review images on a large 230,000-dot LCD screen, which also provides access to the cameras menu system and Quick Control Screen. Use with all EF and EF-S lenses The EOS 1100D is supported by the complete range of EOS lenses and accessories: flashguns, remote releases and a system of more than 60 lenses trusted by professional photographers the world over.
description-fr_FR-mobile: 1100D + EF-S 18-55mm + 100EG + 4GB SD + DVD - 22.2 x 14.7mm CMOS, 12.2MP, 3:2, DIGIC 4, EF/EF-S, TTL-CT-SIR, 2.7" TFT, USB 2.0, PAL/ NTSC, HDMI mini, SD, SDHC, SDXC, 495g - 22.2 x 14.7mm CMOS, 12.2MP, 3:2, DIGIC 4, EF/EF-S, TTL-CT-SIR, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") TFT, USB 2.0, PAL/ NTSC, HDMI mini, SD, SDHC, SDXC, 495g
description-fr_FR-print: Rsolution de 12 millions de pixels Passez la qualit d'image suprieure d'un reflex numrique dot d'un capteur APS-C de 12 millions de pixels. Le processeur d'image DIGIC 4 14 bits permet une prise de vues en rafale 3,2 im./s et des images riches en dtail et en nuances de teintes. When youve seen the rich and vivid texture of Full HD images, your favourite TV programmes and movies will never be the same again. Discover reality with a full high definition experience. HDMI provides high-speed transmission of high definition digital data from multiple devices straight into your TV. More vibrant colours for better images Using an advanced picture quality improvement algorithm, Samsungs Wide Colour Enhancer Plus drastically improves the quality of any image and uncovers hidden details. Now see colours as they were meant to be seen with Wide Colour Enhancer Plus. A TV prepared for surges, lighting and humidity Ensure you can enjoy your entertainment without worry, whatever your environment. Choose a television that can cope with difficult conditions so that youll be able to enjoy great viewing without inconvenience.

Filme direkt vom USB ansehen Dank ConnectShare Movie knnen Sie einfach Ihren USB-Stick an Ihren Fernseher anschlieen und sofort Filme, Fotos oder Musik genieen. Erleben Sie eine Vielzahl verschiedenster Inhalte bequem auf Ihrem Fernseher im Wohnzimmer. Design das gefllt One Design von Samsung verbessert nicht nur den Bildgenuss, sondern verschnert auch Ihr zu Hause. Mit One Design verschmilzt der Rahmen noch mehr mit dem eigentlichen Bild und bringt damit ein nahtloses Fernseherlebnis. Kabellos auf das Internet zugreifen Mit dem eingebauten WLAN knnen Sie alle Inhalte genieen und das kabellos. Der Platz Ihres Fernsehers hngt damit nicht mehr vom nchsten verfgbaren Anschluss ab. Mit der One Foot Verbindung knnen Sie ausserdem Gerte die sich ca. 25 cm vom Fernseher befinden verbinden und das ohne jegliche Kabel oder Passworteingaben. Bleiben Sie in Kontakt mit Skype Videokonferenzen und genieen Sie Ihr gegenber in voller Gre am TV Mit Skype App fr Samsungs Smart TV ist es ein Einfaches mit Freunden und Familie berall auf der Welt in Kontakt zu bleiben. Dazu mssen Sie nur eine Festplatte oder einen USB Speicher an Ihren Fernseher anschlieen und schon wird dieser zu Ihrer persnlichen Medienbibliothek. Kabelloser Zugang zu Ihren Inhalten Greifen Sie von von berall auf Ihre Inhalte zu. Mit AllShare Play knnen Sie Filme streamen, Fotos bertragen und Musik anhren und das von allen kompatiblen Gerten in Ihrer Nhe. Mit der Cloud Technoloie bekommen Sie ausserdem noch mehr Freiheit, denn damit knnen Sie von berall mit dem Internet auf die in der Cloud gespeicherten Inhalte zugreifen. Ihre Lieblingsinhalte knnen Sie jetzt berall benutzen egal ob zu Hause oder unterwegs. description-de_DE-print: Videos, die Eindruck machen Wasserfester Full HD-Camcorder mit groem 29,8-mm-G-Objektiv, Exmor R CMOS-Sensor und Selbstaufnahmetaste - Aufnehmen unter allen Bedingungen dank robustem Design - Klare Full HD-Videos auch bei schlechten Lichtverhltnissen - Dank praktischer Selbstaufnahmetaste knnen Sie selbst Teil des Geschehens sein. Halten Sie all Ihre Abenteuer fest In der Brandung, bei einer Safari oder hoch oben auf der Skipiste, der GW66VE liefert verwacklungsfreie Full HD-Videos in allen Aufnahmesituationen. So knnen Sie jeden besonderen Moment einfangen, egal, wo Sie sind. Am Strand oder auf der Piste Verstauen Sie den GW66VE vor jedem Abenteuer in Ihrer Tasche. Der Camcorder ist bis zu einer Tiefe von 10 m wasserdicht und resistent gegenber Erschtterungen, Staub und Klte (bis zu -10 C). Daher ist er immer einsatzbereit, wo auch immer Sie das Leben hinfhrt, ob bei Stunts im Schnee oder beim Abtauchen ins Meer. Keine Verwacklungen, keine Probleme Bewegen Sie sich frei. Betrachten Sie Ihr Motiv nicht durch den Sucher, und erhalten Sie stets stabile, kristallklare Aufnahmen. Dank optischem SteadyShot mit Active-Modus werden Camcorder-Verwacklungen auch beim Zoomen reduziert. Ideal fr handgefhrte Aufnahmen unterwegs. Jedes Detail, zu jeder Zeit Halten Sie mehr von Momenten und Menschen fest, die Ihnen wichtig sind. Ein Exmor R CMOS Sensor erfasst jedes Detail und nimmt lebensechte Filme sowie Fotos mit 20,4 Megapixeln auf. Mit einem G-Objektiv von Sony und bis zu optischem 10fach-Zoom sind Sie ganz nah an jeder Aufnahme dran. Werden Sie Teil des Films Haben Sie es satt, nie auf dem Bild zu sein? Der Selbstaufnahmemodus ist die Lsung. Mit einem ergonomischen Griff und einer Taste auf der Vorderseite des Camcorders, knnen Sie sich selbst oder zusammen mit Freunden und Familie filmen. Lassen Sie sich keine Chance entgehen. Filme ganz einfach teilen Einfach Aufnehmen und einfach Teilen im MP4- oder AVCHD-Format. Whlen Sie MP4, wenn Sie Ihre Videos auf YouTube verffentlichen mchten oder AVCHD, wenn Sie maximale Bildqualitt bentigen oder Blu-ray Filme brennen wollen.
description-en_US-mobile: 1/3.91 Exmor R CMOS, Full-HD 1920x1080/50p, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") LCD, MS Micro/Micro SD/SDXC, USB, HDMI, 188g
description-en_US-print: Movies that make a splash Waterproof Full HD camcorder with wide 29.8mm G Lens, Exmor R CMOS sensor & self-record button - Shoot in all conditions thanks to a durable design - Capture smooth Full HD videos even in low-light - Be in the movie too with a handy self-shoot button Capture all your adventures Playing in the surf, out on safari, or at the top of the piste, the GW66VE is always ready to shoot steady, Full HD video in all conditions. So you can have fun capturing those special moments, wherever you are. Hit the beach or the slopes Slip the GW66VE in your pocket before every adventure. Waterproof to 10m, shockproof, dustproof and freezeproof down to -10C, its a camcorder thats ready to go wherever life takes you, from tumbles in the snow to dips in the sea. No shakes, no problem Get ready to move around shoot from the hip, and get a stable, clear shot every time. With Optical SteadyShot Active Mode, camcorder shake is reduced, even when zooming in. Perfect for handheld shooting on the go. Every detail, every time Capture more of the moments and people that matter. An Exmor R CMOS sensor can capture every detail and takes lifelike movies and 20.4MP still pictures too. And with a G Lens from Sony and up to 10x optical zoom, get closer to everything you shoot. Be a part of the movie Fed up with never being in the shot? Self-shoot mode fixes that. Theres an ergonomic grip with a button on the front of the camcorder that lets you film yourself alone, or with your family and friends. Dont miss out again. Its simple to share your movies Easy to shoot, easy to share, you can record in either MP4 or AVCHD format. Choose MP4 if you want to put your videos on YouTube or AVCHD when you need maximum image quality, or if you want to burn Blu-ray movies.

description-de_DE-mobile: HP HD 3300 Webcam
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Die umfangreich ausgestattete HP Webcam HD 3300 ermglicht schnelle Verbindungen und die sofortige Kommunikation. Von 3-Wege-Videoanrufen bis zur Videoaufzeichnung (2) sorgt Widescreen 720P HD fr eine enorme Bildqualitt. Die automatische Belichtung ermglicht klare und helle Bilder auch bei sich ndernden Lichtverhltnissen.

Features
• Die HP Webcam HD 3300 funktioniert mit den meisten Video Calling Services. Freier 3-Wege-Videochat. HP Software konsolidiert Ihre Videokontakte an zentraler Stelle. Desktop Sharing ermglicht Freunden, Fotos, Videos, Dokumente und mehr anzusehen. Upload auf Social Media-Websites per Mausklick.

• Die HP Webcam HD 3300 bietet fantastische Funktionen fr eine hhere Bildqualitt. 720P 16x9 Widescreen HD verbessert die Videoqualitt, die Ihnen sofort auffallen wird. Die exklusive HP TrueVision stellt sich automatisch auf vernderte Lichtverhltnisse ein.

• Die HP Webcam HD 3300 ist mit einer Vielzahl von Funktionen ausgestattet. Vielseitig verwendbare Clip-Halterungen. 360 Schwenkmglichkeit und 30 Neigungswinkel fr Ihre individuellen Anforderungen. Weniger Hintergrundgerusche durch Richtmikrofon. Bequemes Desktop Sharing. (2)

• Klare Linien. Schlankes, optimiertes Design. High-End-Merkmale. Leicht und uerst kompakt. Die HP Webcam HD 3300 ist praktisch Ihr eigenes kleines Meisterstck, das sich durch sein kompaktes, platzsparendes Design und seine innovative Funktionalitt in jede Umgebung einfgt.
description-en_US-mobile: HP HD 3300 Webcam
description-en_US-print:
The feature-rich HP Webcam HD 3300 instantly connects and communicates. From 3-way video calling to recording video,(2) the widescreen 720P HD greatly improves image quality. Auto-exposure keep images clear and bright even in changing light conditions.

- HP Webcam HD 3300 works with most video calling services. Free 3-way video chat. HP software consolidates your video contacts in 1 place. Desktop sharing allows friends to see photos, videos, documents & more. Plus, 1-click uploading to social sites.
- HP Webcam HD 3300 offers amazing image-enhancing features. 720P 16x9 widescreen HD improves video quality for a difference you'll notice right away. Plus, exclusive HP TrueVision automatically adjusts to changing light conditions.
- The HP Webcam HD 3300 is jam-packed. Versatile clip mounts almost anywhere. 360 pan & 30 tilt adjusts to your needs. Directional microphone cuts down on background noise. Convenient desktop sharing allows everyone to see.(2)
- Clean lines. Sleek, streamlined shape. High-end accents. Light and ultra-compact size. The HP Webcam HD 3300 is like your very own miniature masterpiece that's small, space-saving and adds sophistication to any environment.

- (1) Internet service required and sold separately.
- (2) Requires installation of the included software.
description-fr_FR-print:
Overview
La webcam HP HD 3300 -riche en fonctions - connecte et communique instantanment. Qu'il s'agisse d'une conversation vido 3 ou de l'enregistrement d'une squence vido,(2) la HD 720P 16/9 amliore considrablement la qualit de l'image. L'exposition automatique garantit des images claire mme avec des conditions d'clairage clairage variables.

Features
• La Webcam HP HD 3300 fonctionne avec la plupart des services de conversation vido. Conversation vido 3 gratuite. Le logiciel HP rassemble vos contacts vido 1 seul endroit. Le partage de bureau permet vos amis de voir des photos, des vidos, des documents et plus encore. En outre, il permet de tlcharger vers les sites sociaux en 1-clic.

• La Webcam HP HD 3300 offre des fonctions d'amlioration de l'image extraordinaires. La HD 720P 16x9 amliore la qualit de la vido et offre une diffrence que vous constaterez immdiatement. En outre, le dispositif exclusif HP TrueVision ajuste automatiquement l'affichage en fonction des conditions d'clairage.

• La Webcam HP 3300 HD est pleine craquer. Le support de fixation universel peut tre fix presque n'importe o. La rotation sur 360 et l'inclinaison sur 30 s'adaptent vos besoins. Le microphone directionnel limine le bruit de fond. Le partage de bureau pratique permet tout le monde de voir. (2)

• Des lignes pures. Une forme soigne et rationnelle. Des accents haut-de-gamme. Format lger et ultra-compact. La webcam HP 3300 HD est un chef d'uvre de miniaturisation qui conomies l'espace et ajoute du raffinement n'importe quel environnement.

description-de_DE-print: - Kein PC ntig - Einfache Bedienung - Ideal zum Scannen von Bchern - Vorschaubild auf dem 1,8-Farb-LCD - Farb- und Schwarz-Wei-Modus - Scannt Farbe A4 in 1,6 Sekunden - Scannen auf das iPad (mit separat erhltlichem Kamera-Kit) - Untersttzt SD - Karten bis zu 32 GB - Scans wahlweise als JPEG oder PDF speichern - 4 GB Micro - SD-Karte im Lieferumfang - Scanauflsung von 600 dpi - Dokumentengre bis 21 35,5 cm - Stromversorgung via Lithium-Ionen Akku (MiWand 2L, MiWand 2L Pro) via AA-Akku (MiWand 2, MiWand 2 Pro) Aufladeoptionen - MiWand 2: Ladegert - MiWand 2 Pro: Ladegert - MiWand 2L: USB - MiWand 2L Pro: Dockingstation (Netzteil), USB - Stromversorgungskabel
description-en_US-mobile: MiWand 2L Pro - Flatbed, CIS, 600 x 600 dpi, 4.572 cm (1.8 ") LCD, 1.2 W, Li-ion
description-en_US-print: A mobile scanner that scans anywhere, anytime Experience the efficiency and convenience of a truly mobile scanner! Powered only by 2x AA alkaline batteries, the MiWand 2 Pro is a mobile scanner that allows you to scan without a computer or software. Simply gliding the scanner over the surface of a page and the scan is done. The images are then saved to a Micro SD card up to 32G. Wireless design, scan images anywhere The brand new portable scanner can be operated with a single hand. Powered by alkaline batteries, you do not need to carry a heavy power adapter and hunt for an electric outlet anymore! Since no computer is required to start a scan, you can carry it to anywhere, anytime! Whenever on the road, in a plane, a car or a caf, you can digitize almost everything right away! Whether standing or sitting, you can complete your scan by simply gliding it over a surface. Even the posters on the wall or a pretty carton can be easily digitized! Start instant scan with the feeder dock When the scanner is attached to the feeder dock, the Avisions MiWand 2 PRO allows you to start instant scan as soon as a page is fed into the feeding slot. The scan will be automatically started and the image is saved into a memory card with a predefined image mode and resolution. Furthermore, the whole unit allows you to scan paper up to legal size (216 x 355 mm or 8.5 x 14 inch). Preview images with 1.8 color LCD display The Preview feature allows you to view your JPEG image on the color LCD screen for 2 seconds immediately after a scan to confirm the images you have just captured. In addition, you can also view all images individually or as a slideshow. View images in iPad Through the mini USB port, the scanned documents can be easily transferred to iPad (with additional iPad Camera Kit) or any SmartPhone which supports USB Host or OTG capability. Patented Double-Roller and Bookedge Design The innovative double roller technology delivers outstanding feeding reliability and image quality by significantly reducing the risk of skewing and distortion. The bookedge design makes book scanning fast and easy.
name: Avision MiWand 2L Pro

description-en_US-mobile: Video Visualiser RE-455X
description-en_US-print: This Visualiser is a high quality image-capturing device with a powerful built-in zoom video camera. Easy to use, it enables accurate display of 3D objects and documents to enliven presentations. Features - High resolution XGA output: 1024 x 768 pixels - High magnification 12x power zoom lens - 850K pixel progressive CCD for top quality images - Fully Automatic Image Display - Efficient twin-tube lighting system - Easy switching between Visualiser and PC images High quality image capturing device for perfect presentations Direct connection to a projector The high resolution XGA output is ideal for direct connection to a projector or other output display device. The Visualiser captures high quality images of documents and 3D objects, with a sharp 1024 x 768 pixel resolution. Images are produced at 15 frames per second so even moving subjects are smoothly displayed. High magnification The Canon 12x power zoom lens ensures small objects are shown in fine detail. This powerful zoom lens gives perfect full-screen output even for items as small as 31.5 x 23.7mm. High image quality Get the best image quality for your presentations. A progressive scan CCD sensor with 850,000 pixels captures the finest details of both 3D objects and A4 originals. Fully Automatic Image Display Obtain optimum image quality without any complex manual adjustments. Auto Focus, Auto Exposure and Auto White Balance are all fully automatic and independently controlled. High Efficiency twin-tube lighting system Twin fluorescent tubes provide even and natural white lighting. Illuminate documents or even intricate three-dimensional objects perfectly. These high-efficiency 6W fluorescent tubes consume minimum power and emit minimum heat. The RE-455X is both environmentally friendly and extremely economical to operate. Convenient image switching Connect a PC to the Visualiser and switch between the two at the touch of a button. Canon's Image Switchover function enables you to alternate between image sources easily, as often as required. White Paper Mode Lighten the background of documents to a whiter colour, for clear visualisation. Text also appears sharper in this mode. Large shooting area The Visualiser table accommodates a wide range of subjects. 3D objects as large as 306 x 230mm can be displayed and the area is perfect for A4 originals. Still Image Mode Freeze a specified image for extended examination by the audience. The still image remains on the display until a button is pressed. One-Shot Auto-Focus Get instant focus for A4 originals at the touch of a button. This is especially useful when changing subjects frequently. Compact foldaway design Transport and store the Visualiser with ease. It can be folded into a compact unit and carried easily using just one hand, thanks to the integrated handle.
name: Canon Video Visualiser RE-455X

description-en_US-mobile: FinePix T400, 16 MP, 1/2.3" CCD, 7.62 cm (3 ") TFT LCD, SD/SDHC/SDXC, USB, Li-ion, Black
description-en_US-print: 10x zoom in Slim body The small camera with a big performance. The FinePix T400 / T350 packs intelligent scene recognition, 16 / 14-megapixels and a 10x optical zoom into a body that is so compact it fits in every pocket, purse or bag. Super slim styling in seven amazing colors The FinePix T400 / T350 is sleek and slim. This 19.8mm* of super slim compact body fits in your pocket or purse effortlessly. Colors available in Black, Silver, Champagne Gold, Blue, Red, Pink and Purple. * Minimum depth Fujinon Wide angle 28mm & 10x Zoom Lens Highly Regarded by Professionals World-wide Wide Angle (28mm*)10x Optional Zoom (280mm*) A high-quality Fujinon 10x zoom lens delivers picture-perfect results across the entire zoom range, from wide-angle compositions to dramatic close-up shots. * Equivalent on 35mm camera 16 / 14 Megapixels*1 - With Vivid Colors and Clarity An impressive 16 / 14 megapixels resolution won't miss the finest details of your subject. Images are captured sharp and clear, in vivid colors, even when printed at large sizes. *1: T400 : 16 Megapixels / T350 : 14 Megapixels High Sensitivity + CCD Shift Image Stabilization Dual Image Stabilization is the combination of high sensitivity and CCD shift image stabilization that works to eliminate blurred photos by freezing action and minimizing blurs at maximum zoom range. Works in scenes such as subjects in motion, low-light conditions, and underwater that usually gives blurry results. Conventional Digital CameraFinePix T400 / T350 3.0-inch Large LCD The large, bright LCD display makes it easy to compose great photos. Sharing pictures is a pleasure, thanks to a high-impact 230,000-dot resolution. HDTV-compatible Photos & Video Able to capture both photos and movies in high-definition 16:9 format, the FinePix T400 / T350 lets you discover the impact of full-screen HDTV image display. Capture high resolution images in 16:9 format (1,280 x 720 pixels). * Optional HD Player HDP-L1 is required. One Touch Movie Recoding Button One Touch Movie Recoding Button just for shooting movies! No settings. Just press, shoot, and enjoy the movie. Post Capture Editing Try our in-camera movie and image editing functions to artistically enliven photos, creating distinctive ambiances. Movie Editing Movie Trimming After you take a clip, just set the IN and OUT points to crop and save only the part you want. It's that easy. Movie Join Select any previously recorded movie file and "resume" shooting to create a movie up to 2GB size. Optional HDTV Connection Kit Combining an HD card reader and a remote control, the optional connection kit makes it easy to display photos and movies on your HDTV. Compatible Accessories * Please use commercially available HDMI cable for connecting with HDTV. * HDP-L1 is compatible with SD / SDHC cards only. 6 Scene SR AUTO Framed scenes are automatically detected and selected into appropriate camera settings: Portrait, Landscape, Night, Macro, Night Portrait, and Backlit Portrait. Portrait Recognizes portraits by detecting the faces quickly in the frame and optimizing focus, brightness and white balance. Landscape Scenic shots such as mountains and buildings are automatically recognized. Colors of the sky, forests, and flower fields are captured in vivid colors and depth. Night For low-light and night-time scenarios, shutter speed and sensitivity are automatically adjusted, producing blur-free pictures with minimal noise. Macro Macro mode sets the focusing position of the details of small flowers or tiny subjects accurately. Night Portrait When photographing people at night or in low light, SR AUTO optimizes flash range, shutter speed, and exposure of the portraits, while capturing smooth and luminous background. Backlit Portrait Optimizes brightness of the faces that usually end up in shadow and underexposure caused by the light behind. Face Detection Face Detection optimizes people pictures by detecting faces and adjusting focus and exposure to ensure bright, clear results. Conventional Digital CameraFinePix T400 / T350 Red-eye Removal in Detected Faces Red-eye removal automatically detects and corrects flash reflection for a perfect end result. Instantly Detect up to 10 Faces! The Face Detection can simultaneously recognizes up to 10 faces in a photo. Share your group portraits using the Zoom Up function in playbacks, checking each detected face. Each priceless expression can be cropped and saved in clear high resolution results. Blink Detection The camera will warn you when people in the frame are blinking, giving you the option to retake the photo, or enlarge the face so you can save or delete the image before you take the next shot. Smile & Shoot Mode The Smile & Shoot mode of Scene Position, automatically releases the shutter when the smile appears so you won't miss the adorable smile the moment they happen. Conventional Digital CameraFinePix T400 / T350 Face Recognition The FinePix T400 / T350 not only detects faces in a frame but it can also recognize who is who! You can register up to 8 people in your camera and next time you take a photo of them it will bring up their name and optimize settings in favor of your registered faces. In playback, you can search for all photos containing registered faces to quickly find photos of your favorites.
name: Fujifilm FinePix T400

Das 14 Zoll Display mit einer Auflsung von 1366 x 768 Pixeln bietet Schrfe und Farbbrillianz in HD-Qualitt. Sie brauchen keinen Projektor mehr fr Ihre Prsentation.

description-de_DE-mobile: fi-5900C, CCD, 600 DPI, SCSI, USB 2.0, 250 W, 50 kg, Schwarz/Wei
description-de_DE-print: -100 Seiten/Min. bzw. 200 Bilder/Min. (A4) Hochformat Farbe bei 300 dpi!. -120 Seiten/Min. bzw. 240 Bilder/Min (A4) Querformat Farbe bei 300 dpi!. -3-fach Ultraschall Doppeleinzugkontrolle mit Zoning-Fhigkeit. -50 600 dpi. -A8 - A3. -500 Blatt im Fllschacht / aktive Ablage. -Freie Blindfarbenwahl. -Whlbarer schwarzer oder weier Hintergrund. -Inklusive Vollversion Adobe Acrobat 7.0 Standard. -Inklusive Kofax VRS 4.0 Plus Hardware Modul mit SCSI und USB 2.0. -SCSI / USB 2.0 fr TWAIN und ISIS Ansteuerung. -Optionale Pre- und Post-Imprinter. Fujitsus fi-5900C ist ein Dokumentenscanner fr den hochvolumigen Produktivbetrieb mit multifunktionaler, hochqualitativer Bildbearbeitung, der Scan-Anforderungen bis zu 100.000 Dokumente pro Tag verarbeiten kann. Der fi-5900C scannt mit einer Geschwindigkeit von 100 Seiten pro Minute, mit einer Auflsung von 300 dpi (A4-Hochformat) in Farbe und Schwarz/Wei. Der automatische Dokumenteneinzug kann ein Stapelvolumen von bis zu 500 Blatt in den Formaten A8 bis A3 erfassen. Papierhandhabung -100 Prozent gerade Papierfhrung in der Erfassungszone. -Extrem niedrige Papierstaurate. -Scannen von Stapeln mit gemischtem Beleggut (Qualitt, Format, Papiergewicht sind stark variabel). -Bequeme Zufuhr von Stapeln unterschiedlicher Hhe durch Einstellen des Papiereinzugs. -Ausrichtung des Dokumentenstapels links, rechts oder mittig. -Mehrfacheinzugskontrolle (3-fach Ultraschall, Papierlnge, Kombimodus). Bildqualitt -Optische Auflsung bis zu 600 dpi. -Scannen in Schwarz/Wei, Graustufen oder Farbe mit der selben Geschwindigkeit (bis zu 300 dpi). -Multistream-Modus erzeugt gleichzeitig Farb- und Schwarz/Wei-Bilder. -Automatischer Deskew. -Automatische Farberkennung. -Extra breite CCDs minimieren die Beschneidung von Eckbereichen. Bildverarbeitung -Automatische Binarisierung (Advanced DTC). -Fortlaufender, praktisch ununterbrochener Scanbetrieb dank automatischer Rekalibrierung. -Leerseitenerkennung und automatische Lschung. -Ausgestattet mit dem wahlweise verwendbaren VRS 4.0 Plus Hardware Modul. Benutzerorientierung -Aktive Papierablage sichert eine ordentliche Stapelablage und den Bedienersupport. -Umfassender Sprachensupport in 8 Sprachen fr Treiber, Handbcher und Bedienfeld. -Geringe Betriebsgerusche (unter 55dB). -Problemloser Reinigungszugang zu Bereichen fr Verbrauchsmaterialen und dem Papierpfad. Rentabilittsmaximierung -Lange Lebensdauer der Verbrauchsmaterialien, bis zu 600.000 Bltter Nutzungszeit der Pick Roller und Separations-PADs. -Betriebszyklus von 20.000 bis zu 100.000 Blttern pro Tag. -Automatische Meldung ber Austauschzyklen der Verbrauchsmaterialien. -Kleine Stellflche bis zu 35 Prozent kleiner als Vorgngerprodukte.
description-en_US-mobile: fi-5900C, CCD, 600 DPI, SCSI, USB 2.0, 250 W, 50 kg, Black/White
description-en_US-print: The fi-5900C from Fujitsu provides users with a multifunctional, high quality image processing mid-volume scanner aimed at applications with scanning requirements up to 100,000 documents per day. The scanner can scan in colour and mono at speeds of 120 A4 landscape pages per minute at 300 dpi through the 500 sheet automatic document feeder which can accomodate all paper sizes between A8 and A3 and also has manual feed capability. Based on extensive user feedback this scanner incorporates a wealth of new new features aimed at streamlining the scanning function Paper Handling -100% straight paper path in the image capture area. -Extremely low jam rate. -Handles mixed batches, where 'mixed' means quality, size and paper weight can vary significantly. -Easy feeding of different volume batches due to height adjustable input hopper. -Variable alignment of input hopper, left, right or center aligned. -Multi Zoned ultrasonic multi feed detection. Image Quality -Optical resolution, up to 600dpi. -Scan in Mono, Greyscale or colour at the same speed (upto 200dpi). -Multi Stream output, deliver colour and mono images at the same time. -Automatic Deskew. -Automatic colour detection. -Extra wide CCDs eliminate cut corners on skewed pages. Image Processing -Auto Binarization. -Continuous, almost uniterrupted scanning due to on-the fly calibration. -Blank page detection and discarding. -Supplied with Hardware accelerated VRS 4.1 Professional. Operator Centric -Active Stacker ensure batches are easily and neatly handled. -Full support for 8 major languages, drivers manual and front panel. -Low noise operation < 55dB. -Easy cleaning access to all consumable and paper path areas. ROI -Long life durable consumables, upto 600,000 pages for all rollers and pads. up to 100,000 pages per day duty cycle. -Automatic operator notification of consumable change requirement. -Small footprint - reduced by up to 35% relative to comparable products.
description-fr_FR-mobile: fi-5900C, CCD, 600 DPI, SCSI, USB 2.0, 250 W, 50 kg, Noir/Blanc
description-fr_FR-print: -100 pages/min ou 200 images/min (A4) format vertical couleur 300 dpi !. -120 pages/min ou 240 images/min (A4) format horizontal couleur 300 dpi !. -Dispositif ultrasonique de contrle des chargements doubles (3 capteurs), avec reconnaissance de zones. -Rsolution : de 50 600 dpi. -Formats de numrisation : A8 A3. -Capacit de stockage de documents / stockage actif : 500 feuilles. -Possibilit de choisir librement les couleurs ignorer. -Possibilit de slectionner un arrire-plan noir ou blanc. -Version intgrale d'Adobe Acrobat 7.0 Standard livre avec le produit. -Module matriel Kofax VRS 4.0 Plus avec SCSI et USB 2.0 livr avec le produit. -Commande SCSI/USB 2.0 pour TWAIN et ISIS. -En option : imprimante d'endossement pr-numrisation et post-numrisation. Le modle fi-5900C de Fujitsu est un scanner documents conu pour la numrisation productive de gros volumes de documents, tout en offrant un traitement multifonctionnel et haut de gamme de l'image ; il numrise sans broncher jusqu' 100 000 documents par jour. Le fi-5900C numrise une vitesse de 100 pages par minute, une rsolution de 300 dpi (format vertical A4) en couleur et en noir et blanc. Le dispositif de chargement automatique accepte jusqu' 500 feuilles dans les formats A8 A3. Maniement du papier 100% d'alignement du papier dans la zone de numrisation Taux de bourrage papier extrmement bas Numrisation de piles de documents mixtes (la qualit, le format et la densit de papier des documents peuvent varier fortement sans que cela ne pose aucun problme) Introduction confortable de piles de diffrentes hauteurs, grce au rglage du chargement du papier Alignement gauche, droite ou centr de la pile de documents Dtection des chargements multiples (trois capteurs ultrasoniques, longueur du papier, mode combi) Qualit d'image -Rsolution optique de jusqu' 600 dpi. -Numrisation en noir et blanc, nuances de gris ou en couleur la mme vitesse (jusqu' 300 dpi). -Le mode multistream cre simultanment des images en couleur et en noir et blanc. -Correction automatique du positionnement inclin (Auto Deskew). -Reconnaissance automatique de la couleur. -Les CCD ultralarges minimisent le rognage des zones situes dans les coins. Traitement de l'image -Binarisation automatique (Advanced DTC). -Fonctionnement continu et ininterrompu du scanner, grce au recalibrage automatique. -Dtection et suppression automatique des pages vides. -Modle quip du module matriel Kofax VRS 4.0 Plus, une technologie utilisable en cas de besoin. Convivialit -Le bac papier actif garantit un empilement correct des documents et paule l'utilisateur. -Support complet en huit langues pour les pilotes, les manuels et le pupitre de commande. -Fonctionnement trs silencieux (moins de 55dB). -Accs facile aux espaces des consommables et du parcours du papier pour leur nettoyage. Maximisation de la rentabilit -Grande longvit des consommables ; galet de prise de papier et garnitures de sparation : jusqu' 600 000 feuilles. -Cycle de fonctionnement : de 20 000 100 000 feuilles par jour. -Signalement automatique des cycles de remplacement des consommables.
name: Fujitsu fi-5900C

description-en_US-mobile: 1802230 - i750 Scanner, 115 ppm, 115000 pages per day, 300 dpi, 305 mm x 863 mm, IEEE-1394
description-en_US-print: The Kodak i700 Series Scanners ideally match the speed and volume requirements of your enterprise. The KODAK i750 Scanner delivers all the advantages of the tried-and-true KODAK i780 Scanner, a Better Buys for Business Editor's Choice Award winner: the speed you need, automatic features like auto orientation for exceptional images every time, and rugged, reliable performance. Compare specs, and you'll see that the KODAK i750 Scanner outruns the competition with speeds up to 115 ppm. But the i750 Scanner's actual throughput advantage is much greater than raw numbersbecause, unlike competing products, it delivers maximum scanning while meeting real needs under real-world conditions. You get true 115 ppm performance when scanning: - At up to 300 dpi resolution. - In color, grayscale or black-and-white. - In dual stream mode (outputting up to four images per scan). - With all advanced features enabled. Pace-setting image processing - Take pre-sorting right out of your business processwith the automatic orientation feature, document content is analyzed on-the-fly and your images are automatically displayed in the correct reading orientation. - Exclusive Perfect Page imaging delivers exceptional image quality, with readability equal to or better than the original document. - Auto color detection for threshold-based automatic color scanning. - Electronic color dropout allows the scanner to eliminate the form color, capturing only the information you need. - Auto cropping, so you capture only the actual documentand deskew, to automatically straighten every image. - Five output options meet virtually any imaging requirementblack-and-white, color or grayscale, plus two dual stream options: color and black-and-white, or grayscale and black- and-white. Extra-versatile, efficient paper handling - Easily scan mixed batches of business documents, photos, tear sheets and graphics. - Pre-scan document imprinting. - SurePath technology delivers the paper-feeding reliability you need for uninterrupted workflow. - Ultrasonic multi-feed detection helps prevent misfeeds by recognizing labels, stick-on notes, and stuck-together documents. - Flexible input tray feeds a wide range of document sizes and shapes, with lockable paper-feeding guides and an included short-document exit tray for stacking smaller documents. - Fast elevator allows you to quickly reach the ready-to-scan position.
name: Kodak i750

description-en_US-mobile: 1443589 - i4600 Scanner, 120 ppm, 50000 pages per day
description-en_US-print: Digitizing and managing a whirlwind of documents just got easier. With the most versatile capture solution Kodak has ever built, youll be ready for production scanning the day you open the box. Introducing the all-new KODAK i4000 Series Scanners. We took everything weve ever learned about document management and built an entirely original platform to help you control information, automate processes, and take productivity to new heights. Its time for a solution that will meet your needs today and can grow to meet your needs tomorrow. Its time for you and Kodak. Its tough. Its simple. And it was engineered from scratch by listening to your needs, then delivering on every one of them. Just look below and decide what youre looking for from a document capture solution, then learn how the new KODAK i4000 Series Scanners can give it to you. Simplicity and ease of integration Kodaks Smart Touch Feature delivers out-of-the-box productivity that easily automates multiple tasks with powerful one touch scanning. Ergonomic design for easier loading and unloading. Our new capture platform allows easy upgrades and simple integration with your new IT strategy or existing process. Output to multiple file formats and destinations, and scan to other applications. Worry-free, consistent image quality Kodaks Perfect Page Technology makes adjusting scanner settings a thing of the past. Perfect Page image processing provides exceptional scans and images time after time, even from less-than-perfect documents, reducing the need for rescans and post-image processing. Streak Filtering corrects for real-world conditions you cant control, such as dust. Longevity and ease of mind When volume increases, enhanced functionality and speed are easily added its the only scanner series in its class that allows field upgrades. Rugged design and steel-welded frame ensure high performance and reliability. KODAK Service and Support helps you keep things running smoothly.

Musikgenuss mit nur einer Berhrung

One Touch-Verbindung mit NFC*: Wenn Ihr Smartphone oder Tablet nicht NFC-fhig ist, koppeln Sie es einfach mit dem kabellosen Lautsprecher, um Ihre Musik kabellos zu bertragen..
Kabelloses Musik-Streaming per Bluetooth: Wenn Ihr Gert nicht NFC-fhig ist, knnen Sie es einfach ber Bluetooth verbinden.

Realistischer Surround Sound mit S-Master Digitalverstrker: Mit insgesamt 20 W Lautsprecherleistung erleben Sie ein raumfllendes Klangerlebnis.
Genieen Sie Ihre Musik dank 8 Stunden Wiedergabe berall: Stecken Sie den mobilen BTX300 einfach aus, und nehmen Sie ihn dank Akku zu einer Gartenparty oder auf eine Reise einfach mit..
Stilvolle Ergnzung fr jeden Raum: Das schmale, geschwungene Design mit gebrsteter Edelstahloberflche sieht berall gut aus. Wei oder Schwarz..

Freisprechfunktion ber das integrierte Mikrofon: Wenn Sie, whrend Sie Musik hren, einen Anruf erhalten, drcken Sie einfach auf die Antworttaste auf dem kabellosen Lautsprecher, um beim Tippen oder Kochen zu antworten..

description-en_US-mobile: 2ch wireless speaker with NFC, Bluetooth, 20W power & 8-hour battery life
description-en_US-print:
Touch once for instant music

One touch connection with NFC*: If your smartphone or tablet isnt NFC-enabled, just pair it with the wireless speaker to stream your music without wires.
Wireless music streaming with Bluetooth: If your device isnt NFC-enabled, simply pair with the speaker using Bluetooth.
Bring your music to life: The 2 channel wireless speaker with its passive radiator reduces sound distortion for crisp, clear music.
Realistic surround sound with S-Master digital amp: With 20W total speaker power, its the type of audio that fills every corner of the room.
Take it on a trip with 8-hour playback: With the rechargeable battery, simply unplug the portable BTX300 and take it anywhere from a party on the terrace to a road trip.
Add a touch of style to any room: A sleek, curved design with a brushed stainless steel finish will look good wherever you put it. White or black..
USB charging as you listen: While youre dancing in the kitchen, you can charge your smartphone or tablet via the USB power port.
Take hands-free calls with a built-in microphone: When youre listening and a call comes in, just press the answering key on the wireless speaker to chat while typing or cooking.
Ready for a safe journey: A custom carrying case protects the wireless speaker as you go, so you can take it to a friends place for drinks and a listen.

Son Surround raliste avec amplificateur numrique S-Master: Grce sa puissance totale de 20 W, l'enceinte fournit un son qui emplit chaque recoin de la pice.
Emportez-la avec vous et profitez de 8 heures d'coute: Grce sa batterie rechargeable, dbranchez simplement l'enceinte BTX300 portable et emportez-la vos soires en extrieur ou lors de vos voyages.
Une touche d'lgance pour chaque pice: Systme compact aux courbes lgantes et finition en acier bross inoxydable, pour un style lgant dans toutes les pices de la maison. Blanc ou noir..
Chargement USB et coute simultans: Dansez dans la cuisine tout en chargeant votre smartphone ou tablette via le port d'alimentation USB.
Passez des appels en gardant les mains libres grce au microphone intgr: Si vous recevez un appel alors que vous coutez de la musique, appuyez simplement sur la touche de prise d'appel sur l'enceinte sans fil afin de discuter tout en continuant vos activits.
Prt pour vos dplacements: Une housse de transport personnalise protge l'enceinte sans fil lors de vos dplacements, vous permettant de l'emporter chez des amis pour profiter de votre musique autour d'un verre.

description-de_DE-mobile: HP Scanjet N6310 Document Flatbed Scanner
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Dieses flexible Gert scannt alle erdenklichen Brounterlagen von ein- und beidseitig bedruckten Dokumenten ber gebundene Berichte, Visitenkarten und Fotos bis hin zu Kleinbilddias und Negativen. Durch die verbesserte Erfassung von Dokumenten und programmierbare Direkttasten wchst die Produktivitt.

Features
Dieser uerst vielseitige Scanner erfasst einfach alles von Einzeldokumenten bis hin zu ganzen Papierstapeln.
• Ein leistungsstarker Partner im Unternehmen: Dokumente, Bilder und andere Vorlagen lassen sich mit einem einzigen flexiblen Gert erfassen. Papierstapel, gebundene oder geheftete Dokumente, Visitenkarten, Fotos, Kleinbilddias, Negative: Es gibt nichts, was man nicht scannen kann!

Benutzerfreundliche Direkttasten und Funktionen fr die automatische Optimierung von Bildern machen Scanvorgnge noch effektiver.
• Alltgliche Aufgaben lassen sich dank Direkttasten noch effizienter bewltigen. Die HP Scantechnologie ermglicht das Entzerren, Zuschneiden und Drehen digitalisierter Dateien. Bei der Umwandlung von Dokumenten in bearbeitbare digitale Dateien sorgt Color-Dropout fr eine noch bessere optische Zeichenerkennung (OCR).

Dank automatischer Dokumentenzufhrung mit Duplexfunktion werden auch mehrseitige Dokumente schnell und zuverlssig gescannt.
• Noch mehr Produktivitt im Bro: Dokumente werden ber die automatische 50-Blatt-Dokumentenzufhrung mit Duplexfunktion problemlos erfasst. Scannt bis zu 15 S. bzw. 6 Bilder/Min. Die HP Scansoftware ermglicht die Scanvorschau sowie das Bearbeiten und Anpassen von Scans. ISIS-, TWAIN- und WIA-Treiber im Lieferumfang enthalten.
description-en_US-mobile: HP Scanjet N6310 Document Flatbed Scanner
description-en_US-print:
Overview
Manage all your office scanning single or double-sided documents, bound reports, business cards, photos and even slides and negatives from one versatile machine. Boost productivity with document enhancement and programmable shortcuts.

Features
Capture everything from single receipts to stacks of papers with this ultra-versatile scanner.
• Put an advanced document capture device at the heart of your business and get versatile image scanning from the same machine. Scan it all stacks of papers, bound or stapled documents, business cards, photos, 35 mm slides and negatives.

Streamline your scanning processes with easy shortcuts and automatic image enhancement features.
• Complete common tasks more efficiently with one-touch shortcuts. Use HP scanning technology to automatically deskew, crop and rotate digitised files. Choose colour-drop-out to improve OCR accuracy when turning documents into editable digital files.

Scan multipage documents quickly and reliably with the duplex automatic document feeder.
• Boost office productivity with easy unattended document capture using the 50-sheet duplex automatic document feeder. Scan at up to 15 ppm/6 ipm. Preview, edit and adjust scans using HP Scanning Software. ISIS, TWAIN and WIA drivers included.
description-fr_FR-mobile: HP Scanjet N6310 Document Flatbed Scanner
description-fr_FR-print:
Overview
Grez toutes vos numrisations de bureau documents simples ou recto verso, rapports relis, cartes de visite, photos, et mme diapositives et ngatifs sur une seule machine polyvalente. Augmentez la productivit avec l'amlioration de document et les raccourcis programmables.

Features
Capturez tout, des simples reus aux piles de papiers, avec ce scanner ultra-polyvalent.
• Placez un appareil de capture de document avanc au cur de votre socit et profitez d'une numrisation d'image polyvalente l'aide de la mme machine fiable. Numrisez tout: des piles de papier, des documents relis ou agrafs, des cartes de visite, des photos, des diapositives et des ngatifsde 35mm.

Rationalisez vos processus de numrisation avec des raccourcis et des fonctions d'amlioration automatique d'image.
• Ralisation plus efficace des tches courantes (raccourcis de fonction directe). Technologie de numrisation HP pour correction des dsalignements, rognage et rotation auto. des fichiers numriss. Dtourage de couleur pour amliorer la prcision OCR lors de la conversion des documents en fichiers numriques modifiables.

Numrisez des documents de plusieurs pages de faon rapide et faible avec le chargeur auto. de document recto verso.
• Augmentez la productivit au bureau avec la capture facile de document sans surveillance l'aide du chargeur auto. de documents recto verso de 50feuilles. Numrisez jusqu' 15ppm//6ipm. Prvisualisez, modifiez et ajustez les numrisations l'aide de HP Scanning Software. Pilotes ISIS, TWAIN et WIA inclus.
name: HP Scanjet N6310

description-de_DE-mobile: HP Scanjet G4010 Photo Scanner
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Herausragende1 Farbgenauigkeit durch innovatives 6-Farb-Fotoscannen das bietet nur HP. Auch das Scannen von Dias und Negativen ist mglich, wobei dank einer Hardware-Auflsung von 4.800 x 9.600 dpi jedes Detail erfasst wird2. Verblasste Farben lassen sich auffrischen und sogar alte Fotos und Dias werden wieder schn.

Features
Hoch auflsende 6-Farb-Fotoscans plus Durchlichteinheit fr Dias und Negative: Das gibt es nur bei HP.
• Um 40 % genauere Farbwiedergabe1 als bei anderen Scannern dank 6-Farb-Scans mit 96 Bit das bietet nur HP. Die integrierte Durchlichteinheit ermglicht das Scannen von Dias und Negativen fr gestochen scharfe, hoch auflsende Ergebnisse mit 4.800 x 9.600 dpi2.

Erinnerungen bewahren mit intuitiven Tools lassen sich alte oder beschdigte Originale restaurieren.
• Alte Fotos, Dias und Negative werden dank verschiedener intuitiver Tools wieder lebendig. U. a. gibt es ein Tool zum einfachen Retuschieren von Staub- und Kratzspuren. Farben auffrischen, rote Augen korrigieren und Details auf dunklen Fotos besser zur Geltung bringen all dies leisten die HP Real Life Technologies.

Mit praktischen Direkttasten scannen und die Scans ber die mitgelieferte Software bearbeiten und weiterleiten.
• Schnelles, einfaches Scannen von Fotos oder Dias/Negativen per Tastendruck. Kopien und Vervielfltigungen per Tastendruck erstellen und Dateien als PDFs speichern, die sich bequem weiterleiten lassen. Die benutzerfreundliche HP Photosmart Software ermglicht das Verwalten, Bearbeiten und Mailen von Fotos.

1 Auf Grundlage unabhngiger Scanner-Tests, Dez. 06. http://digitalkamera.image-engineering.de/index.php/Publications
2 Die maximale Auflsung ist abhngig von den Systemfaktoren des PC
description-en_US-mobile: HP Scanjet G4010 Photo Scanner
description-en_US-print: World's first 6-colour photo scanner for industry-leading colour accuracy. Enjoy high-definition scan quality that delivers vivid and realistic images with each scan. - Capture true-to-original colour for your creative projects with HPs exclusive, 6-colour, 96-bit photo scanning. Get high-definition detail with 4800 x 9600-dpi resolution[1]. - Easily restore colours to old, faded photos, and remove dust or scratches with HP Real Life technologies' scanning software. Give photos a more vibrant, realistic quality with HP Adaptive Lighting which brighten darker areas and bring out details. - Easily convert documents and images to digital files using the 4 one-touch buttons: Scan, Scan Film, Copy and HP Photosmart Instant Share. Archive or share via email and edit text from scanned documents. [1] Not available for scanning negatives in 6-colour; maximum resolution may be affected by PC system factors
description-fr_FR-print:
Overview
Dotez-vous d'une prcision de couleurs suprieure et exceptionnelle 1 avec la numrisation de photos 6couleurs une exclusivit HP. Numrisez les diapositives et les ngatifs et captez chaque dtail en rsolution matrielle 4800 x 9600ppp2. Ravivez les couleurs passes et restaurez vos anciennes photos et diapositives.

Features
Numrisation de photos haute dfinition 6 couleurs, une exclusivit HP, plus adaptateur de diapos/ngatifs.

Prservez vos souvenirs des outils intuitifs vous aident restaurer des originaux anciens ou abms.
• Rendez vie aux photos, diapositives et ngatifs anciens, avec toute une gamme d'outils intuitifs notamment pour supprimer poussires et rayures. Restaurez les couleurs passes, liminez l'effet yeux rouges et rvlez les dtails des photos sombres, l'aide de la technologie HP Real Life.

Numrisez facilement l'aide des touches de fonctions directes, modifiez et partagez l'aide du logiciel fourni.
• Apprciez la numrisation rapide de photos ou de diapos/ngatifs, avec les touches de fonctions directes. Ralisez copies et retirages d'une pression de touche, et enregistrez-les au format PDF pour faciliter le partage. Organisez vos photos, corrigez-les et envoyez-les par courrier lectronique avec le logiciel HP Photosmart, facile utiliser.

1 Bas sur des tests indpendants des scanners intgrs, Dec 06. http://digitalkamera.image-engineering.de/index.php/Publications
2 La rsolution maximale peut tre affecte par des facteurs lis au systme de l'ordinateur

description-en_US-mobile: I-SENSYS MF5980DW 33PPM, A4, 1200 x 600 DPI, USB 2.0, 10BASE-T/100BASE-TX, 802.11b/g
description-en_US-print: Compact laser All-in-One Meet the demands of small, busy workgroups with the exceptional performance of this compact, network-ready multifunctional. The easy to use i-SENSYS MF5980dw offers double-sided printing, scanning, copying and faxing in a single slim device. Time-saver The i-SENSYS MF5980dw boosts productivity with its 33 ppm output speed and class-leading First Copy Out Time of less than 8 seconds. There is also minimal waiting time for print outs, thanks to Quick First-Print technologies. The 50-sheet Duplex Automatic Document Feeder for scanning, copying or faxing double-sided documents, together with the optional cassette that expands paper supply capacity up to 800 sheets, also ensure faster and more efficient working. One touch, ease of use The intuitive 5-line LCD display presents more information on screen, so users make the most of the available functions. For even greater ease of use, there are one touch solution keys that allow quick scanning direct to your PC; eco-copying for combining several pages into a single print out, saving paper and money; and secure print, which is a secure way to print sensitive documents and reduce waste. Accelerate workflows Distribute your documents faster and more efficiently using Canons SEND functionality. With this you can scan direct to email, a network folder or a USB memory key. In addition, Compact PDF compression technology creates smaller files up to 1/10th of the size achievable with standard compression without compromising quality, making it much easier to send and share documents. Easy networking wired and wireless Save space and cut costs with one high performance network-ready device thats available to everyone in the workgroup. The i-SENSYS MF5980dw is easy to manage over the network and Wi-Fi compatibility enables you to easily integrate it into your wireless network. Seamless integration This network-ready unit offers PCL 5c, PCL 6 and PostScript Level 3 support for easy integration into your existing print environment. Save energy and cut costs Reduce your impact on the environment, while cutting costs. Energy Star compliant, the i-SENSYS MF5980dw leads the way with one of the lowest Typical Energy Consumption (TEC) figures just 1.4 kWh. In sleep mode it only consumes 2.3 Watts for greater energy efficiency. Automatic double-sided printing cuts costs further by reducing paper usage.
description-fr_FR-mobile: I-SENSYS MF5980DW 33PPM, A4, 1200 x 600 DPI, USB 2.0, 10BASE-T/100BASE-TX, 802.11b/g
description-fr_FR-print: Multifonction laser compact Rpondez aux besoins des petits groupes de travail forte activit grce aux performances exceptionnelles de cet appareil multifonction compatible rseau compact. Simple d'utilisation, l'i-SENSYS MF5980dw offre des fonctions d'impression recto verso, de numrisation, de copie et de tlcopie runies en un seul appareil au design compact. conomie de temps L'i-SENSYS MF5980dw permet d'optimiser la productivit grce sa vitesse de sortie de 33 ppm et son temps de sortie de la premire copie ingal infrieur 8 secondes. Les technologies Quick First-Print (premire sortie rapide) permettent galement un temps d'attente minimal pour les impressions. Son chargeur automatique de documents recto verso de 50 pages pour la numrisation, la copie ou la tlcopie de documents recto verso, associ la cassette en option permettant d'tendre la capacit papier jusqu' 800 feuilles, contribuent galement accrotre la rapidit et l'efficacit de travail. Simplicit d'utilisation partir d'une seule touche L'cran LCD intuitif de 5 lignes prsente plus d'informations l'cran de sorte que les utilisateurs tirent le meilleur parti des fonctions disponibles. Pour une simplicit d'utilisation encore accrue, des commandes par simple pression d'une touche permettent la numrisation rapide directement vers votre PC ; la copie conomique en combinant plusieurs pages en une seule impression, ralisant ainsi des conomies de papier et d'argent ; et l'impression scurise, qui permet d'imprimer en toute scurit les documents sensibles tout en rduisant le gaspillage. Acclration des flux de travail Distribuez vos documents plus rapidement et efficacement l'aide de la fonctionnalit ENVOI de Canon. Cette fonctionnalit vous permet d'effectuer une numrisation directement vers un courriel, un dossier rseau ou une cl USB. En outre, la technologie de compression Compact PDF permet de crer des fichiers de plus petite taille (jusqu' 1/10me de la taille obtenue en utilisant la compression classique) sans pour autant compromettre la qualit, facilitant ainsi nettement l'envoi et le partage de documents. Mise en rseau (filaire et sans fil) aise conomisez de l'espace et rduisez les cots en mettant ce priphrique compatible rseau hautes performances unique la disposition de tous les membres du groupe de travail. L'i-SENSYS MF5980dw est facile grer sur le rseau et sa compatibilit Wi-Fi vous permet de l'intgrer votre rseau sans fil en toute simplicit. Intgration transparente Cette unit compatible rseau prend en charge le PCL 5c, PCL 6 et le Postscript 3, facilitant ainsi son intgration dans votre environnement d'impression existant. Rduisez vos cots tout en faisant des conomies d'nergie Attnuez votre impact sur l'environnement tout en rduisant les cots. Conforme la norme Energy Star, l'i-SENSYS MF5980dw donne l'exemple en affichant l'une des consommations relles d'lectricit (TEC) les plus faibles, savoir 1,4 kWh seulement. Il consomme uniquement 2,3 watts en mode veille, pour une efficacit nergtique accrue. L'impression recto verso automatique contribue minimiser les cots en rduisant l'utilisation de papier.

description-en_US-mobile: EOS 650D + EF-S 18-55 IS II - 22.3 x 14.9 mm CMOS, 18 MP, 3:2, DIGIC 5, 30-1/4000 s, JPEG 5184x3456, MOV 1920x1080, SD, SDHC, SDXC, USB
description-en_US-print: An ideal entry to the world of EOS imaging. The EOS 650Ds 18.0-megapixel sensor is superb for both still images and Full HD movies. A Vari-angle Clear View LCD II Touch screen makes shooting simple. Features - 18.0 MP APS-C CMOS sensor. - Full-HD movies with manual controls and continuous AF. - 5 fps continuous shooting. - Vari-angle Clear View LCD II Touch screen. - ISO 100-12,800 sensitivity, extendable to ISO 25,600. - 9-point wide-area AF. - Integrated Speedlite Transmitter. High-quality, entry-level EOS. First choice for those starting their DSLR adventures. Advanced image quality Capture every detail with 18-megapixel resolution, and enjoy the smooth tones and accurate colours of 14-bit DIGIC 5 image processing. The EOS 650D produces files big enough to print at large sizes or crop for alternative compositions without sacrificing quality. Produce Full HD movie projects Capture premium-quality movies at 1080p resolution, enjoying the right level of automatic or manual control for you. Autofocus is possible while filming, and a built in microphone enables the recording of high-quality stereo audio. Keep up with fast moving action Track moving objects accurately across the frame with an autofocus system comprising nine cross-type AF points. Continuous shooting at 5 fps for bursts of up to 22 frames means youll never miss that decisive moment. Explore new viewpoints The EOS 650D has a Vari-angle 7.7cm (3.0) 3:2 ratio Clear View LCD II Touch screen that hinges away from the cameras body and rotates through 270. This enables video and still-image shooting from alternative viewpoints such as over the top of crowds or from waist level. Touch-screen control Enjoy alternative access to the EOS 650Ds controls though a Vari-angle Clear View LCD II Touch screen. Shoot and focus with a single tap and use pinch and swipe gestures when reviewing images. Low-light performance The EOS 650D can capture images over a sensitivity range of ISO 100-12,800 (extendable to ISO 25,600), enabling hand-held shooting in low light without using flash. Integrated Speedlite Transmitter Explore creative lighting options by positioning Canon Speedlite flashes off camera and controlling them with the EOS 650Ds Integrated Speedlite Transmitter. Scene Intelligent Auto Canons Scene Intelligent Auto technology analyses each scene and sets the most appropriate combination of cameras settings automatically. Great results in difficult conditions HDR Backlight control captures three different exposures and combines them into one, retaining shadow and highlight detail. The EOS 650Ds hand-held night scene mode captures multiple images at fast shutter speeds and blends them together for a blur-free result.
name: Canon EOS 650D + EF-S 18-55 IS II

A photo-lab quality 10x15cm borderless print is produced in approximately 20 seconds and exceptional ISO ESAT speeds of 12.5 ipm for mono documents and 9.3 ipm for colour. Simple Operation The centralised operation panel with 7.5cm colour TFT display delivers an intuitive user experience and with Quick Operation, features can be accessed effortlessly. Stylish design Compact and sleek all black finish, this device fits neatly in any home. Enhanced connectivity In-built Wi-Fi makes it easy to share in the home. Print from and scan directly to mobile devices using the Easy-PhotoPrint App. Cloud printing Browse and print your favourite photos directly to the printer from online albums at CANON iMAGE GATEWAY** & Googles Picasa. Access on demand calendars, stationery and other templates without a need of a PC. Versatile media handling Experience versatility with Auto Duplex Print to use both sides of the paper, 2-way paper feed lets you load photo & plain paper at the same time. Print directly onto compatible CDs, DVDs and Blu-ray discs with Direct Disc Print. Eco features Find out your CO2 and paper savings made by double-sided printing with ECO Information to see how you are helping the environment. Save energy by using the Auto Power Off - set the printer to switch off, when not being used for a set amount of time. Advanced Software Turn your movie moments into beautiful prints with Canons unique Full HD Movie Print. New features include Merge Frames and Layout Print to create more striking images. Make your photos even more exciting by applying Fun Filter Effects with Easy-PhotoPrint EX. Use Easy-WebPrint EX to combine clips from several web pages so you only print what you need from the web. Get creative with CREATIVE PARK PREMIUM an online service that lets you download photos, illustrations, paper crafts and much more, from internationally recognised photographers & artists.

Obtenez des tirages de qualit professionnelle au format 10 15 cm sans marge en 20 secondes environ grce aux impressionnantes vitesses ESAT ISO de 12,5 ipm en noir et blanc et 9,3 ipm en couleur*. Fonctionnement simple Dot d'un cran TFT couleur de 7,5 cm, le panneau de commande centralis est trs intuitif. Grce son systme Quick Operation, vous accdez rapidement la fonction souhaite. Design sophistiqu Compact et bnficiant d'une lgante finition noire, cet appareil saura trouver sa place dans votre intrieur. Connectivit amliore Le Wi-Fi intgr facilite le partage la maison. Imprimez directement depuis des priphriques mobiles et envoyez-leur directement des numrisations grce l'application Easy-PhotoPrint. La prise en charge d'Apple AirPrint* vous permet d'imprimer directement depuis votre iPad ou votre iPhone. Impression en cloud Parcourez les photos prfres de vos albums en ligne sur CANON iMAGE GATEWAY** et Google Picasa et envoyez-les directement sur l'imprimante. Accdez des calendriers, articles de papeterie et autres modles la demande sans ordinateur***. Gestion des supports polyvalente Profitez de la polyvalence avec l'impression recto verso automatique, pour imprimer les deux faces d'une feuille, et la double alimentation papier, qui vous permet de charger du papier standard et photo en mme temps. Imprimez directement sur des CD, DVD et Blu-ray compatibles avec l'impression directe sur disques. Fonctions conomiques La fonction ECO Information vous informe sur les conomies de CO2 et de papier ralises via l'impression recto verso. conomisez de l'nergie avec la fonction de mise hors tension automatique : rglez le dlai de mise hors tension de l'imprimante en cas d'inactivit. Les nouvelles fonctions incluent la fusion des images et l'impression avec mise en page, pour des images encore plus saisissantes. Utilisez Easy-WebPrint EX pour combiner des lments de plusieurs pages Web, ce qui vous permet d'imprimer seulement ce dont vous avez besoin sur Internet. description-en_US-mobile: DR-2010M, 600dpi, 25ppm, 600dpi, 24-bit, USB 2.0, 2.4kg, Black
description-en_US-print: Canon DR-2010M Easy-to-use, highly productive desktop scanning comes to the Mac market with the compact, robust imageFORMULA DR-2010M scanner, offering exceptional performance for office departments and workgroups. Features - Compact space-saving design; - High-speed colour scanning at 20ppm (40ipm duplex); - Excellent image quality; - Unrivalled energy efficiency; - Impressive document handling; - Powerful software and one touch scanning, including direct to iPhoto. Further Information The DR-2010M space-saving desktop colour scanner, brings Canons unrivalled performance and exceptional reliability in image capturing to the Mac platform. Delivering exceptional performance, the compact design of the DR-2010M ensures efficient use of workspaces. Strong and robust, the scanner is built to handle up to 1,500 pages per day ideal for peak periods. Productivity at speed The fastest, most economical and effortless way to manage your workgroup scanning, our innovative image sensor technology delivers the same highly productive speeds, whether your documents are black-and-white, greyscale or colour. For easy, one push ad hoc scanning, you can scan 20ppm (40ipm duplex). Higher image quality However variable the types of documents to scan from rough textured paper to feint text with an optical resolution of upto 600 dpi the scanned result will be of the highest quality. The DR-2010M also includes a range of features to enhance the legibility of documents and improve OCR accuracy to create perfectly searchable PDFs. Reliability at work Boost user productivity and scanning reliability further with a range of features, including Text Orientation Recognition, Auto Colour Detection and Canons Rapid Recovery System. Energy efficiency built-in Save energy and reduce costs with the Energy Star compliant DR-2010M. Up to 50% more efficient than comparable rival models, the scanner can also be automatically switched on or off in line with the Mac it is attached to. Impressive document handling A slanted straight thru paper path provides trouble-free scanning. From thin and thick, to embossed media including business cards, photographs and A3 documents (in folio mode) the DR-2010M can scan mixed document types with no special preparation. Powerful software Canons versatile CaptureOnTouch software is included for simple, productive one touch, quick scanning operation, including scanning direct to iPhoto. Additional features come from flexible applications like Presto! PageManager for organising digital documents and Presto! Bizcard 5, which can set up important contact information in a searchable database. It also supports all Mac applications, such as iPhoto and Image Capture, through the included TWAIN driver.
name: Canon DR DR-2510M
