Modifiez le mode de communication de votre entreprise, tout en gagnant du temps et en conomisant de l'argent avec l'cran HP Compaq LA2206xc LCD Webcam d'une diagonale de 54,6 cm (21,5pouces).

Features
Connexion et collaboration
• Soyez l en personne virtuellement. L'cran LA2206xc est quip d'une webcam intgre HD 720p, de microphones doubles et de haut-parleurs intgrs pour la vidoconfrence. Travaillez avec vos collgues et clients comme s'ils taient dans la mme pice.

Solutions logicielles de runion virtuelle
• Renforcez les relations de travail en ligne, amplifiez la productivit, gagner du temps et conomiser de l'argent avec un logiciel de runion virtuelle (inclus avec le moniteur). HP MyRoom et YouCam 4 permettent un partage et une interaction en temps rel la fois simples et scuriss.

Un design avant-gardiste

Respectez les standards les plus exigeants

1 EPEAT Gold l o HP enregistre les crans professionnels. Consultez le site www.epeat.net pour connatre l'tat d'enregistrement dans votre pays

description-de_DE-mobile: 4-in-1, 33 ppm (A4), 1200 x 600 dpi, USB 2.0, 10BASE-T/100BASE-TX
description-de_DE-print: Optimierte Produktivitt dank leistungsstarker SEND-Funktion und automatischen Duplexfunktionen. Kompaktes, netzwerkfhiges, energieeffizientes und daher sparsames Multifunktionssystem. - Automatischer Duplexdruck, Kopie, Fax und Scan - Bis zu 33 Seiten/Minute, Ausgabe der ersten Seite nach nur ca. 8 Sekunden - Separate Funktionstasten fr einfaches Scannen, umweltbewusstes Kopieren und sicheres Drucken - Scan-to-E-Mail, -Netzwerkordner oder -USB-Stick - Netzwerkfhig, PCL5e/6 - Energieeffizient SW-Laser-Multifunktionssystem fr mittlere Arbeitsgruppen. Kompaktes Laser-Multifunktionssystem Die herausragende Leistung dieses kompakten, netzwerkfhigen Multifunktionsgerts erfllt die Anforderungen kleiner, vielbeschftigter Arbeitsgruppen. Der benutzerfreundliche i-SENSYS MF5940dn bietet Duplexdruck, Scan-, Kopier- und Faxfunktionen in einem schlanken Gert. Zeitsparend Der i-SENSYS MF5940dn steigert mit seiner Ausgabegeschwindigkeit von 33 Seiten pro Minute und schneller Ausgabe der ersten Seite nach weniger als 8 Sekunden die Produktivitt. Auerdem gewhrleistet die Quick First Print-Technologie minimale Wartezeiten fr Ausdrucke. Der automatische Dokumenteneinzug mit Duplexfunktion fr bis zu 50 Blatt zum Scannen, Kopieren oder Faxen doppelseitiger Dokumente und die optionale Papierkassette, die die Papierkapazitt auf insgesamt bis zu 800 Blatt erweitert, garantieren ebenfalls schnelleres und effizienteres Arbeiten. Zielwahl-Tasten fr einfache Bedienung Das intuitive 5-zeilige LCD-Display zeigt mehr Informationen an, damit Anwender die verfgbaren Funktionen optimal nutzen knnen. Fr einen noch hheren Bedienkomfort sorgen Zielwahltasten, die direktes Scannen auf den PC, umweltfreundliches Kopieren mehrerer Seiten auf einen Ausdruck zum Einsparen von Papier und Kosten und sicheren Druck von vertraulichen Dokumenten ermglichen und Ressourcen schonen. Beschleunigte Arbeitsablufe Mit den SEND-Funktionen von Canon knnen Sie Ihre Dokumente schneller und effizienter verteilen. Sie bieten die Mglichkeit direkt in eine E-Mail, einen Netzwerkordner oder auf einen USB-Stick zu scannen. Darber hinaus erstellt die Compact PDF-Komprimierungstechnologie kleinere Dateien mit ca. einem Zehntel der Gre, die standardmige Komprimierung bietet ohne Qualittsverlust, sodass Dokumente einfacher gesendet und gemeinsam genutzt werden knnen. Einfache Verwaltung Mit diesem leistungsstarken, netzwerkfhigen Gert, auf das jedes Mitglied der Arbeitsgruppe zugreifen kann, sparen Sie Platz und Kosten. Der i-SENSYS MF5940dn kann ber das Netzwerk per Remote User Interface im Browser problemlos verwaltet werden. Dank der PCL5e/6-Kompatibilitt lsst er sich nahtlos in Ihre Arbeitsumgebung integrieren. Energie sparen und Kosten senken Schtzen Sie die Umwelt, und reduzieren Sie gleichzeitig Kosten. Der i-SENSYS MF5940dn erfllt die Energy Star-Richtlinie und ist mit seinem geringen durchschnittlichen Energieverbrauch (TEC) von nur 1,4 kWh zzt. branchenfhrend. Im Ruhezustand ist er mit einem Verbrauch von lediglich 2,3 Watt noch energiesparender. Automatischer Duplexdruck fhrt durch geringeren Papierverbrauch zu weiteren Kosteneinsparungen.
description-en_US-mobile: 4-in-1, 33 ppm (A4), 1200 x 600 dpi, USB 2.0, 10BASE-T/100BASE-TX
description-en_US-print: Improve productivity thanks to powerful SEND functionality and auto duplexing features. This compact, network-ready, multifunctional is highly energy efficient, keeping costs down. - Auto duplex print, copy, fax and scan - 33 ppm/cpm, 8 seconds First Copy Out Time - Solution keys for easy scan, eco copy and secure print - Scan to email, network folder and USB memory key - Network-ready, PCL5e/6 - Energy efficient The easiest way to accelerate small workgroup productivity. Compact laser All-in-One Meet the demands of small, busy workgroups with the exceptional performance of this compact, network-ready multifunctional. The easy to use, i-SENSYS MF5940dn offers double-sided printing, scanning, copying and faxing in a single slim device. Time-saver The i-SENSYS MF5940dn boosts productivity with its 33 ppm output speed and class-leading First Copy Out Time of less than 8 seconds. There is also minimal waiting time for print outs, thanks to Quick First-Print technologies. The 50-sheet Duplex Automatic Document Feeder for scanning, copying or faxing double-sided documents, together with the optional cassette that expands paper supply capacity up to 800 sheets, also ensure faster and more efficient working. One touch, ease of use The intuitive 5-line LCD display presents more information on screen, so users make the most of the available functions. For even greater ease of use, there are one touch solution keys that allow quick scanning direct to your PC; eco-copying for combining several pages into a single print out, saving paper and money; and secure print, which is a secure way to print sensitive documents and reduce waste. Accelerate workflows Distribute your documents faster and more efficiently using Canons SEND functionality. With this you can scan direct to email, to a network folder or to a USB memory key. In addition, Compact PDF compression technology creates smaller files a tenth of the size achievable with standard compression without compromising quality, making it much easier to send and share documents. Easy to manage Save space and cut costs with one high performance network-ready device thats available to everyone in the workgroup. The i-SENSYS MF5940dn is easy to mange over the network, via a web browser using the Remote User Interface. Thanks to its PCL5e/6 compatibility it seamlessly integrates into your business environment. Save energy and cut costs Reduce your impact on the environment, while cutting costs. Energy Star compliant, the i-SENSYS MF5940dn leads the way with one of the lowest Typical Energy Consumption (TEC) figures just 1.4 kWh. In sleep mode it only consumes 2.3 Watts of energy for greater energy efficiency. Automatic double-sided printing cuts costs further by reducing paper usage.
name: Canon i-SENSYS MF5940DN

description-de_DE-mobile: 600 dpi, CIS (LED), up to 100 pages , 32MB SDRAM, USB
description-de_DE-print: Mobile Stromversorgung via USB Tragen sie das Gert nicht von einem Standort zum nchsten sondern nutzen sie es unterwegs! Diese Vision wurde mit dem AV36 Scanner realisiert, der unabhngig vom Stromnetz, nur ber den USB-Anschluss mit Strom versorgt wird. Somit scannen sie ihre Dokumente berall wo ein Notebook genutzt werden kann, praktisch berall. Portabel Der AV36 ist sehr leicht (nur 0.7kg) und sehr klein mit 290mm x 77mm x 52mm. Die geringe Gre erlaubt es dem Nutzer das Gert problemlos mitzufhren ohne zustzllichen Ballast zu tragen. Aufgrund der Tatsache das kein Netzteil bentigt wird ist der Avision AV36 der ideale Begleiter fr unterwegs und setzt einen neuen Standard in der Welt der portablen Scanner ohne auf Qualitt verzichten zu mssen. Duplex Scanner Der AV36 ist ein Duplex Scannermit einer optischen Auflsung von 600dpi. Sparen sie Zeit und Mhe indem sie ihre doppelseitigen Dokumente oder ID-Karten in einem Scannvorgang einlesen. Das Scannen eines Dokuments dauert in Farbe bei 300 dpi Auflsung nur 12 Sekunden im Simplex Modus, sowie 15 Sekunden im Duplex Modus. Kompatibel mit Plastik Karten(EC) Untersttzt Dokumente von A8 bis A4, und kann dabei Plastik Karten(z.B EC Karten/Psse) bis zu einer Hhe von 1.25mm einscannen. Software Umfang Der Avision AV36 Scanner wird mit Twain und ISIS Treibern ausgeliefert, der Vollversion des exklusiven Avision Button Manager, AVScan, ScanSoft PaperPort 11SE , NewSoft Presto! BizCard NewSoft Presto! BizCard Presto! Presto! BizCard ist eine umfassende Kontaktverwaltungs Software mit der Sie ihre Visitenkarten scannen , bearbeiten und mit einer Vielzahl an Anwendungen synchronisieren knnen.Das ideale Werkzeug um ihre Kontakte zu pflegen und sprachbergreifend zu organisieren. Presto! BizCard erfasst und konvertiert ihre Visitenkarten in eine durchsuchbare und editierbare Datenbank. Diese Informationen lassen sich somit einfach und mhelos mit dem AV36 zu ihrem Computer/Laptop bertragen.
description-en_US-mobile: 600 dpi, CIS (LED), up to 100 pages , 32MB SDRAM, USB
description-en_US-print: Mobile power by USB Dont just haul the scanner from one destination to another, use it on the go! This is the vision fully realized with the AV36, which is powered by a USB port instead of a wall socket. So now, documents can be scanned whenever a laptop is present, which can be anywhere. Portable The AV36 is light (only 0.7kg) and small in size at 290mm x 77mm x 52mm. The small form factor enables users to pack along easily without sacrificing too much luggage space or become a burden to carry. Coupled with the benefits of being USB powered, the AV36 sets a new standard for scanner portability. Duplex scanning The AV36 is a duplex scanner with an optical resolution of 600dpi. Save the time and effort of manually scanning a double-sided document or a plastic ID card. A complete color scan of A4 document at 300dpi in simplex mode takes 12 seconds, and 7.5 seconds per image in duplex mode. Compatible with plastic cards Supported document size ranges from A8 to A4, and it can scan embossed plastic cards up to 1.25mm thick, such as credit cards and ID cards. Bundled software The newest version of TWAIN (v5.60) and extensive software applications Avision Button Manager, AVScan 5, NewSoft Presto! BizCard and ScanSoft PaperPort 11SE are included with every shipped unit to bring the most out of the AV36. NewSoft Presto! BizCard Presto! BizCard is a complete contact management solution that lets you scan, edit and synchronize business card contacts to various contact management software applications. It captures and converts business cards into a searchable and editable database, with support for 12 different languages including English, most European languages, Simplified/Traditional Chinese and Japanese. BizCard is the ideal tool for helping you stay in touch and organized.
name: Avision AV36

description-de_DE-mobile: LEGRIA HF M306 - 32Gb SDHC, 1/4 type CMOS, 15x optical, DIGIC DV III, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") LCD, SD / SDHC
description-de_DE-print: Innovative Canon HD-Technologien, verpackt in einem kompakten, eleganten Camcorder der LEGRIA HF M306 berzeugt durch brillante Bildqualitt und ein handliches Design. Aufzeichnung auf Speicherkarten Die Aufnahmen werden direkt auf SDHC-Speicherkarten (High Capacity) aufgezeichnet. Eine 32-GB-Karte bietet bei entsprechenden Einstellungen Speicherplatz fr ber 12 Stunden Videomaterial. Eine Aufzeichnungsrate von 24 Mbps garantiert optimierte Videoqualitt. Speicherkarten sind ideal zur Weitergabe an Freunde. Komfortabel filmen in HD High Definition-Videos sind jetzt einfacher denn je. Smart Auto mit Scene-Detection optimiert je nach Aufnahmesituation die Einstellungen z. B. fr klasse Videos eines atemberaubenden Sonnenunterganges oder von schnen Familienfeiern. Instant AF sorgt fr eine uerst przise und schnelle Scharfstellung, die Face-Detection-Technologie erkennt Gesichter und optimiert die Einstellungen fr Personenaufnahmen. Touchscreen-Technologie Der LEGRIA HF M306 ermglicht eine innovative Camcorder-Bedienung. Das 6,8 cm (2,7 Zoll) groe LC-Display ist ein Touchscreen mit neuen Aufnahme- und Wiedergabefunktionen fr eine neue, intuitivere Art des Filmens. Canon HD Camera System 3,3 Megapixel Full HD-CMOS-Sensor, Canon HD-Videoobjektiv mit 18fach optischem Zoom und DIGIC DV III-Bildprozessor: Das Canon HD Camera System sorgt fr einfach brillante Full HD-Videos. Optischer Dynamik-Bildstabilisator (OIS) und Powered IS Kleine Camcorder-Vibrationen beim Filmen erscheinen hufig bei der Wiedergabe verstrkt. Um eine Verwacklungsunschrfe zu minimieren, verwendet der LEGRIA HF M306 zwei Systeme zur Bildstabilisierung: Der optische Dynamik-Bildstabilisator kompensiert Vibrationen, die durch Aufnahmen beim Gehen entstehen, der Powered IS verringert Verwacklungsunschrfen bei Teleaufnahmen. Software Mit der mitgelieferten PIXELA-Software sind Video-Bearbeitung und Web-Upload ein Kinderspiel. Mit dem optional im Handel erhltlichen DVD-Brenner DW-100 von Canon brennen Sie DVDs auf Tastendruck und ohne PC. Pre REC, 25p Cinema-Modus (CINE), Fotos mit 3,3 Megapixel Auflsung Der LEGRIA HF M306 verfgt ber viele Aufnahmefunktionen fr attraktive Videoclips. Im Modus Pre REC(ording) werden stndig Videosequenzen aufgezeichnet auch bevor die Aufnahmetaste bettigt wird. Die letzten drei Sekunden werden automatisch vor den Anfang jedes Videos angefgt, und Sie verpassen kein schnes Motiv. Mit dem 25p Cinema-Modus erstellen Sie Videos mit echtem Kino-Flair. Sie knnen sogar Fotos mit 3,3 Megapixel Auflsung aufnehmen, um Ihre Videos zu ergnzen.
description-en_US-mobile: LEGRIA HF M306 - 32Gb SDHC, 1/4 type CMOS, 15x optical, DIGIC DV III, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") LCD, SD / SDHC
description-en_US-print: Canons unique HD technologies packaged inside a compact, stylish design the result is the LEGRIA HF M306, a camcorder with image quality that packs a punch, but is small enough to carry anywhere. Memory card recording Record directly to high capacity SDHC memory cards a 32GB card can store over 12 hours of HD movies at the most efficient setting. For maximum quality, shoot at 24Mbps. Cards are perfect for sharing. Easy HD shooting Shooting HD has never been easier. Smart Autos scene recognition technology optimises settings according to the situation, whether its a dramatic sunset or a family event. Instant AF achieves pin-sharp focus quickly and Face Detection Technology optimises shooting settings for perfect people shots. Touch-screen technology The LEGRIA HF M306 provides a unique way to control your camcorder. The large 6.8cm (2.7) touch-screen enables you to control of the camcorders shooting and playback functions with simple on-screen gestures for a new, more intuitive way of movie-making. Canon HD Camera System The Canon HD Camera System combines a 3.3MP Full HD CMOS sensor, an 18x optical zoom Canon HD Video Lens and the DIGIC DV III processor to deliver superb Full HD movies. Dynamic OIS and Powered IS When shooting video, small shakes of the camcorder can appear magnified in playback. To counter this, the LEGRIA HF M306 uses two systems of image stabilisation Dynamic Optical Image Stabilizer reduces shake caused when shooting while walking and Powered Image Stabilizer keeps the image steady for telephoto shots. Software Easy-to-use PIXELA software is supplied for editing movies and simple upload for sharing online. Or with Canons DW-100 DVD Burner (available separately) burn DVDs at the touch of a button no PC required. Pre REC, 25p Cinema Mode plus 3.3MP stills The LEGRIA HF M306 has many shooting features for creating better movies. In Pre REC mode, the camcorder starts recording three seconds before the Record button is pressed, so you wont miss any of the action. 25p cinema mode creates more cinematic-looking movies. And you can even snap 3.3MP still photos to complement your movies.
name: Canon LEGRIA HF M306

description-en_US-mobile: 14MP(4288 x 3216), 1/2.3" CCD, SD/SDHC, 18x optical, 6.7x digital, 5.0 - 90.0 mm, ISO 64-6400, -2.0EV - +2.0EV 1/3EV, LCD 230k, USB 2.0, Mini HDMI, 540g
description-en_US-print: Perfect for those looking to step up from a basic compact to a camera with more features. The FinePix S2980 camera has a generous 18x zoom, 14-megapixel resolution and an electronic viewfinder to compliment its LCD view screen. In addition to the same core specifications of the previous S2950, the S2980 also features a brighter LCD screen, faster startup time, longer flash range and a shorter time between shots. 14-megapixel resolution and 18x optical zoom A 14-megapixel CCD sensor delivers large, high-resolution images, while a 18x optical zoom gets you close to the action. From wide angle to extreme telephoto at the flick of a switch An 18x Fujinon optical zoom provides the equivalent of a 28-504mm lens on a full-frame digital camera, but at a fraction of the size and weight! The wide-angle end focal lengths will be popular with those shooting landscapes, street scenes and interiors, while extreme telephoto settings will get you closer to the action when shooting sports or wildlife. Experiment with intermediate zoom settings when shooting portraits, still life and travel photography. 28mm wide angle Where some bridge cameras sacrifice the wide-angle part of the zoom range to get extra reach at the telephoto end, the S2900 series gives you the best of both worlds, starting with a very useful 28mm (equivalent) wide-angle zoom setting. At 28mm youll be able to take in those big-sky landscapes, shoot interiors in great detail and cope easily with large group shots. 14 megapixel resolution for great image quality With 14-megapixels youll not be left wanting more when it comes to resolution. The FinePix S2900 series produces JPEG files measuring up to 4288x3216 pixels, which is big enough to produce prints larger than A3, or allow creative cropping on your home PC without loosing quality. The Fujifilm CCD sensor captures the world around you in vivid colour and stunning clarity. Dual image stabilisation Camera shake at long shutter speeds can ruin an otherwise golden moment with image blur. The FinePix S2900 series tackles this head on by combining high ISO sensitivity with sensor-shift image stabilisation great for photography indoors without using flash High ISO sensitivity (max. ISO6400) Dont just rely on flash in low light: adjust the sensitivity all of the way from ISO64 to ISO6400, according to shooting conditions. Or use a higher ISO value in good light to ensure that shutter speeds are fast enough to freeze any action. * At ISO3200 and 6400, number of recorded pixels is limited to a maximum 3 megapixels. At full resolution (14 megapixels), sensitivity is limited to a maximum ISO1600.
name: Fujifilm FinePix S2980

description-en_US-mobile: OKI B6200 laserprinter 128MB 24ppm 1200x1200dpi A4
description-en_US-print:
Oki has a more holistic view of Mono Printing - why offer faster speed of printing if you do not have the processor power to handle the information on the page? Why worry about first page to print times if you do not have enough memory to complete printing your job? Oki offers class leading printers like the B6200 with impressive speed, processor power, memory, duty cycle, toner capacity, trays and reliability which will improve your business productivity. 
 
Speed, Versatility,flexibility and Reliability - these are the qualities that productive professionals in busy workgroups tell us they must have in a printer. And thats what the B6200 printer deliver for small to medium workgroups - a cost-effective solution for all their printing requirements. The fast time to first page makes the printer ideal for heavy duty customer-facing applications or medium workgroups where time at the printer needs to be minimised. The B6200 offers a number of productivity enhancing features including optimal paper handling. The additional paper trays offer large capacity storage of multiple paper types and envelopes which speeds up mailshots or mail merges. 
Okis stringent quality and design standards together with the capability to print up to 75,000 pages per month ensure uninterrupted reliability. That means busy workgroups can be assured of continuous, consistent output no matter how hard the B6200 is working. description-en_US-print: Capture Full HD movies without ever worrying about camera shake with the LEGRIA HF R406. Get closer with 53x Advanced zoom and create movies that sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select. Optical Intelligent IS Intelligent IS is the perfect solution to combat camera shake by detecting the scene and automatically selecting from four stabilisation modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. The advanced dynamic mode corrects roll and tilt movements that can occur when walking, ensuring sharp steady videos in every situation. 53x Advanced zoom; Full HD CMOS A genuine Canon HD video lens with 53x Advanced Zoom lets you capture all the detail in even far away subjects. The Full HD CMOS sensor gives true HD quality and excellent colour reproduction even in low light, so your movies will look great on your HDTV. Baby Mode Capture your childs first steps, first words, or many other firsts with Baby Mode. Register your childs date of birth in-camera, and add colourful stamps for height and weight. All footage will automatically be sorted to the baby album. Advanced image processing The powerful DIGIC DV4 imaging processor ensures higher image quality in low light and a substantial reduction in image distortion as it works together with the optical image stabiliser. Superb quality recording Bring out the best of Full HD with progressive recording at the highest rates for AVCHD(28Mbps) and MP4 (35Mbps). Whether youre showcasing or sharing, simply select the ideal format and choose from a range of recording rates. Audio Scene Select Its simple to make your movies sound as good as they look with Audio Scene Select. Just select from 5 scene modes and audio settings are optimised automatically to match the scene youre shooting. So whether youre filming speech at a wedding or music at a concert, you can enjoy immersive, realistic audio. Fingertip control Smooth operation is easy with a high-resolution 7.5cm capacitive touch screen LCD, which gives you intuitive control of settings and simplifies playback. Opening the LCD panel quick starts the camcorder, so youll never miss a moment. Cinema-Look filters; Touch Decoration Inspire your creativity with Cinema-Look Filters. Select from 7 adjustable colour-grading filters to capture the perfect movie scene. Adding fun effects to your movies without a PC is easy using Touch Decoration. SDXC card slot The LEGRIA HF R406 records Full HD movies direct to an SDXC memory card which are available in a wide range of sizes allowing you to capture hours of footage.
name: Canon LEGRIA CANHFR406

description-de_DE-print: Robuste Kamera; 12,1 MP HS System Die PowerShot D20 ist so robust, dass sie der ideale Begleiter selbst fr extreme Outdoor-Aktivitten wie Snowboarding oder Schnorcheln ist. Und unabhngig vom Abenteuer sorgt das HS System fr groartige Aufnahmen. Der moderne DIGIC 4 Bildprozessor und der hoch empfindliche 12,1 MP CMOS-Sensor helfen beim Einfangen der echten Atmosphre des Momentes selbst bei schwachem Licht und ohne Stativ. Wasserdicht, stofest, frostbestndig und staubgeschtzt Extra fr besonders harte Bedingungen entwickelt, ist die Kamera bis zu 10 m Tauchtiefe wasserdicht, stofest bis zu einer Fallhhe von 1,5 m [1], voll funktionsfhig bei Temperaturen bis zu -10 C und vollkommen staubgeschtzt. 28-mm-Weitwinkel, 5fach optisches Zoom, Intelligent IS Ideal fr Gruppen- und Nahaufnahmen: Das 28-mm-Weitwinkelobjektiv und das 5fach optische Zoom geben Ihnen die Mglichkeit, alles im Blick zu haben, oder ganz nah ran zu gehen. Der Intelligent IS sorgt auch dann noch fr scharfe, deutliche Fotos und Movies, wenn Sie in Action sind, mit hohem Zoomwert oder bei wenig Licht fotografieren. Er passt den optischen Bildstabilisator je nach Szene auf einen von sieben verschiedene Modi an und minimiert so Verwacklungsunschrfen. GPS [2] GPS versieht Fotos und Movies mit Standortdaten und dokumentiert so Ihre Abenteuerreisen. Mit der Map Utility Software (im Lieferumfang) kann die Aufnahmeort sogar auf der Karte aufgezeigt und an Freunde weiter gegeben werden. 7,5 cm (3,0 Zoll) PureColor II LCD Der groe und besonders gut lesbare LCD mit 460.000 Bildpunkten ist mit Spezialbeschichtungen versehen, damit sogar bei Sonnenschein und Unterwasser alles darauf gut sichtbar ist. Das Active Display mit Gestensteuerung kann auch dann noch bedient werden, wenn man Handschuhe trgt. Full-HD-Movies Die Movie-Taste startet unmittelbar die Aufzeichnung in Full-HD (1080p) mit optischem Zoom und der Intelligent IS hlt die Aufnahmen frei von Verwacklungsunschrfen. Die HDMI-Schnittstelle erlaubt den Anschluss an einen kompatiblen HD-Fernseher fr die Wiedergabe in Topqualitt. Smart Auto (fr 32 Aufnahmesituationen) Im intelligenten Automatik-Modus (Smart Auto) entstehen ganz einfach hochwertige Fotos oder Movies. 32 Aufnahmesituationen (21 bei Movies) werden unterschieden und automatisch die richtigen Einstellungen ausgewhlt. Spezielle Movie-Modi Filmtagebuch (720p) und Super Slow Motion Movie fr noch mehr Mglichkeiten beim Filmdreh. Unterwasserfunktionen Fr ganz besondere Unterwasseraufnahmen sorgen Funktionen wie Unterwasser-Makro fr exzellente Nahaufnahmen oder Quick AF fr das blitzschnelle, automatische Scharfstellen. Dank benutzerdefiniertem und automatischem Weiabgleich zeigen die Aufnahmen selbst bei den unterschiedlichsten Unterwasserbedingungen immer die richtigen Farben. Optionales Unterwassergehuse fr bis zu 40 m Tauchtiefe Um sich auf jedes Unterwasserabenteuer einstellen zu knnen ist im Handel optional ein Unterwassergehuse fr bis zu 40 m Tauchtiefe erhltlich. Oder man greift zum Zubehr Kit [3], das zustzlich noch den Schultergurt, den Karabiner-Trageriemen, eine Weichtasche, sowie Silikonhlle und Schwimmer beinhaltet. description-en_US-print: Rugged camera; 12.1 Megapixel HS System The PowerShot D20 is rugged enough for the most extreme outdoor activities, from snowboarding to snorkelling, while HS System ensures exceptional results whatever the adventure. Advanced DIGIC 4 processing and a high-sensitivity 12.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor let you capture the real atmosphere of the moment without flash or tripod even in low light. Water, shock, freeze and dustproof Constructed for harsh conditions, the camera is waterproof down to 10m, shockproof to drops up to 1.5m[1], operates in temperatures as low as -10 C and is fully protected from dust. 28mm, 5x optical zoom; Intelligent IS Fit more in the frame with 28mm wide-angle for panoramic landscapes and great group shots and use the 5x optical zoom to get closer to distant subjects. Intelligent IS keeps photos and videos sharp and detailed even on the move, at full zoom or in low light, automatically adjusting the optical Image Stabilizer to the scene from 7 modes. GPS[2] GPS tags the location of your photos and videos while the Logger function can keep track of your journey. Use the supplied Map Utility software to pinpoint shooting locations and to share them with friends. 7.5 cm (3.0") PureColor II LCD A large, high visibility 460k dot LCD screen with multiple coatings provides good visibility in all conditions from sunshine to underwater. Active display with Tap Control offers comfortable reviewing of images even when wearing gloves. Full HD movies Use the movie button to instantly record Full HD (1080p) movies with optical zoom, while Intelligent IS keeps footage steady. An HDMI connection ensures high quality playback on an HDTV. Smart Auto (32 scenes) Effortlessly shoot great photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and selects optimal settings from 32 variables (21 in movies). Special movie modes Movie Digest and Super Slow Motion Movie add more ways to capture the action on your adventures. Underwater functions Capture stunning shots underwater with functions like Underwater Macro for sharp close ups and Quick AF for fast automatic focusing. Custom and White Balance Compensation quickly adjust colours to different aquatic environments. Optional 40m Waterproof Case Get equipped for more adventures with an optional waterproof case (40m) or the Accessory Kit[3] that includes Shoulder Strap, Carabiner Strap, Softcase, Silicon jacket and Float. [1] The shock resistant testing methods are unique to this product and do not guarantee against damage or malfunction of the product. [2] GPS use may be restricted in certain countries or regions. Use of GPS should comply with the laws and regulations of the country and area in which it is being operated including any restriction on the use of electronics. [3] Optional straps not designed for underwater use.

description-en_US-print: A Compact Laser Workhorse Tremendous value that offers speed, and best-in-series standard input capacity and cartridge yield. Compact Yet Commanding The Lexmark E462dtn is ultra-compact yet provides the largest standard input capacity and toner capacity in the E460 Series. With two 250-sheet paper inputs plus a 50-sheet multipurpose feeder, youll have plenty of paper for your busiest workdays. Exclusive Savings The Lexmark E462dtn offers the highest yield replacement cartridge in the E460 Series: 18,000* pages. Choose this Lexmark Extra High Yield Toner Cartridge at replacement time and see just how low your cost per page can go. (*Declared yield in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752.) Easy to Perform and Save True 1200 x 1200 dpi print quality and performance features like a time-to-first-page as fast as 6.5 seconds help you perform at your best. Built-in networking lets you share the Lexmark E462dtn with others, and built-in duplexing makes it easy to save paper. Fuss Less, Focus More Brings hassle-free printing to your fingertips. Experience enhanced security and time savings with a range of high-end features you typically wouldn't expect to find on such an attractively priced printer, like a numeric pad for confidential printing, early-warning alerts for low toner, and customizable operator panel messaging. Print Black, Think Green Designed with eco-conscious features like Eco-Mode and an instant warm-up fuser to help you save paper and energy. Recycle your empty cartridges free of charge through the Lexmark Cartridge Collection Program. Printing responsibly means everyone winsyour business, your budget and the environment! Lexmark Guarantee Lexmark's warranty options on the Lexmark E Series provide sound peace of mind. To optimize your printer's performance and investment value, always use genuine Lexmark supplies, service and parts.

description-en_US-print:
The value of one single unit for both colour and monochrome requirements
An affordable colour cost per page and a mono cost per page competitive with traditional mono laser printers ! 

Single-element, high-yield cartridges and large paper capacity ensure a low intervention rate and great maintenance savings.

With print-and-hold features, you can proof the job at the machine and then press a button to continue printing, avoiding wastes.

IT managers can set mono/colour restrictions based on the different printing needs of each employee or workgroup.

3 automatic toner-saver levels save you up to 50% on toner cartridges and let you optimise your output when needed.

Up to 5 input sources that can hold up to 3100 sheets to keep the work flow moving.

Optional mailbox and output stackers.
Optional finisher for hole punching and stapling.
Optional automatic duplex printing (standard on C750dn model).

One-pass printing, transferring all four colours to the document at the same time, enabling 20 ppm printing in colour or monochrome.

True 1200x1200 dpi and/or 2400 IQ modes ensure perfect quality documents for all your needs, whether in colour or monochrome.

350 MHz processor, offering top speed for even the most complex jobs.

Near-photo-quality output, thanks to brand new colour tables and automatic belt registration for complete accuracy in process printing.

Very quick 20-second time to first colour page!

description-de_DE-print: WLAN fr jedermann Auf Ihrem Android- oder iOS-Gert lassen sich Ihre Aufnahmen streamen, was ideal zur Kontrolle und zur Steuerung aus der Ferne ist. Die integrierte WLAN-Funktion ist ideal, um Ihre Videos ganz bequem ber Ihr soziales Netzwerk mit anderen zu teilen oder auf DLNA-zertifizierten TVs anzusehen. Die MP4-Untersttzung ermglicht einen schnellen Datentransfer von HD-Videos. Optischer Intelligent IS Intelligent IS so heit die perfekte Lsung gegen Verwacklungsunschrfen. Das System erkennt die Aufnahmeszene und whlt den dafr optimalen Bildstabilisator zur Kompensation unerwnschter Verwacklungen, damit Ihre Aufnahmen immer gestochen scharf sind. Der optimierte Dynamic Modus korrigiert Roll- und Kippbewegungen, die typisch sind beim Filmen im Gehen fr Videos ohne Verwacklungsunschrfen in praktisch jeder Situation. 53fach Advanced Zoom; Full-HD-CMOS Mit dem original Canon HD-Videoobjektiv mit 53fach Advanced Zoom halten Sie auch weit entfernte Motive brillant und detailreich fest. Der Full-HD-CMOS-Sensor sorgt fr exzellente Full-HD-Videos mit prziser Farbwiedergabe auch bei wenig Licht. Baby Modus Mit dem Baby Modus filmen Sie die ersten Schritte, die ersten Worte oder viele andere erste Male im Leben Ihres Kindes. Sie knnen das Geburtsdatum des Kindes in der Kamera registrieren und farbige Markierungen fr Gre und Gewicht hinzufgen. Alle in diesem Modus aufgenommenen Videos werden automatisch in einem Baby-Album gespeichert. Simultane Aufzeichnung Videos knnen gleichzeitig im AVCHD- und MP4-Format aufgenommen werden. Damit knnen Sie das Video genauso gut in erstklassiger Qualitt vorfhren, wie auf einem Mobilgert ansehen oder auf ein soziales Netzwerk hochladen. Die Videos werden auf dem internen Speicher und der Speicherkarte festgehalten. Moderne Bildverarbeitung Der leistungsstarke DIGIC DV4 Bildprozessor sorgt fr bessere Bildqualitt bei wenig Licht und senkt im engen Zusammenspiel mit dem optischen Bildstabilisator deutlich die Unschrfen. Der Prozessor verarbeitet bis zu 35 Mbps in MP4 und 28 Mbps in AVCHD. Audio-Szenenauswahl Mit Audio Scene Select passt die Tonqualitt zu den brillanten Bildern. Einfach aus 5 voreingestellten Szenen auswhlen und die Tonaufnahme wird automatisch auf diese Situation optimiert aufgenommen. Die Rede auf einer Hochzeit oder die Musik auf einem Konzert Ihre Aufnahmen bringen den Ton immer richtig zur Geltung. Bedienung per Fingertipp Das hochauflsende 7,5 cm (3 Zoll) groe Touchscreen-LCD ermglicht eine denkbar einfache Steuerung der Einstellungen und der Wiedergabe. description-en_US-mobile: LEGRIA HF G30 - 3.09 MP, 1/2.84 HD CMOS PRO 20x Zoom, OIS, DIGIC DV 4, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") , Wi-Fi, SD/SDHC/SDXC, Dolby Digital, HDMI
description-en_US-print: Capture the action like a pro with the Canon LEGRIA HF G30 The flagship LEGRIA HF G30 camcorder packs high-specification optics, sensor and stabiliser plus Wi-Fi connectivity into a compact body, ideal for enthusiasts who want to match their creativity with professional quality videos. - 20x zoom, 26.8mm wide-angle lens; 8 blade circular aperture - Control settings remotely and share with Wi-Fi - Simultaneous recording of AVCHD and MP4 - Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor, DIGIC DV 4 - Optical Intelligent IS - Full manual control - Instant AF; Face Detection - 8.8cm OLED touch screen 20x zoom, 26.8mm wide-angle lens, 8-blade aperture The brand new 26.8mm wide angle lens provides better image quality than ever before in a compact camcorder, while the smooth 20x optical zoom lets you get closer to the action. A new, 8-blade circular aperture enables beautiful Bokeh effect. Wi-Fi Remote Enjoy the freedom of controlling your LEGRIA HF G30 when the camcorder is positioned out of reach. Control a number of settings, including shutter speed, focus and exposure wirelessly by using your smartphone or tablets web browser. Dual-Format Recording Simultaneously record in different formats (AVCHD and MP4) or at different bitrates, to the dual SDXC card slots and enjoy the twin benefits of professional quality footage and easy upload to the web. Capture fast and slow motion when shooting in MP4 format. HD CMOS PRO sensor, DIGIC DV 4 With an effective pixel count of approximately 2.91 megapixels, the new HD CMOS PRO sensor designed and manufactured by Canon for its professional models delivers stunning picture quality, even in low light, as well as wide dynamic range and realistic colour reproduction. The new powerful DIGIC DV 4 image processor works with the sensor to provide images with lower noise and more depth. Optical Intelligent Image Stabilisation Intelligent IS combats camera shake by automatically selecting the right optical image stabilisation from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. The advanced dynamic mode corrects roll and tilt movements that can occur when walking, ensuring sharp steady videos in every situation. Full Manual Control A manual lens ring allows intuitive control of focus or zoom. Exposure, aperture, shutter speed and gain can all be independently adjusted using the touch screen and customisable control dial, allowing you to unleash your creativity. Instant AutoFocus, Face Detection Instant AF provides fast and accurate focusing for pin-sharp HD quality. Face Detection automatically optimises camcorder settings for perfectly-focused and exposed shots of people. 8.8cm (3.5) fold-out OLED touchscreen and tiltable EVF The responsive organic electrostatic LED touch screen, with a 1.23 million dot resolution, offers superior definition, contrast and colour reproduction over LCD. The 0.61cm (0.24) 1.56 million pixel electronic colour viewfinder can tilt up to 45 to allow you further control especially in bright conditions

description-en_US-print: High-Performance Network Camera With 360 Degree Endless Rotation The award-winning SNC-RX550 represents the mid-range of the SNC-RX Series and features a 26x optical zoom, enabling it to zoom in on small or distant objects with exceptional clarity. Combined with a 12x digital zoom, the SNC-RX550 delivers a maximum zoom of 312x. All SNC-RX Series Network Dome Cameras feature built-in Intelligent Object Detection and Intelligent Motion Detection. They can also freely and endlessly rotate 360 degrees, allowing users to monitor the area surrounding the camera without interruption. Advanced image processing technology offers a choice of three compression formats - JPEG, MPEG-4, and H.264 - so that users can choose the appropriate format to match their network environment and monitoring applications. A newly-developed "Dual Encoding Capability" also allows simultaneous streaming in JPEG and MPEG-4, further improving workflow flexibility. description-en_US-mobile: Block Rocker Bluetooth - Bluetooth, 50 h, AM/FM, White
description-en_US-print:
Blast your music whenever and wherever you want: Block Rocker Bluetooth is a powerful and flexible all-in-one sound system for iOS devices, MP3 players, microphones and instruments.

Keep the music cranked: Block Rocker Bluetooth's wireless capability means you can keep your iPad, iPhone, or other Bluetooth-enabled device right by your side as you blast your music. You can even listen to your favorite radio station or to the big game  just dial it in on Block Rocker Bluetooths built-in AM/FM radio. You can also plug in and crank up instruments, microphones and more. A high-quality microphone is included.

Block Rocker Bluetooth has a built-in battery with a charge indicator and will provide up to 50 hours of cordless sound. A power cord is also included for nonstop music. For ultimate portability, Block Rocker Bluetooth has rugged wheels and a telescoping handle.

Rock the block, wirelessly, with Block Rocker Bluetooth from ION Audio.

- Streams music wirelessly from any Bluetooth music-playing device or phone
- Works with iPad, iPhone, iPod touch, Android devices, and more
- Powerful sound, perfect for parties, BBQs, drive-in movies and more
- Input for a microphone, instruments and other audio sources
- High-quality microphone included
- Built-in digital AM/FM radio and retractable antenna
- USB port for charging iPad, iPhone, or other devices
- Built-in battery provides up to 50 hours of use
- Bluetooth range of up to 50 feet
- High-output powered 2-way speaker
- 1/8-inch auxiliary input for amplifying other audio devices
- Recessed wheels and telescoping handle for portability
- Rugged design to withstand heavy use
- Perfect for use anywhere, indoors or outside
- Projects high-fidelity sound up to 150 feet away
- Built-in cradle for your smartphone, iPad, or other device
name: ION Audio Block Rocker

description-en_US-mobile: DocuMate 3920, 600 dpi, CCD, 10.2 kg
description-en_US-print:
Direct connect scanners are a vital part of your document capture strategy, but network scanners, like the DocuMate 3920, are the perfect solution for an office that has shared scanner needs. 

Network accessible scanning achieves two major goals for your document workflow and capture with great efficiency and ease of use. First, a network scanner can be conveniently located in common areas and does not require a PC connection. Second, the scanner can easily access broad network connections to file servers, email servers, FTP locations and printers and fax servers.

The DocuMate 3920 is designed with convenience and ease to support small to medium workgroups and offices through a standard Ethernet connection and provides a secure multi-user access, with easy administration, through an embedded form-based web page configuration. No expensive IT department or network contractor is needed to begin scanning documents to local servers or FTP locations. Email can now be delivered anywhere on the internet (or simple fax sending and receiving) through standard phone line.
name: Xerox DocuMate 3920

description-en_US-print:
This Lexmark product offers the following resource conserving features:

Instant Warm-Up fuser  Saves energy
Power Saver Features  Reduces the power state of the printer after printing when entering Sleep Mode  adjustable from 1-240 minutes; reduces power state further when entering Hibernate Mode (a virtual off mode)
Scheduled wake up  Allows accounts to conserve energy by engaging Hibernate
Mode during periods of the day or week when the printer is not in use and disengaging
Hibernate Mode during work periods
Eco-Mode  Conserves energy and paper through three optional settings:
Energy Saving Mode: Print engine motors do not start until a document is ready to print, the printer enters Sleep Mode after a period of inactivity and printer control panel display light is turned off in this mode
Paper Saving Mode: Device defaults to duplex printing and print log features are turned off
Energy + Paper Saving Mode: Energy and paper saving settings are activated
Quiet Mode  Reduces noise emission by adjusting print speed, disabling advanced paper start, disabling or minimizing beeps (key press, alarms, etc.), and adjusting fan speed (Quiet mode may be combined with Eco-Mode)
Multi-Page Printing  Prints multiple page images on one page
Duplex  Prints on both sides of a page
Recycled Paper  Supports the use of recycled content media
Lexmark Solutions  Reduces unnecessary printing and simplifies your work processes, such as eliminating the need for stocking paper forms
Fax Forwarding  Conserves paper by digitalizing faxes and redirecting to email or file rather than printing (Hard drive option required)
Print Preview  Conserves paper by allowing users to review print jobs and select pages needed before printing
Print and Hold  Holds print jobs until released by the user at the printer interface by entering a pin number (Hard drive option needed)
Distribute Information Electronically  Conserves paper by routing scanned documents to e-mail, network folders, USB thumb drives, FTP, and LDSS destinations (Additional options may be required)
name: Lexmark XS796de

description-de_DE-print: Professionelle Scans mit einer Auflsung von bis zu 9.600 dpi und schneller Filmscan Der Premium Scanner fr Dias, Negative, Fotos und Dokumente bietet das einfache, schnelle und vielseitige Scannen in auergewhnlicher Qualitt ohne Aufwrmzeit, einfache Bedienung auf Knopfdruck und automatische Bildretusche. - Premium Scanner fr Dias, Negative, Fotos und Dokumente. - Hohe Scanqualitt: 9.600 x 9.600 dpi (Filmscan), 4.800 x 4.800 dpi (Fotos und Dokumente). - Schnelle Scans von Fotos und Dokumenten: ca. 7 Sekunden fr ein A4-Farbdokument bei 300 dpi. - Schnelle Scans von Filmen: ca. 18 Sekunden fr ein KB-Negativ bei 1.200 dpi. - Durchlichteinheit zum Scannen von bis zu 12 KB-Aufnahmen, 4 KB-Dias und 120er Rollfilm mit einer maximalen Gre von 6 x 22 cm (nur Filmstreifen). - Automatische Bildretusche: FARE Level 3 zur automatischen Staub- und Kratzerentfernung und zur Rekonstruktion verblichener Farben. - 7 Scan-Buttons fr einfachste Bedienung auf Knopfdruck. - Keine Aufwrmzeit durch weie LED-Lampe. - Scannen auf einen Evernote oder Dropbox Cloud-Service. - Erstellen von mehrseitigen PDFs mit Passwortschutz. Optimierte Qualitt, auergewhnliche Detaildarstellung Auergewhnlich hohe Wiedergabequalitt: Der Premium Scanner fr Dias, Negative, Fotos und Dokumente bietet einen CCD-Sensor fr Filmscans mit bis zu 9.600 x 9.600 dpi und Scans von Aufsichtvorlagen mit bis zu 4.800 x 4.800 dpi. Er liefert besonders detailreiche Scans mit erstklassiger Farbreproduktion dank 48 Bit Farbtiefe, die sich fr Vergrerungen oder hochauflsende Drucke eignen. Vielseitiges Film-Handling Die integrierte Durchlichteinheit ermglicht das komfortable Scannen diverser Filmvorlagen. Bis zu 12 KB-Filmstreifen bzw. 4 gerahmte Dias lassen sich in einem Arbeitsgang scannen. 120er Rollfilm (max. 6 x 22 cm) wird ebenfalls untersttzt. Sofort einsatzbereit und schnell Hochwertige und produktive Scanleistung: Fr KB-Negative bentigt der Scanner nur ca. 18 Sekunden (bei 1.200 dpi) und ein A4-Farbfoto oder -dokument ist in nur ca. 7 Sekunden fertig gescannt (300 dpi). Die weie LED-Lampe ermglicht die sofortige Scanbereitschaft, da sie keine Aufwrmzeit bentigt und sorgt fr einen besonders niedrigen Stromverbrauch. Die automatische Stromabschaltung schaltet den Scanner selbstndig aus, wenn er eine voreingestellten Zeit nicht in Betrieb war. Automatische Bildkorrektur Verkratzte, beschdigte, verstaubte oder verblasste Durchlichtvorlagen lassen sich ganz leicht restaurieren ohne langwierige manuelle Nachbearbeitung. FARE Level 3, die integrierte Canon Technologie zur automatischen Staub- und Kratzerentfernung, bernimmt diese Aufgabe fr Sie und sucht mithilfe von Infrarotlicht nach Fehlern auf der Filmoberflche. Einfache Bedienung mit nur einem Tastendruck Selbst komplexe Scanfunktionen werden mit nur einem Knopfdruck durchgefhrt: Mit Hilfe von 7 Scan-Buttons haben Sie sofortigen Zugriff auf praktische Funktionen wie Scan-to-PC, -E-Mail, -Copy oder -PDF. Foto, Textdokument oder Filmvorlage: Der Scanner erkennt den Vorlagentyp und whlt automatisch die geeigneten Scan- und Speichereinstellungen ein Knopfdruck auf Auto Scan gengt! Der integrierte Netzadapter ermglicht besonders kompakte Abmessungen das spart Platz auf Ihrem Schreibtisch. Intelligente Software im Lieferumfang Mit der Software My Image Garden und Scanning Utility, die sich beide im Lieferumfang des Scanners befinden, finden Sie zahlreiche praktische Funktionen, die mehr aus Ihren Scans machen. So lassen sich die eingescannten Dateien einfach handhaben oder per Auto Document Fix so optimieren, dass die Ausgabequalitt sowohl bei Fotos als auch bei Dokumenten gesteigert wird. Vorlagen knnen bequem in durchsuchbare PDFs konvertiert werden inklusive Passwortschutz zur Sicherung vertraulicher Informationen.
description-en_US-mobile: Flatbed, A4, CCD, 9600 x 9600 dpi, USB, 15 W, 4580 g, Black/Silver
description-en_US-print: Enjoy high-speed scanning for everything from photos to documents, to even 35mm film while also enjoying superb quality. The CanoScan 9000F Mark II Color Image Scanner, a high-speed scanner with professional film scanning quality. With 9600 x 9600 maximum color dpi1, it produces incredible detail in both business documents and photographs. The CanoScan 9000F Mark II also helps you get the most out of your photos and documents with My Image Garden2 software, offering a simple and intuitive way to scan and organize your files.\n\nThe CanoScan 9000F Mark II features our Super Toric Lens, delivering pin-sharp scans from edge-to-edge and bright, low noise images. It requires zero warm-up time3 and offers lower power consumption with super-efficient white LEDs. In addition, its Fare Level 3 feature provides dust and scratch removal, along with fading, grain and backlight correction. Plus, its Auto Scan Mode automatically adjusts settings by detecting what you're scanning.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Plat, A4, CCD, 9600 x 9600 dpi, USB, 15 W, 4580 g, Noir / Argent
description-fr_FR-print: Canon CanoScan 9000F Mark II Numrisation professionnelle avec une rsolution jusqu' 9600 dpi et numrisation de films grande vitesse Ce scanner professionnel de films, photos, diapositives et documents offre une numrisation simple, rapide et polyvalente d'une qualit exceptionnelle sans aucun prchauffage, fonctionnant par simple pression d'une touche, avec correction automatique de l'image. - Scanner professionnel de films, photos, diapositives et documents. - Numrisation de haute qualit : 9600 9600 dpi pour les films, 4800 4800 dpi pour les photos et documents. - Numrisation rapide de photos et documents : environ 7 s pour le format A4 couleur 300 dpi. - Numrisation de films grande vitesse : environ 18 s pour un ngatif de 24 36 1200 dpi. - Gestion polyvalente : bande de film 12 35 mm, diapositives montes 4 35 mm et film au format 120 max. 6 22 cm (en bande uniquement). - Correction automatique de l'image : la technologie intgre FARE de niveau 3 limine la poussire et les rayures et restaure les couleurs. - Fonctionnement par simple pression sur un bouton grce aux 7 touches EZ. - Aucun prchauffage et consommation d'nergie rduite grce au voyant DEL blanc. - Numrisation vers votre service Cloud Evernote ou Dropbox. - Cration de PDF scuriss de plusieurs pages. Qualit optimale, dtails exceptionnels Profitez d'une qualit de reproduction optimale. Ce scanner professionnel de films, photos, diapositives et documents est quip d'un capteur CCD pour une numrisation de qualit : jusqu' 9600 9600 dpi pour les films 4800 4800 dpi pour les documents et les photos. Le niveau de dtail exceptionnel des images est parfaitement adapt aux agrandissements et aux impressions haute rsolution. Sa profondeur de couleurs sur 48 bits assure par ailleurs une reproduction prcise des couleurs. Support film polyvalent Numrisez vos films sans le moindre effort grce l'adaptateur pour film intgr. Il numrise des films fixes 12 35 mm et 4 diapositives montes en une seule opration (ngatifs et positifs). De plus, les films au format 120 sont galement pris en charge (6 22 cm max.). Numrisation haute vitesse instantane Amlioration spectaculaire des performances de numrisation en termes de productivit. Numrisez des ngatifs de films 24 36 en un clin d'il, une vitesse d'environ 18 secondes 1200 dpi, ou numrisez une photo couleur ou un document au format A4 une vitesse d'environ 7 secondes (300 dpi). Numrisez vos documents sans attendre tout en conomisant de l'nergie : aucun prchauffage requis avec consommation d'nergie rduite grce au voyant DEL blanc. Faites encore plus d'conomies d'nergie avec la fonction de mise hors tension automatique qui teint le scanner aprs un certain dlai d'inactivit. Correction automatique d'image Restaurez aisment des films dchirs, endommags, poussireux, aux couleurs passes sans avoir y apporter de retouches manuelles fastidieuses. La technologie FARE (Film Automatic Retouching and Enhancement, amlioration et retouche automatiques de film) de niveau 3 unique de Canon intgre au scanner fait tout le travail pour vous l'aide d'une lumire infrarouge qui analyse les dfauts physiques prsents sur la surface du film. Fonctionnement par simple pression sur un bouton Un fonctionnement rapide et simple, mme pour les usages les plus complexes. Les 7 boutons EZ vous permettent d'accder instantanment aux fonctions Numrisation automatique, Copie, Email et la cration de PDF multipages. Le bouton de numrisation automatique permet de reconnatre les types de photos, documents et films, et vous propose les paramtres de numrisation et d'enregistrement appropris. L'adaptateur secteur intgr rend l'appareil plus compact, rduisant ainsi l'encombrement sur le bureau. Logiciels intelligents inclus Tirez le meilleur de vos numrisations avec les logiciels fournis My Image Garden et Scanning Utility qui offrent toute une panoplie de fonctions trs utiles. Grez facilement vos documents numriss et servez-vous de la fonction Auto Document Fix pour optimiser l'impression et la qualit des images ou documents finaux. Convertissez des documents en PDF avec protection par mot de passe pour protger vos informations confidentielles.
name: Canon CanoScan 9000F Mark II

description-de_DE-mobile: MV800, 16.1 MP, max. 4608 x 3456, CCD, TTL AF, 5x OZ, Program AE, Auto WB, 10MB, Micro SD/MicroSDHC, HDMI, USB 2.0, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") rotating LCD, 121g
description-de_DE-print: Auf der Suche nach spektakulren Aufnahmen? Die Perspektive machts! Und bei Aufnahmen, bei denen ein tiefer Kamerastandpunkt ntig ist, entfllt zudem das lstige Hinknien. Auch Selbstaufnahmen gelingen spielend leicht das Aufklappen des Displays gengt. Modernste Fototechnik in stilvollem Design Dank ihres glnzenden Metallbodys ist die MV800 auch optisch ein wahrer Hingucker. In ihrem schlichten, minimalistischen Design versteckt sich modernste Fototechnik. Und mit dem modernen Smart Touch 3.0- Bedienkonzept gestaltet sich die Handhabung so einfach, wie bei einem Smartphone. Hochwertige Bildqualitt Ob ausgedehnter Stadtbummel oder Restaurantbesuch mit Freunden, die MV800 bannt mit 16,1-Megapixel-Auflsung die schnsten Momente gestochen scharf und detailreich auf Bild. Und das ist noch nicht alles: Der 5-fach optische Zoom holt weiter Entferntes ganz nah heran, der 26-mm-Weitwinkel bildet Motive in voller Bandbreite ab. So gelingt auch das perfekte Portrt von der besten Freundin oder des ganzen Freundeskreises spielend einfach. Eine Kamera-Bedienung wie beim Smartphone Smartphone-Besitzer fhlen sich schon zu Hause, denn ber den grozgigen Touchscreen lsst sich die MV800 so leicht und intuitiv wie ein Smartphone handhaben. Klare Symbole im App-Stil werden mit leichtem Fingerdruck aktiviert, vllig unkompliziert lsst es sich zwischen unterschiedlichen Einstellungen wechseln und detailgenaue Regelungen knnen vorgenommen werden. Ebenso bequem lassen sich spezielle Effekte aufrufen oder durch bereits gespeicherte Aufnahmen blttern. Personalisieren Sie Ihre Kamera: Whlen Sie aus den verschiedenen Wallpaper-Vorlagen aus oder nutzen Sie ihr eigenes Lieblingsbild fr einen ganz individuell gestalteten Bildschirm. Bild im Bild zeigt beide Seiten der Geschichte Warum sich nur auf ein Bild beschrnken, wenn auch zwei mglich sind? Zeigen Sie beispielsweise beim Kegeln den erfolgreichen Wurf und - alle Neune - gleichzeitig das Jubelgeschrei des Gewinnerteams. Die neue Bild-im-Bild-Funktion ermglicht es, zwei Bilder zu kombinieren und so die komplette Situation einzufangen. Passen Sie Bildgre und -position an und verwandeln Sie das Erlebnis in eine unvergessliche Erinnerung.
description-en_US-mobile: MV800, 16.1 MP, max. 4608 x 3456, CCD, TTL AF, 5x OZ, Program AE, Auto WB, 10MB, Micro SD/MicroSDHC, HDMI, USB 2.0, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") rotating LCD, 121g
description-en_US-print: Groundbreaking Adjustable LCD Screen The 3.0" Flip-Out Display lets you take and view great pictures from multiple angles. Easily adjust the LCD from 0 to 180 degrees and make any shot possible. Snap a picture over a crowd or get waist-level candids of kids and pets, or spin the display for perfectly framed self-portraits. Choose from 3 shutter options to comfortably snap pics from any position. Crisp, Colorful Images and Video Wherever life takes you, capture the moment perfectly. With a 16.1 Megapixel resolution and 5X optical zoom, images and videos are rich and brilliant from any angle, even at long distances. Dual Image Stabilization even eliminates camera shake, so images are at their best: sharp and crisp. When youre ready, view HD videos on the big screen with the built-in HDMI port. Perfect Panorama Getting the wide view has never been easier. Simply take aim and hold the shutter button while you capture the perfect scene. Live Panorama immediately displays the final image in preview, so you can decide if the view you have is the the view you want. Beautiful on the Outside, Too Be fashionable and turn heads with the minimal, sleek design of the MV800. Crafted from seamless shimmering metal and a colorful 3.0" Touchscreen, this stunning camera always makes a bold impressionjust like the pictures it takes. Extend Your Creativity The LCD display is loaded with ways to get creative and add a personal touch to the interface. Create a wallpaper of images with Magic Frame or apply filters and special effects that get your vision just right. Easily navigate creative options with Smart Touch 3.0. Multiple Moments Deliver the whole story with the Picture in Picture function. Insert any image into another, at any size or placement, so no moment has to stand alone. Pair the bowling strike with friends cheering the score or add the birthday gift to the happy smileits all up to you. Spark Your Creativity Explore the possibilities for fun with Magic Frame. Mix your own images into 12 playful templates, or create a custom Magic Frame and add yourself to a group shot of friends or into a crowd. Add Effects to Portraits Have more fun with portraits. The Funny Face feature can bend, stretch and warp your favorite faces. Just tap the screen to play with facial features, as little or as radically as you want. Face Tracking ensures that the distorted portrait stays intact even when you move the camera. The Art of Filters Unleash your creative side with Smart Filter 3.0. Right from the display you can transform any shot just for fun or to express a mood. Give it motion or multiple points of lightor even halftone dots like comic books. You can even make images look like cartoons, paintings and more. Stunning 3D Images 3D Photo transforms any image into stunning 3D. Just connect the camera to a 3D HDTV to display both still images and panoramic photos with incredible depth and dimension. Striking the Right Pose The Pose Guide function displays a gallery of posed models right on the display, so subjects can be easily directed into the perfect posegetting you just the right shot, just like a pro. Striking the Right Pose The Pose Guide function displays a gallery of posed models right on the display, so subjects can be easily directed into the perfect posegetting you just the right shot, just like a pro. Perfect Details Touch up pics on the spot with Photo Editor. Remove blemishes and other imperfections using Beauty Shot, or easily rotate images, add effects and crop out distracting elements right from the display. Tell a Story Creating storyboards for film or TV couldnt be simpler. Choose the right template, place the shots into layout then add text with a virtual keyboard. Then review the story right on the display and you're done. Zoom Noise Reduction Crystal-clear video needs crystal-clear sound. HD Movie with Zoom Noise Reduction (ZNR) automatically adjusts and optimizes sound when recording in HD. It even discards the mechanical noise that comes from using zoom. Intelligent Portraits Portrait takes three different pictures at one time. Snap a wide-angle shot and the camera captures two additional angles simultaneously.

description-de_DE-mobile: FB2280E - CCD, 600dpi, 48bits/24bits, 128MB SDRAM, USB 2.0, 49-120 g/m, USB 2.0, 6.5 kg, incl. UHG
description-de_DE-print: Der Avision FB2280E ist von Grund auf als Buchscanner konzipiert worden. Mit dem CCD Sensor und einer optischen Auflsung von 600dpi, ist er in der Lage qualitativ hochwertige A4 Scans zu produzieren.(4 Sek. mit 300 dpi Farbe). Ein weiteres einzigartiges Feature des FB2280E ist die Dokumentenabdeckung. Mit dieser Abdeckung ist es mglich die Dokumente sicher zu plazieren, ohne da diese whrend des Scannes verrutschen. Zustzlich ist fr den FB2280E ein Dokumenteneinzug optional erhltlich. Dieses ADF hat eine Kapazitt von 50 Blatt mit einer maximalen Dokumentgre von 21,6 x 36,5cm. Der Avision FB2280E ist die perfekte Wahl fr das Scannen von Bchern. Mit der innovativen und patentierten Scanneroberflche des FB2280E kann der Benutzer den gesamten Inhalt eines Buches scannen, ohne dunkle und unscharfe Bereiche zwischen gegenberliegenden Seiten zu erhalten. High Quality Scannlsung Der FB2280E Bildverarbeitungsprozessor basiert auf der CCD Technologie mit 600dpi optischer Auflsung. Somit liefert er perfekte Bildqualitt im Zusammenspiel mit hchst professionellen Business Ansprchen. Automatisches Zuschneiden von verschiedenen Vorlagen Zustlich hat der Scanner eine automatische Vorlagengrenerkennung. Mit Hilfe des Button Manageres, knnen Dokumente wie Bcher, Zeitschriften u.v.m. kontinuierlich und mit einem einfachen Tastendruck nach und nach gescannt werden.Dabei werden die unterschiedlichen Vorlagengren in einem Scan automtisch erkannt und genau zugeschnitten. Scannen mit nur einem Knopfdruck Mit Button Manager knnen neun verschiendene Anwendungen oder Scanziele eingebunden werden. Der Button Manager ermglicht Kopieren, Versenden mit E-Mail, Simplex- oder Duplex-Scan, das alles mit einem Tastendruck. Auerdem knnen Sie Ihre Dokumente mit einem Tastendruck in durchsuchbare PDFs und andere Bildformate scannen und an voreingestelle Ziele speichern. Neue Funktionen Der FB2280E enthlt den neuesten TWAIN Treiber mit neuen Funktionen und Verbesserungen wie zum Bespiel der Einstellung der Empfindlichkeit des dynamischen Schwellenwertes (dynamic threshold), Dokumenten /Foto Farbkorrektur, automatische Erkennung und Zuschneiden der Vorlagengre (auto cropping), sowie die Reduzierung von Flecken. Wir sind bemht den TWAIN Treiber kontinuierlich weiter zu verbessern um die besten Scanergebnisse zu erzielen.
description-en_US-mobile: FB2280E - CCD, 600dpi, 48bits/24bits, 128MB SDRAM, USB 2.0, 49-120 g/m, USB 2.0, 6.5 kg, incl. UHG
description-en_US-print: Avisions book edge scanners feature a unique, innovative flatbed platform, with a slanted front edge engineered to accommodate books in a way that prevents the dark, shadowy area near the spine from appearing. Curved text often seen near the center is also eliminated, since this special design allows pages to spread flat on the scanner. Never again would you need to press the book against the scanner, which distorts the scanned image and potentially damages the book. Avision makes book scanning a breeze! The Avision FB2280E is designed from the ground up to excel at scanning books. Packed with CCD sensors and a 600 dpi optical resolution, it can produce high quality A4 scans in 4 seconds at 200 dpi in black and white. Another unique feature of the FB2280E is the document cover. With this cover, you can temporarily place your documents safely on the scanner, reducing the risk of misplacing them during scanning. An optional ADF add-on is available for the FB2280E, with a 50 sheet capacity and a maximum document size of 21.6 x 36.5cm. The slant front platform makes book scan easy as a breeze With the innovative and patented front platform, the Avision FB2280E allows you to easily scan books and deliver clear images within 2mm of the book spine. Shadow and text distortion commonly found on books scanned by traditional scanners are no longer existed. High Qualities Scanning Solution The FB2280E's core image processing components are CCD based with a 600 dpi optical resolution, enabling it to output picture perfect quality while meeting the most stringent demands of business professionals anywhere. Automatic multiple images cropping In addition, the scanner comes with the convenient feature of multiple images cropping. With this feature, various sizes of documents such as photos, ID Cards, or business cards can be placed on the flatbed and the scanner is able to crop and create multiple images according to the original sizes of the documents in one single scan. Easy-to-use button scanning With the bundled software "Button Manager", you can create searchable pdf file directly after pressing the button on the scanner. Pages are automatically cropped and rotated to the correct orientation and then saved to your choice of file formats including PDF, TIFF, JPEG, GIF, BMP, or searchable PDF. The program also lets you pre-set nine customized functions or destination application such as e-mail, printer, or other photo editing software application for a variety of scanning tasks. Auto crop, deskew and thresholding image-enhancing features FB2280E incorporates the latest TWAIN driver with new features and enhancement such as the ability to adjust sensitivity of dynamic threshold, document/photo color matching, custom color dropout, automatic multiple cropping, and reduce despeckle. We are committed to improving the TWAIN driver continuously to enrich your scanning experience as never before.
name: Avision FB2280E

description-en_US-mobile: LEGRIA HF G30 - 3.09 MP, 1/2.84 HD CMOS PRO 20x Zoom, OIS, DIGIC DV 4, 8.89 cm (3.5 ") , Wi-Fi, SD/SDHC/SDXC, Dolby Digital, HDMI
description-en_US-print: Capture the action like a pro with the Canon LEGRIA HF G30 The flagship LEGRIA HF G30 camcorder packs high-specification optics, sensor and stabiliser plus Wi-Fi connectivity into a compact body, ideal for enthusiasts who want to match their creativity with professional quality videos. - 20x zoom, 26.8mm wide-angle lens; 8 blade circular aperture - Control settings remotely and share with Wi-Fi - Simultaneous recording of AVCHD and MP4 - Canon HD CMOS PRO sensor, DIGIC DV 4 - Optical Intelligent IS - Full manual control - Instant AF; Face Detection - 8.8cm OLED touch screen 20x zoom, 26.8mm wide-angle lens, 8-blade aperture The brand new 26.8mm wide angle lens provides better image quality than ever before in a compact camcorder, while the smooth 20x optical zoom lets you get closer to the action. A new, 8-blade circular aperture enables beautiful Bokeh effect. Wi-Fi Remote Enjoy the freedom of controlling your LEGRIA HF G30 when the camcorder is positioned out of reach. Control a number of settings, including shutter speed, focus and exposure wirelessly by using your smartphone or tablets web browser. Dual-Format Recording Simultaneously record in different formats (AVCHD and MP4) or at different bitrates, to the dual SDXC card slots and enjoy the twin benefits of professional quality footage and easy upload to the web. Capture fast and slow motion when shooting in MP4 format. HD CMOS PRO sensor, DIGIC DV 4 With an effective pixel count of approximately 2.91 megapixels, the new HD CMOS PRO sensor designed and manufactured by Canon for its professional models delivers stunning picture quality, even in low light, as well as wide dynamic range and realistic colour reproduction. The new powerful DIGIC DV 4 image processor works with the sensor to provide images with lower noise and more depth. Optical Intelligent Image Stabilisation Intelligent IS combats camera shake by automatically selecting the right optical image stabilisation from 4 modes to counteract movement and prevent blur. The advanced dynamic mode corrects roll and tilt movements that can occur when walking, ensuring sharp steady videos in every situation. Full Manual Control A manual lens ring allows intuitive control of focus or zoom. Exposure, aperture, shutter speed and gain can all be independently adjusted using the touch screen and customisable control dial, allowing you to unleash your creativity. Instant AutoFocus, Face Detection Instant AF provides fast and accurate focusing for pin-sharp HD quality. Face Detection automatically optimises camcorder settings for perfectly-focused and exposed shots of people. 8.8cm (3.5) fold-out OLED touchscreen and tiltable EVF The responsive organic electrostatic LED touch screen, with a 1.23 million dot resolution, offers superior definition, contrast and colour reproduction over LCD. The 0.61cm (0.24) 1.56 million pixel electronic colour viewfinder can tilt up to 45 to allow you further control especially in bright conditions
name: Canon LEGRIA HF G30

description-en_US-mobile: Visioneer OneTouch Technology, 50 sheets ADF, 600 dpi, 24-bit color, TWAIN, ISIS, WIA, USB 2.0/1.1, Kofax VRS Professional
description-en_US-print: The DocuMate 3460 is a high speed and technologically advance DocuMate and the easiest to use scanner among its competitors. It is packed with features that will change how you look at and manage paper documents and information. Work Easier The DocuMate 3460 is powered by Visioneer OneTouch technology to scan documents to up to 9 preset, yet completely configurable destinations. This enables your document to be scanned with the proper settings for resolution, color, duplex, auto-crop, auto-straighten, file format and then delivered to virtually any application, folder or device in one touch of a button! Integrated with Kofax VRS (Virtual ReScan) technology, imagine the workflow possibilities of delivering perfect scanned paper documents in a searchable PDF format to email or Microsoft SharePoint or a custom web application for your enterprise, all at the touch of a button. Not only is this a productivity gain but greatly reduces the training requirements for scanner users, further helping your return on investment. Work Flexible You dont always know what documents you will need to scan next you might have clean laser quality pages today but tomorrow there maybe multi-colored forms, embossed ID cards, varying sizes of paper. The DocuMate 3460 handles it all. The 50-page automatic document feeder (ADF) makes short work out of any stack of paper of varying size. The front feed tray on the DocuMate 3460 handles scanning plastic cards, such as driving licences, not only increasing the card scanning efficiency, but drastically improving roller wear, making it an extremely cost-effective solution. Work Smarter Smart Ultrasonic Double Feed Detection is built into the Documate 3460 so that youll never miss a page due to a misfeed or a stapled document going through the scanner. Kofax VRS is integrated into the scanner driver so that you get perfect scans from imperfect originals. VRS also eliminates the need to rescan documents through automatic cropping, straightening, brightness control and edge clean-up. All this is also integrated into Visioneer OneTouch so your entire scanning requirements are achieved at the touch of a button. In the end, paper becomes information and flows through the organization under your control.
name: Xerox Documate 3460 Pro

description-en_US-print: High-Endurance Printing at Its Best Simplify high-volume jobs with a fast-thinking powerhouse featuring built-in duplexing, up to 50 ppm print speed, and generous input capacity (650 sheets standard, up to 4,300 sheets with options). Expertly handles a range of media sizes and types, plus offers a rich selection of paper handling and finishing options. Lexmark T652dn Let It Decide the Best Speed Identifies the size and complexity of your job and automatically calculates the optimal speedquicker time-to-first-page for short jobs and more pages per minute for longer jobs. Lexmark T652dn Intelligent Job Waiting No more letting missing media derail hours of print time. The innovative Job Waiting feature will simply hold that job aside, letting others go on working without interruption (requires the hard disk option). Lexmark T652dn Outstanding Print Quality Combines true 1200 x 1200 dpi with automatic darkness adjustment and pixel-boosting technology to ensure high-quality, professional documents every time. Lexmark T652dn Cutting-Edge Security From network security to user-access restrictions, youll be fully equipped to keep valuable data safe and sound. In addition to IPSec, SNMPv3 and 802.1x network security, the Lexmark T652dn offers an alphanumeric pad for easy PIN authentication, plus encryption and disk wiping to secure the optional hard disk. Lexmark T652dn Less Work for IT Network-ready and very easy to set up, plus Universal Driver support for simple deployment. Includes Lexmark MarkVision Professional software for time-saving remote management and automated tools.
name: Lexmark T652DN

description-en_US-mobile: 3D HD Camcorder 3DV5, 5MP, 6.096 cm (2.4 ") LCD, 1/2.5"
description-en_US-print: Now, you are in charge of exciting multi-dimension entertainment with ViewSonics new Shown Go 3D HD Camcorder 3DV5. With two 5 Megapixel sensors built-in, you can easily capture awesome 3D HD videos and 3D still images. No need for special glasses, just playback to preview in 3D instantly on the 2.4" LCD screen. ArcSoft Wizard embedded with 3DV5, allows you to enjoy 3D videos and images on a standard PC or notebook with the included red/cyan glasses. Even upload and share your videos on YouTube 3D using one simple click with intuitive and intelligent software built-in. This palm-sized 3DV5 HD camcorder will make entertaining and sharing fun in full 3D, a snap! 3D By NVIDIA Compatible with the NVIDIA Vison Kit* for awesome 3D effects using 3D shutter glasses. * Not Included Now Playing On Your PC or TV The 3DV5 is compatible with most new 3D HDTVs. With intuitive ArcSoft software Wizard onboard the 3DV5, you can also easily enjoy 3D playback on your regular 2D PC or TV with the included red/cyan glasses. Ready For YouTube The new ViewSonic 3D HD camcorder 3DV5 is integrated with ArcSoft Wizard. One button is all it takes to upload your 3D videos to YouTube 3D or Facebook. View your HD 3D videos with red/cyan glassesit's just that simple and fun. We make it easy to share all your 3D images with the Shown Go 3DV5! See It Instantly in 3D 2.4" LCD onboard preview screen lets you view your 3D videos or photos without the use of 3D glasses. You Choose the Shot Capture all the moments you cherish in full exciting 3D HD 720p videos with dual 5 Megapixel sensors built-in, for 30 frames per second. A simple click switches between 3D or 2D mode! Youll never miss the action. The Shown Go is ready to record every precious memory in HD 3D. From sports events, to your childs soccer practice or the good times your friends and families enjoy together, youll be able to shoot and share it all with ViewSonics 3DV5.
name: Viewsonic 3DV5

description-de_DE-mobile: 600 dpi, CIS (LED), bis zu 3000 seiten, 64MB SDRAM, USB 2.0
description-de_DE-print: Kompakt und schnell Der AV176U bietet ein einzigartiges und stylisches Design. Formschn knnen der Einzugs- und der Ausugspapierhalter bei Nichtgebraucht eingeklappt werden und schtzten den Scanner dabei zustzlich vor Staub. Im Vergleich zu konventionellen Dokumentenscannern, findet der AV176U durch seine kompakte Bauweise auf jedem Schreibtisch Platz. Der AV176U scannt in Farbe, Graustufen und Moncrome mit einer Geschwindigkeit von 30 Seiten pro Minuten im Simplex Modus und 60 Bilder pro Minuten im Duplex Modus. Der Automatische Dokumenteneinzug des AV176U fasst 50 Bltter. Dies macht ein kontinuierliches Scannen ohne Unterbrechungen mglich und steigert so die Effizienz des Arbeitens. Die neuste Avision Anwendung: der Button Manager ermglicht es ihnen komplexe Scannvorgnge in nur einem Schritt zu bewltigen. Sobald der Knopf gedrckt ist, werden die Dokumente gescannt und automatisch in eine BMP, JPEG, GIF oder TIFF Datei oder in ein durchsuchbares PDF gewandelt.
description-en_US-mobile: 600 dpi, CIS (LED), up to 3000 pages, 64MB SDRAM, USB 2.0
description-en_US-print: AV176U, a compact and affordable duplex scanner The AV176U is a 30 page-per-minute, 60 image-per-minute, duplex sheetfed scanner that is fast, reliable, and affordable for business where scanning plastic ID cards, business cards, documents or other heavy card stock is necessary. With the straight paper path, the scanner allows thicker paper up to 400 g/m2 (110 lbs) and embossed plastic cards such as credit cards, or drivers license up to 1.25mm to be transmitted smoothly. Ultrasonic multi-feed detection assures you that not a single page of your documents will be lost. AV176U saves your space when not in use Both the input and output paper tray of the AV176U can be folded when not in use. This feature not only helps prevent the unit from dust but also save more working space. Powerful bundled software applications The AV176U comes with TWAIN and ISIS drivers, and is bundled with a suite of powerful software applications that include Avision Button Manager, AvScan 5.0, and ScanSoft PaperPort 14SE. With Button Manager, you can create searchable PDF, scan and send images to e-mail, printer, or other destinations with just a simple press of a button. The AVScan V5 and ScanSoft PaperPort are highly effective image processing and document management software that helps you streamline your task more efficiently.
name: Avision AV176U
